name: Hotel Tiffany
description: This hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Copenhagen Central Station and Tivoli Gardens. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi access and can choose to buy a in-room continental breakfast. Hotel Tiffany’s rooms feature a kitchenette with a microwave, toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. Guests can enjoy an in-room continental breakfast that consists of yoghurt, juice, cheese, marmelade and patés. A delivery of fresh bread and pastries will be delivered each morning. Tiffany’s staff will gladly share their local knowledge with guests during their stay. A metro station is located 50 metres away.

name: Zoku Copenhagen
description: An innovative apartment hotel designed for living, working and socializing Located within 2.6 km of Copenhagen Central Station, Zoku Copenhagen is designed for professionals, business travelers and remote workers who are on the lookout for a high-design and sustainable apartment hotel for 1 day, to 1 month to 1 year. Zoku Copenhagen features 160 Lofts: private apartment-style rooms that contain a lofted bed, living room, kitchen, bathroom and large 4-person table. The award-winning Zoku Loft is a spacious micro-apartment equally suited for living and working. It is designed for inviting friends and colleagues into your home, working across multiple time zones or getting any job done while exploring the city. Each Loft sleeps two, except the Loft XXL that sleeps 4, and comes equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free high-speed Wi-Fi. You can even personalize your space by choosing your favorite artwork to hang on the walls for inspiration during your stay. When you feel like leaving your private room to socialize, our rooftop Social Spaces on the 5th floor feature the Living Room, Kindred Spirits Bar, Living Kitchen restaurant, Coworking Spaces, Meeting Rooms, Event Space, and a spacious terrace to cater to all the fun and practical needs of Zoku's international mix of residents. The windows throughout the rooftop offer plenty of natural daylight, giving you a much-needed break from the hustle and bustle of the city and a one-of-a-kind view of Amager. The shared spaces are accessible 24/7, with an on-site team of ‘Sidekicks’ to support you during your stay. Copenhagen Central Station is 3 metro stops away and there is a direct metro connection to important business districts and historical sites. Bike rentals are also available at Zoku. The nearest airport is Kastrup Airport, 5.8 km from the property.

name: Go Hotel City
description: Situated in Copenhagen, within 2.8 km of Church of Our Saviour and 4.2 km of The National Museum of Denmark, Go Hotel City features accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as private parking for guests for an additional cost. The property is set 4.3 km from Danish Royal Library, 5 km from Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek and 5 km from Tivoli Gardens. The hotel offers city views, a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at Go Hotel City can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Copenhagen, like hiking, cycling and fishing. Christiansborg Palace is 5 km from Go Hotel City, while The David Collection is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Dragor Hotel & Apartments
description: This waterfront hotel is in Dragør’s historic centre, 12 km from central Copenhagen. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking. All apartments have a 32-inch flat-screen TV and a shared terrace. Dishwashers, electric cookers and tea/coffee facilities are standard features at Dragør Apartments. All apartments have a private entrance, and some provide harbour views. The courtyard garden offers seating areas and BBQ equipment. A traditional Danish restaurant is also found on site. Plaice, pork and steak tartare are just some of its dishes. Copenhagen International Airport is just 6 km from Dragør Hotel & Apartments.

name: Amalie Bed and Breakfast & Apartments
description: This cosy B&B is quietly situated 1 km from Odense Train Station and 900 m from the Hans Christian Andersen Museum. Both high speed Wi-Fi and private parking are free. All rooms and apartments have a cable flat-screen TV. Apartments at Amalie Bed & Breakfast include a fully equipped kitchen, private bathroom, living room and dining area. Linen and towels are included for all guests. Standard rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities and a fully equipped shared kitchen. Free tea and coffee are available. The garden with BBQ facilities and furnished terrace provide a nice place for relaxation. Restaurants and grocery stores can be found in the surroundings. Vestergade pedestrian street is 15 minutes' walk away.

name: City House
description: City House is located in the heart of Odense at the famous Sct. Knudsgade quarter. City House offers a fully equipped apartment with kitchen, bedroom, living room, balcony and a garden. Your stay includes Free Parking, Cleaning, Linens, Towels and Wifi. The apartment includes a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Kitchen facilities include a stove, microwave and fridge. The living room is with a sofa and flat-screen TV with a chrome cast, so you can cast your favorite channels/movies. The pedestrian zone is only a 5-minute walk away. The Hans Christian Andersen Museum is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

name: City Hotel Apartments
description: Set in Odense in the Funen region, with Møntergården City Museum nearby, City Hotel Apartments offers accommodation with free WiFi. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower while the kitchen features a dishwasher. An oven and coffee machine are also featured. For an additional cost guests can add breakfast to their stay at City Hotel Apartments. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the connected City Hotel Nattergalen. A bicycle rental service is available at this property. Popular points of interest near City Hotel Apartments include Carl Nielsen Museum, Odense Concert Hall and Hans Christian Andersens Hus.

name: Skagen Strand Hotel Og Feriecenter
description: Right by Hulsig Station and 800 metres from Skagen Beach, this resort offers an indoor water park and free sports centre. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a private south-facing terrace with garden furniture. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s apartments have a seating area and a private bathroom. All are equipped with a TV and a CD player. Some houses has a washing machine if not there are public washing facilities. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s water park includes a 48-metre water slide and sauna facilities. The sports centre features a gym and tennis, mini golf and badminton courts. Children can enjoy access to several playgrounds and play areas on site. Guests have free access to all facilities. The resort’s restaurant serves international and Danish cuisine. Free public parking spaces are found nearby.

name: The Cherry Apartment - 'Den Gule Svane' Guest House near Rønne & Beach
description: Boasting a garden, barbecue facilities and views of garden, The Cherry Apartment - 'Den Gule Svane' Guest House near Rønne & Beach is located in Rønne, 12 km from Natur Bornholm. Featuring bicycle parking, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. All units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a walk-in shower. At The Cherry Apartment - 'Den Gule Svane' Guest House near Rønne & Beach every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. The accommodation offers a picnic area. The area is popular for snorkelling and windsurfing, and bike hire is available at The Cherry Apartment - 'Den Gule Svane' Guest House near Rønne & Beach. The Echo Valley is 15 km from the guest house, while Østerlars Church is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, a few steps from The Cherry Apartment - 'Den Gule Svane' Guest House near Rønne & Beach.

name: Essenbaekgaard B&B
description: Essenbaekgaard B&B has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Assentoft, 7.1 km from Memphis Mansion. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. Kitchenware is also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Essenbaekgaard B&B offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Randers Regnskov - Tropical Forest is 8.6 km from Essenbaekgaard B&B, while Djurs Sommerland is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 35 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Palads Hotel
address: Sct. Mathias Gade 5, 1. Floor, Viborg, Central Jutland
description: A charming city hotel in the middle of Viborg. Hotel Palads, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is located in the center of Viborg, right by the city's pedestrian street. Here you can experience one of Denmark's oldest cities, which offers exciting museums, cozy medieval streets and good opportunities for shopping in the city's cozy shops. Also visit Viborg Cathedral when you are in town. It is the world's largest granite church. In the hotel's restaurant you will find good quality and traditional Danish food, served with love in a traditional setting. On the terrace outside the hotel, it is possible to relax and enjoy a good glass of wine, a cold beer or a good meal in the sun. The rooms at Hotel Palads, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western are located in five buildings, surrounded by our parking spaces, which are free for hotel guests.bestwestern.com

name: Danhostel Fredericia
description: This hostel lies next to Madsby Park and the historical miniature village of Fredericia. It offers a communal kitchen and rooms with a TV. The rooms at Danhostel Fredericia have direct access to either a terrace or the garden. Each room has a private bathroom with shower. Danhostel Fredericia has a large terrace with park and lake views. In summer, guests can make use of the barbecue area in the surrounding garden. Other facilities include a guest TV lounge. A children’s playground is found in Madsby Park, 1 km away.

name: Fladbro Kro
description: Dating back to 18th century, this inn is situated next to Fladbro Forest. It offers a gourmet inn restaurant and apartments with a fully equipped kitchen and free Wi-Fi access. Randers city centre is an 11-minute drive away. A seating area, dining area and flat-screen TV feature in all apartments at Fladbro Kro. Each apartment has a bathroom with shower and a furnished terrace. Some apartments feature a kitchen. The in-house restaurant serves slow food dishes based on local ingredients. Meals can be enjoyed at the outdoor serving during summer. Bicycles can be borrowed for free on site. Randers Golf Club is a 2-minute drive away. Silkeborg city centre is 50 km from the inn.

name: Hotel Marina
description: This hotel is next to Grenå Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from Kattegatcentret Oceanarium. It offers free sauna and indoor pool access, plus free Wi-Fi. Satellite TV and minibars are standard at Hotel Marina. Some rooms have a seating area and work desk. Facilities include a children's playground and activity centre with billiards and table tennis options. Staff can recommend walking trails and jogging tracks in the nearby forest. Parking is free at Hotel Marina. Guests can drive to Djurs Sommerland Theme Park, 25 minutes away.

name: Hotel Sleep2Night
description: This hotel is 3 km from central Helsingør, the ferry terminals and Kronborg Castle. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, a popular breakfast and a parking place directly outside their room. Hotel Sleep2Night’s rooms have a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Other facilities at Sleep2Night include a large terrace and bicycle rental. Guests seeking nature will find forests and a beach within 5 minutes’ drive of Hotel Sleep2Night. Hotel staff can recommend nearby restaurants and attractions.

name: Benniksgaard Hotel
description: Situated at the highest point in Rinkenæs by Flensburg Firth – with Benniksgaard Golf Course as its closest neighbour – the four star Benniksgaard Hotel, BW Signature Collection boasts views of unparalleled beauty. Benniksgaard takes its name from a family farm dating all the way back to 1393. Today, Benniksgaard is privately owned and run as a hotel. All the buildings have undergone a comprehensive and painstaking renovation. The rustic style, exposed beams and bright colours create an airy, inviting atmosphere. The old chicken house has been transformed into Restaurant Pejsestuen, the longest wing into a hotel wing with 31 rooms – and the old farmhouse from 1782 into fourteen stunning spacious rooms and suites. With its squinting walls, sash windows and creaking floors, the listed farmhouse is a constant reminder of bygone times. The first floor staircase is a particularly interesting relic, and indeed, its narrow steps have been a constant feature of the farmhouse. The old grain stores and a recently added wing are home to several function and conference rooms, while the wing formerly occupied by agricultural machinery now houses BenniksgaardButik shop, offering a wide range of items to suit all tastes.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotel Herman Bang
description: This hotel is 350 metres from Frederikshavn Train Station and Ferry Terminal. It features free Wi-Fi. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, desk and private bathroom. American and Mexican cuisine can be enjoyed at Hotel Herman Bang's own Restaurant Empire. Other options include Restaurant Herman serving classic Danish dishes, as well as Café Empire that offers Italian coffee, paninis and desserts. Best Western Herman Bang's central location provides easy access to Frederikshavn's many shops and restaurants. Private parking spaces are found behind the hotel.

name: Hestkær Family Rooms
description: Featuring a spacious children's playroom with a ball pit and an outdoor playground, Hestkær Family Rooms offers pet-friendly accommodation in Grindsted. Legoland and Lalandia are only a 20-minute drive away. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, Playstation 3 console and video games. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. There are 2 guest kitchens at the property and an outdoor barbecue area. Breakfast baskets can be booked on site. Guests can relax in the outdoor seating areas, while children can enjoy outdoor activities in the garden surroundings at Hestkær Family Rooms. You can also play table tennis and billiards at this hostel. Herning is 49 km from Hestkær Family Rooms, while Kolding is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Billund Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: Hotel Strandtangen
description: This hotel is located by the scenic Skive Fjord. It offers an à la carte restaurant and spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi and views of Skive Marina or the Krabbeholm Forest. All rooms and apartments of Hotel Strandtangen feature modern bathroom and the apartments have furnished balconies with views of the water. Apartments include floor heating and fully equipped kitchenettes. Strandtangen Hotel’s restaurant has modern décor and serves both Danish cuisine and international dishes. Its waterfront terrace is a popular meeting place in summer. Guests can relax in Strandtangen’s cosy lounge, which has a flat-screen TV and an open fireplace. Staff can help arrange a variety of activities, including canoeing and kayaking. Central Skive is 2.5 km from Hotel Strandtangen. Local buses stop just outside the door, and private parking is free for guests.

name: Hjerting Badehotel
description: Situated directly on the beach, this hotel is 9 km away from Esbjerg’s town centre. It offers free Wi-Fi, impressive North Sea views, along with a small sauna and fitness room. The light and airy guest rooms at Hjerting Badehotel all include a flat-screen TV and minibar. Several have scenic views over Skallingen and the islands of Fanø and Langli. Guests can enjoy gourmet cuisine and panoramic views of Ho Bay at the on-site Restaurant Strandpavillonen. Ship-Inn, the hotel’s English pub and café, serves light dishes and drinks in a relaxed setting. Bicycles can be rented at Badehotel Hjerting to explore the surroundings. Hotel staff can recommend several golf courses located nearby. Free parking is available on site.

name: Rotzowlund Bnb
description: Located in Grenå and only 24 km from Djurs Sommerland, Rotzowlund BnB provides accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The property features inner courtyard views. The 1-bedroom bed and breakfast is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Rotzowlund BnB can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 30 km from the accommodation.

name: Kyndestoft Bed & Breakfast
description: Set in Holstebro in the Midtjylland region and Jyske Bank Boxen reachable within 43 km, Kyndestoft Bed & Breakfast offers accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a garden and free private parking. Some of the units feature a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Kyndestoft Bed & Breakfast can enjoy hiking nearby, or benefit from the sun terrace. Herning Kongrescenter is 39 km from the accommodation, while Elia Sculpture is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Midtjyllands Airport, 30 km from Kyndestoft Bed & Breakfast.

name: Køge Bed & Kitchen - Rooms
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel Hillerod
description: We live in the heart of North Sealand. Our trails take you from the baroque history and through to today’s modern activities. Magnificent forests, lakes and sports routes surround us. The city and the nature has inspired us. We have created our own little village with twisted avenues, green plants and sunshine ray. Our rooms have the opportunity for families, business or couples on vacation. At the Best Western Hotel Hillerod we greet you and you can recognize us for our desire and passion for creating the best setting for you and your stay. We take great pride in helping you to find everything you want to explore. At Restaurant Krydderiet, we take pride in presenting you for the best ingredients. During the summer, we collect strawberries from local farmer’s fields, in the autumn we collect plants and mushrooms in the forest and outside our windows, we grow our own herbs. The passion for food and our professional commitment makes a visit at us an experience for all senses.bestwestern.com

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.

name: Løkken Badehotel Apartments
description: This hotel is only 300 metres from Løkken Beach and 20 minutes’ drive from Fårup Sommerland Amusement Park. It offers traditional Danish food and a hot tub, sauna and indoor pool. Løkken Badehotel’s apartments feature kitchens with refrigerators, dishwashers and tea/coffee facilities. Living rooms with cable TV are standard features, while a communal laundry room is also available on site. Løkken Badehotel Apartments' central location offers easy access to shops, cafés and bars. Løkken Golf Club is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Medio
description: This hotel is 1.5 km off the E20, a 1-hour drive from Legoland. It offers free parking and WiFi. The terrace provides a chance to relax after a long drive. Cable TV, private bathrooms and simple décor are standard features in Hotel Medio Fredericia's rooms Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Daily specials are served in the hotel restaurant each evening. A children’s playground offers swings and a trampoline. Popular area activities include hiking, fishing and cycling. The old truss bridge that crosses Denmark's Little Belt strait is 4 km from Medio Hotel.

name: Danninghus
description: No description found

name: Comwell Kongebrogaarden
description: Comwell Kongebrogaarden Hotel overlooks the Lillebælt Strait, 5 minutes’ drive from Middelfart and Snoghøj. It offers an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. All rooms have a private balcony or shared terrace. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee making facilities and seating areas are found in each room. Relaxation options include a lounge with a fireplace and a large, sea-view terrace. The in-house restaurant serves Danish and international dishes. Comwell Kongebrogaarden is situated next to a large marina. The green surroundings of Kongebroskoven Deer Park are ideal for walks. There are 16 golf courses within a 1-hour drive of the hotel.

name: Hotel Udsigten Marstal
description: Featuring garden and sea views, Udsigten Marstal is an accommodation located in Marstal. The property offers free WiFi. Extra beds are available at this property, please contact the accommodation if desired. Continental breakfast is served daily at the property. The hotel offers a sun terrace. Guests can also relax in the garden or on the shared lounge area.

name: Dana Cup Sportscenter
description: Just 2.5 km from the centre of Hjørring, guests at this hostel have access to a TV room, free WiFi and a furnished terrace with BBQ facilities. The rooms and cottages at Dana Cup SportsCenter have simple interiors and come with a private bathroom. Cottages also have a kitchenette and outdoor seating area. Guests can also pay for access to an adjoining sports club with tennis course, swimming pools and a gym. Lønstrup and Skallerup beaches are within 20 minutes’ drive, and Hjørring golf club is only 3 km away.

name: Munkebjerg Bed & Breakfast
description: Surrounded by lush and unspoiled beech forests is the Munkebjerg Bed & Breakfast, an excellent base for visits to both the Legoland Theme Park and Givskud Zoo. Close by is also the city of Kolding and the historical fortress town Fredericia. Billund Airport is just a 35 minute drive away. The newly renovated and comfortable guest rooms at Munkebjerg all include satellite TV, free internet access and heated floors. The new beds are fitted with high-quality mattresses, which guarantee a good night's sleep. Please note that the bathroom facilities are shared. Children will enjoy the outdoor play area.

name: Vandrehuset 2 og 3
description: No description found

name: Agroturismo Can Guillem
address: Carretera Santa Gertrudis, Km 0,100, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and large gardens, Can Guillem is a stylish converted farmhouse set in the Ibizan countryside. It offers free Wi-Fi and is located 5 km from Ibiza Town. The interior of Can Guillem features traditional tiled floors and whitewashed walls. Each air-conditioned room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Can Guillem offers massage services and a hot tub. Car and bicycle rental is available and you can also hire a boat or take sailing lessons. The hotel offers a charming terrace and you can order meals on request. In Ibiza Town there is a wide variety of restaurants and bars, as well as the world-famous nightclub Pacha. Ibiza Golf Club is a 15-minute drive from Can Guillem. A shuttle service to San José Airport, located 10 km away, is available on request.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Palma Suites
address: Plaça Mercadal, 8, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma’s old town, Palma Suites offers modern, air-conditioned suites with a fully equipped kitchen and free WiFi. It features a roof terrace and a gym. Featuring Nordic-style dècor, each suite is equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and dishwasher, a lounge-dining area with sofas, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They feature heated flooring and individually controlled heating. Different cleaning services are provided according to the length of stay. There is a café-bar on site and breakfast is offered upon request. Many dining options, bars and shops can be found in the area surrounding Palma Suites. Club Náutico is 15 minutes’ walk from the suites. Palma Beach is 2 km away and Palma Airport is 9 km from Palma Suites. Public parking is available 150 metres away and for an extra cost.

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa
address: 7610 Calle Caravel La Playa De Palma, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in the centre of Playa de Palma and on the beachfront, Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa offers modern accommodation with flat-screen TVs. The complex overlooks the beach and includes an outdoor pool and spa. Fontanellas Playa has a large sports area with a mini-football pitch and guests will find a playground next to the complex. The spa has a sauna, hot tub and a seasonal indoor pool. WiFi is free in all areas incluiding in the rooms. Each of the rooms and apartments has a private bathroom, air conditioning and a furnished balcony. The apartments also have a fully equipped kitchen. The complex is situated just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca, and is surrounded by bars and restaurants. Palma de Mallorca Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Zhero Hotel Mallorca
description: Hotel Zhero is a chic boutique hotel in the hills overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, 7 km outside Palma de Mallorca. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool with loungers. All air-conditioned rooms at the Zhero Hotel feature stylish, minimalist décor all in white. They come with a flat-screen plasma TV, a private balcony and private bathroom complete with hairdryer. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. À la carte Mediterranean food is available for lunch. The Zhero has a lounge bar with a poolside terrace where you can get a cocktail or a coffee. The pool area is also equipped with ambient lighting and music for parties or other social events. The Hotel Zhero is 5 minutes’ drive from Bendinat Golf Course and 5 minutes from a secluded beach. It is a 10-minute drive to the town of Portals Nous where you can find several restaurants and bars.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Hotel y Apartamentos Leman
address: Avinguda Son Rigo 6, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.4 km from Can Pastilla Beach, Leman Hotel y Apartamentos provides a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Leman Hotel y Apartamentos, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Palma Yacht Club is 14 km from the accommodation, while Palma Port is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Leman Hotel y Apartamentos.

name: The Hype Beachhouse
address: Carrer de la Grua 2, 07608 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, The Hype Beachhouse offers a rooftop pool, and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the aparthotel serves Italian cuisine. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings. Can Pastilla Beach is less than 1 km from The Hype Beachhouse, while Cala Estancia Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Paguera Treff Boutique Hotel
address: Bulevar de Paguera, n 31, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: This pleasant hotel is located on Paguera’s seafront Boulevard in the centre of the resort. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, most with sea views and some has terrace, 20 metres from Palmyra Beach. The Paguera Treff’s spacious rooms feature Mediterranean-style decor and all come with satellite TV, a safe and a full private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast and has a restaurant offering regional cuisine. Starters and desserts are served buffet-style, while main dishes are à la carte. There is also a bar area and terrace. You can hire a car or bicycle, or going snorkelling and diving at the beach. The Andratx Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ drive away and you can reach lively Magaluf by car in 12 minutes. Paguera Treff is located 20 minutes’ drive from Palma and its airport.

name: Portals Hills Boutique Hotel
description: Surrounded by gardens with an outdoor pool, Portals Hills Boutique Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Portals Marina. This stylish hotel has an on-site restaurant, pool bar and night club. Offering impressive sea views and a private balcony, all spacious modern accommodation features chic décor, air conditioning and free WiFi. There is a seating area, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some suites have Fendi furniture, a roof terrace and private lift. At Portals Hills Boutique Hotel you will find a modern fitness centre, a wellness lounge, and a concierge service. Real Bendinat Golf Course is 3 km from the property and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 23 km away.

name: Melia Cala d'Or Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer Portinatx, 16-18, Cala d'Or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Meliá Cala d'Or offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi throughout the hotel. Located in Cala d'Or, this property is just minutes from the center of Cala d'Or, Cala Gran and Cala Ferrera, You can have a meal at Restaurant Es Llaüt, Sa Pastera, or Salon Wistaria. There is an outdoor pool with a whirlpool and a children's pool surrounded by gardens. This elegant hotel has a central sun terrace and gardens. Rooms feature elegant Mediterranean design and include air condition and free WiFi. In addition, the junior suites have a kitchen and lounge. Es Llaüt is open for breakfast and evening for dinner with local and international cuisine. In Sa Pastera Bar, located poolside, you can enjoy all day drinks and snacks at noon. In addition, during the summer months, it is open at night so they can enjoy a wonderful dinner in a quiet and perfect environment. At the spa, you can enjoy the heated pool, spa bath, sauna, steam bath and bithermal shower and gym. We also have massages and beauty treatments. Room rates include free access to the spa and gym.

name: Bennoc Petit Hotel
address: Cami De Aguila, Km 3.7, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi, Bennoc Petit Hotel - Only Adults is located 3.5 km from Llucmajor, in Mallorca. It features a shared swimming pool and on-site restaurant. S’Arenal Beach is a 15-minute drive away. This hotel offers heated double rooms with a private bathroom. All rooms have a minibar and flat-screen TV. Set in a XII century building, the property has a shared terrace and garden. The restaurant offers a buffet breakfast and dinner. Mayorca Golf Resort is 5 km from Bennoc Petit Hotel - Only Adults, and Palma de Mallorca Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Palma Port, with ferry services to Barcelona, Valencia, Ibiza and Menorca, is 30 km away.

name: Marriott's Club Son Antem
address: Ctra MA 19 Salida 20, Tourism Registry License A/2178, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Plan an unforgettable vacation at Marriott's Club Son Antem in Mallorca, Spain. Set on a manicured property, our vacation ownership resort offers spacious two- and three-bedroom townhouses filled with modern amenities. Our vacation rentals sit near some of the area's most popular attractions. Visit Llucmajor and Palma de Mallorca, relax on local beaches, browse the shops and tour castles, cathedrals, ruins and more. Swim in our resort's connected indoor/outdoor pool, work out in our fitness center, practice your swing on our two golf courses or pamper yourself in our spa. Perfect for families, our Mallorca resort offers Pepe’s Place Kid's Club and other child-friendly activities. Grab a snack at The Marketplace or indulge in global cuisine at La Terrassa Mediterranean Bar & Grill. Each townhouse provides separate living and dining areas, stylish bathrooms with whirlpool tubs, full kitchens, laundry facilities and furnished outdoor patios. Discover the difference at Marriott's Club Son Antem.Marriott

name: Plazamar Serenity Resort
description: Situated 450 metres from Santa Ponsa Beach, Plazamar Serenity Resort offers a lagoon-style pool surrounded by palm trees and sun loungers. Each bright studio has a kitchenette and a balcony with pool or mountain views. Plazamar Serenity Resort are situated in the popular Mallorcan resort of Santa Ponsa. A wide range of shops, restaurants and bars can be found within a 5-minute walk. Each air-conditioned Plazamar Serenity Resort studio has a sofa bed and a dining table. The kitchenette includes a microwave, fridge and kettle. Free WiFi is available at the property's lobby. You can enjoy international meals in the café or at the poolside snack bar. There are weekly barbecues in summer. The complex also offers daily entertainment and activities for all ages. You can arrange car or bicycle hire at the 24-hour front desk. Staff can also provide information about the island.

name: Viva Blue & Spa
address: Carrer Del Passeig De Bateman, Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: This seasonal aparthotel is 200 metres from Playa de Muro Beach, beside the S’Albufera Nature Reserve, in northern Mallorca. It offers a semi-Olympic outdoor pool, indoor and outdoor pool, heated during winter months, a spa and free parking. All air-conditioned apartments at Viva Blue have a satellite TV, private balcony and a safe. Some have views over the S'Albufera Nature Reserve. The open-plan kitchen is equipped with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a poolside snack bar, a mini-market and a buffet restaurant with special menus for children. The hotel is well equipped to welcome athletes. The Viva Blue spa includes a sauna, a fully equipped gym and massage services on request. The hotels has special facilities for cyclists, including bike storage, a cycling shop, tools and an area to clean the bikes. The local area offers a great variety of outdoor activities such as trekking and cycling. There is a games room, a children’s play area, and the children's club offers organized activities with an entertainment team. This is a seasonal hotel, open from February to November.

name: Valentin Park Club
description: This hotel is 300 metres from the centre of town and 400 metres from Paguera Beach. The Valentin Park Clubhotel is set in more than 10,000m² of gardens. The hotel has a large swimming pool and a terrace with sun beds. There are also children’s pools. A heated indoor pool is available in winter. Other facilities include a sauna and a gym. Valentin Park Clubhotel offers a wide range of entertainment for adults and children. There are professional shows and activities. There is also a playground. All rooms have a balcony. There is satellite TV and full air conditioning. The hotel is in a quiet area of Paguera. This resort offers more hours of sun than any other area in Mallorca. The nearby beaches are ideal for surfing and water skiing.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Trh Jardin Del Mar
address: Huguet des Far, s/n, 07748 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Overlooking Santa Ponsa Bay in south-western Mallorca, Jardín del Mar offers air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony. It has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace offering fantastic views. The apartments and rooms at TRH Jardín del Mar have a kitchenette with a fridge. They have tiled floors and are equipped with satellite TV. The Hotel Jardín del Mar has a café-bar with big screens. There is also a poolside snack bar. Leisure facilities include a seasonal indoor pool and a sauna, available for a surcharge. The lively resort of Magaluf is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Jardín del Mar. You can walk to Santa Ponsa Beach in around 5 minutes.

name: Viva Sunrise
description: The Aparthotel VIVA Sunrise is located in Puerto Alcudia, just 400 metres from the beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, separate adult and children’s pools, surrounded by sun terraces with loungers and parasols. Apartments and studios feature air conditioning and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. They also include a balcony and private bathroom. VIVA Sunrise has a poolside bar, La Palapa, serving snacks and light meals, including pizza. Guests can enjoy buffet meals at Caprice restaurant and an à la carte menu at El Patio. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at Sunrise’s tour desk. This is a seasonal hotel, open from April to October.

name: Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel
address: Av.Beat Ramon Llull, 53, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set in Cala Millor, 800 metres from Cala Bona Beach, Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a seasonal outdoor pool. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Cala Millor Beach is less than 1 km from the aparthotel, while Natural Park S'Albufera de Mallorca is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 68 km from Aparthotel Ciudad Laurel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Marins Beach Club Hotel Adults Only
description: Situated 300 metres from Cala Millor Beach, Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Cala Millor and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms have a balcony. A Full English/Irish, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English and Spanish at the reception. Sa Coma Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 70 km from Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fincahotel Can Estades
address: Cami De Son Pillo,n°15, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This beautiful country hotel is set in the countryside outside Calvià. Can Estades is surrounded by attractive gardens and features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with views of the Tramuntana Mountains. Can Estades offers attractive rooms, studios and apartments. All accommodation has bright attractive décor with beamed ceilings. There is air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a fridge. Apartments and studios have kitchen facilities and a seating area. A buffet breakfast including homemade bread and jams, as well as local cheese and hams, is served in the sunny terrace or dining room. Eggs can also be prepared on request. You can enjoy a drink from the honesty bar on the balcony or the terrace. The centre of Calvià is 1.5 km from the hotel and the nearest beaches are 10 minutes’ drive away. Palma and its airport are within 30 km of the Estades.

name: Zafiro Tropic
description: Zafiro Tropic is located 200 metres from the beach in Port d’Alcúdia in northern Mallorca. It has a large garden, 3 swimming pools and a spa with Turkish baths. All apartments and studios at Zafiro Tropic are air-conditioned and have a private balcony. They also have satellite TV. Hotel Zafiro Tropic has one pool with a pirate ship and slides and one chillout pool with Balinese beds. In the garden there are loungers and parasols, and the hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. Zafiro Tropic’s Caprice restaurant serves Mediterranean and international food. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar, La Palapa. El Patio bar and restaurant offers nightly shows, and you can enjoy cocktails in Cafe-Bar Babalú. The S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 km away from Zafiro Tropic- The town of Alcúdia, located 2 km away, has a 14th-century wall.

name: Viva Eden Lago
address: Carrer De Les Savines, Urb. Lago Esperanza, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The Eden Lago’s setting just 300 metres from the beach on Majorca’s Alcudia Bay makes it an ideal spot for a relaxing break in the sunshine. The aparthotel’s facilities also allow you to make the most of the island’s amazing climate, with an outdoor swimming pool and terraces surrounded by lush gardens. You can also enjoy the tranquillity offered by the nearby S’Albufera Nature Park and the historic seaside city of Alcudia.

name: Aparthotel Alcudia Garden
address: Avinguda De La Platja, 1, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 80 m from the magnificent, spacious and sandy Alcudia Bay Beach, the hotel offers an ideal location for a relaxing holiday, with 2 swimming pools and 8000m² of beautiful gardens. Enjoy a fun-filled break for all the family at the Alcudia Garden Aparthotel, whose spacious, air-conditioned accommodation has a balcony where you can soak up the sun. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Relax in the sauna and hot tub, or spend the time swimming in the sea or the hotel’s pools. Choose from activities including free-of-charge sports such as archery, table tennis and aerobics, or visit the Alcudia Garden’s fitness centre. At night, enjoy performances and shows, including live music in the summer. There is a bar by the pool. Children can have fun at the playground, in the children’s pool, and with the entertainment programme led by the hotel’s monitors. There is also a mini-club for kids aged 4-12. The Aparthotel Alcudia Garden is also set close to s’Albufera, the top Natural Park in the Balearic Islands. You can explore the natural surroundings with a bike rented at the hotel, or head to the cosmopolitan Puerto del Alcudia for a range of activities.

name: Inner Kompas Studios
description: No description found

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Tottam Art & Healthy Garden
description: Located in Málaga, 18 km from La Cala Golf and 19 km from Plaza de Espana, Tottam Art & Healthy Garden provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The lodge provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. A stovetop and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Benalmadena Puerto Marina is 26 km from Tottam Art & Healthy Garden, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: El Nogal Home
address: Av. Juan Sebastián Elcano 62, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This charming guest house features a typical Andalusian patio with a sun terrace. It is located in the peaceful residential area of Pedregalejo, east of Málaga city and close to the beach. The guest house's air-conditioned rooms are decorated in an attractive traditional style. Each room has a private bathroom and offers free Wi-Fi. Hostal El Nogal has an outdoor hot tub which can be used for free during the summer months. Guests have access to a shared kitchen. Beside Hostal El Nogal there is a small café where guests can have breakfast. As well as the beach, the hotel is also just a short journey from the old historic centre, the Picasso museum and all of the bars and nightlife. Regular bus services leave from a stop located outside the building, taking you to Teatinos, Puerta Blanca and the Olympic Stadium.

name: Welcome Hostel
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Churriana district of Churriana, Welcome Hostel is 2.6 km from Campo de Golf Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 9.2 km from Automobile and Fashion Museum. The units in the hostel are equipped with a kettle. At Welcome Hostel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Benalmadena Puerto Marina is 10 km from the accommodation, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 1 km from Welcome Hostel.

name: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments
address: Av. Del Sol, 5, Benalmádena, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments are located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, and feature 2 large outdoor pools, and 2 children’s pools. Facilities include 6 seasonal bars and restaurants, a large supermarket, and free wi-fi. All Apartments at the Sunset Beach Club have a balcony or terrace, fully equipped kitchenette, individually controlled air-conditioning/heating, satellite TV, and safe. A hair & beauty salon and fitness centre are also available (fees apply). Free guest activities and entertainment are offered all year round. Guests can enjoy hot buffet breakfasts and dinners inside the Oasis Restaurant. A la carte lunches and dinners, afternoon snacks and cocktails, are available at La Terraza terrace restaurant. The Panorama Bar boasts spectacular sea views, and shows live international sports on TV.

name: Camping Torremolinos
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the beach, Camping Torremolinos offers air-conditioned bungalows and mobile homes with a private patio and TV. The campsite features a bar and a restaurant. Some bungalows or mobile homes have a bathroom and a kitchen. Camping Torremolinos offers free WiFi throughout its premises. Malaga Airport is 4 km from the campsite and Malaga city centre is a 10-minute drive away. You can reach Aqualand Water Park and Plaza Mayor Shopping Centre in a 5-minute drive. Free parking is available on site.

name: 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden, and a terrace, 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea provides accommodation in Málaga with free WiFi and sea views. This property offers a private pool and free private parking. The air-conditioned chalet consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the chalet. A private beach area is available on site. Popular points of interest near the chalet include Playa de La Cala - La Butibamba, Playa El Bombo - Cabo Rocoso and Playa de Calahonda - Rocas del Mar. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 37 km from 2 Bed Townhouse with garden patio overlooking La Cala Cove & Sea.

name: Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria 24, Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking the sea, the adults-only Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only is an ideal accommodation for spending a relaxing break in the sun on the island of Gran Canaria. Lie back and soak up the sun on one of the loungers or hammocks surrounding the complex’s year-round heated pool. There is also a free spa centre and fitness suite on site where you can enjoy a range of treatments or a relaxing massage for a surcharge. The on-site restaurant and bar, The Club, offers a buffet breakfast and a more formal sit-down meal in the evening. After dining, you can sit back with a drink in the poolside bar or in the rooftop chill out. The rooms in the Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only boast balconies or terraces with views of Puerto Rico and the sea. They all have a kitchenette and free WiFi.

name: Servatur Terrazamar Suite & Sun Suite
address: Avda de las Palmeras 5- 8, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: This large and well-equipped apartment complex is situated in the resort of Puerto Rico, in the south of Gran Canaria – ideal for a fun-filled holiday in the sun. Terrazamar Sun Suite is built on a valley side and has terraces on various levels offering great views of the valley and the Atlantic Ocean. You can also choose to relax and sunbathe on the large private terrace of your own apartment. Take a dip in the large on-site swimming pool or lie back in comfort on the sun loungers. You can also get active by playing a game of tennis on the complex’s courts. Use the Terrazamar as a base to visit the famous beaches of Puerto Rico, just over a kilometre from the complex.

name: Vistaflor Puerto Plata
address: Avenida de la Cornisa 7, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Vistaflor Puerto Plata offers accommodation set in Mogán, less than 1 km from Playa de Puerto Rico and 2.2 km from Amadores Beach. Free WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchenette, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden views. The aparthotel offers 3-star accommodation with a solarium and year-round outdoor pool. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Vistaflor Puerto Plata, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Anfi Tauro Golf Course is 4.4 km from the accommodation, while Yumbo Centre is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 44 km from Vistaflor Puerto Plata.

name: Grupotel Revoli
address: Av. Mogan,11, 35140 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set in Puerto Rico de Gran Canaria, 800 metres from Playa de Puerto Rico and 1.8 km from Amadores Beach, Grupotel Revoli offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a garden and a terrace. All self-catered units feature tiled floors and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available every morning at the aparthotel. Grupotel Revoli offers 4-star accommodation with a public bath. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy table tennis on site, or go cycling or hiking in the surroundings. Playa de Tauro is 2.8 km from Grupotel Revoli, while Anfi Tauro Golf Course is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 44 km from the aparthotel.

name: Holiday Club Playa Amadores
address: Avenida Minstra Anna Lindh 1, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: With Amadores Beach reachable in 200 metres, Holiday Club Playa Amadores offers accommodation, a restaurant, pool with a view, a terrace and a bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Offering sea or pool views, each unit comes with a kitchen, a satellite flat-screen TV and DVD player, outdoor furniture, a washing machine and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers 5-star accommodation with a solarium. A car rental service is available at Holiday Club Playa Amadores. Playa de Tauro is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Playa de Puerto Rico is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria, 46 km from Holiday Club Playa Amadores, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Holiday Club Vista Amadores
address: Calle Montana Clara,12, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Holiday Club Vista Amadores features a sauna and a fitness room, as well as accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchen in Amadores. The aparthotel offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and bath or shower. A dishwasher and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Some units have a balcony. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Guests can enjoy a meal at the in-house restaurant, which specialises in local cuisine. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. A car rental service is available at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Playa del Ingles is 15 km from the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Holiday Club Vista Amadores.

name: Bull Vital Suites & Spa
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria, 80, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: BULL Vital Suites & Spa offers luxury accommodation next to Maspalomas Golf Course, in southern Gran Canaria. The complex has 2 outdoor pools, gardens and 1 free spa entry per person per stay. Each spacious room features a private balcony or terrace with views over the golf course, Maspalomas Dunes or the pool. They come with air conditioning, 2 satellite TVs, free WiFi, safe for hire, and minibar. The spacious junior suites include a separate seating area and kitchenette. The bathroom has a bath or shower, bathrobe, hairdryer, and beach towels. The Vital Suites features a Roman-style spa, with a sauna, thermal pools, and steam bath. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The property also offers medical services and rehabilitation treatments, and a personal trainer can be requested. The complex offers a restaurant and a poolside bar.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and golf are offered onsite. A gym and squash are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Club Vista Serena
description: The Vista Serena is located in Maspalomas, 1 km outside Playa del Inglés in Gran Canaria. Surrounded by gardens, they offer 2 outdoor pools and a sun terrace with loungers. All apartments at the Vista Serena have a private terrace. They also consist of a bedroom, a living-dining room with sofa bed, and a bathroom. The kitchen is equipped with a hob, fridge and microwave. There is satellite TV in the living room, and the complex offers a DVD rental service. Vista Serena has a restaurant, the Celebration Restaurant, which serves contemporary cuisine. There is also a poolside bar where you can get a drink to enjoy on the sun terrace. Maspalomas Golf Club is just 1.2 km away from Vista Serena, and the sand dunes are 2 km away. Aqualand Water Park is also 2 km away.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
description: Canary Island paradise right on the seafrontThe Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort is a hotel especially for families or water sports enthusiasts set in the tranquillity and beauty of Caleta de Fuste. It is located near the airport and the capital of Fuerteventura Puerto del Rosario.This exclusive establishment has modern bungalows and studios next to the beach. They are large and fully equipped to make you feel at home and have been recently refurbished while retaining the traditional Canary Island style. It is a unique resort for sports lovers especially fans of scuba diving and windsurfing but also for those who love golf beach volleyball or any other water sport or outdoor activity. The hotel has several buffet or a la carte restaurants bars and a theatre with a programme to suit audiences of all ages. In addition there is a luxurious USpa for visitors who want to relax and try out the most innovative health and beauty treatments or work out in the fitness studio. There is a kids club offering an endless range of activities and three great swimming pool areas which are also for adults.Barcelo.com

name: Lemon & Soul Las Palmas
address: Calle Alfredo L. Jones, 37, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Perfectly located just steps from Las Canteras Beach and its vibrant pedestrian promenade, the Lemon & Soul Las Palmas hotel offers business and leisure travelers a centrally located hub in the heart of it all. Guests arriving at the hotel are welcomed into a bright, playful lobby adorned in citrus-hued color palettes and modern furnishings. The apartment-style accommodation, which, along with the entire hotel, was recently refurbished, and is the ideal solution for travelers who seek independence, but also desire the comforts and conveniences of a serviced hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Cordial Green Golf
description: Offering free transfers to Maspalomas Beach and Playa del Inglés, Bungalows Cordial Green Golf features 2 outdoor swimming pools. It is located next to Maspalomas Golf Course and sand dunes. All Cordial Green Bungalows have bright, modern décor and a private terrace. There is a well-equipped kitchenette and a lounge area with sofa bed and TV. Only superior bungalows have air conditioning available in bedroom and living room. The Cordial Green complex features a poolside snack bar and a buffet restaurant with a terrace. There is also an on-site supermarket. Various shops, restaurants and bars can be found within a short walk in central Maspalomas. Las Palmas Airport is a 20-minute drive from the bungalows.

name: Hotel Ereza Mar- Adults Only
address: Avenida José Franchy Roca 6, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Located on the seafront, the hotel Ereza Mar offers a magnificent view across the Atlantic Ocean. It has a privileged location situated at a mere 350 metres from the beach, as well as being near to all of the main leisure and recreation centres. Hotel Ereza Mar has 160 double and twin rooms and ten Junior Suites. Six of the rooms ares specially designed for guests with disabilities.FarePortal

name: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate
address: Avenida Del Jablillo, 5, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Costa Teguise. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The air-conditioned rooms provide pool view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Guests at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, French and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Jablillo is 300 metres from the hotel, while Aqua Park is 2 km from the property.

name: THB Flora
address: Calle Reina Sofia 25, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: An attractive holiday resort located in a peaceful area of Puerto del Carmen, THB Flora is just 800 metres from the beach and 500 metres from the shopping centre. There are leafy gardens that surround the Flora Apartments Lanzarote, where you will find 2 swimming pools with a terrace, bar, mini club and children’s playground. In addition, to keep you entertained, there are billiards, table-tennis, a games room, fiestas, dances and a wide entertainment programme for both adults and children making this a great option for all the family. Some room types features a kitchenette. Each one comes with satellite TV. The Hotel THB Flora has a bar-restaurant and a snack bar. There is also an on-site supermarket. The airport is just 10 km from the property, and Arrecife is 17 km away.

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites
description: Set around a shared swimming pool, 1.5 km from the beach in Adeje, Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites offers apartments with sea views. This aparthotel features an on-site spa. All accommodation has a furnished private terrace, as well as a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave, coffee machine and kettle. There is a bathroom with a shower, bathrobe and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are included. The spa includes a sauna and massage services, available for an extra cost. A fitness centre, bar and games room can also be found at the property. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Siam Park Waterpark is 3 km from Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites and Las Americas Golf Course is 4 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Parque Santiago IV Official
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Lluvina, 40, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Facing the beachfront, Parque Santiago IV Official offers 3-star accommodation in Playa de las Americas and has a fitness centre, garden and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi. The hotel offers a hot tub and a concierge service. At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Parque Santiago IV Official offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include El Bunker Beach, Camison Beach and Playa de las Americas. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 19 km from Parque Santiago IV Official.

name: Valtisya Pool And Airport
address: Calle Alto de los Leones 38, 35213 Telde, Gran Canaria
description: Set in Telde in the Canary Islands region, VALTISYA POOL AND AIRPORT offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. All self-catered units feature tiled floors and are fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchenette with a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or mountain views. The country house offers an outdoor fireplace. If you would like to discover the area, cycling and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and VALTISYA POOL AND AIRPORT can arrange a bicycle rental service. Yumbo Centre is 42 km from the accommodation, while Aqualand Maspalomas is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria, 9 km from VALTISYA POOL AND AIRPORT, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunset View Club
address: Calle San Blas, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Shining under the sun only a few kilometers from the shores of the Atlantic, Sunset View Club is a great getaway for beach-lovers, sunseekers and families who desire a relaxed stay. The kids and young at heart will waste no time diving into the heated outdoor pool while those seeking relaxation soak in the hot tub, making a note to return to the solarium at night to gaze at the stars. Youll enjoy the convenience of partial kitchens in your Suites, each cooled by ceiling fans and air conditioning. With plenty of shopping, great dining and panoramic views within steps from your Suite, Sunset View Club has you primed for a laid-back holiday.iHotelier/iStay

name: Yucca Park Aparthotel
description: Located in Costa Adeje, Yucca ApartHotel offers fully equipped apartments with access to an outdoor pool, garden and a sun deck. The beach is 300 metres away. Each apartment has a dining-living room with a TV. All apartments have a kitchen equipped with and oven, toaster and an electric kettle. WiFi is available for a supplement. Fitted with tile flooring, the bedrooms include a wardrobe and the bathroom comes with a bath or shower. Bed linen and towels are provided. A variety of restaurants, shops and bars are within 3 minutes' walk from the property. Tenerife Sur Airport is located 19 km from the property.

name: Rainbow Golf Gay Men-only Resort
address: Avenida Touroperador Finnmatkat, 6, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Rainbow Golf Bungalows, Gay Men-only Resort is in a quiet part of Maspalomas, 20 minutes' walk from the famous sand dunes. It offers an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi zone. Each modern bungalow features a furnished terrace at the front and the back. The living room has a sofa and flat-screen TV with free satellite channels. There is a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave, ceramic hob and coffee maker. There is also a toaster and kettle. Safes are available to rent. You will receive a bottle of champagne and water on arrival. You can also purchase capsules for the coffee maker. Guests can use the hot tub. Free parking is available nearby and the complex is within 10 minutes' walk of the lively Yumbo Centre. There is an on-site minimarket and a pool bar, where breakfast can be served.
