Services available include laundry and massage, as well as car rental. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Ramada Residences by Wyndham Costa Adeje
address: Torviscas Alto, Calle Galicia, 6, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada hotel. Ramada is a global upper-midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant/lounge, while other sites offer a continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to us.Wyndham

name: Bungalows Rebecca Park
description: Bungalows Rebecca Park features charming whitewashed studios and bungalows, and a lovely swimming pool surrounded by gardens and terraces. The complex is 1.5 km from Playa del Inglés Beach and has an on-site supermarket. All of the bungalows and studios at the Bungalows Rebecca Park come with a private terrace. An electric stove, satellite TV and a tea/coffee maker can be found in the kitchen. The restaurant serves buffet meals, while there is also a bar and pool bar. An entertainment programme is offered in the evening. The complex offers easy access to the town's shopping centres, bars and restaurants. Playa del Inglés lies in the south of the island of Gran Canaria. The airport is around 25 km away.

name: Hovima Jardin Caleta
description: This modern aparthotel is located just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in the La Caleta. It offers comfortable apartments, 3 outdoor swimming pools and a hot tub. The bright HOVIMA Jardin Caleta apartments feature a furnished balcony with pool or sea views. Each has a lounge with sofa bed, satellite TV and rental safe and kitchenette with hob, kettle and toaster. The hotel has a buffet restaurant with BBQ and a poolside bar with sun terrace. The sports bar offers evening entertainment and has a pool table and darts. The Jardin Caleta has a children’s playground and kid’s club. There is a ping-pong table and one of the pools is heated in winter. Bike and car rental are offered and the Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 1 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 25 km away.

name: Aparthotel la Piramide
description: Aparthotel la Piramide is a 10-minute drive from Fuerteventura Airport and 3 km from Castillo Beach. It features an outdoor pool, hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym and tennis court. All apartments have a balcony with pool views. There is a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. You can hire the safe, and there is a private bathroom. The kitchenette includes a fridge, hob and coffee maker. The complex has a café, restaurant and poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for snacks. Free parking is available nearby and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Fuerteventura Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Casa Doramas B&b Vv
address: Calle Alfonso el Sabio 7, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Situated within 1.5 km of Las Alcaravaneras and 2.4 km of Las Canteras Beach in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Casa Doramas B&B VV features accommodation with a flat-screen TV. Complimentary WiFi is available and private parking is available on site. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or garden views. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Parque de Santa Catalina is 3.3 km from the bed and breakfast, while Parque Romano is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 23 km from Casa Doramas B&B VV.

name: Aparthotel Green Field
description: Aparthotel Green Field is a modern complex just 5 minutes' walk from Playa del Inglés Beach. It has a large outdoor pool with loungers, and all rooms have a balcony or a terrace. The Green Field has studios and apartments with separate bedrooms and kitchens. All air-conditioned rooms feature a private bathroom, TV and seating area. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Green Field complex offers a massage service and a hairdresser. The pool heating and sauna are available from November to April. The hotel also organizes daily shows. Green Field is close to shops and restaurants and it is only a 20-minute walk to the Maspalomas Dunes.

name: Bungalows Cordial Sandy Golf
description: Set in the old touristic town of Maspalomas, the bungalows are ideally located next to the golf course and just 2 km from the spectacular nature reserve of the Dunes of Maspaloma. Just a few minutes away from the shopping centre, Faro 2, these comfortable and completely-renovated bungalows are also within easy reach of golf and tennis facilities. In addition to this, a free shuttle bus is offered to the beach of Maspalomas and the centre of Playa del Inglés. The bungalows are completed by access to the resort’s swimming pool (heated in winter), and poolside snack bar. Meals are offered at Cordial Green Golf, just in front of the complex.

name: Caybeach Princess
description: Caybeach Princess features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Maspalomas. This 3-star resort offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and free shuttle service. At the resort every room comes with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a garden view. Caybeach Princess provides certain units with pool views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast. Caybeach Princess offers a children's playground. Meloneras Beach is 2.8 km from the resort, while De Las Mujeres Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 30 km from Caybeach Princess.

name: Relaxia Lanzaplaya
address: Calle México no 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Set in the Puerto del Carmen resort, this apartment complex is set overlooking the beach. It offers outdoor pools for adults and children, surrounded by sun terraces and loungers. The attractive apartments feature a private balcony or terrace. They come with a well-equipped kitchen and a lounge area with satellite TV. Relaxia Lanzaplaya offers a buffet restaurant, which often hosts themed dinners. Light meals are available from the poolside snack bar. Facilities at Lanzaplaya include ping pong and billiards. The lounge-bar has a TV with international channels. Located in the south of Lanzarote, the resort of Puerto del Carmen has many bars, restaurants and shops. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away.

name: Club Atlantico
address: Calle Pedro Barba 16, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Centrally located in Puerto del Carmen, Club Atlántico is just 200 metres from the beach, and features a heated outdoor swimming pool and children's pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each apartment is south-east facing and offers pool views from its balcony or terrace. They have a lounge with sofa bed, a full bathroom and a kitchenette with ceramic hob, toaster, microwave and kettle. Apartments also have satellite TV with a range of international channels. The Club Atlántico also has a poolside club house and there are plenty of sun beds available for relaxing by the pool. Every Friday there is a barbecue for all guests, and there is live entertainment on some evenings. The multi-lingual reception staff can assist with car and bike rental, organising trips and more. Puerto del Carmen is well known for its restaurants, bars and shops. Lanzarote Airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Neptuno Costadeje
description: Located 1.5 kilometres from the beach, this family friendly hotel has much to keep you active and outdoors, and a great pool to relax in the sunshine by. Playa de las Américas is set a short journey from Aparthotel Neptuno Costadeje. Guests at the aparthotel also have discounts at the spa and sports centre, 300 metres away. Enjoy your holiday at your own pace with the property’s great balance of self-catered accommodation complemented by great facilities. You can cook basic meals in the well-equipped kitchen of your apartment or take the night off and dine in the Neptune’s onsite restaurant. The property has badminton and volleyball facilities. Children will have fun and make friends in the play area while grownups will like the traditional-style bar with plenty of seating. Challenge yourself to a workout in the property’s gym before treating yourself to a relaxing massage.

name: Rosamar Resort Lanzarote
address: Arpon, 3, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: No description found

name: City Room Las Palmas
address: Calle Valencia, 62, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Located within 1.8 km of Poema Del Mar Aquarium and 3.5 km of Alfredo Kraus Auditorium, City Room Las Palmas offers rooms in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is allergy-free and is set 700 metres from Las Alcaravaneras. The units come with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a shared bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, rooms at the guest house also have free WiFi, while some rooms come with a patio. At City Room Las Palmas all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Las Canteras Beach, Parque de Santa Catalina and Parque Romano. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 23 km from City Room Las Palmas.

name: Hd Parque Cristobal Tenerife
description: This extensive holiday complex offers spacious bungalow accommodation in the heart of Playa de las Américas, just 200 metres from the beaches of southern Tenerife. Enjoy a relaxing and fun family break in the year-round sunshine of this unique Canary Island with a stay at the Parque Cristóbal Tenerife. Its tropical gardens surround 2 huge outdoor swimming pools for adults, both heated in winter. Children can enjoy themselves in the supervised mini club or their own 2 swimming pools. Alternatively, stay active with a game on the tennis court or a session in the gym. Each apartment opens onto a private terrace and features a well-equipped kitchen.

name: Sol Barbacan
address: Av de Tirajana, 27, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located in Playa del Inglés, Sol Barbacan is only 2 km from the nearest beach. The complex features a swimming pool, 2 hot tubs, and free WiFi in all areas. Sol Barbacan offers a buffet restaurant and an a la carte restaurant, as well as a pool bar and an evening lounge with a terrace. Set in gardens, the complex includes minigolf and beach volleyball facilities. There is also a gym and entertainment activities, including a kids’ club and teens’ club. Maspalomas Golf Course is a 5-minute drive from the property.

name: Hotel Tropical Park
address: Avda.el Jable N41, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: Featuring apartments with balconies set around an outdoor pool with free sun loungers, Hotel Tropical Park is set just 150 metres from Callao Salvaje Beach. It has a buffet restaurant and a gym. Each apartment at the Hotel Tropical Park has modern décor with tiled floors. All come with air conditioning and a seating area with satellite TV. Kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and kettle. Guests can enjoy a range of Spanish cuisine in the Tropical Grill Restaurant. Drinks are not included in half board. There is an on-site supermarket and a range of smaller shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Tropical Park. The lively town of Playa de Las Américas is a 10-minute drive from the hotel, while Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 km away.

name: Avanti Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults
description: AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults is located opposite the beach, in the old town of Corralejo. It features a restaurant and a roof terrace with a hot tub. This small, adults-only hotel offers room looking onto the ocean or the town of Corralejo. The chic rooms at AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults have minimalist, white décor with turquoise finishes. All rooms have free WiFi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The restaurant serves Spanish cuisine and specialises in seafood, paella and fish dishes. The terrace offers ocean views. There is a lounge on the terrace. On the rooftop guests will find a solarium, a bar and a restaurant. Guests can practice a wide range of water sport activities in the area such as paddle surf, kite-surf, diving, and sailing. Corralejo Nature Reserve is within 3 km of the hotel. Puerto del Rosario and Fuerteventura Airport are less than 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Suite Villa Maria
address: Av. De Los Acantilados, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star hotel complex is located 1 km from La Caleta de Adeje Beach, in south-west Tenerife. It offers villas with furnished terraces and views of the Atlantic Ocean and the island of La Gomera. Some villas at Hotel Suite Villa María have a hot tub and others have a private pool. All have free internet access and feature a lounge with flat-screen satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with hydromassage shower. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Villa María. The á la carte La Torre Restaurant serves traditional Canarian dishes while the Pool Bar offers light snacks and drinks. The hotel can organise excursions, including green fees for Costa Adeje Golf Course, located less than 1 km away. Car rental service can also be arranged at the property. A free shuttle service to Plaza del Duque Shopping centre is provided twice a day. Tenerife South Airport can be reached by car in 25 minutes.

name: Apartamentos Parque del Sol
description: Set in Adeje, 400 metres from Playa de Fanabe, Apartamentos Parque del Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. Featuring a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Apartamentos Parque del Sol you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Spanish cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a beauty services, fitness room and solarium. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Apartamentos Parque del Sol, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Torviscas Beach, El Duque Beach and Enramada Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 21 km from Apartamentos Parque del Sol.

name: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is set on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It is also moments from Playa de las Americas's well-known tourist spots. Guests staying at Coral Ocean View - Adults Only can enjoy taking a dip in the swimming pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink in the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is an adults-only hotel. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as slippers and bathrobes. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. Local attractions close to the hotel include Aqualand Costa Adeje, Siam Park and The Patch. Those wishing to discover the region are able to visit Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Los Olivos Beach Resort
address: Paris, 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: With a stay at Los Olivos Beach Resort in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Fanabe Beach and 13 minutes by foot from El Duque Beach. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hostal Kasa
address: Calle General Vives 75, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hostal Kasa is 1-Star-Hotel located in the center of the city and 3 minutes away from Las Canteras beach, you'll enjoy our rooms (exterior/interior), and a terrace to share experiences with other travelers, or to enjoy the maximum comfort of a Hotel. Hostal Kasa is placed in a marvelous place in the city; near the shops, pubs, restaurants, and close to the nightlife. The Bus station of Las Palmas is about 200 meters away. It offers a regular service practically to every place on the island. Hostal Kasa offers free Wi-Fi and rents surfboards.

name: Royal Sunset Beach Club
description: Royal Sunset Beach Club offers the convenience of at-home living, fantastic on-site amenities and close proximity to the beach. When youre not relaxing in your spacious Apartment, youll have the choice of playing pool, table tennis, squash or other recreational games on-site. Royal Sunset Beach Clubs great location one block from Playa de Fanabe allows you to instantly grab a sunset drink at a beachside bar, swim in the sea or experience the many restaurants and shops along the coast. No matter if youre a sunseeker or a foodie, you and your group will find everything you need in or around Royal Sunset Beach Club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Floresta
address: Calle Mercurio, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Hotel Floresta offers spacious apartments located 200 metres from Lanzarote’s Playa de los Pocillos Beach. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts. The apartments are modern and practical with a seating area and air conditioning. They can accommodate up to 2 adults and 2 children. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at Floresta apartments Lanzarote, as well as a terrace to enjoy meals and drinks outside. There are also gardens, play areas for children and an entertainment programme for all ages.

name: Club Tenerife
address: Los Diamantes II Urb. Oasis Del Sur, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Featuring a shared outdoor heated swimming pool, Club Tenerife Apartments is located in Los Cristianos, a 15-minute walk from the beach. This property offers a sun terrace and a pool snack bar. All apartments have a living space with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe to rent, and a dining table, as well as a kitchen equipped with an oven, fridge, microwave, and electric kettle. There is a private bathroom and a balcony. Some apartments offer views of the pool. The property has a shared terrace, games room, and library. A shuttle service to the airport is available for an extra charge. You can find a restaurant, bar, and grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Club Tenerife Apartments. Los Cristianos Port, with ferry services to La Palma and La Gomera, is 2.6 km from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car.

name: Coral Compostela Beach Golf
description: Apartment complex situated n the south side of the Las Américas Golf Course, and only 800 metres from Las Vistas Beach. Two-floor building comprised of fully-equipped apartments of one or two rooms, creating a pleasant ambience. The premises also comprise an a la carte restaurant, bar, and a fresh water swimming pool that is heated in winter. The offering of nearby restaurants and leisure possibilities is considerable, owing to the hotel’s advantageous location. The complex also offers an entertainment program and sells green fees for the golf course. It is, without a doubt, an ideal place for golfers, or families who want to spend their holidays in a tranquil atmosphere. A children's club is also available.

name: Hotel Estefania Boutique Suites
address: 2 Calle Llano del Grillo, 38652 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur
description: Hg Tenerife Sur Apartments are a 10-minute walk from Los Cristianos Beach, in southern Tenerife. Set in gardens, they offer 2 outdoor pools, a sauna and squash court. All Canarian style apartments at HG Tenerife Sur have a private terrace and TV. Satellite TV is available for surcharge. There is a private bathroom, and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge, kettle, toaster and electric hob. There is a bar and a restaurant at the Hg Tenerife Sur apartment complex. Wired internet is available in public areas for an extra charge, and there is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The complex has a games room and a children’s play area. There is easy access to the TF1 Motorway, and Playa de las Americas and Las Americas Golf Course are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Las Terrazas de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF- 47 Km9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Las Terrazas de Abama Suites is situated within the Abama Golf Course, and features stunning views of La Gomera and the Teide Volcano. Set in a luxurious complex, this property is surrounded by beautiful gardens. Some suites feature views of the sea and the golf course, while others feature views of the complex. Guests can benefit from a free transfer to the facilities within the property and the beach. Featuring a terrace, each air-conditioned suite features a dining area and a living space with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also featured. Other facilities on site include the Melvin Restaurant, offers guests a variety of dining options. The menu, designed by Berasategui, is a special selection of local products that constitutes a unique culinary offer. There is also a gourmet shop at Abama Terraces, offering a wide range of local artisan products and an exquisite selection of wines. Puerto de la Cruz is 37 km from Las Terrazas de Abama Suites. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Amarilla Golf Residences
address: Avenida María Ángeles Ascanio Cullen, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: With Playa El Barranco reachable in less than 1 km, Amarilla Golf Residences offers accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave and kettle are also provided. Guests at Amarilla Golf Residences can enjoy a buffet breakfast. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa Colmenares and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 6 km from Amarilla Golf Residences, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Flamingo Suites Boutique Hotel
address: Avda De Espana 6 - San Eugenio Bajo, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Hotel Flamingo Suites is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tenerife, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer, babysitting, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, sauna, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, diving. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tenerife, Hotel Flamingo Suites will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas
description: Set in magnificent tropical gardens, 1 km from water park Siam Park, the colonial-style Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features 3 outdoor pools. It offers a free shuttle bus to the beach, a 20-minute walk away. Bright, spacious apartments and suites have air-conditioning, and living room with a TV and sofa bed. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. All apartments and suites have a dining area and kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas has a restaurant, and the snack bar overlooks the pools. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered, and there is a mini-market on-site. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. There is parking on-site.

name: Coral Compostela Beach
address: 8 Av. Las Américas, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: On the beach front of the popular "Las Américas", this is a pleasant complex with gardens, and very near the commercial area of the town and the famous atmosphere at Arona. The rooms are distributed between 8 buildings and over 4 floors and all comprise a double room, balcony or terrace, kitchen and lounge. The restaurant offers a la carte service and menus, and there is also a snack bar where you can grab a bite. This is a great option to enjoy holidays with the family in complete independence, with all services within easy reach. Sport lovers can take advantage of the various golf courses nearby, or the water sports on offer.

name: Los Jardines de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF 47 KM 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Situated in Guía de Isora, 2.8 km from Playa del Barranco de Erques, Los Jardines de Abama Suites features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast pool views. At Los Jardines de Abama Suites rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Los Gigantes is 13 km from Los Jardines de Abama Suites, while Aqualand is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Wyndham Residences Tenerife Costa Adeje
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham Hotels and Resorts. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is the crown jewel of the Wyndham family. Situated in spectacular resort and urban destinations, each Wyndham Grand provides a one-of-a-kind experience with compelling local flavor, attentive service, relaxing surroundings and thoughtful touches. Guestrooms are comfortable and refined, dining experiences are crafted by master chefs and artfully appointed lounges invite you to linger.  Flexible meeting spaces, elegant halls and sophisticated media offerings ensure a memorable and successful social or business event.Wyndham

name: Gran Oasis Resort
address: Meandro, 3, Golf las Américas, 38650 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Gran Oasis Resort is a luxury aparthotel, set next to Las Américas Golf Course. Set in gardens, this complex has a large outdoor swimming pool and views of the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is set between Playa de Las Américas and Los Cristianos. The nearest beach is less than 2km away. The Oasis resort offers a bus service to the beach and Siam Park. The Gran Oasis has comfortable, bright apartments with one or 2 bedrooms. They all have a kitchenette, air conditioner and satellite TV. The complex has a bar and a restaurant. There is a 24-hour reception in the hotel, offering currency exchange, car rental. There is also a tour desk and a small supermarket. The rooms have air conditioning.

name: Parque la Paz
address: Luis Díaz de Losada, 2, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Parque La Paz Tenerife is located just 150 metres from the Playa de las Americas. Situated in the resort centre, it offers free parking. The apartments are practical and light, with a living room and a bedroom. They also have a kitchenette and a terrace. All apartments have a TV and safe. The Parque La Paz complex has a large freeform swimming pool, plus a small one for children. It also has a large area for sunbathing. You can find plenty to choose from in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. The hotel also organises occasional poolside barbeques. Drinks can be found in the bar lounge or poolside bar. Playa de las Americas is a popular area in the south of Tenerife. Parque La Paz is surrounded by shopping centres, restaurants, bars, parks and gardens, and entertainment.

name: Hovima Santa María
description: Just 300 metres from La Pinta Beach in Playa Fañabe, HOVIMA Santa María offers tennis courts and outdoor pools, 1 heated in winter. Apartments and studios have furnished terraces and well-equipped kitchenettes. Each bright HOVIMA studio has 2 single beds, a sofa bed, satellite TV and a rental safe. Apartments have separate bedrooms and living areas. Kitchenettes include a hob, toaster and kettle. HOVIMA Santa María’s restaurant serves varied buffet meals. You can relax with a drink in the bar, or enjoy the nightly entertainment. The complex has a 24-hour reception, where beach towels, currency exchange, car hire and babysitting services can be arranged. Staff are happy to provide information about the surrounding area. A range of shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk, while Colón Marina is 350 metres away. Tenerife Sur Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Servatur Caribe
address: V Centenario, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: These apartments are in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort, 100 metres from Magma Conference Centre and 600 metres from Siam Park. There is an outdoor pool and all apartments have a private balcony. There is a tennis court and a games room at Servatur Caribe. Golf Las Americas is under 1 km away. The property has a tour desk and you can hire a car, electric motorbikes or bicycles at the apartments. a 24-hour reception is available for guests. Only a few kilometres from the Caribe Apartments you can discover rural attractions such as Barrance del Infierno Cliff, Teide National Park and several charming, small towns. Premium One Bedroom Apartment Pool View + Premium One Bedroom Apartment Sea View offer improved bedroom comfort, reclinable chairs, bedroom towards pool, bathroom with hairdryer as well as a bottle of sparkling wine and snacks on arrival.

name: Beverly Hills Heights - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Urb. Oasis Del Sur, C. Sierra Nevada, 1, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Located in Los Cristianos, Beverly Hills Heights provides free WiFi. Guests can benefit from an all year round outdoor swimming pool. This 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service to the city centre. All guest rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a kettle, a bath and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom. At Beverly Hills Heights, each room comes with a seating area. Pool and sea view area available subject to availability. Buffet breakfast and dinner are available at our sister property. Guests can make use of a bar. When booking half board or full board, please note that drinks are not included. Excursions can be booked at reception. Playa de las Americas is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Puerto de la Cruz is 75 km from the property. Tenerife Sur Airport is 12 km away.

name: Hotel Andrea's
address: Avenida Valle Menendez, 6, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Hotel Andrea´s is 350 metres from Los Cristianos Beach, in southern Tenerife, and 10 minutes’ walk from the Port. It has a sun terrace and a bar. Rooms at Andrea’s Hotel feature tiled floors, and all have a private bathroom. There is a work desk and minibar, and you can hire the safe. There are vending machines for drinks on-site, and guests can relax in the TV lounge. WiFi is available in all areas for free. The 24-hour front desk staff can recommend excursions, and you can hire a car or motorbike. Las Americas Golf Club is a 5-minute drive away. Reina Sofia Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Suites - by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Spacious and modern apartment style Deluxe Suites with 1 2 or 3 bedrooms for all guests. Terrace with ocean views and many also have a private pool.Family friendly.Wide gastronomy offer in exclusive restaurants.1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness Centre 16 yearsBarcelo.com

name: Royal Sun Resort
address: C/ Los Geranios, 16, 38683 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Set by Los Gigantes Cliffs, Royal Sun Resort Tenerife features outdoor swimming pools with fantastic panoramic views of the coast. The resort offers stylish apartments with private, furnished terraces. Each apartment at Royal Sun Resort includes a lounge area with sofas and flat-screen satellite TV. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher, and the bathroom has a circular bath tub and free toiletries. By the pool is Oasis Abraxas bar, and the resort also has a range of other bars with live entertainment, as well as the buffet restaurant Regency and the à la carte restaurant Aqua. Royal Sun Los Gigantes has a gym and a squash court. Safes, a laundry service and Wi-Fi internet are available at an extra cost. Staff can provide tourist information and help arrange car rental or airport transfers. Royal Sun Apartments Los Gigantes is 1.5 km from both Los Gigantes Harbour and Puerto de Santiago.

name: Flamingo Beach Mate
address: Avenida de España, No3, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Flamingo Beach Mate is set in Adeje and has an outdoor swimming pool, a children's pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities are a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers free WiFi. All rooms, apartments and studios in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each is equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while apartments will provide you with a kitchen. Guest rooms are fitted with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Flamingo Beach Mate. There is also a snack bar. Staff at the reception can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Popular points of interest near Flamingo Beach Mate include La Pinta Beach, San Eugenio Shopping Centre and Gran Sur Shopping Centre. Tenerife Sur Airport is 16 km away.

name: Labranda Bahía Fañabé & Villas
description: Labranda Baha Faab & Villas is a charming hotel located in the south of Tenerife, in the tourist area of Playa Faab in Costa Adeje, just a 5-minute walk from the famous beaches of El Duque and Faab. Close to a diverse selection of shops, restaurants, bars and night clubs. Transportation is also easily accessible with nearby bus stops and taxi stop. The complex is made up of 180 bright, spacious and comfortable apartments. They are also surrounded by gardens and swimming pools.iHotelier/iStay

name: Coral Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Calle Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 10, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Located 400 metres from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this adults-only design hotel offers a spa and outdoor pool. The rooftop terrace enjoys stunning views over the Atlantic. The Coral Suites & Spa offers stylish accommodation, decorated in bold colours. Rooms include a kitchen and a balcony. The lounge area comes with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Sunprime Coral Suites is situated near the beaches of Troya and Las Vistas. The Las Américas Golf Course is also within walking distance. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Nuevo restaurant with views over the pool. There is a poolside bar and the Lobby Bar where cocktails are available.

name: Hotel Baobab Suites
description: Set 10 minutes’ walk from Duque Beach in a residential area of Costa Adeje, Hotel Baobab Suites offers 2 heated outdoor pool and sun terrace, Saplings Kids club and Squash. Featuring a white, modern décor and large windows, each bright suite includes a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV. Their kitchen areas include an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests can enjoy a welcome package. The hotel offers 3 breakfast options; Breakfast box can be delivered in the privacy and intimacy of the suite. Also, breakfast is served at Bite Buffet restaurant. The centre of Costa Adeje is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Baobab Suites and offers a selection of restaurants, bars and shops. Sports and activities such as spinning, pilates, yoga, meditation, and beach volleyball are organized at the on-site Activate sports and leisure center, which also offers paddle tennis courts and boules. Wellness and beauty Centre based on Ayurveda. Teide National Park is around 45 minutes’ drive away, while Tenerife South Airport is just a 20-minute drive from the complex. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda
address: Nuestra Senora De Lourdes, 2, 38470 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda offers rustic apartments, 13 km from Icod de los Vinos, Tenerife. Set in gardens with sun terraces and barbecue facilities, all apartments offer mountain views. Apartments feature wooden floors and heating. The living room has a satellite TV and sofa or sofa bed. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Breakfast is available in the buffet restaurant and there is a bar. Packed lunches can also be requested. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are offered. There is a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle, and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. A wide range of hiking trails can be found very nearby.

name: Checkin Bungalows Atlantida
description: With fantastic facilities, Checkin Bungalows Atlántida are perfect for combining independence and a fun-filled holiday in the Tenerife sunshine with all the family. Make the most of the sports facilities and the 3 swimming pools, 2 of which are heated during winter season. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida has outstanding possibilities for keeping active during your holiday. Gather a group of friends for a game of tennis or squash. Soak up the sunshine beside the pool and then play mini golf or basketball in the fresh air. Relax with a refreshment in the restaurant or bar with large sun terrace. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida is situated in the fishing and sailing village of Cristianos, near Tenerife's wonderful beaches and views of the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for an enjoyable stay in San Miguel de Abona. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Swimming pool. For those travelling with children Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel offers a games room and a kids pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and an in-room dining area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel provides a variety of places to dine, including Golden Buffet and Piano Bar. Eateries at the hotel include Cakes & Bakes Café and Spice Garden. A selection of dining options can also be found in the area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel has easy access to Amarilla Golf and Country Club. For guests with a car, parking is available and Granadilla de Abona is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Coral Los Silos - Your Natural Accommodation Choice
address: Edificio San Bernardo, 38470 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Coral Los Silos is a comfortable base when visiting Los Silos and is close to everything the area has to offer. Some of the popular facilities provided at this 3-star property include free on-site parking and wireless internet. The property has 5 apartments and has been recently refurbished. It also offers a laundry service, a sun deck and a lift. The apartments have a refrigerator, a coffee maker and an in-room dining area. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities like a shower and a hair dryer. Tenerife South Airport is a 80-minute drive from Coral Los Silos. It also is an ideal base to discover Buenavista del Norte and Icod de los Vinos.Revato

name: Regency Country Club, Apartments Suites
description: Located in Arona, Regency Country Club CHAFOYA is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tenerife. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Regency Country Club CHAFOYA. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Regency Country Club CHAFOYA combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tenerife unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Calle Sierra Nevada, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Set in Los Cristianos, Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts provides a terrace, bar and an all year round outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers free shuttle service to the city centre and a 24-hour front desk. International cuisine is served at the restaurant. All units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, oven, a coffee machine, a bath and a wardrobe. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster. The rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts. Playa de las Americas is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Puerto de la Cruz is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 12 km from Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts.

name: Select Sunningdale
address: Golf Del Sur, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur provides great value self-catering holiday accommodation. This is a wonderful resort to stay on Tenerife with its pool lined with palm trees, relaxed family vibe and set in the green oasis of Golf del Sur. Guests at Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur will enjoy views of the impressive Mount Teide as they make special holiday memories. Choose from the curved swimming pool or a dip in the blue waters of the ocean; dine at the resort’s restaurant, the multitude of local fish restaurants at the nearby village of Los Abrigos, or head into Las Americas for a taste of the Island’s nightlife. A fantastic Tenerife resort for families of all ages, with an onsite entertainment team to keep you smiling the whole holiday, Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur is ready and waiting to welcome you to the Island of Eternal Spring.

name: Santa Barbara Golf & Ocean Club
address: Avenida Del Atlantico, 38620 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: From the sand on the golf course to the sand on the beach, Santa Barbara Golf and Ocean Club will tempt you to relax outdoors throughout your stay. This seaside resort features spacious Apartments and dazzling on-site amenities like a cinema, solarium, sauna and game room. Private cars, golf carts and cycles are available for rent if you want to explore the island at your preferred pace. Youll return each night to a comfortable Apartment with sea views, a swimming pool with a poolside bar and a Moorish-inspired architectural design that rivals the amazing landscape just beyond the propertys gates.iHotelier/iStay

name: Royal Garden Villas & Spa
address: Campo de Golf Costa Adeje - Finca Los Olivos, Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star resort features luxurious, Balinese-style villas with private heated pools. Set in gardens, Royal Garden Villas offers a gym, spa and impressive ocean views. Each spacious property is individually decorated with chic décor and wooden furnishings. All villas have a terrace, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, DVD player and a well-equipped kitchen. Each one comes with a hydromassage shower and bath. The Royal Garden’s Jardín Restaurant offers à la carte cuisine and a selection of Spanish dishes in a stylish environment decorated with intricate wooden lattices. The Tucán Tucán Pub serves a range of cocktails and light snacks. The Golden Pond spa features Oriental-style design and has an indoor pool and Turkish baths. It also has a hot tub, ice fountain and various beauty treatments. There is also a squash court and gym. The Royal Garden can arrange yacht hire, green fees for local golf courses and various excursions, including trips to Puerto de la Cruz and the island of La Gomera.

name: Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts
description: Set in Los Cristianos in the Tenerife Region, 2.3 km from Playa de las Americas, Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts boasts an outdoor pool, and terrace. Puerto de la Cruz is 43 km away. Free WiFi is available. You can play tennis and billiards at the property, and the area is popular for cycling. Adeje is 9 km from Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts, while El Médano is 17 km from the property.

name: Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol
description: Located in Arona, Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Opening to a terrace with sea, pool or garden views, all units are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers a range of wellness facilities including a wellness packages and a public bath. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol include Playa De Los Tarajales, Los Cristianos Beach and Playa del Callao. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 18 km from the aparthotel.

name: Luz Del Mar
description: Located in the traditional village of Los Silos, this spa hotel has a tropical garden and a solar-heated swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. The hotel’s wellness suite offers an organic sauna, a dry sauna, a relaxation room and adventure showers. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel Luz del Mar is surrounded by the Teno Mountains and the El Teide National Park. There is free public parking on site and the sea is a short walk away. Buenavista’s 18-hole Golf Course is within a short drive. The Luz del Mar is in the Isla Baja region, full of traditional farm houses. The hotel has a large wind-protected terrace and rooms have a balcony or terrace. There is also a Chimney Lounge with an open fireplace.

name: Las Adelfas 2
address: Calle Los Cardones, 47, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Set in beautiful gardens within Golf del Sur, Las Adelfas is 1 km from the Atlantic Ocean. Featuring 2 outdoor pools, the complex is 4 km from Tenerife South Airport. WiFi is free and available throughout all units. The modern Las Adelfas studios and apartments have a private balcony overlooking the pools and private entrance. Each has a kitchen with cooking facilities. There is a living room with a sofa, and most units have a safe. Guests can dine in The Waterfall restaurant, enjoy the Sports Bar or have a drink by the pool. San Miguel Marina, with its shops, bars and restaurants, is 20 minutes’ walk away. The complex has a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Apartamentos Borinquen
address: Avenida Venezuela, 14, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace with loungers, Apartamentos Borinquen is set in the centre of Playa de las Américas, 200 metres from the beach. At the Apartamentos Borinquen, the equipped kitchenette includes a fridge. Bright studios all open onto furnished balconies, offering views of the ocean and the landscape of the Costa Adeje. Free Wi-Fi is available in common areas. Playa de las Américas Bus Station is located 100 metres from Apartamentos Borinquen, and there is a shopping centre around 150 metres away which has several small bars and shops. Magma Art & Congress centre is 400 metres from the property while Siam Park is 700 away. You will find Golf Las Americas 750 metres from Apartamentos Borinquen. Free private parking is available on site up to avalibility.

name: Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Avenida V Centenario, 11, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Offering stunning views of the Canary Islands, this attractive apartment complex is set just 10 metres from Troya Beach. It features an adult and children’s outdoor pool, a gym, hot tub and sauna. Apartments and studios at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts Club feature elegant décor and pool or sea views. Lounges have a sofa bed and plasma TV with DVD player and modern kitchens include microwave, fridge and toaster. DVDs and a safe can be rented at reception. The complex has a cafeteria, bar and a selection of restaurants, as well as on-site supermarket and beauty salon. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of numerous shopping centres, bars and restaurants. You can rent a car, exchange currency and book excursions at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts’s 24-hour reception. Las Americas Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ walk away and Tenerife South Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Royal Tenerife Country Club
address: Calle San Andreas, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Royal Tenerife Country Club can tee up an exceptional holiday for golfers and beachgoers alike. This family-friendly resort within two kilometres of the shoreline offers an outdoor pool, book library, on-site car rental and a variety of other services and amenities that complement the spacious self-catered Suites. These 1- and 2-Bedroom Apartments are only minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport, helping you maximize your holiday without spending valuable time driving to and from the terminal. With plenty of on-site amenities and a great location near some of Tenerifes most popular attractions, Royal Tenerife Country Club is a fantastic option for a self-catered getaway in Spains Canary Islands.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sunset Bay Club
description: Youll discover multiple reasons to spend your vacation at Sunset Bay Club when you learn about the many on-site services and amenities throughout the property. Just beyond your spacious Apartment, youll find two sparkling pools, a solarium, a fitness center and other great recreational facilities. The convenient on-site services include golf cart and car rentals, laundry facilities, a book library, a currency exchange and a babies accessories catalogue. Sunset Bay Club is ready to provide young families, couples and solo travelers everything they need for a comfortable and convenient stay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Only You Hotel Valencia
description: Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Only YOU Hotel Valencia provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The property is 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Only YOU Hotel Valencia each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Valencia include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Turia Gardens and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Bungalows Park Albufera
address: Carrera Del Riu 556, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: A short distance from bicycle rentals, the sea, and more, this beach mobile home lets you experience it all. Albufera Natural Park is just steps away and Platja del Saler is within an easy 8-minute walk, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the seasonal outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this mobile home, which also features a picnic area. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 3-bedroom rental, you'll find a living room, premium bedding, a BBQ grill, and air conditioning. The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a microwave, and cookware. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: El Plantio Golf Resort
address: Ctra Antigua Alicante, Elche km3 (A-79), Alicante, Valencia
description: Surrounded by pretty gardens, this luxurious resort features 2 golf courses. Located 10 minutes’ drive from the beach and 3 km from Alicante, it offers 2 outdoor pools, a gym and modern apartments with a balcony. All elegant, air-conditioned apartments at the El Plantío Golf Resort have satellite TV, a modern kitchen equipped with dishwasher and washing machine and a dining room. A daily cleaning service is also provided. The resort’s buffet restaurant serves international food, and there is also a bar. A Carrefour supermarket is 5 minutes’ drive away. Plantío Golf has a golf school, a children’s playground and a large sun terrace. It has a 24-hour reception and Alicante Airport is 3 km away.

name: Alicante Aparthotel Evolution
description: Situated in Alicante, 700 metres from Postiguet Beach and 200 metres from the centre, Alicante Aparthotel Evolution features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At Alicante Aparthotel Evolution you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while fishing and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Alicante Aparthotel Evolution include Alicante Train Station, Explanada de España and The San Nicolas Co-Cathedral. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 16 km from the apartment.

name: Palacio Salvetti Suites
description: Set in Alicante, 700 metres from Postiguet Beach and 100 metres from the centre, Palacio Salvetti Suites offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the apartment. Popular points of interest near Palacio Salvetti Suites include Alicante Train Station, Explanada de España and The San Nicolas Co-Cathedral. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Estudiotel Alicante
address: Calle Poeta Vila y Blanco, 4, 03003 Alicante, Valencia
description: Estudiotel Alicante's spacious rooms offer free Wi-Fi. It is situated by the Bulevar Plaza Shopping Centre, metres from El Corte Inglés Department Store. Each room at Estudiotel Alicante features a private bathroom, a work desk and plasma-screen satellite TV. Central heating and air conditioning are provided seasonally. Some accommodation has a private balcony. Estudiotel Alicante is 600 metres from Postiguet Beach, while Santa Barbara Castle is a 15-minute walk away. Trains, trams and airport buses all stop within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Alicante Center Apart
description: Situated in Alicante, less than 1 km from Postiguet Beach and 300 metres from the centre, Alicante Center Apart features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a solarium. Popular points of interest near Alicante Center Apart include Alicante Train Station, The San Nicolas Co-Cathedral and Explanada de España. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Kiwidestiny Alicante
address: 5 Calle Semilla, 03115 Sant Vicent del Raspeig, Valencia
description: Set in San Juan de Alicante, Kiwidestiny Alicante offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as pool with a view and a garden. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the aparthotel. Kiwidestiny Alicante offers a picnic area. Cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby. Alicante Golf is 14 km from the accommodation, while Alicante Train Station is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández, 29 km from Kiwidestiny Alicante, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barceló Montecastillo Golf
address: Carretera de Arcos km 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Completely renovated in March 2013 the Barcelo Montecastillo Golf is a true icon of the Jerez area thanks to its high quality facilities and its characteristic elegant and simple design.The hotel is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and tranquillity on their holidays offered by the hotels complete Spa for golf lovers for companies who wish to hold meetings at the hotel or for tourists who want to discover Jerezs bodegas and equestrian events. This hotel has a total of 162 rooms and a group of villas making it the perfect accommodation for families and groups of friends who want to enjoy a tranquil and relaxing holiday.This resort offer you 3 outdoor swimming pools Wellbeing Club Spa Circuit dry sauna steam sauna and gym. 4 Treatment rooms. Lounges 16 Halls for Events Exhibition gallery Rooms for private banquets Golf course 18 hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. It was the venue for the Volvo Masters for 5 years in a row 1997/2001 Practice course and Putting Green Golf Academy Exclusive use of Private Academy for groups or events. Football and other sports 2 international regulation size football grounds Dressing rooms at the football grounds Jogging track Multisport athletics track Tennis court Barcelo Hotels and Resorts offers you in this hotel the original and new gastronomic concept of Healthy Gourmet which consists in the mixture of great quality products exquisite flavours sublime presentations.The perfect combination between eating well and in a healthy way.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Fernando III
description: Hotel Fernando III is in Seville’s historic Santa Cruz district. It offers free WiFi, a roof terrace with city views and a seasonal swimming pool, open from June to September. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Fernando are comfortable and offer attractive, contemporary design. Some rooms have balconies and offer city views. The hotel’s restaurant serves both Andalusian dishes and European cuisine, in additional to traditional tapas and wines. There is also daily breakfast service. The hotel can also provide tourist information and a ticket service. Additional facilities include function rooms suitable for conferences, banquets and weddings. Hotel Fernando III is a short walk from Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. The Alcazar Gardens are just 2 streets away, while Seville Train Station is also nearby.

name: Attica21 Coruña
address: C/ Enrique Mariñas, 34, A Coruña, Galicia
description: Attica21 Coruña is located in a strategic location in the city of A Coruña, in front of the ExpoCoruña exhibition and fairgrounds, in an established residential area and just a few minutes from the beach. It offers different types of fully equipped rooms, a cafeteria and restaurant service, gym and parking. The hotel is located a few meters from the bus stop with quick connection to the city center. And in a privileged position with the Alvedro Airport which is 10 minutes away and with the AP-9 that communicates with any point outside the city and province. When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of 25 EUR per pet upon request. Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 15 kilos

name: Hotel Sunway Playa Golf & Spa Sitges
address: Paseo Marítimo De Sitges 92-94, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: This hotel is just 20 metres from Sitges Beach and next to Terramar Golf Course. It offers free bicycle rental, 2 pools and accommodation with free Wi-Fi, private balconies and fantastic views. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Playa Golf and SPA have tiled floors and satellite TV. The apartments have modern kitchens with a hob, microwave and washing machine. The Playa Golf has its own supermarket, and there is also a fitness centre and a games room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The Sunway Playa Golf and Spa has a spa and it offers a hamman, sauna and massages at an extra cost and an indoor pool with a hot tub free of charge. The Sunway Playa Golf and SPA complex has 3 restaurants offering a range of Mediterranean dishes. There is also a bar offering views over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can use the hotel's free bicycles (subject to availability) to explore Sitges, with the town centre a 10-minute ride away. Barcelona can be reached easily by car, via the C32 motorway, or by train from Sitges station.

name: Villa Ines
description: Set 200 metres from the beach at Venice Lido, Villa Ines is an Art Nouveau building with garden. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and glass chandeliers made by the owner's family. Rooms at B&B Villa Ines have a different colour theme, a flat-screen TV and a minibar, and a bathroom with spa bath. In the summer months, breakfast and evening drinks are served out in the garden. Villa Ines Bed and Breakfast is located 250 metres from the water-bus stop for St Mark’s Square in Venice.

name: Charming House iQs
address: Campiello Querini Stampalia, Castello 4425, 30122 Venice, Veneto
description: Charming House IQS is home to luxury suites located just a few streets behind St Mark’s Square and facing the Rio de Mondo Novo Canal. Discover comfort, views, service and excellent amenities. Featuring contemporary design, art and technology, Charming House’s suites are modern and exclusive. Each suite has been individually designed and varies its use of materials. Suites come with great amenities including Nespresso coffee makers, 2 Smart TVs, newspapers, showers and lovely bath products. iPod docking stations and DVD players are also available and Wi-Fi access is free of charge. Enjoy in-room breakfast service. Suites come with charming canal views at Charming House. Here you are just steps away from some of Venice’s most famous sites. A waterbus station is also located close by, enabling you to cross the city even quicker.

name: B&B Teatro
description: Located in Palermo, 800 metres from Fontana Pretoria and 1.1 km from Palermo Cathedral, B&B Teatro provides a restaurant, quiet street views and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet and bathrobes. A fridge, a stovetop and minibar are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. An Italian breakfast is available daily at B&B Teatro. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and the accommodation can arrange a car rental service. Popular points of interest near B&B Teatro include Teatro Politeama Palermo, Via Maqueda and Piazza Castelnuovo. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino, 28 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Torreata Hotel & Residence
description: Situated in a residential area near the entrance to the Parco della Favorita, Torreata Hotel & Residence is ideally placed to reach the famous beach resort of Mondello. The property provides free parking, subject to availability. Set in a tower of 12 floors overlooking the Utveggio Castle, the resort offers en suite rooms with air conditioning and TV. Some rooms can be equipped with a kitchenette. Residence Hotel Torreata is part of the Addiopizzo movement, which promotes ethical tourism in support of a mafia-free economy.

name: Cosmopolitan B&B
description: Located in Palermo between the train station and the harbour, Cosmopolitan B&B offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and flat-screen TV. Breakfast includes cannoli from Piana degli Albanesi, cassata, and croissants. Rooms are the Cosmopolitan B&B feature tiled floors and modern, elegant furnishings. Each has a private external or internal bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The B&B is 50 metres from Piazza Pretoria, and 300 metres from the Martorana Church.

name: Ai Cartari
description: Ai Cartari is located in the centre of Palermo and housed in a restored 14th-century building. Set 800 metres from the train station, it offers free WiFi access in all the rooms. Each spacious room here will provide you with a satellite TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with towels and free toiletries. Massimo Theatre is a 15-minute walk from Ai Cartari. Palermo Cathedral is 1 km away.

name: B&b Stesicoro Inhabit - City Center
address: Via Etnea 123 (Ingresso Via Neve 7, Angolo Piazza Stesicoro 3 ), 95131 Catania, Sicily
description: Intimate and comfortable located in the heart of Catania in the elegant and prestigious via Etnea and a few meters from Piazza Duomo. Composed of seven finely furnished in modern style, all with private bathroom and perfectly soundproofed. The privileged location just a few meters from Piazza Duomo makes the B&B Stesicoro the perfect choice for those wishing to visit the city without using public transport, allowing you to walk to all the main points of interest in Catania.VRBO

name: Dome
description: No description found

name: Hotel Califfo
address: Via Leonardo da Vinci 118, 09045 Quartu Sant'Elena, Sardinia
description: Located 1.5 km from the nearest beach and with views over the Gulf of Cagliari, Quartu Sant’Elena's Hotel Califfo is in the coastal area between Cagliari and Villasimius. It offers free WiFi throughout and a large free-form pool with hydromassage area. The Roman Amphitheatre in Cagliari is 16 km from the hotel. Elmas Airport is a 30-minute drive away, and Cagliari Port, where ferries depart for Civitavecchio and Palermo, is 15 km from the Califfo. Rooms come with air conditioning, satellite TV channels and a minibar. Some have views of the Mediterranean Sea. Breakfast is buffet style, and American breakfast options are also available. The restaurant serves a mix of classic Italian cuisine and Sardinian dishes. Sports facilities include tennis, football and basketball. Karaoke evenings are also held. The beautiful Poetto beach is 1.5 km away. You also have discounts at a partner private beach located nearby.

name: Jolie Julie Accomodation
description: Set in Sassari, 38 km from Alghero Marina, Jolie Julie Accomodation features a shared lounge and views of the city. The property is located 39 km from Nuraghe di Palmavera, 46 km from Capo Caccia and 46 km from Neptune's Grotto. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hair dryer and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the guest house also have free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a terrace. At Jolie Julie Accomodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. Italian and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Palazzo Ducale Sassari is 1.2 km from Jolie Julie Accomodation, while Sassari Railway Station is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alghero, 28 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Album Boutique Rooms
description: Located in Sassari, Album Boutique Rooms provides accommodation 38 km from Alghero Marina and 39 km from Nuraghe di Palmavera. Free WiFi is providedthroughout the property. Every unit features a private bathroom and bidet, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. A minibar and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. An Italian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. A car rental service is available at the bed and breakfast, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Capo Caccia is 46 km from Album Boutique Rooms, while Neptune's Grotto is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Alghero, 28 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Le Jeu de Paume
description: This hotel is located in the hamlet of Le Lavancher, a ten minute drive from Chamonix town center, between the breath-taking Aiguilles de Chamonix and the Argentière valley, this fantastic setting is guaranteed to amaze anyone with an interest in the nature surrounding the Mont Blanc mountain range. It features an indoor swimming pool, a hammam, a sauna and an indoor hot tub, as well as a outdoor hot tub only during summer season. The guest rooms at the Hôtel Le Jeu De Paume have free Wi-Fi internet access and views of the Vallée d'Argentière, the Aiguilles de Chamonix or the Aiguilles Rouge. The larger rooms are equipped with balneotherapy baths. Guests can enjoy refined cuisine at the Jeu De Paume’s restaurant, Le Rosebud. Breakfast is available at the property. There is also a cocktail bar with a pool table, chess, and small lounges to make you feel at home. Free private parking is also provided and Chamonix Golf Club is 3.6 km away.

name: Lykke Hotel Chamonix
description: Lykke Hotel Chamonix "ex Mercure" is located at the foot of Mont Blanc, in the heart of Chamonix and offers contemporary accommodation and a 24-hour reception. The gondola lift to the Aiguille du Midi mountains is a 5-minute walk away. Free WiFi is provided throughout and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel's ski shop. The rooms are located in 2 different buildings separated by a street. All the rooms at Lykke Hotel Chamonix have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some of the rooms have a balcony and offer Mont Blanc views. Enjoy traditional dishes of the Savoie region at La Cordée, the hotel's restaurant. In summer, you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc from its panoramic terrace or have a drink at the bar Le 4810. The surrounding area offers plenty of leisure and sportive activities all year round. Private parking is provided.

name: Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa
description: This chalet sits below the famous ski area of the Grands Montets and at the starting point for a range of hiking trails. Its spacious rooms (some with mezzanines for families) have a view of Mont-Blanc or the Glacier of Argentière. The chalet-style rooms and suites offer bright and cosy living spaces. They all have a balcony, individual heating, TV and private bathrooms with bath and shower. Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa provides plenty of after-ski facilities including an indoor swimming pool, outdoor hot-tub, sauna, fitness room and steam room. Massages are also available upon request. In winter warm up in the bar with a drink next to the fireplace, or play a game of billiards. In summer, guests can enjoy the large terrace with sunbeds facing Mont Blanc. Wi-Fi internet access is available in the public areas of Les Grands Montets Hotel & Spa and free parking is available on site. Throughout the year, ski lockers, shoe-dryers and multi-passes are available at the hotel.

name: Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire Hotel & Spa
description: Set in 5-hectare park with vineyards and Olive trees, Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire is a hotel decorated in an elegant style. The property was built in the 18th property and includes spa facilities as well as 2 swimming pools. The rooms and suites at Les Lodges Sainte-Victoire have a minibar, an LCD TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A kettle is available in the rooms. A gourmet-style restaurant is available on site and offers meals made with seasonal and local products. A homemade buffet breakfast is also available daily and you can enjoy a drink at the bar. Children under the age of 8 benefit from free breakfast. Other facilities are available such as a sun terrace, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access, available throughout. The spa facilities include a steam bath, a sauna and a fitness centre. The hotel is situated 10 km from Sainte-Victoire Mountain and 6 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence. There is free, private car park on site which does not require reservation. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac
description: Set in Bordeaux, 3 km from Wine and Trade Museum, Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.1 km from Matmut Atlantique Stadium. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms also offer a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Guests at Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac can enjoy a continental breakfast. Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk. Bordeaux Expo is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Chaban Delmas Bridge is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bordeaux–Mérignac Airport, 13 km from Live Hotels Bordeaux Lac.

name: Patio De L'Intendance
description: Set in a 18th-century building in central Bordeaux, Patio De L'Intendance offers B&B accommodation 100 metres from Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux. It provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access and has a wooden-decked patio. This house offers 2 exclusive guest rooms or a loft, which are individually themed. Offering views of the church or the patio, they have wooden floorboards.Guests can also relax in the property's shared patio or lounge. A continental breakfast is provided every morning in the dining room.
