A supermarket can be found within 200 metres from the property and the B&B is located in the city centre with bars and restaurants. A common kitchen is at guests' disposal. Only 3.3 km from Bordeaux Saint-Jean railway station, the residence is 300 metres from a fitness center with a Turkish bath and sauna. Bordeaux Mérignac airport is 13.1 km away.

name: All Suites Appart hotel Bordeaux Lac
address: 10 Rue du Prof Georges Jeanneney, 33300 Bordeaux, Gironde
description: No description found

name: Novotel Suites Nice Airport
description: 5 mins from the Mediterranean and NICE airport, recharge your batteries at Novotel Suites Nice Airport. Family stays, holidays for 2 or business trips: the 4-star hotel welcomes you to comfortable suites, convertible to work spaces for business meetings. Enjoy a gourmet break in our boutique in a friendly setting or in your room. Relax by the pool or stroll Promenade des Anglais.accorhotels.com

name: Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57
description: Boasting a restaurant, a bar, and a shared lounge, Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57 features accommodation in Nice with free WiFi and sea views. Housed in a building dating from 1980, the boat is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, snorkelling and windsurfing. This 2-bedroom boat will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, a balcony, a seating area and a CD player. Towels and bed linen are offered. Guests at the boat can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast. Speaking German, English, French and Italian, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Guests at Yacht Priape Nice - San can enjoy cycling and fishing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plage Rauba Capeu, Plage Castel and Plage Ponchettes. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur, 7 km from Yacht Priape Nice - San Lorenzo 57, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apparthotel La Girafe
address: Allée de la Colombe, 13821 La Penne-sur-Huveaune, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est is set in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, 11 km from Marseille and 15 km from the Calanques National Park. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free secure private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is individually decorated and features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms include a private bathroom. You will find a laundry room at the property. Cassis is 8 km from Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est, while Toulon is 38 km away. Marseille Sallette Golf club is a 3 km drive away. The Villasospa Spa is located 350m away. Marseille Provence Airport is 29 km from the property.

name: Château Beaupin Chambres et Suites By Les Collectionneurs
description: Château Beaupin chambres et suites is located in Marseille, near the beach. This listed building dates from 19th century. The hotel features a swimming pool, bar-restaurant and certain rooms have a private gardens, see view or balcony. Free WiFi is available. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, air condition, coffee making facilitities and a hairdryer. Bed linen, towels, pool towels and toiletries are provided. The area is popular for its beaches, hiking along the coastline, windsurfing, diving and golf. Free open parking is available onsite and is monitored by video surveillance. The Old Port is a 15-minute drive away. Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km away. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

name: Hôtel Padolo
description: Offering a garden with a heated outdoor pool and a bar, Hôtel Padolo is located in the south of Corsica, in the town of Bonifacio. A hot tub is available at an extra charge. The property features free WiFi access and free on-site parking for guests arriving by car. The private bathrooms come with a shower and free toiletries. A continental buffet breakfast including hot drinks, homemade jam and homemade bread is available every morning for an extra charge. Guests can also purchase snacks onsite. Hôtel Padolo is an 8-minute drive from Bonifacio Port and 4 km from the King Aragon Steps. For guests who enjoy golf, the Sperone Golf Course is an 18-minute drive away. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is situated just 17 km from the property.

name: Résidence Hôtelière A Trama
address: Route de Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Situated in Bonifacio, 2.4 km from Bonifacio Port, Résidence hôtelière A TRAMA features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 8.3 km from Former Chapel of the Trinity, 29 km from Porto Vecchio Port and 36 km from The Lion of Roccapina. Guests can use the hot tub, or enjoy garden views. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a hot tub and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. All units will provide guests with a microwave. King Aragon Steps is 3.9 km from Résidence hôtelière A TRAMA, while Sperone Golf Course is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Moby Dick
address: Plage de Santa Giulia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located on a sandy beach with parasols and deckchairs, Hôtel Moby Dick offers classy rooms with sea or lake view and a restaurant with panoramic views of the sea. Each air-conditioned room has a private furnished terrace and is equipped with free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The restaurant prepares a buffet breakfast and traditional Corsican cuisine. Meals are served in the dining room or on the panoramic terrace and lush garden. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. Other services provided at the Hôtel Moby Dick are free private parking and 24-front desk. Moby Dick is 7.4 km from Porto-Vecchio City Centre and 19.3 km from Bonifacio.

name: Le Roc e Fiori Hotel
description: Located 4km south of Porto-Vecchio in Corsica, the Roc E Fiori Hotel is near the Santa Giulia and Palombaggia beaches. It has a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam and pool-side terrace. Massages can be arranged, at an extra cost. Le Roc E Fiori offers rooms with a private terrace that overlooks the garden and the mountains. They each have a separate seating area with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Fiori’s bar and have lunch at the pool bar. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout and a computer is at guests' disposal at the reception. The hotel also offers a bicycle and scooter rental service, massages and exfoliating treatments upon request.

name: Résidence U Pirellu
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, a hair dryer, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Résidence Casarina
address: Route De Maora Golfe De Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Residence Santa Maria
description: Set in LʼÎle-Rousse, 50 metres from Digue Beach, RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Located around 200 metres from Nautique Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 800 metres away from Napoleon Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 70 metres from Lotissement des Iles Beach. All guest rooms come with a fridge, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature sea views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Guests at RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. L'Ile-Rousse Port is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Pietra Lighthouse is a 16-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA.

name: Domaine Santa Giulia Palace
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto
description: A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Bonifacio, 2.1 km from Bonifacio Port. Some units include a seating area and/or a terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. The restaurant at A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can swim in the saltwater pool, go snorkelling or hiking or relax in the garden. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 5.2 km from the accommodation, while Porto Vecchio Port is 25 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 19 km from A Loghja Di Cavallo Morto.

name: Chambre d'Hote Veronique
description: No description found

name: Résidence Aigue Marine
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Suite Home Porticcio
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a fenced pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel De Provence
description: Hôtel de Provence is located in central Cannes and has a pretty garden and patio. It offers air-conditioned en suite guest rooms, each with satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. With traditional French decor, the Provence is set in a quiet area, a 5-minute walk from La Croisette, Cannes Beach and 10 minutes from the Palais des Festivals and Cannes Marina. The Hôtel de Provence bar serves regional wines and a variety of refreshing beverages. Guests can enjoy drinks and the hotel’s French breakfast in the garden or on the terrace and patio. There are numerous restaurants and boutique shops in the nearby side streets.

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: La Bastide de l'Oliveraie
description: This charming hotel in Cannes provides free wireless internet, as well as a rooftop terrace and a Turkish steam bath. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. All the rooms at La Bastide De L'Oliveraie feature a refrigerator, a coffee maker and a kitchenette. They each offer an in-room safe, a telephone and a flat-screen TV. La Bastide De L'Oliveraie is close to shops and restaurants, and is a brief car ride from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. It is within a 20-minute walk of Cannes Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Cannes.Revato

name: Le Relais d'Agay
address: 100 Boulevard De La Plage, 83530 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: Le Relais d'Agay faces the beautiful sandy beach at Agay and is surrounded by shops and restaurants. It offers free Wi-Fi access throughout the property. Some of the guest rooms offer a private balcony and sea views. You can start your day with a generous buffet breakfast in the Relais d'Agay’s bright breakfast room. As well as spending the day on the beach, there are many footpaths and nature trails in the Estérel Hills where you can go to admire wonderful panoramic views. Le Relais d'Agay makes a great base for exploring the glamorous towns of the French Riviera, such as Saint Tropez and Cannes.

name: Residéal
address: 100 Rue Line Renaud Loulou Gasté, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Villa Cosy, hotel & spa
address: Chemin De La Belle Isnarde, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Saint-Tropez centre and Place des Lices is Villa Cosy. It offers contemporary rooms in a villa-style setting and a heated outdoor swimming pool. An LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access feature in all of the rooms and suites at Cosy. Each is decorated in cream and chocolate tones and some have a private patio leading directly onto the poolside terrace. Guests can order breakfast to their room and dine on the private balconies or on the hotel’s terrace. There is also an onsite bar, which serves a range of aperitifs and cocktails. The airport shuttle service and car rental can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Villa Cosy also provides free private parking and Les Salins Beach is a 10-minute drive away.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Avanti Hotel
description: Located in Stockholm, 4.4 km from Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre, Avanti Apartment Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. The property is around 4.9 km from Monteliusvägen, 6 km from Stockholm Cathedral and 6.1 km from Museum of Medieval Stockholm. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a sauna. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room is fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Avanti Apartment Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. The Royal Palace is 6.2 km from Avanti Apartment Hotel, while Ericsson Globe is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Stockholm Ängby Camping
description: Stockholm Ängby Camping offers basic accommodation with standard facilities in Stockholm, 10 km from Stockholm City Hall. Free WiFi and parking are offered. A terrace with garden views is offered in each unit as well as a kitchenette. Stockholm Ängby Camping provides a children's playground, a barbecue and a tennis court. Långholmen is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Lydinge Resort
description: Situated next to the 18-hole Lydinge Golf Club, this hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Hyllinge’s main square and 15 minutes’ drive from central Helsingborg. It offers free private parking. Each room at Lydinge Golf Club Resort features parquet floors and a flat screen TV. A small putting green is available for a fee. Fishing licences can be bought for the neighbouring pond, where guests can also swim. Other nearby amenities include a lit jogging track and tennis courts. Lydinge has a restaurant with lunch specials and an a la carte menu. Hyllinge Shopping Centre also has a variety of restaurants and stores, about 1 km away.

name: Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel
description: Located 7 minutes by car from Gothenburg, this hotel offers a 2000 m² big outdoor and indoor spa. Guests have free access to the gym. The individually decorated rooms include free WiFi and a flat screen TV. Private parking is also available free of charge. The property features both indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa that guests can access for a fee. It is possible to book massage. The guests can enjoy the in house restaurant and four different bars. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet and an internationally inspired à la carte menu. Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel is 100 metres from Berghöjdsgatan Bus Stop. The No. 42 bus reaches central Gothenburg in 12 minutes.

name: Hotel Villan
description: Situated in the Eriksberg district, just a 10-minute ferry ride from Gothenburg city centre, this intimate waterfront hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hotel Villan is housed in a refurbished wooden building from the early 1900s. The stylish guest rooms have a seating area and a work desk, and each room features a tiled bathroom with underfloor heating. Complimentary hot drinks, fruit and candy are available at all times in the lobby. A buffet breakfast is included in the room rates and served each morning. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at the property, and conference rooms are available as well. A shoe polishing service is offered at the hotel. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, located 32 km from the property.

name: Hotel Torslanda
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Mullbärsgårdens Bed and Breakfast
description: Offering rooms and apartments, Mullbärsgårdens B&B is just 2 minutes’ walk from Stora Torget square in Visby. The Visby Medieval Wall can be admired from the property as it borders the garden. Facilities include a sea-view terrace, BBQ facilities and free WiFi. Featuring bright, modern décor, all accommodation at Mullbärsgårdens includes a 42-inch flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. The self-catering apartments have a fully equipped kitchen. Guests staying in rooms have access to a shared kitchen, where a light self-service breakfast is provided. Almedalen Park and Visby Botanical Garden are 2 minutes’ walk from Mullbärsgården. The seaside is only 80 metres away. The Visby Ferry Terminal is 1 km away.

name: Hotell Villa Borgen
description: Set in Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre, this hotel offers free WiFi and an inner courtyard. Free tea, coffee, cookies and fruit are offered in the lobby. Minibars and TVs are standard room features at Hotell Villa Borgen. Umbrellas are included in each room as well. Staff will gladly recommend local restaurants and bars. Situated on the street Adelsgatan, Villa Borgen provides easy access to arts and crafts shops and cute cafés. Visby Marina is 500 metres away.

name: Novi Resort
description: Located by Norderstrand Beach, this property offers guest rooms and apartments in Visby and just 1 km from Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre. It offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a large terrace. NOVI Resort’s rooms feature modern décor, designer furniture and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All options have private patios or balconies with Baltic Sea views. Most have a kitchenette. Guest can hang out by the poolside or eat at NOVI's summer restaurant Grill & Bar between June and August. It offers light dishes, gourmet dining and great sea views. NOVI Resort is a 10-minute walk from Visby’s 13th-century city wall and Almedalen Park. Gotska Golf Course is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Ljungs Fem Rum
description: On the popular island destination of Gotland and just 1.5 km from Visby golf club, Ljungs Fem Rum offers modern rooms with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a large garden with BBQ facilities. Ljungs Fem Rum consists of accommodation with private bathrooms and a private entrance, each with its own patio or balcony. Each room comes with a kitchenette, a TV, and a sofa-bed in the living/dining area. There is a communal breakfast room at the property, with homemade bread baked daily. The shared living area has sofas and a TV as well as a fireplace. Located in Västergarn, there is a swimming beach within 10 minutes’ walk of the property. Visby town is 23 km to the north, with buses running regularly to a bus stop just 50 metres from Ljungs Fem Rum.

name: Visby Gustavsvik
description: This holiday village lies by the beach, 3 km north of the medieval town of Visby. It offers parking, a beach sauna and a communal laundry room. Guests can choose between self-catering apartments or guest rooms. The apartments at Visby Gustavsvik have a kitchen and a private patio. Guests rooms include a patio, TV and a private bathroom with shower. During summer, guests can enjoy dinners at the on-site restaurant Viken. Gustavsvik’s facilities include bicycle rental and a barbeque area. The surrounding area offers hiking trails and jogging tracks as well as activities such as football and volleyball. Guests can borrow sports equipment at the reception.

name: Hotell Zäta Longstay
description: This city centre hotel is within 10 minutes’ walk of Östersund Central Station and the Storsjön lake. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi internet access. Hotell Zäta Longstay’s guest rooms have a TV and a bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a seating area. All rooms are equipped with a fridge and a microwave. A self service kitchen can be used free of charge. Guests arriving by car in winter months might appreciate Zäta’s heated garage. Fees apply, and a reservation is required. Hotell Zäta Longstay is located close to shopping, bars and restaurants. The cultural history museum, Jamtli, is 1.5 kilometres from the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Aby Hotel
description: The Aby Arena is the only meetings and event venue in Scandinavia that combines a top modern trotting race course with an exhibition center, meetings, a hotel, a fitness center and a variety of dining opportunities. It is a dynamic destination for attendees seeking a truly unique experience. With 223 bedrooms, the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel forms an important part of the Aby Arena. In order to strengthen the ambiance of a venue that is full of action, expectations and joy, the interior design of the hotel has been inspired by an amusement park. Regardless of the purpose of your stay, we hope that our guests regard the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel as an arena full of action and exciting moments. The room types we offer include standard rooms, superior, deluxe, extended stay and economy. In addition to the normal sized double rooms we offer 72 rooms that can accommodate up to 5 guests. Restaurant Lyon is closed until further notice. We refer our guests to our own lobby bar in the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Bauergården
description: Located next to Bunn Lake in Gränna, 10 km from Grenna Museum, Bauergården features a common terrace where you can enjoy views of the garden. A communal sauna offers relaxation. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some room have outdoor seating. The restaurant menu offers Nordic-style dishes. A range of activities is offered in the area, such as fishing and canoeing, or you can simply find a spot on the lake beach. The nearest airport is Linköping City Airport, 86 km from the property.

name: Sveriges minsta Hotell! Hôtel Gruyère
description: Sveriges minsta Hotell! Hôtel Gruyère is located in central Landskrona, 44 km from Malmö and 700 metres from the beach. Guests can enjoy free WiFi, barbecue facilities and complimentary coffee throughout the stay. This small accommodation has 4 rooms, all include a seating area, flat-screen TV and access to a shared bathroom. Guests at this accommodation can also relax on the common terrace and enjoy views of the city. Breakfast is optional and served between Monday and Saturday at the neighbouring cafe Trädgårdsgatans Konditori. On Sundays, a take-away breakfast bag is offered. Helsingborg is 28 km away, while Copenhagen is 88 km from Hôtel Gruyère. The nearest airport is Malmo Sturup Airport, 60 km from the property, while Copenhagen Airport Kastrup is 76 km away.

name: Ludvika Stadshotell
description: This family-run hotel is situated in Ludvika, 200 metres from the train station. It offers free WiFi and free access to a nearby fitness centre. Rooms here are individually decorated and include a desk, TV & armchair. The bathroom has free toiletries, a hairdryer and a shower. The Stadshotell serves a breakfast buffet. Shops, cafes and restaurants are only a few minutes walk from the hotel.

name: La Hotel
description: Located on the island of Lidingö, this property is a 20 minutes' ride with public transportation from central Stockholm. Free WiFi is provided. Street parking is free and garage parking is provided for a fee. Millesgården Art Museum is a 10 minutes' walk from the hotel. Shared facilities at LA Hotel include a washing machine, iron equipment and a communal kitchen. Some rooms have a private kitchenette. All rooms have private bathrooms (some next to the room) and a TV. Guests also have access to a gym in the same building. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet that is served daily in the breakfast room. Free coffee, tea and hot chocolate are available for guests at all times. Bicycles are available for rent 100 metres away, while car rental is 50 metres from the property. Värtahamnen and Frihamnen harbours are both about 3 km from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is 34 km away. The area of the property provides a ski lift, golf courses and beaches.

name: Hotell Park
description: Dating back to 1881, this family-owned hotel is located in central Västervik, right next to Västervik Train Station. It offers individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi access and cable TV. All rooms at Hotell Park have a seating area and private bathroom with shower. Rooms feature either park or garden views. Bicycles can be rented on site. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the furnished garden in nice weather. Archipelago boats depart from Västervik Port, a 2 minute walk away. Bredgatan pedestrian street is 150 metres from Park Hotell.

name: Nya Pallas Hotel
description: With a peaceful, yet central location in the coastal town of Falkenberg, Nya Pallas Hotel offers a lush garden. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Hotel Nya Pallas include a writing desk and a seating area. Garden views, old-style furniture and beautiful paintings create a charming atmosphere in each room. Breakfast and light dishes are served in the elegant dining room. For relaxation, guests can book the sauna or visit the relaxation area. In addition, the on-site Västkusthälsan Spa offers a variety of face and body treatments.

name: Stiftsgården i Rättvik
description: Peacefully located by Lake Siljan, this Rättvik property features a private beach and waterfront terrace with panoramic lake views in a non alcoholic environment. It offers a daily breakfast buffet, along with free sauna and gym access. The bright guest rooms at Stiftsgården i Rättvik are decorated with light wooden furnishings. Each includes a flat-screen TV, work desk and garden views. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas of the property. Stiftsgården’s restaurant serves buffets made with Swedish specialities and locally produced ingredients. Lake views can be enjoyed while dining. In summer, the large garden is an ideal location to relax and enjoy a cup of coffee. Leisure options at Stiftsgården i Rättvik include giant chess and table tennis. Guests wishing to explore the surroundings can rent a bicycle on site and visit the 15th-century Rättvik Church, just 150 metres away.

name: Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection
description: The Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection is an effortless ecosystem of living comforts for smart and active people. From the expertly outfitted gym to the health-conscious cafe and restaurant and spacious common areas with co-working possibilities, here you can count on premium functionality at a reasonable price. And a good night's sleep, of course. Select from a range of flexible arrangements, from economy to a room with a connecting office. No matter which room you stay in, you can always count on the essential contemporary comforts. Like a great bed, lightning-fast Wi-Fi, and your very own balcony for refreshing moments in peace. Expertly outfitted by casall PRO and Matrix Fitness, the Ten Gym offers all you could desire in terms of strength, cardio, mobility, and recovery training.all in one spacious, playful, and state-of-the-art facility. Our Ten Restaurant is open Monday to Saturday from 5 p.m. We serve a great variety of international dishes. Or why not stop by after work to enjoy a refreshing drink in good company? The Ten Cafe offers a range of health-conscious and delicious options that fuel your activities and keep you feeling good. Start the day with a wholesome breakfast and a great cup of coffee. Meet up for lunch and feast on a salad, sandwich, or seasonal hot dish. Or why not stop by after work to enjoy a drink in good company? We have plenty of seating options and far-reaching views for your dining pleasure. With its warm and spacious interiors and versatile meeting points, our Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection is the perfect place to gain clarity and energize new ideas. Enjoy our private conference and break-out rooms with flexible arrangements. Or expand your gathering to our common areas with endless possibilities for memorable dining and entertainment experiences or other group activities.the entire hotel is at your service!bestwestern.com

name: Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo
description: Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Oslo, 10 km from Sognsvann Lake. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher. The campground offers an outdoor fireplace. Skiing, cycling and hiking are possible within the area, and Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo offers ski-to-door access. Oslo Central Station is 10 km from the accommodation, while Akershus Fortress is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 57 km from Topcamp Bogstad - Oslo.

name: Hi Oslo Haraldsheim
description: Surrounded by the greenery of Oslo’s Grefsen neighbourhood, this hostel is 4 km from the city centre. It offers access to a fully equipped kitchen, garden with BBQ and free WiFi in public areas. Each guest room at HI Oslo Haraldsheim features wooden floors and simple décor. Guests can choose either private or shared bathroom facilities. Communal rooms at the hostel include a TV lounge, as well as a library with a billiards table. A laundry room is available at Haraldsheim, along with vending machines with drinks and snacks. Outdoor furniture can be enjoyed when the weather is nice. The Norwegian Museum of Science, Technology and Medicine is a 6-minute drive from the hostel. Both Ullevål Stadium and Oslo Ski Centre are 2 km away.

name: Scandic Kokstad
description: Situated in Bergen, Scandic Kokstad offers contemporary 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna. It also provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Kokstad offer a desk, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all feature ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar.Revato

name: City Living Sentrum Hotell
description: City Living Sentrum Hotel is located 400 metres from Trondheim Central Station. It offers rooms with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access, a fridge and electric kettle. Nordre gate pedestrian street is 50 metres away. Torget Square is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The Nidaros Cathedral is 800 metres away. Several restaurants, pubs and night clubs are located on the same street.

name: Highland Lodge
description: This hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Geilo Train Station. It offers a gym, sauna and pool. Original Edvard Munch prints and Hardanger Mountain views are featured in the restaurant or café. Free WiFi and private bathrooms are standard in Highland Lodge’s individually decorated rooms. Snow-kiting and dog sleighing, plus cross-country or downhill skiing are popular area activities. A bakery, bar and restaurant are found in the same building. Nearby is the picturesque Hardanger Plateau, a 3,400 km² national park with many rivers, lakes and waterfalls.

name: Trudvang Gjestegaard
description: No description found

name: Vestlia Resort
description: Found next to Hardangervidda mountain plateau and only 2 km from Geilo Train Station, this ski-in ski-out hotel offers lodge-style guest rooms, free Wi-Fi and comprehensive spa and fitness facilities. Hotel Vestlia Resort was designed by renowned Norwegian architect Helene Hennie. The charming guest rooms have comfortable, stylish décor and furnishings. Vestlia Resort’s in-house restaurant serves seasonal Norwegian, Italian and French cuisine. Lighter dishes are offered in the cosy café-bar. After-ski drinks can be enjoyed by the open fire at Hunter’s Bar. Vestlia Resort’s spa provides luxury treatments and relaxation facilities. Guests can stay in shape by visiting the fully equipped fitness centre. The family-friendly Geilolia Ski Resort provides a large number of high-quality slopes and cross-country tracks for all skill levels. In the summer, guests can play a round of golf on Vestlia Resort’s 9-hole course, which is found next to the hotel.

name: Klara
description: Located just 31 km from Oseberg Kulturhus, Klara offers accommodation in Sandefjord with access to a garden, a shared lounge, as well as a shared kitchen. This bed and breakfast provides free private parking, free shuttle service and free WiFi. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Preus Museum is 46 km from Klara, while Telemark Kanal is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Sandefjord, Torp Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad
description: Set in central Fredrikstad in the Old Town, surrounded by shops, museums and markets, this hotel is 150 metres from the Old Town Ferry Terminal. Guests can enjoy free WiFi and free bike rental. Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad's rooms are individually decorated in a classic style. All feature antique furniture, and some guest rooms offer views of the Old Town. Facilities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can relax in the garden with a drink from the bar. A continental breakfast is served at the neighbouring restaurant, Gamlebyen Gjestgiveri, where Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad's guests are offered discounts on some lunch and dinner dishes. Fredrikstad's main street, Nygaardsgata, is just a 10-minute walk and free ferry ride away. Fredrikstad Museum is 250 metres from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel, Kristiansand
description: Featuring views of the city, Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel Kristiansand provides 4-star accommodation in Kristiansand. It is set in the area's popular nightlife district, about a five-minute walk from Otterdalsparken. There are a variety of amenities at Caledonien Hotel that guests can enjoy, including an express check-in and check-out feature, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. Corporate facilities include a business centre and meeting rooms. The rooms at Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel feature a telephone and an in-room safe. En suites include either a bath or a shower. Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel Kristiansand has its very own pub where patrons can socialise while enjoying a casual meal and a beverage. Eateries at the hotel include Telford and Brasserie C. Caledonien Hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Kristiansand with the Sorlandet Art Museum, the Kilden Performing Arts Centre and Kristiansand Cathedral within a 10-minute walk. Kristiansand Zoo and Amusement Park is only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Lysko Gjestegaard
description: Situated by the Larvik Fjord in central Larvik, this property offers free parking and rustic-style rooms with antique furnishings, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. Larvik Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. All the individually decorated rooms at Lysko Gjestegård feature wooden interiors. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. BBQ facilities and a children’s playground are found in the garden at Gjestegård Lysko. Fishing is possible in the Larvik Fjord, just 2 minutes’ walk away. Bølgen Culture House is 1 km away. Bøkeskogen Forest is a 13-minute walk away. Lysko Gjestegård offers free, secure parking for both bikes and motorcycles. A beach is found within 2 minutes' walk of the B&B.

name: Sjøholt Camping
description: No description found

name: Living Hotel Weißensee
description: This hotel offers a peaceful park setting in Berlin’s Weißensee district, a direct tram ride from Alexanderplatz. It features modern rooms with free minibar, and a restaurant with beer garden. The air-conditioned rooms at Livinghotel Weißensee include satellite TV. Some have a balcony, microwave and kettle, and selected drinks in the minibar are free. Living Hotel Weißensee features a modern fitness centre with gym, sauna and infra-red sauna. Bathrobes and towels are provided. The hotel's restaurant serves hearty German dishes, and a buffet breakfast can be booked. Guests can enjoy drinks in the cocktail bar or outside in the beer garden. The Albertinenstraße tram stop is a 10-minute walk away. From here, trams run to the famous Berlin TV Tower at Alexanderplatz in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Am Moosfeld
description: This quiet, 4-star hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Neue Messe Exhibition Centre, in South-East Munich. It offers free Wi-Fi. The family-run Hotel Am Moosfeld provides rooms with cable TV, a work desk and a modern bathroom. In the evenings, the Kaminstube restaurant serves Bavarian and international dishes. Leisure facilities are located in the annex next door, and include a sauna area (open daily between 17:00 and 23:00), a fitness room. A shuttle service to the Neue Messe is available on request. Trains run to Munich Central Station in 20 minutes. The A94 motorway is 1 km away and there is free parking on site according to availability.

name: NH München Unterhaching
description: The NH München Unterhaching hotel is set in a quiet residential of Munich, yet it’s only a 15-minute train ride to the city’s main sites. The S-Bahn station is 300m from the hotel and from here guests can access attractions such as the Marienplatz and the famous Maximilianstrasse shopping street. Business travelers will enjoy being only a 20-minute drive from the Messe Munich exhibition center and the International Congress Center. There are 80 comfortable rooms at NH München Unterhaching. All of our standard rooms come with a separate sleeping and living area and have a couch, and a small kitchenette with tea and coffee-making facilities. Each morning, we serve a delicious fresh breakfast, which you can enjoy in our bright and airy breakfast room with floor-to-ceiling windows. There are a variety of options for every taste including local specialties such as Bavarian sausages. Our lobby bar serves your favorite drinks alongside a menu of light meals and snacks. In the summer, you can enjoy these on our terrace decorated in a Bavarian beer garden style. For snacks at any time of night or day, there is a self-service Open Bar. There is also a wellness center with a gym, sauna, and steam bath.NH Hoteles

name: Westside Hotel
description: This charming hotel offers spacious accommodation on the north-western outskirts of Münich, close to the train station and A99 motorway, and just a 20-minute train journey from the city centre. The rooms of the WESTSIDE Hotel feature large bathrooms and free, unlimited wireless internet access. The hotel will happily lend you a laptop if you are not able to bring yours along. Wake up to the Westside’s delicious buffet breakfast, rich with choice, before the start of a busy day. Things to do include exploring the surrounding area, the nearby Allach Forest, Munich’s city centre, or simply enjoying a round of golf at the Eschenried golf course.

name: Hotel Rosengarten
description: Situated in Hamburg, within 13 km of Hamburg Central Station and 13 km of Hamburg Dammtor Station, Hotel Rosengarten features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 14 km from Hamburg Fair, 14 km from Town Hall Hamburg and 15 km from Dialog im Dunkeln. The property is allergy-free and is located 14 km from Inner Alster Lake. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At Hotel Rosengarten rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hamburg, like hiking and cycling. Mönckebergstraße is 15 km from Hotel Rosengarten, while CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Das Nest Boardinghouse Hamburg Niendorf
description: These modern, self-catering apartments in North Hamburg are a direct underground ride from Hamburg Trade Fair and the city centre. Free Wi-Fi and kitchens are provided. The Nest Boardinghouse Niendorf offers comfortably furnished apartments with flat-screen TVs and DVD players. A tumble dryer and ironing facilities are available on the basement-level floor. You will also find a gym, sauna and solarium here. The Nest is located close to many shops, where you can buy your daily groceries. Free parking is available on site, and Niendorf Nord Underground Station is just 50 metres away.

name: Boutique Hotel Poppenbütteler Hof
description: This hotel in Poppenbüttel is located just a few steps from the Alster and the hiking trails along this river. It is 2 km from Poppenbüttel S-Bahn Train Station and 8 km from Hamburg Airport. The rooms at the Hotel Poppenbütteler Hof include satellite TV and a minibar. The bathrooms have heated floors. A rich breakfast buffet is provided daily at the Poppenbütteler Hof. Hamburg city centre can be reached in 30 minutes via a direct S-Bahn train from Poppenbüttel Station.

name: Hotel Falk
description: This hotel is situated in Bremen’s Osterholz suburb, just a 15-minute drive from the city centre, and a 2-minute drive from the A27 motorway and Weserpark shopping and leisure centre. Look forward to comfortable, welcoming rooms at Hotel Falk, as well as a delicious and diverse breakfast buffet to enjoy in the mornings (included in room price). Make the most of free wireless internet access available throughout the hotel. Enjoy snacks and refreshments in the conservatory bistro. This hotel is the ideal base for day trips and activities in Bremen and the surrounding area.

name: Appart Hotel Heldt
description: This peaceful hotel is located in the green Schwachhausen district of Bremen. It provides spacious apartments, some with fully equipped kitchens. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning at the 3-star Appart-Hotel-Heldt. Free Wi-Fi is provided in both the rooms and Appart-Hotel’s public areas. The Apart-Hotel-Heldt is 2 km from the large Bürgerpark Park and the Rhododendron-Park. Bremen city centre, Main Train Station and congress centre are a 10-minute drive away or with Tram 4 which takes around 13 minutes.

name: Hotel Zum Klüverbaum
description: This family-run hotel offers comfortable accommodation in the Blumenthal district of Bremen, close to the A270 motorway. Bremens historic city centre is a 25-minute drive away and easy to reach by train or bus. The Hotel Zum Klüverbaum features comfortably furnished rooms equipped with all of the standard amenities. You can also look forward to a tasty breakfast buffet each morning. Free WiFi internet access is available in all public areas of the hotel. Popular sights in Bremen include the historic Marktplatz (market square), the Schnoor quarter, and the impressive Bremer Dom cathedral.

name: Holiday Inn Stuttgart
description: Stuttgart business hotel in Weilimdorf, with 2 restaurants and a fitness centreHoliday Inn® Stuttgart hotel is a 20-minute train ride from the city centre, with Weilimdorf S-Bahn station just across the road.If you're looking for hotels near the Porsche Museum Stuttgart, you're in luck – it's just a 15-minute drive away. The nearby A81 and A8 motorways bring you to Stuttgart Airport (STR) in less than 25 minutes. Thanks to our handy location in Weilimdorf business park, corporate guests are a short walk from the offices of Siemens and Robert Bosch, while Thales and Porsche are a quick train ride away. Head to the city centre for some shopping or to admire 20th-century art at Staatsgalerie Stuttgart. Holding a meeting or special event? There’s space for up to 350 guests in our 17 well-equipped meeting rooms.At this hotel you can enjoy:- On-site parking- Inclusive Wi-Fi- 24-hour pizza service- 24-hour Business Centre- Kids stay and eat freeYou’ll sleep soundly in our comfortable guest rooms with quality bedding and a pillow menu. Executive rooms offer extra space and suites have separate living rooms. You can start your day with a generous breakfast buffet at Piazza restaurant, then have a relaxing dinner at Dolce Vita restaurant. Hotel Bar is the place for evening drinks, or nip into the Cigar Lounge.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Rheincity Hotel
description: Providing free WiFi, RheinCity Hotel & Boardinghouse is located in Ludwigshafen am Rhein, within 1.7 km of Feierabendhaus der BASF. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area. All rooms have a kitchenette with a microwave, stovetop, toaster and electric kettle. All guest rooms at RheinCity Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk. A continental breakfast is offered daily. Guests can enjoy free coffee and tea throughout the day.

name: Stay@ma Boardinghouse Mannheim
description: Located within 3.2 km of Mannheim Central Station and 3.4 km of Luisenpark in Mannheim, STAY@MA Boardinghouse Mannheim provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. University of Mannheim is 4 km from the aparthotel, while National Theatre Mannheim is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 5 km from STAY@MA Boardinghouse Mannheim.

name: Romantik Landhaus Dresden
description: This aparthotel is located in Dresden, just 5 km from the Old Town attractions. Romantik Landhaus features a terrace and children's playground. All apartments at Romantik Landhaus offer a fully equipped kitchen as well as a seating area with a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms come with a bathtub or shower as well as a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests are welcome to use facilities in a neighbouring hotel, which offers a wellness area with pool, saunas, and massages. Breakfast can also be booked here. Romantik Landhaus is also an ideal base for hiking and cycling in the surrounding Saxon countryside and in the Elbe Valley. Romantik Landhaus will happily organise trips and book tickets for local attractions. The Spaßbad Elbamare swimming pool is a 5-minute walk away. The property is 4.7 km from the Messe Dresden exhibition grounds, 6.5 km from the Rose Garden and 12 km from Dresden Airport.

name: Dorint An Den Westfalenhallen Dortmund
description: The Dorint An den Westfalenhallen Dortmund offers spacious accommodation, a spa and free internet in public areas. It lies opposite the Westfalenhallen exhibition grounds, 3 underground stops from the city centre. The air-conditioned rooms of Dorint An den Westfalenhallen Dortmund include satellite TV, a minibar and tea/coffee-making facilities. Free WiFi internet is also available. Hotel's spa area has a sauna and a modern gym. Regional and international cuisine is served in the Davidis restaurant. Drinks are available in the Overbeck bar throughout the day. Dorint An den Westfalenhallen Dortmund also offers rooms for various events as well as 13 conference rooms that can host up to 300 people. Westfalenhallen underground station is 500 metres from the hotel. The Signal Iduna Park football stadium is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Luga Homes - Stadthaus
description: This apartment house is centrally located in Leipzig, 100 metres from Leipzig Main Train Station and 600 metres from Zoo Leipzig and the Rosental park. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Luga Homes - Stadthaus offers modern rooms as well as luxurious apartments with a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom. The accommodation is a 4-minute walk from the Old Town with the central market square and Thomaskirche church. Leipzig University is a 15-minute walk away. StadtHaus Luga Homes are 5.6 km from the Leipzig Trade Fair. Leipzig/Halle Airport is 13 km away.

name: Dusit Suites Athens
description: Facilities and services include 24hr reception, internet access, concierge facilities, elevator, laundry facilities, dry cleaning, spa facilities, sauna, swimming pool, bar and restaurant.Rooms feature internet access, mini bar, safe, cable/satellite TV, desk, balcony, coffee/tea making facilities and hairdryer.Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions.Address: Lazaraki 42 & Pandoras 3, Glyfada, Athens, 16674 Greece.Sembo

name: Villa Elizea
description: No description found

name: Nicky Apartments Chania
address: Άπτερο, Κάτω Δαράτσο, Κάτω Δαράτσο, Ελλάδα 2 Όροφος, Chania 731 00
description: Set 400 metres from Kladissos Beach, Nicky Apartments Chania offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, quiet street views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a toaster and a fridge, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. A car rental service is available at Nicky Apartments Chania. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Chryssi Akti, Municipal Garden and Fransiscan Monastery of Agios Fragkiskos. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 16 km from Nicky Apartments Chania.

name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
description: Overlooking the Bay of Elounda, Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel is set on a peninsular stretch of land, with a view of Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. It features elegantly decorated accommodation opening to a balcony or terrace with sea views. Offering a living room, all air-conditioned suites and villas come with a minibar. Some units are fitted with luxurious bathrooms with steam bath, while most have a private and individually heated pool. An American-style, a la carte breakfast can be enjoyed, whilst watching views of the bay. The awarded Calypso restaurant prepares gourmet dishes by the pool, while a selection of Greek and international wine labels are available at "Kellari" wine cellar. The "Koh" Pan-Asian restaurant, located just above sea level at the very tip of the peninsula, serves Asian cuisine. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas, paddling pool and care centre for children. A private sandy beach with beach service, as well as water-sport facilities and tennis courts are offered. A 50-seat cinema features private screenings of films. Located at the sister property, the exclusive Six Senses Spa is equipped with an authentic Turkish bath, where guests can experience holistic treatments and therapies. The seaside Agios Nikolaos Town is 10 km away and Heraklion City is at a distance of 70 km. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 68 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Aegean Sky Hotel & Suites
description: Aegean Sky is a brand new hotel complex offering modern and spacious studios and apartments within walking distance of the beach in Malia, Crete’s premier party resort. The accommodation at Aegean Sky Hotel - Suites is comfortable and functional. All the units have balconies or patios, as well as indoor seating areas. The extensive list of in-room facilities includes air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar and CD player. Without even stepping out of Aegean Sky Hotel - Suites, you can enjoy Greek cuisine at the restaurant or have fun with a drink and a bite at the poolside bar. And when you are ready to go out, everything Malia has to offer – from the sandy beach and the old village, to its famous nightlife – is right on your doorstep.

name: Villa Iokasti
description: Situated in the picturesque village of Koutouloufari, Villa Iokasti provides traditional accommodation with plenty of entertainment facilities, free wireless internet and warm Cretan hospitality. Relax around the large outdoor swimming pool and enjoy the Mediterranean sun.There are many entertainment options at Villa Iokasti. A full English or Continental Breakfast is served daily. Savour the wonderful flavours of traditional Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel even provides cooking lessons on request. Taste the magnificent Greek wine, or have a dance at one of the hotel’s theme nights. The hotel enjoys a peaceful location, close to many places of cultural interest. A short stroll will take you into the traditional village or to the beach. The hotel can also arrange for you to rent a car or bike, so you can easily explore the surrounding area.

name: Tsambikos Apts
description: Set in Faliraki in the Dodecanese region, with Kathara Beach and Katafygio Beach nearby, Tsambikos Apts offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to beauty services. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A fridge is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. The restaurant at the apartment serves American, Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Tsambikos Apts offers a sun terrace. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Tsambikos Apts, while snorkelling and cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Mandomata Beach is 800 metres from the apartment, while Ladiko Beach is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Rhodes International, 16 km from Tsambikos Apts, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Romanos, a Luxury Collection Resort, Costa Navarino
address: Navarino Dunes, Costa Navarino, Costa Navarino
description: Enjoying a privileged position by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Romanos has been acclaimed as leading resort in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”. The property captures authentic and exceptional qualities of Messinia through its award-winning architecture, combining grand column-lined walkways with elegant, contemporary design, uninterrupted views of the coastline, and a wonderful backdrop of the golf landscape. The Romanos features exquisite guestrooms, while the superb Ionian Exclusive suites and beachfront villas additionally offer anticipatory Butler service and select amenities. Embark on epicurean journeys at elite venues, with fine menus curated by acclaimed chefs, rejuvenate at Anazoe Spa, experience four world-class signature golf courses and the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, along with an impressive array of sports and authentic experiences.Marriott

name: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park
description: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park offers everything you need to experience England's capital city in style. Ideally situated in North West London, just steps from Regent's Park and within walking distance of Lord's Cricket Ground and Wembley Stadium, our family-friendly and pet-friendly hotel effortlessly blends style, substance and award-winning service. Relax after a long day of meetings or exploring the city in our spacious, recently refurbished rooms and suites with pillow top beds and high-speed Wi-Fi; some of our rooms also offer private balconies. Stop by and enjoy delicious Italian dining at our on-site Carluccio's Restaurant or keep up with your workout routine in our fitness centre, pool and sauna. Our renovated event spaces are well suited to all business and social occasions, and our experienced event planners will help manage every detail. Best of all, our hotel location enables you to discover the many sights of London, from Camden Market and ZSL London Zoo to Primrose Hill and Baker Street.Marriott

name: COMO Metropolitan London
description: Located amongst a range of well-known tourist hot spots, boutiques and eateries, COMO Metropolitan London is ideal for guests wanting to explore London and its surroundings. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel, including body treatments, free Wi-Fi and a spa and wellness centre. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Guests staying at COMO Metropolitan London can enjoy the luxurious rooms that provide a private bathroom, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all include a desk and an in-room safe. During their stay at COMO Metropolitan London, guests can dine at Nobu, which serves South American and Japanese cuisine. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar. COMO Metropolitan London is within walking distance of Bond Street, Buckingham Palace and Grosvenor Square. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Knightsbridge Tube Station, which allows easy access in and around London.Revato

name: The Old Vicarage Lodge
description: No description found

name: My-Places Abbotsfield Court Townhouse 4
description: With views of the Pennines, this serviced town house provides free Wi-Fi, a modern kitchen and a spacious living area. Manchester’s centre is a 10-minute drive, or the tram network is just a few minutes’ walk away. My-Places Senior Executive Serviced Accommodation features a 42-inch HD TV with Sky HD and stylish décor in the living area. The master bedroom has a TV and a sleek private bathroom, whilst there is also a second bathroom. Opening onto a garden with a barbecue area, My-Places’s kitchen includes a fridge/freezer, oven and kitchenware. Guests can also request an airport pick-up service. Manchester Fort shopping centre, which also has restaurants, is 0.5 miles away. Woodlands Road Tram stop provides regular 5-minute links to the city centre’s Victoria Rail Station.

name: Cheval Abbey Strand Apartments, at Holyrood
description: Located on the grounds of Holyrood Palace, Abbey Strand Apartments, at Holyrood offers self-catering accommodation. Each apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen featuring coffee machine, dishwasher and oven, a dining area, a living room with a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries and shower. Concierge front desk, express check-in and express check-out are available on-site. The apartment provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Abbey Strand is located on the Royal Mile and with in a 20-minute walk from Edinburgh Castle. Edinburgh Airport is 14 km from the property.

name: Park View House
description: No description found

name: Leith City Centre Guesthouse Apartment
address: 7 Academy Street 3 Floor Number 2 Leith, Edinburgh, EH6 7EF
description: Situated in Edinburgh, 1.8 km from Royal Yacht Britannia, Leith City Centre Guesthouse Apartment features views of the quiet street. The property is set 2 km from Edinburgh Playhouse, 2.5 km from Edinburgh Waverley station and 2.9 km from Royal Mile. The accommodation features entertainment staff and free WiFithroughout the property. All rooms at the guest house are fitted with a seating area. Leith City Centre Guesthouse Apartment offers some rooms with mountain views, and the rooms have a kettle. The units will provide guests with a dishwasher. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Edinburgh, like skiing, cycling and hiking. Camera Obscura and World of Illusions is 3.6 km from Leith City Centre Guesthouse Apartment, while National Museum of Scotland is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Edinburgh Airport, 13 km from the guest house.

name: Destiny Student Murano - Campus Accommodation
description: Destiny Student - Murano (Campus Accommodation) is located within 15 minutes' walk of the city centre. This purpose-built student campus accommodation offers guests a central base in Edinburgh. There are numerous bars and restaurants in the New Town and shopping at the St. James Centres, less than a mile from the property. The property offers double en-suite rooms with shared kitchen and living areas. Private apartments are available for larger groups or families. Studios with en-suite facilities, and private kitchen and living areas are also available. All rooms are en-suite with 120cm-wide, small double beds, fresh linen, access to kitchen facilities and living areas with a TV. Guests can make use of free WiFi access throughout the building, games room and a pay-as-you-go laundry facility. Simple key fob entry throughout the building. Staff are on hand 24 hours a day to provide information on the building and the local area. Windows are restricted from opening fully due to building’s health and safety policy.

name: Mar Hall Golf and Spa Resort
description: Set in a 240-acre estate, just 10 minutes’ from Glasgow Airport, Mar Hall Golf & Spa Resort features a golf course, luxury spa and sumptuous rooms. There is an award-winning restaurant and free Wi-Fi. In a historical mansion, the rooms at Mar Hall Golf & Spa Resort have elegant decor and stylish bathrooms. All rooms feature fluffy bathrobes, toiletries, mini bars and work desks. Many have scenic garden views. The Cristal gourmet restaurant offers fine dining in intimate surroundings. The Grand Hall serves beverages, snacks, light lunches and afternoon teas. Cooked breakfasts are also available daily. The Mar Hall Spa offers Decleor luxury beauty treatments, and features a sauna and swimming pool. There is also a modern fitness centre and an 18-hole championship golf course. Just 15 minutes’ drive from Glasgow centre, Mar Hall Golf & Spa Resort is surrounded by the beautiful Kilpatrick Hills. The shores of Loch Lomond can be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Holiday Home
description: Located 7.5 km from Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome, 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Holiday Home provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Every unit features an equipped kitchen with an oven, a living room with a sofa and flat-screen TV and private bathroom. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. The holiday park offers a picnic area. Celtic Park is 7.6 km from 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Holiday Home, while Glasgow Cathedral is 7.7 km away. The nearest airport is Glasgow Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: West Highland Way Rooms Ed30002f
description: Located in Milngavie, 6.8 km from Mugdock Country Park and 9.2 km from Glasgow Botanic Gardens, West Highland Way Rooms ED30002F provides city views and free WiFi. Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. Riverside Museum of Transport and Technology is 11 km from the aparthotel, while The Glasgow Royal Concert Hall is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Glasgow Airport, 17 km from West Highland Way Rooms ED30002F.

name: Loch Lomond Waterfront Luxury Lodges
description: No description found

name: Balmaha Lodges and Apartments
description: Located in Balmaha in the Central Scotland region and Lake of Menteith reachable within 28 km, Balmaha Lodges and Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a terrace and free private parking. Some accommodation includes a balcony with lake views, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with shower. The lodge offers a hot tub. If you would like to discover the area, hiking, canoeing and cycling are possible in the surroundings. Mugdock Country Park is 31 km from Balmaha Lodges and Apartments, while Glasgow Botanic Gardens is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Glasgow Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: 3 Bedroom Self Catering Static Caravan
description: Set in Stepps in the Lanarkshire region, 3 Bedroom Self Catering Static Caravan offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Every unit features an equipped kitchen with an oven, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. The holiday park offers a picnic area. Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome is 7.5 km from 3 Bedroom Self Catering Static Caravan, while Celtic Park is 7.6 km away. The nearest airport is Glasgow Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Chalet
description: Situated 7.5 km from Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome, 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Chalet features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Every unit has an equipped kitchen with an oven, a living room with a sofa and flat-screen TV and private bathroom. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. The holiday park offers a picnic area. Celtic Park is 7.6 km from 3 Bedroom Self-Catering Chalet, while Glasgow Cathedral is 7.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Glasgow Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Cults Hotel
description: The Cults Hotel is just a 10-minute drive from Aberdeen’s centre and offers modern, individually styled rooms. The friendly Lounge Bar serves a varied menu and real ales, and there is free Wi-Fi. With contemporary décor, all well-equipped rooms feature a TV, free tea and coffee, a telephone and trouser press. Each luxury tiled bathroom includes a hairdryer and fluffy bathrobes. A popular public bar has a pool table, a large flat-screen TV and open fireplace. The Lounge Bar offers freshly prepared food with a terrace seating area outside. Until May 31st 2021 the offered breakfast will consist of a Bagged Continental Breakfast delivered to the room. The Cults has 2 golf courses within 10 minutes’ drive. The local area is famous for its fishing, with the River Dee a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Clay pigeon shooting can also be arranged on request.

name: Deeside Holiday Park
description: Deeside Holiday Park is a tranquil retreat set in the Southern valley of the River Dee ideal for getting away from it all. Whether you choose to spend your time exploring Royal Deeside and the Cairngorms National Park or soaking up the atmosphere in the lively city of Aberdeen, our park offers the perfect holiday destination. Deeside has long been a favorite destination for the Royal family and for many other visitors to the North-East of Scotland. Steeped in history and tradition, the area is a must for heritage lovers with its castles and folklore, whisky distilleries and museums and of course its atmospheric stone circles – history comes to life at every turn. Whether you choose to visit Deeside Holiday Park to relax and explore the great outdoors or to have some fun on a lively activity break, there are a host of opportunities on your doorstep. The park also offers self-catering accommodation including luxury hot tub lodges and modern holiday homes, to en-suite glamping and camping pods. Investment in the park facilities include modern, heated toilet and showering amenities, indoor playroom and TV room, play park, duck pond, and outdoor BBQ area. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out what’s on at the P&J Live (16 km) or you can explore the many local Castles, or venture into The Granite City, Aberdeen, (13km). This holiday park is 12 km from Aberdeen Airport.

name: Broomlea Guest House
description: Set in Dyce, within 10 km of Beach Ballroom and 6.5 km of Hilton Community Centre, Broomlea Guest House offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is situated 9.4 km from Aberdeen Art Gallery & Museum, 10 km from Aberdeen Harbour and 23 km from Newburgh on Ythan Golf Club. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house, every room has a wardrobe, a TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. Broomlea Guest House features certain units with garden views, and rooms come with a kettle. The units will provide guests with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. P&J Live at TECA is 4.4 km from Broomlea Guest House, while St Machar's Cathedral is 8.1 km away. The nearest airport is Aberdeen Airport, 1 km from the guest house.

name: Beeches Guest House
description: No description found

name: Ivy Cottage Serviced Accommodation
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and a garden. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and an ironing board.Expedia

name: The Green House
description: Featuring garden views, The Green House offers accommodation with a terrace and a coffee machine, around 1.2 km from Sefton Park. The property was built in 19th century, and has accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. Boasting a Blu-ray player, the bed and breakfast has a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 4 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are offered in the bed and breakfast. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. The Green House offers a picnic area. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and the accommodation can arrange a bicycle rental service. Williamson's Tunnels is 1.9 km from The Green House, while Philharmonic Hall is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Liverpool John Lennon Airport, 11 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Chateau julie
description: Situated in Liverpool in the Merseyside region, Chateau julie features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. The bed and breakfast has a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. Casbah Coffee Club is 3.6 km from Chateau julie, while Anfield Stadium is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Liverpool John Lennon Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Titanic Boat
description: Stay in the Heart of Liverpool in the unique Titanic Liverpool boat. Located in Liverpool Marina with an on-site bar and grill, this huge apartment boat has been designed to resemble and honour the Titanic with its liverpool and White Star Line connections. 3 bedrooms including a luxurious '1st class' master bedroom with ensuite, second '2nd class' bedroom with double bed and single bunk with ensuite and third '3rd class' bedroom with bunk beds and beside the main shower room and toilet. Guests can enjoy the huge living space ideal for entertaining with fully equiped kitchen and dining area. Guests at Titanic Boat can enjoy a 52-inch TV with Sky channels. The lounge area has traditional décor and leather chesterfield sofas, and there is also a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a fridge, a microwave, a stove, and a washing machine and dryer. Liverpool One shopping center is a 12-minute walk from the property and Matthew Street is a 15-minute walk away. This is our guests' favorite part of Liverpool, according to independent reviews.VRBO

name: The Baltic Lodge No2 3 Bedroom At Cains Brewery
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Liverpool, The BALTIC LODGE NO2 3 BEDROOM AT CAINS BREWERY is within a short distance of Philharmonic Hall and Liverpool Central Station. This chalet provides free private parking, full-day security and free WiFi. The 3-bedroom chalet is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with kitchenware, and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are provided in the chalet. Popular points of interest near the chalet include Liverpool Metropolitan Cathedral, Albert Dock and Lime Street Train Station. The nearest airport is Liverpool John Lennon Airport, 12 km from The BALTIC LODGE NO2 3 BEDROOM AT CAINS BREWERY.

name: The Wooden Lodge No 1 At The Baltic Cains Brewery
description: Situated in Liverpool and only less than 1 km from ACC Liverpool, The WOODEN LODGE NO 1 AT THE BALTIC CAINS BREWERY features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. The chalet is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as fishing and hiking. The chalet is located on the ground floor and features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are available in the chalet. Popular points of interest near the chalet include Albert Dock, M&S Bank Arena Liverpool and Liverpool Central Station. The nearest airport is Liverpool John Lennon Airport, 12 km from The WOODEN LODGE NO 1 AT THE BALTIC CAINS BREWERY.

name: The Joker Boat
description: A luxurious bespoke 2 bedroomed boat house apartment designed around the theme of The Joker from Batman, this barge is situated in Central Liverpool's Yacht Club boating marina, with its own bar and restaurant. The Joker Boat is contemporary in style, with sleek furnishings and elegant décor. City Centre Quirky Boat Apartment within walking distance to all attractions 1 The fully-equipped Italian granite kitchen boasts a gas oven and cooker, a microwave, a fridge, a washing machine and a dryer. There is seating space and a TV with Sky channels. The city’s main attractions, including Mathew Street and Liverpool One shopping centre, are less than 10 minutes away on foot.VRBO

name: Solent Breezes, Caravan 108
description: Solent Breezes, Caravan 108 is situated in Southampton, 16 km from Ageas Bowl, 20 km from Southampton Guildhall, and 20 km from The Mayflower Theatre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. This holiday home has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with oven, a TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. If you would like to discover the area, golfing, cycling and fishing are possible in the surroundings. Port Solent is 23 km from the holiday home, while Portsmouth Harbour is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Southampton Airport, 19 km from Solent Breezes, Caravan 108.

name: Hunters Lodge Guest House
description: No description found

name: Otters Green
description: Otters Green features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Botley, 4.8 km from Ageas Bowl. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes and shower. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Otters Green offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Southampton Guildhall is 12 km from Otters Green, while The Mayflower Theatre is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Southampton Airport, 14 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Twin Oaks Guest House
