address: Twin Oaks Guest House Southampton Road, Southampton, SO40 2NQ
description: Featuring a garden, shared lounge and views of garden, Twin Oaks Guest House is set in Cadnam, 18 km from The Mayflower Theatre. The property is around 18 km from Southampton Guildhall, 27 km from Ageas Bowl and 27 km from Salisbury Cathedral. There is a picnic area and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. At the guest house, every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes Full English/Irish, vegetarian and vegan options. Salisbury Train Station is 27 km from Twin Oaks Guest House, while Old Sarum is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Southampton, 19 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oxford Guest House
description: A 15-minute drive from the centre of the city, Oxford Guest House provides stylish accommodation in Headington. With a bus route into Oxford stopping just a few metres away, this guest house provides modern en suite rooms with parking available and fast WiFi. Each room has a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee facilities, and there are rooms for families and with disabled access. All rooms have en suite shower facilities with hairdryer and complementary toiletries. A choice of full English or Continental breakfast is available, and Oxford Guest House is within 10 minutes’ walk of Headington’s shops, cafés and restaurants. This property is less than 4 miles from the many attractions of Oxford city centre, including the New Theatre, Odeon Cinema and a huge range of stores. Oxford Castle, the Ashmolean Museum and the Bodleian Library are all close to the centre, and the train station runs direct services to London, less than 1 hour away. There are frequent coaches to all London airports from central Headington.

name: Ethos Hotel
description: Walking distance to the city centre, yet located in a quiet residential neighbourhood, Ethos Hotel provides guests with convenient accessibility to Oxford. This boutique hotel features a fully licensed bar and restaurant that serves daily breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea, and dinner as well as complimentary snacks for hotel guests. Continental breakfast is included, and may be upgraded to full English for a £5 supplement. The hotel offers Suites with super king-size beds and a separate living space with sofabeds. Free WiFi, mini kitchens, air-conditioning, under floor heating, heated towel rails, large screen TVs, and Cole & Lewis toiletries are standard in all rooms. Caffè Ethos also provides complimentary snacks to hotel guests throughout the day. Every evening from 18:00 until 20.00 complimentary bruschetta is served. Private parking is available for an additional fee at the property. This Victorian hotel is less than a 15-minute walk from Oxford city centre, and 1-mile from Oxford Rail Station. Christ Church, one of the larger colleges of the University of Oxford, is less than a 10-minute walk away. Hinksey Heights Golf Club is less than a 10-minute drive from the Ethos Hotel.

name: South Avenue B&B
description: Located 7.6 km from University of Oxford, South Avenue B&B provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a kettle. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests can also relax in the garden. Blenheim Palace is 10 km from South Avenue B&B, while Notley Abbey is 29 km away. The nearest airport is London Heathrow Airport, 76 km from the accommodation.

name: Cherwell Gates
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as an oven and a stovetop. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: The Clifden Arms B&B
description: The Clifden Arms B&B features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Worminghall, 12 km from Notley Abbey. Fitted with a patio, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A fridge is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish options. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. A outdoor play equipment is also available at The Clifden Arms B&B, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. University of Oxford is 16 km from the accommodation, while Blenheim Palace is 26 km away. The nearest airport is London Luton Airport, 66 km from The Clifden Arms B&B.

name: Lakeside Town Farm
description: Far from the maddening crowds, with a peaceful location on a 300-acre working farm, surrounded by gorgeous gardens and overlooking a lake, this self-catering cabin has free parking on site. The property also has an EV charger in case you have an electric car. The cabin boasts a fitted kitchen with new appliances, including a 2-ring hob, microwave, fridge, toaster, and kettle. Crockery, kitchen utensils, and ironing facilities are provided. the cabin has an airfryer. With its gorgeous gardens and lakes, the property has been featured on the TV show Gardeners' World. Guests can sit on the veranda with a glass of wine and enjoy the tranquility of the surroundings, and watch the sheep and cattle grazing. Red kites often soar above, and green woodpeckers can be spotted on the lawn. Guests can enjoy the Lockdown Larder farm shop, just across the field. It stocks fresh fruit and vegetables, homegrown beef and lamb, milk, butter, eggs, cheese, and local preserves. When travelling with dogs, please note that only one small dog is allowed (maximum weight:10kg) an extra charge of 50 Pounds per stay applies. Please contact Theresa regarding the pet.

name: Rana Court Apts 1 & 2 Bed Apts close to Hospitals Business & Science Parks
description: Situated 5.6 km from University of Oxford, Rana Court Apts 1 & 2 Bed Apts close to Hospitals Business & Science Parks features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The apartment offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Blenheim Palace is 19 km from Rana Court Apts 1 & 2 Bed Apts close to Hospitals Business & Science Parks, while Notley Abbey is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is London Heathrow Airport, 71 km from the accommodation.

name: The Mirador Boutique Town House
description: The Mirador is a truly unique guest house with cosmopolitan décor, each room portraying themes such as Roman, Egyptian or Oriental. Central Swansea can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Each individual room has a hi-tech TV/DVD player, free Wi-Fi access and en suite bathroom with power shower. Most are furnished with desks. The Gower Peninsula and surrounding beaches are located within driving distance. Local activities range from pony trekking and rambling to golf, and all are available within a 5-mile radius.

name: Willow Mews
description: Located in the village of Llanrhidian,13 km from Swansea, Willow Mews features countryside views. Guests benefit from free WiFi and private parking available on site. The property is self-contained and features a wooden spiral staircase, oak floors, exposed stone walls and a vaulted ceiling. The ground floor has a kitchen and living area, and the upper floor features a super king-size bed and en suite shower room. Guests can relax in the outdoor dining area. Weobley Castle is 2 km from Willow Mews, while The Mumbles is 20 km from the property. A number of activities are offered in the area, such as walking, golfing and horse riding. The nearest airport is Cardiff Airport, 62 km from Willow Mews.

name: Swansea Log Cabin
description: Delightful 4* rated Log Cabin set on a hill in the Swansea Valley. Self catering accommodation. Sleeps 2 people. 1 bedroom with a king size bed, kitchen with full size oven and hob, shower room with wc. Living area has a tv and Netflix free of charge and views of the valley and village of Pontardawe. Ideal for visiting Swansea, liberty Stadium, Swansea University, Mumbles and Gower beaches. We are also only 20 minutes away from the National Showcaves of Wales at Dan yr Ogof and the Brecon Beacons National Park. Walkers and cyclists are welcome. Sorry no pets allowed. Strictly No Smoking allowed in the cabin however you may smoke outside.VRBO

name: The Trotting Mare Caravan Park - Adults Only
description: Enjoying a rural setting near the historic village of Overton on Dee, The Trotting Mare Caravan Park - Adults Only is located less than 5 km from Ellesmere. All units include a seating and dining area. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven. A microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a kettle. Towels and bed linen are available. The Trotting Mare Caravan Park - Adults Only also includes a barbecue. Guests can enjoy the on-site pub. Bike hire and car hire are available at the property on request and the area is popular for golfing and cycling. You can engage in various activities, such as fishing and hiking. The nearest airport is Liverpool John Lennon Airport, 44 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Belfast
address: The Gasworks, 3 Cromac Place, Belfast, BT7 2JB
description: In Belfast’s vibrant Gasworks district, the 4-star Radisson Blu Hotel Belfast features a stylish restaurant and cocktail bar. The spacious rooms offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. The elegant Nordic-style rooms are decorated in cool tones, and each features a TV with on-demand movies. All rooms have a work desk and a private modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Overlooking the Gasworks water feature, The Gasworks Restaurant serves an authentic Belfast menu and deli breakfast menu. Guests can enjoy a selection of snacks, fine wines and draught beers at The Gasworks Bar. Just a 10-minute walk from Belfast city centre, Radisson Blu Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Belfast Castle. Private on-site parking is available, and the SSE Arena is just over a mile away. Parking is free of charge for stays between Friday and Sunday.

name: Crowne Plaza Belfast
description: A refined modern hotel near central Belfast, with stylish dining, complimentary WiFi and an indoor poolCrowne Plaza® Belfast hotel places you in a parkland setting near the River Lagan. A 15-minute drive takes you to the city centre, where Belfast Central station offers local and regional train services. The hotel has free parking and the M1 motorway is a 10-minute drive away. Belfast International Airport and George Best Belfast City Airport (BHD) are both less than half an hour’s drive from the hotel.In the city centre, a 15-minute drive from the hotel, you can browse upmarket brand stores in the glass-domed Victoria Square complex. Close by, the Grand Opera House hosts musicals and theatre productions. Just outside the centre, visit Titanic Belfast to discover the ocean liner’s story, or catch live concerts and sports at the nearby SSE Arena Belfast.You can host up to 900 people in our 16 modern event spaces, from sleek boardrooms to an expansive ballroom. There’s complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director is on hand to cater for all your needs.Unwind with a workout in the gym, a swim in the indoor pool or a relaxing visit to the sauna. You can dine on seasonal local cuisine in the hotel's restaurant, or try the all-day menu in the casual lounge bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Malone
description: The Malone is a recently renovated boutique Victorian townhouse hotel. It has a new on-site restaurant and pub as well as complimentary car parking. This hotel is located within South Belfast’s historical Queen’s University Quarter. The Malone provides 71 stylish, luxury rooms and 3 self-catering apartments with spacious bedrooms and kitchens. Decorated in modern colours, rooms feature flat-screen TVs, work desks and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can dine at the Gallery restaurant which offers simple, elegant, local Irish food and next-level service. The Greyhound is a modern, Irish pub serving up the best pint of Guinness and an extensive offering of pub food done right. Traditional Irish hospitality with a modern twist. The Ulster Museum and Belfast’s Botanic Gardens are both a 10-minute walk from the property, and the centre of the city is 1.5 miles away. The City Sightseeing bus stops just outside the hotel.

name: Number 91
description: This mid-terrace three-storey cottage rests in Belfast, Northern Ireland, and can sleep five people in three bedrooms. Number 91 is a marvellous mid-terrace three-storey cottage resting in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Hosting three bedrooms, including a king-size, a second-floor king-size and a second-floor single, along with a bathroom with bath, walk-in shower, basin and WC, this property can sleep up to five guests. There is also a kitchen and a living/dining room. Outside there is off-road parking and an enclosed patio garden with furniture. Treat your loved ones to an unforgettable break to Northern Ireland with a stay at Number 91. Amenities: Oil central heating. Electric oven and hob, fridge/freezer, washer/dryer. TV, WiFi. Fuel and power inc. in rent. Bed linen and towels inc. in rent. Off-road parking. Enclosed garden with patio and furniture. One well-behaved pet welcome. Sorry, no smoking. Shop 0.3 miles, pub 0.5 miles Region: Northern Ireland is a superb holiday destination with a fantastic coastline and wonderful countryside to discover. Visit the Giant’s Causeway, Carrick-a-Rede rope bridge, the Bushmills Distillery and Belfast, the provinces capital city. Town: The thriving city of Belfast, otherwise known as the capital of Northern Ireland, rests on the eastern coast of the country, and is the largest city in the region. Belfast homes a fantastic choice of shops and eateries, including traditional Irish pubs as well as popular high street names, and is host to a plethora of exciting sights and attractions, including the Titanic Belfast, the stunning architecture of Belfast Castle and over 150 different species homed at Belfast Zoo.VRBO

name: Belmore Court & Motel
address: 1 Wickham Drive Tempo Road, Enniskillen, BT74 6HX
description: Set in its own grounds on the edge of the island town of Enniskillen, the Belmore Court & Motel offers free parking and free WiFi, with a choice of modern hotel-style rooms and self-contained rooms. The Belmore Court & Motel offers a range of accommodation, including 30 modern Superior and Executive en suite rooms. Stylish luxurious and spacious, all of these rooms are finished to the highest standards. All rooms have en suite bathrooms, 50-65in TVs, telephones, and tea/coffee making facilities. A Hot Buffet Breakfast is served each morning complete with bacon, sausage, egg, pastries, bread, cereals, fruit, juice, tea and coffee. Located beside the main reception building, the Motel is an original building dating back to the 1950s. Quaint and stylish, the motel consists of 8 townhouses that have been tastefully converted into high-quality self-contained Standard one- and two-bedroom units. Guests can also make use of all of the facilities of Belmore Court. Most of the rooms have mini-kitchens and the rest have tea/coffee making facilities.

name: Bannview Bed & Breakfast
description: Conveniently located, Bannview is a short walk from the railway station and 5 minutes walk from Portadown town centre, providing an ideal base from which to explore County Armagh. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Overlooking the River Bann, which is famous for coarse fishing, Bannview Bed & Breakfast is within reach of many local attractions. There are at least 4 golf courses within the surrounding area and water sports facilities at Craigavon Lakes. A local shopping centre is within walking distance. Guests may wish to make use of the games room, with its full-size snooker table. Rooms are comfortably furnished, with a TV and en suite facilities.

name: Cherryhill Lodge
description: Situated in Newcastle, Cherryhill Lodge offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a shared lounge. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, vegetarian or vegan options. Newcastle Beach is 1.6 km from the bed and breakfast, while Down Cathedral is 23 km from the property. The nearest airport is George Best Belfast City Airport, 61 km from Cherryhill Lodge.

name: Walsh's Hotel
description: Walsh's Hotel and Apartments has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Maghera. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At the hotel rooms include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at Walsh's Hotel and Apartments will be able to enjoy activities in and around Maghera, like hiking. Glenariff Forest is 49 km from the accommodation, while The Diamond is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Belfast International Airport, 45 km from Walsh's Hotel and Apartments.

name: Blackwell House
description: No description found

name: Inn On The Coast
description: Just metres from the rugged cliffs of Portrush, Inn on the Coast has magnificent views towards Ramore Head. The spacious rooms each have a private en-suite bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities, Freeview TVs, as well as hairdryers and a work desk. The hotel also benefits from a large off-road car park free to use for our guests and free Wi-Fi in bedrooms and all public areas. The Inn on the Coast Pub Bistro serves traditional Irish food, and the well-stocked bar offers Irish whiskies, Guinness and a range of beverages. The lively bar also includes a cosy wood-burning stove. This pet-friendly hotel is close to many attractions including Giant's Causeway, a Unesco World Heritage site, The Old Bushmills Distillery, Carrick-a-Rede Rope Bridge and Dunluce Castle are also close by. Inn on the Coast has 5 scenic golf courses within 3 miles including Royal Portrush Golf Club. Ballyreagh Municipal Golf Course is directly opposite, and the sandy Portrush beaches are just over a mile away. There are numerous coastal walks and cycle routes within the local area.

name: Bayview Hotel
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, this hotel is situated in the heart of the picturesque harbour-village of Portballintrae, 1.6 km from Bushmills. The Bayview Hotel is close to the Giant's Causeway and Old Bushmills Distillery. Ideal for escaping the stresses of everyday life, the hotel's surroundings offer many opportunities for natural and cultural excursions and activities. The hotel has good conference facilities, and Porthole Restaurant and Bar offers a pleasant space in which to enjoy a meal and drinks. An ideal destination for conferencing, golfing, business or leisure, the hotel and staff aim to cater to your requirements. The hotel has a lift and interlinking and disabled rooms are available.

name: Belfast House
description: Featuring a bar and free WiFi throughout the property, Belfast House is situated in Cookstown. All have a private bathroom. The rooms in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes vegetarian and continental options. Armagh is 34 km from Belfast House, while Antrim is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Belfast International Airport, 34 km from the property.

name: Antrim House
description: Located in the centre of Portrush, this adult only bed and breakfast has some traditionally decorated rooms with views of the sea. Offering free Wi-Fi and free, secure, private parking, the property is just 3 minutes’ walk from the beach. UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Giant's Causeway, is a 20-minute drive away. The popular Old Bushmills Distillery is 10 minutes away by car. Bright, spacious rooms at the Victorian Antrim House keep many original features. With tall ceilings, each room has a TV, tea and coffee and a private bathroom. In Portrush, the bus and train stations are just 2 minutes’ walk from the House. The pretty harbour, with bars and restaurants, is a 5-minute walk away. Guests can enjoy a traditional basket breakfast in the Antrim House. With a marble fireplace, it also has antique furniture.

name: Charlemont House
description: No description found

name: Portcaman House
description: Only a 2-minute walk from Bushmills centre, Portcaman House offers free parking and it is conveniently located to reach the spectacular Giant’s Causeway, 4 and half miles away. The Old Bushmills distillery, established in 1743, is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Each room features an en suite bathroom with shower, a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities, and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy packed lunches, which can be provided upon request. Bushmills town centre and Portballintrae, 1 and half mile from the property, offer a variety of shops, restaurants, and cafés. Surrounded by the picturesque countryside and the coast, Portcaman House offers easy access to beautiful walking trails. Portballintrae’s beach is 4 minutes’ drive and the now-ruined medieval Dunluce Castle is 2 and half miles from the property.

name: Galgorm
description: The 4-star Galgorm features a luxury spa and award-winning restaurant. It is set within 163 acres of lush parkland with the River Maine flowing through. The resort is just 3 miles from Ballymena, in beautiful Country Antrim. The elegant bedrooms each have a luxury modern bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Rooms also feature a cosy seating area and a work desk, and some have scenic views across the grounds. The Resort also boasts a selection of restaurants & bars and extensive conference and banqueting facilities. Guests can enjoy Thermal Village and Spa - the only one in Ireland. It features riverside hot tubs, indoor and outdoor heated pools, steam rooms and saunas. The impressive Galgorm is in heart of Northern Ireland's breathtaking countryside. There is free on-site parking, and Galgorm Castle Golf Club is a 3-minute drive away. Belfast international airport is 17 miles away.

name: Walter's Place
description: Walter's Place has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Carrickfergus, 17 km from SSE Arena, 17 km from The Waterfront Hall and 18 km from Titanic Belfast. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and walk-in shower. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city views. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. The Belfast Empire Music Hall is 19 km from Walter's Place, while Belfast Castle is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is George Best Belfast City Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Willow House Bed & Breakfast and Orchard Studios Self Catering
description: No description found

name: Glendaloch B&B
description: Glendaloch B&B is situated in a rural area on the outskirts of Antrim Town, a 5 minute drive from Belfast International Airport and Antrim Town Centre. The bed and breakfast is a 30-minute drive from Belfast, and offers free WiFi and on site parking. All rooms have private en suite shower facilities, a flat-screen TV, free toiletries, hairdryer, a kettle, tea/coffee making facilities, fresh milk, complimentary biscuits and bottle water. Guests can enjoy a cooked Irish breakfast that includes the property's own free range eggs. Packed lunches can be provided, and there is a shared sitting area. There is free shuttle service between Belfast Airport at the property. Ballymena is 22 km from Glendaloch B&B, while Lisburn is 22 km from the property. Guests are 3.7 miles from Clotsworthy House and Antrim Castle Gardens.

name: Courtyard Mews
description: Within a charming stone courtyard, these luxury apartments have a kitchen and dining area, modern living room and a patio. Guests have free Wi-Fi and free parking, just 0.8 miles from Armagh centre. Bedrooms are bright and airy, whilst the luxury bathroom is finished with stone tiles. The living room has views of the garden, and features a large flat-screen TV, DVD player and comfortable sofa. Guests can prepare meals in Cherry Lodge’s fully fitted kitchen. Complete with a cooker, fridge freezer, microwave and utensils there is also a dishwasher and washer/dryer. For groceries and supplies, the local supermarket is just 50 metres away from the Lodge. Armagh’s city centre can be reached in just over 10 minutes’ walk, and offers restaurants, bars and theatres.

name: Brae-Mar B&B
description: On Northern Ireland’s North Coast, the Brae-Mar B&B is just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Portrush and the beach. It has large individually designed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Brae-Mar all feature TVs and private bathrooms with hairdryers. Tea/coffee making facilities are provided and some accommodation has fully-equipped kitchens and lounges. A traditional breakfast is served each morning in the charming dining room. The North Antrim Coast has many spectacular walks, and fishing and water sports are available at Portrush Bay. Free parking is available at the Brae Mar B&B. Brae-Mar has free parking onsite and is conveniently located opposite a Lidl supermarket with petrol station, post office, ATM, Off License and Fast Food within 100m

name: Number 5 Atlantic View
description: Offering a garden and sea view, Number 5 is located in Portstewart, 2.6 km from Portstewart Strand and 17 km from Giants Causeway. This bed and breakfast provides free private parking, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Portstewart Golf Club is 2.8 km from Number 5, while Royal Portrush Golf Course is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Waterfall Caves
description: Situated in Limavady, Waterfall Caves features accommodation with free WiFi, lake views, and access to a hot tub. Some units have a terrace and/or a patio with sea or mountain views. The chalet offers an outdoor fireplace. Guests at Waterfall Caves can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Guildhall is 37 km from the accommodation, while Giants Causeway is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 24 km from Waterfall Caves.

name: Donard Shadow Lodge
description: Featuring garden views, Donard Shadow Lodge offers accommodation with free private parking, around 1.3 km from Tollymore Forest Park. The chalet is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and cycling. The chalet has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a patio, a kettle, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge and 1 bathroom with a bath. Slieve Donard is 200 metres from the chalet, while Dundrum Castle is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is George Best Belfast City Airport, 60 km from Donard Shadow Lodge.

name: Greencastle B&B
description: Set in Kilkeel in the Down County region, Greencastle B&B offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with an oven. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Greencastle B&B offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Proleek Dolmen is 48 km from Greencastle B&B, while Louth County Museum is 49 km away. The nearest airport is George Best Belfast City Airport, 88 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Portglenone Garden Rooms
description: Located in Portglenone in the Antrim County region and Giants Causeway reachable within 44 km, Portglenone Garden Rooms provides accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a garden and free private parking. The chalet provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. Portglenone Garden Rooms offers a picnic area. Glenariff Forest is 43 km from the accommodation, while Allen Park Golf Centre is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Belfast International Airport, 38 km from Portglenone Garden Rooms.

name: Bluebell Cottage
description: Set in Armagh and only 49 km from Proleek Dolmen, Bluebell Cottage offers accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. This chalet is 5 km from Saint Patrick's Catholic Cathedral and 25 km from The Garage Theatre. The chalet features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Louth County Museum is 50 km from the chalet, while Saint Patrick's Church of Ireland Cathedral is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Belfast International Airport, 68 km from Bluebell Cottage.

name: The Lough Erne House at Golf Village Lough Erne Resort
address: 19 Golf Village Lough Erne Resort Enniskillen, Enniskillen, BT93 7FB
description: Featuring lake views, The Lough Erne House at Golf Village Lough Erne Resort provides accommodation with a terrace and a kettle, around 23 km from Killinagh Church. There is an on-site restaurant, plus free private parking and free WiFi are available. This holiday home is equipped with 5 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 3 bathrooms equipped with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home. At the holiday home guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities. Guests can also relax in the garden. Sean McDiarmada Homestead is 35 km from The Lough Erne House at Golf Village Lough Erne Resort, while Drumlane Abbey is 46 km away. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 102 km from the accommodation.

name: The Mourne Lodge
description: The Mourne Lodge is a community enterprise in the beautiful Mourne Mountains. It is the perfect escape to relax and unwind. We provide the authentic Irish experience with a warm welcome from our attentive staff. The centre is the perfect location for the outdoor enthusiast. You can take a short stroll to the breath-taking Silent Valley and Lough Shannagh. Challenge yourself and hike the many mountains nearby and be rewarded with the best scenery Northern Ireland can offer. During the summer months, we are lucky to have the Mourne Rambler bus service. Check Translink for local bus service. Taxi from Kilkeel is approx. £5 - Joe's Taxi 02841763793. If you are coming from Dublin please check out the Scenic Carlingford Ferry (Huge Time Saver!!). We offer a range of rooms to suit every need including single, double, twin, quad and family rooms, all en-suite. Some of our rooms have large king size beds. For the budget traveller, we also have beds in shared dorms. Meals are served at The Mourne Lodge. Continental breakfasts are always available each morning. Cooked breakfasts should be ordered in advance as we try to serve only the best fresh local ingredients. Evening dinners and packed lunches are also available on request. There are excellent self-catering facilities for guests to wish to prepare their own meals. The Mourne Lodge aims to provide a tranquil escape therefore we encourage quiet hours after 10pm so that guests can relax and unwind. When you stay with us, you experience a warm and welcoming feeling from start to finish. The Mourne Lodge is a unique guest experience in an area of outstanding natural beauty which is not to be missed.Expedia

name: The Old Post Office Lodge
address: 70 Creagh Road, Creagh House, Tempo, Enniskillen, BT94 3FZ
description: No description found

name: Meadow View B&B
description: Meadow View B&B has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Ballymena, 49 km from Giants Causeway. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with bathrobes and walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area. Glenariff Forest is 28 km from the bed and breakfast. The nearest airport is Belfast International Airport, 35 km from Meadow View B&B.

name: Clare Forest Apartment
description: Situated in Ballycastle and only 15 km from Giants Causeway, Clare Forest Apartment features accommodation with garden views, free WiFi and free private parking. Located 43 km from Glenariff Forest, the property provides a garden. The bed and breakfast has a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette features a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is bath with bathrobes and a hair dryer. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. Carrick-A-Rede Rope Bridge is 6.5 km from Clare Forest Apartment, while Ballintoy Harbour is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 63 km from the accommodation.

name: Further Space at Carrickreagh Bay Luxury Glamping Pods, Lough Erne
description: Situated in Enniskillen in the Fermanagh County region, Further Space at Carrickreagh Bay Luxury Glamping Pods, Lough Erne features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. All units come with a patio with lake views, a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware, and a private bathroom with shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. The campground offers an outdoor fireplace. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and canoeing are possible in the surroundings. Killinagh Church is 21 km from Further Space at Carrickreagh Bay Luxury Glamping Pods, Lough Erne, while Sean McDiarmada Homestead is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 97 km from the accommodation.

name: Devonshire House
description: Relax, play or work here, ideal for families or groups of friends escaping the confines of lockdown. We are fully compliant with the AA and Visit England 'Covid Confidence' schemes and have implemented stringent cleaning procedures between lets. Usually operating as a 4 star B&B (Devonshire House), we have decided to offer guests the option of taking over the house on a self catering basis. Each bedroom (on on the ground floor) is en suite, with a spacious living room and separate guest dining room, if you prefer not to cook then make use of the facilities at the pub across the road (covid opening times need to be checked) or use one of our many delivery services. Only a 20 minute walk into the historic city of Bath, with complimentary wi fi and free, unrestricted on street parking. Country walks are right on the doorstep so you can embrace the outdoors. The spacious living room comfortably seats 9 on the luxurious, low, leather sofa, tv with dvd if you want to watch your favourites or have a 'movie' night in. The compact kitchen gives you all the facilities that you need, induction hob, microwave, double oven and the essential coffee maker. The light and airy, dining room is a separate space which seats all your guests where you have the option of individual tables or creating one large table. All the bedrooms are ensuite with co ordinated furnishings, crisp white sheets and fluffy duvets. We are on a main road, so easy to find, with lots of free on street parking and only a 20 minute downhill walk into Bath. We are on a major bus route into the city and you can get an all day bus ticket for £4.50 each or a group ticket for up to five of you, one way taxi is around £7.00. We are in a residential area, so you must be aware that noise is to be kept to a minimum between 10 pm and 9 am. Do remember to use your Bath Reward Card which is on your key fob, as this gives you discounts at lots of tourist attractions and added value offers at lots of restaurants and cafes.VRBO

name: Park Farm
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ drive from Windsor Castle and Legoland, the 4-star Park Farm has modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. Eton can be reached in less than 10 minutes by car. Each room features bright decor, a flat-screen Freeview TV, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can also make use of a a fridge, microwave, and ironing supplies, which are located in a cupboard in the communal area. In the mornings, Park Farm offers a wide selection of hearty breakfasts. Dishes are served alongside toast, muesli, fresh juice, and coffee. Vegetarian alternatives are also available. With free parking, Park Farm is just 20 minutes' walk from the centre of Windsor. London Heathrow Airport is just 13 miles away.

name: Lumley Castle Hotel
description: Lumley Castle Hotel, a unique and historical four-star venue surrounded by acres of parkland overlooking the River Wear and has stood tall for over 630 years. The Castle boasts 68 luxurious bedrooms, 10 historic reception rooms, exquisite and newly refurbished Knights restaurant and resident Library bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Ardtorna
description: With panoramic views of Loch Creran, Ardtorna is situated between the town of Oban and the district of Appin. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are also provided. A super king-size bed is featured in each Ardtorna room, as well as a Loch view, bathrobes and luxury toiletries. A Freeview TV and hospitality tray are also provided. Freshly baked scones are served between 16.00 and 18.00 on the day of your arrival. Locally-sourced fish and meat are served at breakfast, which features a full Scottish breakfast, smoked salmon bagels, and pancake platters. Oban can be reached in a 10-minute drive and features its own whisky distillery and historic landmarks such as McCaig’s Tower. The nearest shops, bars and restaurants are also located in Oban, and buses to the town operate from just outside the property.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Milton Keynes
address: Stadium Way West, Milton Keynes, MK1 1ST
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Milton Keynes offers 304 bedrooms, including suites and family rooms, and 17 event spaces, the largest of which accommodates up to 1000 guests. Our hotel includes restaurants and bars, including the unique Pitchside Restaurant, which has daytime views over the stadium’s pitch. We are delighted to offer our guests complimentary WiFi. We have onsite parking, managed by a third-party, please follow instructions on the signage located in the car parks on how to park. We also offer an EV charging Hub with six Ultra-fast charging points; Our friendly, professional team is trained to anticipate your needs. It is our pleasure to ensure that your time with us is the best it can be, whether you are staying in one of our stylish bedrooms, joining us for dinner in Pitchside Restaurant or attending an event in one of the many event spaces. Milton Keynes is just 32 minutes by train from London Euston and well-served by London Luton Airport, just 35 minutes away. If you are traveling by car, we’re within seven miles of Junction 13 or 14 from the M1 motorway. Milton Keynes benefits from two railway stations, Bletchley and Central Milton Keynes, both just 5 minutes away by taxi. For visitors, there’s plenty to see and do in Milton Keynes, including codebreaking at Bletchley Park, indoor skiing at Snozone, and wakeboarding at Willen Lake, all within five miles of us. Live football at Stadium K is on site. Milton Keynes also has a thriving art gallery, a world-class city orchestra, and a buzzing arts fringe scene. Milton Keynes has hosted a variety of national and international sports fixtures. Stadium MK was most recently a venue for the Rugby World Cup.Hilton

name: The Gainsborough Bath Spa
address: 4 Beau Street, Bath, Somerset, Bath, BA1 1QU
description: Perfect location in the heart of Bath, a short walk to the Roman Baths, Bath Abbey and the main shopping district. Home of the Spa Village, Bath, a 1300m2 spa, the only hotel in the United Kingdom to have access to naturally heated thermal water directly into the Spa and Spa bedrooms. Designed by award-winning Champalimaud Design from New York. Located 5 minutes from Bath Spa train station and 2 minutes from the bus station. 90 minutes from London Paddington with Heathrow Express link. Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi in all bedrooms and public areas. Complimentary minibar in all rooms, Nespresso machines, underfloor bathroom heating. Three-rosette award winning Dan Moon at The Gainsborough Restaurant.iHotelier/iStay

name: Ramside Hall Hotel, Golf And Spa
description: Ramside Hall Hotel Golf & Spa is set within a 350-acre estate, featuring 2 Championship golf courses, with a combined 36 holes amidst mature woodlands and lakes. The spacious bedrooms, many with scenic views, feature elegant décor and modern bathrooms, work desks, satellite TVs with Sky and BT Sports and luxurious Elemis toiletries. There are many upgrades available, including use of a chauffeur-driven Bentley Mulsanne. The hotel boasts 4 restaurants including the award-winning Rib Room Steakhouse & Grill and Fusion with a pan-Asian menu. Pemberton’s Carvery offers traditional British cuisine throughout the day and informal dining is also available in the Clubhouse. Complimentary spa access includes access to the indoor 25-metre swimming pool, bubble pool, steam room and sauna. Access to the hydro-pool and outdoor pool is reserved for guests on spa packages and members. During busy times guests will be limited to a 1-hour time slot and guests may be allocated access on check-in. A tempting menu of Elemis treatments is available within the Spa, subject to availability. Booking is highly recommended to avoid disappointment. Just 450 yards from Junction 62 on the A1M, the hotel is just a 5-minute drive from the historic city of Durham and 25 minutes from Newcastle-upon-Tyne. Newcastle Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Cransley
description: No description found

name: Aldwark Manor Estate
description: In stunning parkland, close to York, Aldwark Manor Estate is a Victorian manor house that mixes traditional style with modern bedrooms featuring free WiFi. Aldwark Manor is the ideal place to relax after sightseeing in York, Harrogate and the surrounding areas. The lounges have a terrace patio overlooking the gardens and golf course, ideal for a pre-dinner drink. Each room at the property features tea/coffee making facilities, a room service menu and a seating area. The bathrooms feature a walk in shower, and a hairdryer. Our brand new golf course is now open too, having undergone an exciting new refurbishment! Spa and Leisure - We are closing “Reflections” in April 2024 but have deep cleansed so guests can swim/gym and relax through the summer. Treatment products are ESPA, and the full range can be viewed on our website for pre-booking. Children swim times are 8am until 10am and 4pm until 6pm throughout the week. **Road Closure Notice** From 17th April 2023 until February 2024, Aldwark toll bridge will be closed due to essential maintenance. An alternate route to and from the estate may be required. For your sat nav please use postcode YO61 1UF and place ‘no toll roads’ in requirements, Alternatively you contact us at the hotel, and we can provide you with route directions to avoid this closure.

name: My Way Guest House
description: No description found

name: The Globe
description: The Globe is a popular choice amongst travelers in Exeter, whether exploring or just passing through. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. To be found at the hotel are meeting facilities, restaurant, newspapers, bar. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as golf course (within 3 km). The Globe is an excellent choice from which to explore Exeter or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Glencree
description: In beautiful Lakeland surroundings overlooking an idyllic brook, Glencree is situated between the villages of Bowness and Windermere. With free parking and free Wi-Fi, it serves hearty breakfasts cooked to order. Guests can swim in the property's off-site pool. Bright and warmly furnished, rooms at Glencree are individually designed and feature en suite bath or shower rooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV is featured in every room, along with tea and coffee-making facilities. Some rooms enjoy scenic woodland views. The shores of tranquil Lake Windermere are only a 10-minute walk away, while the village centres Bowness and Windermere are both 15 minutes away on foot. The area is surrounded by stunning fells to explore, and Dove Cottage, the home of William Wordsworth, is 15 minutes’ drive away. Breakfasts are all made from high quality local produce, with a selection of traditional full English breakfasts or vegetarian and continental options.

name: Black Boy Inn
description: The Black Boy is a 16th-century inn within Caernarfon's historic town walls. It serves hearty gastro Welsh food and real craft beers in front of roaring log fires and is an easy walk from the town centre and 13th-century castle. The Black Boy Inn dates back to 1522 and is one of the oldest inns in North Wales. Whilst updating the rooms to a high standard, the property has retained their unique character and atmosphere by using local, traditional building materials with handmade furniture and quality fittings. Some of its walls are 1.2 to 1.5 metres thick. The wood panelling, creaking floorboards, low ceilings, narrow staircases and thick wooden beams create a cosy atmosphere. Black Jack's is a separate part of the inn and is located in a courtyard to the rear. Eight of these 10 spacious rooms have mini kitchens and a small seating area. The Black Tower is a listed Edwardian building locate towards the rear of the inn in a separate building. It is a few minutes' walk from Caernarfon Castle.

name: Ty Dre Town House
description: Ty Dre Town House provides a stylish range of accommodation in the centre of Caernarfon, just 2 minutes’ walk from Caernarfon Castle. The property is set in an Edwardian building, and features free Wi-Fi, and also free public parking nearby. Ty Dre Town House has en-suite bathroom facilities with bath or shower and complementary toiletries. There is a flat-screen TV, hairdryer, telephone and tea and coffee facilities in the spacious rooms. There are 4 floors with 2 disabled access rooms on the ground floor. The reception is located at the Black Boy Inn. There is also a suite with its own kitchenette, including a fridge, toaster, kettle and dishwasher. Caernarfon lies around 5 miles from the spectacular Snowdonia region. On the opposite side of the Menai Strait, you can drive to the beautiful Isle of Anglesey in around 15 minutes.

name: Lion Hotel & Studio Apartments
address: Y Maes Criccieth Wales Ll52 0Aa, Criccieth, LL52 0AA
description: Lion Hotel & Studio Apartments are centrally located for exploring the Llyn Peninsula and Snowdonia National Park. The Lion Hotel & Studio Apartments are located in the heart of Criccieth. All 33 en suite rooms have all the comforts you will need for a relaxing stay and most have scenic views across Cardigan Bay and Snowdonia. The six studio apartments are housed in the separate Castle View Cottage, face due south and all have views of Criccieth Castle. Each has dining and limited cooking facilities. The separate en-suite bedrooms have King Size beds. The charming hotel offers a Full Welsh Breakfast using locally sourced ingredients, a stylish bar, restaurant and garden.Free Wi-Fi, free parking 3 EV's

name: Tudor Lodge
description: No description found

name: Aberdunant Hall
description: Situated within Snowdonia National Park, Aberdunant Hall is a 17th-century property set within 200-acres of woodland on an idyllic upmarket Holiday Home Park. With free onsite parking, it retains many original features, such as beamed ceilings, fireplaces and stained glass. Guests can relax in the garden or on the terrace. All rooms at Aberdunant Hall have a flat-screen TV, en suite bathroom and complimentary tea/coffee facilities. In the mornings, guests can enjoy continental or full Welsh breakfast in the Glaslyn Lounge. Al fresco dining can be enjoyed on the terrace, which boasts panoramic views of the mountains. Family meals and Sunday lunches are served in The Glaslyn Lounge, and intimate dining is available in Y Bistro. A carvery is served every Sunday and features a choice of 3 locally sourced meats. Hiking, rock climbing and mountain biking can be enjoyed within Snowdonia park, and the harbour town of Porthmadog and Black Rock Sands beach are just 3 miles away. Watersports such as jet-skiing, diving and windsurfing can be arranged and facilities are a 40-minute drive away.

name: Greenbank Lodge Llangollen
description: No description found

name: Penrhos Park
description: Within 150 acres of lush green countryside in the Wyre Valley, West Wales, Penrhos Park is an unique holiday park and golf complex complete with its own hotel. Designed with the golfer and adventurer in mind, Penrhos Park offers attractions for all the family, including an extensive sport and leisure facilities and picturesque grounds to explore. Here, you will find comfortable en-suite rooms, an indoor heated swimming pool, 27 holes of golf and a new flood lit driving range. Whether you are visiting as a golfer, a rambler en route across the Welsh coastal path, or a cyclist adventuring through the Welsh hills, Penrhos Park has everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Enjoy this family run complex, a warm Welsh welcome, and of course, a game of golf. Penrhos Park is just 10 miles from Aberystwyth. The hotel can be reached via the A487 road which is just 0.6 miles away.

name: Château Rhianfa
address: Plas Rhianfa, Glyngarth, Menai Bridge, LL59 5NS
description: No description found

name: Maison50
description: Located in Crickhowell, 25 km from Longtown Castle, MAISON50 features views of the mountain. The property is non-smoking and is set 23 km from Brecon Cathedral. All guest rooms at the guest house come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette and a dining area. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a terrace and some have garden views. At MAISON50 all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Crickhowell, like cycling. Clifford Castle is 35 km from MAISON50. The nearest airport is Cardiff Airport, 81 km from the guest house.

name: Glan Aber Hotel
description: Set in the picturesque village of Betws-y-Coed in the north of Snowdonia National Park, the Glan Aber serves local cask and real ales in its bar. Trout and salmon fishing as well as hill walking and other activities are possible in the immediate area. Flat-screen TVs and tea and coffee are provided in all bedrooms, with the exception of the mixed dormitory. BT Sports channels are shown in the Glan Aber Hotel’s bar and guests can enjoy a game of pool or darts in the games room. Secure bicycle storage is available. Betws-y-Coed Rail Station and Golf Club are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. We're a dog-friendly hotel and love to welcome your 4 legged friend. Most rooms accept dogs, however please check the room descriptions or contact us to confirm you are booking a dog friendly room.

name: The Oasis
description: No description found

name: Beechwood House
description: In the village of Llanarth, between Aberaeron and New Quay, Beechwood House offers stylish en suite accommodation in West Wales. Serving breakfast featuring local produce, this Ceredigion guest house has free Wi-Fi and parking and a spacious landscaped garden with patio. All guest rooms at Beechwood House have en suite facilities with a power shower and complimentary toiletries. There is a TV, wardrobe and tea and coffee facilities in each room. Full cooked breakfast is served each morning, with locally produced bacon, sausages and free-range eggs. Early breakfast is possible if required. The quiet village of Llanarth has a church, pub and village shop, and is just 3 miles from the pretty coastal town of New Quay. Further south, Cardigan is around 30 minutes’ drive from the village, with Aberystwyth a similar distance to the north.

name: Plas Gwyn B&B and Holiday Cottage
description: Situated in the heart of Snowdonia National Park, 300-year old Plas Gwyn B&B and Holiday Cottage offers free WiFi and free private parking. It is set in Dolgellau, in a secluded valley, surrounded by mountain streams. This traditional Grade II listed Georgian townhouse retains many period features, including fireplaces and an oak staircase. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV, mini bar, iPod docking station, and tea and coffee making facilities. The en suite shower rooms have a hairdryer. The Plas Gwyn also offers a one-bedroom holiday cottage. This boasts a seating area with a wood-burner and a full equipped kitchen. Plas Gwyn also offers a three bed-roomed self catering cottage with enclosed garden and off road parking. It has a large fully equipped dining kitchen, utility room and a sitting room with log burning stove. The main bedroom has an en-suite. North Wales offers castles, coastal paths, and sandy beaches. Barmouth Beach is just 20 minutes’ drive from the Plas Gwyn B&B. Dolgellau is at the foot of the Cader Idris mountain range. It is an ideal base for scenic walks around Snowdonia. Secure bike storage is available at the house.

name: Llwyngwair Manor, Newport, Pembrokeshire
address: Off A487 Main Road, Newport, SA42 0LX
description: Located in Newport Pembrokeshire, 44 km from Oakwood Theme Park, Llwyngwair Manor, Newport, PEMBROKESHIRE provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. Guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom, while selected rooms include a kitchen with a fridge. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the hotel. You can play table tennis and darts at Llwyngwair Manor, Newport, PEMBROKESHIRE, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. St David's Cathedral is 39 km from the accommodation, while Folly Farm is 44 km away. The nearest airport is Cardiff Airport, 152 km from Llwyngwair Manor, Newport, PEMBROKESHIRE.

name: Three Wells B&B
description: Three Wells B&B is situated on the edge of the Radnor Hills, in the heart of Wales. A number of picturesque walks lead from the hotel’s door to nearby Llandrindod Wells. An 18-hole golf course and the town’s rail station can be reached in around 10 minutes by car. Rooms at the Three Wells all have carpeted floors and TVs for guests to use. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the building, and there is space for 15 cars in the free off-road car park.

name: Rooms At 31
address: Stonehaven Stonehaven Scotland Ab39 2Da, Stonehaven, AB39 2DA
description: Set within 300 metres of Carron Beach and 500 metres of Cowie Beach in Stonehaven, Rooms at 31 offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Old Hall Bay Beach is 2.9 km from Rooms at 31, while Beach Ballroom is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aberdeen Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Barns Serviced Accommodation
description: No description found

name: The Garrison
description: Set in Fort William and within 1.9 km of Glen Nevis, The Garrison features a bar, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 16 km from Loch Linnhe. At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. At The Garrison every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Glenfinnan Station Museum is 28 km from the accommodation, while West Highland Museum is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Oban Airport, 60 km from The Garrison.

name: Court Residence
description: Court Residence Aparthotel offers suites in Linlithgow's historic town centre. The property is only a 15-minute drive from Edinburgh Airport. Stirling is a 25-minute drive away and Glasgow is a 45-minute drive from the accommodation. The contemporary suites include a kitchen, work space, smart TV and free WiFi access. Shops, bars and restaurants can be reached within walking distance and Linlithgow Palace is next to the property. A Continental breakfast hamper is included and on-site parking is available free of charge.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations Club Craigendarroch Suites Scotland
description: Enjoy a Scottish getaway to the Cairngorms National Park at the Hilton Grand Vacations Club at Craigendarroch Suites. Set in Royal Deeside, just an hour from Aberdeen Airport, this Victorian country hotel offers the perfect location close to Balmoral Castle and outdoor activities in the Scottish Highlands. Settle in to a warm and inviting guest room or suite at this Royal Deeside hotel. Keep in touch with complimentary WiFi or curl up to watch the 32-inch TV. Select a spacious suite for upgraded amenities including a balcony. Take some time out and enjoy the array of recreational amenities for children and adults alike. Swim laps or take an aqua aerobics class in the lagoon-style pool as the children enjoy the kid’s pool with slide. Children adore meeting new friends at the Acorn Club, held during the school holidays. Maintain your exercise regime with a workout at the fully-equipped fitness center, play squash or tennis, rent a bicycle to explore the area, or book a treatment at the spa. Indulge in delicious Scottish cuisine in the elegant restaurant.Hilton

name: Raniven Guest House
address: 1 Strathaven Terrace Breadalbane street, Oban, PA34 5PE
description: Set in a quiet street of Oban, this Victorian villa is only 10 minutes’ walk from Oban Rail Station and free Wi-Fi. Each bedroom at Raniven Guest House has an en suite bathroom, a TV with DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Guests also have access to ironing facilities on request. A variety of pubs and restaurants is available a 1-minute walk from Raniven. In Oban, ferries to Coll, Tiree, Colonsay, Uist, Barra, Mull, Iona and Lismore are frequently available. Easdale is a 30-minute drive away and free parking is available at the property.

name: Dunhallin House
description: No description found

name: Links House at Royal Dornoch
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and a garden. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Mackays Hotel Wick
description: In Wick, in the beautiful area of Caithness in the Northern Highlands, Mackays offers award-winning service and fine food in No1 Bistro, as well as free Wi-Fi and parking. Built in 1883, Hotel is regularly updated, combining attractive period features with simple, stylish touches for a relaxed atmosphere. Rooms have a wide-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a guide to the local area. No1 Bistro serves local produce and fish from the boats of nearby Scrabster. In the friendly bar, whisky and wines are a speciality. The Orkney Islands are a ferry ride away, and you can visit The Castle of Mey, which was home to the Queen Mother for many years.

name: Moness Resort
description: In 35 acres of tranquil Perthshire countryside, this luxurious resort features a swimming pool and 2 restaurants. Free WiFi is also available. The impressive Moness Resort leisure complex includes a sauna and a steam room. There is also a games hall. All of the elegant rooms at Moness Resort feature flat-screen TVs and an inclusive Full-Scottish breakfast is provided. Moness is delighted to partner with PURE Spa & Beauty, a leading provider of spa and beauty services throughout the UK. Uisge Bar and Restaurant offers a superb menu, in stylish surroundings.

name: Meikleour Arms Hotel And Restaurant
description: Set in the rural region of Perthshire, the Meikleour Arms is located at the heart of the conservation village of Meikleour, well known for its impressive trees and salmon fishing. Located only 12 miles from Perth, the Meikleour Arms was built in 1820 on one of the oldest historical estates in East Scotland. The rooms and cottages have en-suite bathrooms, free WiFi, flat-screen TVs and tea/coffee facilities. Guests can enjoy local specialties using produce from their kitchen garden and woodlands. All the meat and game come from their own butchery. The surrounding area offers outdoor activities such as angling, horse riding and hiking. The hotel also owns a salmon fishing school on the nearby river Tay and all material is provided free of charge (advanced booking recommended). The Blairgowrie Golf Club established in 1889 is only 4 miles away.

name: The Bandstand
description: With stunning, uninterrupted sea views over Nairn’s beach and the Moray Firth, this comfortable family-run hotel offers free WiFi and an award-winning bar with a range of real ales. In the heart of the town of Nairn, Braeval Hotel is a great base from which to visit the Highlands of Scotland. A charming, traditional pub, the hotel’s Bandstand Beer and Music Festival was awarded finalist in the Scottish Hospitality Award's 'Scottish Festival of the Year 2016' and CAMRA District Pub of the Year 2016. The Braeval has 9 real ale and cider hand pumps and is Cask Marque accredited. The hotel's Sea View Restaurant offers fresh seafood, steaks and traditional Scottish cuisine, and was a finalist in the Scottish Hospitality Award's 'Restaurant of the Year 2016'. The cosy guest lounge features an open fire. The en suite rooms are decorated in a comfortable style. All rooms have TVs, tea/coffee making facilities, hairdryers and radio alarm clocks. Some of the rooms have sea views. A full, traditional cooked Scottish Breakfast is included in the price.

name: The Machrie Hotel & Golf Links
address: The Machrie Hotel & Golf Links, Isle of Islay, PA42 7AN
description: Featuring a fitness centre and a garden, Machrie Hotel & Golf Links is situated just outside Port Ellen. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk minibar, safe and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. Many of our bathrooms also have a bath. Guests at Machrie Hotel & Golf Links can enjoy a continental or a Full English breakfast. The hotel restaurant and bar is available for lunch and dinner, which serves a variety of Scottish and British dishes. Afternoon tea is also served in the Stag or Courtyard Lounge. Preferred green fees are available for residents on the 18-hole championship links course. There is also a 6-hole par 3 'Wee Course', 5, bay driving range, practice areas and Hebrides putting area. The PureGray Spa & Gym offers 2 spa treatment rooms offering a wide selection of services, a sauna and a 24-hour gym. Prebooking is essential. The Machrie is located less than 6 km from Port Ellen and 11 km from Bowmore.

name: 19th Hole Hotel
description: Less than half a mile from Carnoustie Golf Course, the 19th Hole Hotel provides spacious rooms with 32-inch TVs and cosy bathrobes. Guests can enjoy full Scottish breakfasts. Light and elegant, each room boasts a sleek, en suite bathroom with a powerful rain shower and a bath. Guests can relax with their own slippers, free tea and coffee, and a minibar. Rooms also have use of a ground floor storage locker for golf bags or pushchairs. Hearty cooked or buffet breakfasts are served each morning, and the award-winning, lively bar features karaoke approximately once a month. Carnoustie Rail Station and Golf Street Rail Station are both just 5 minutes away on foot.

name: Sheraton Grand Istanbul Atasehir
address: Barbaros Mah, Mor Sumbul Sok, No:1, Istanbul 34746
description: The Sheraton Grand Istanbul Atasehir is located in the heart of Atasehir, an emerging residential and business center on the Asian side of Istanbul. With its central location, the hotel is well connected to all major transportation routes, 28 kilometers away from Sabiha Gokcen International Airport (SAW) and only 1 kilometer away from the Istanbul Finance Center development. Ulker Sports Arena is within walking distance. 165 stylish rooms and suites offer a variety of city and sea views of the Bosphorus and Princes’ Islands. A range of modern amenities include high speed internet access, a flat screen TV, a minibar, tea/coffee machine and a plush Sheraton Signature Bed.Marriott

name: Sultanahmet Isil Hotel
address: Şehsuvar bey mahallesi ışıl çıkmazı no 2 Fatih İstanbul, Istanbul 34126
description: Situated in Istanbul, 1.2 km from Blue Mosque, SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with slippers and an iPod docking station. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL offers a barbecue. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL include Basilica Cistern, Hagia Sophia and Column of Constantine. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 38 km from the hotel.

name: Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia
description: Istanbul is the only city in the world built on two continents; Europe and Asia, stands on the shores of the uniquely beautiful Bosphorus. Discover the beauty of one of the world's most celebrated cities at the Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia. The hotel is located in the center of the booming business district of Atasehir and offers a refreshing experience for business and leisure travelers. Spacious rooms and suites with high ceiling and panoramic windows are featuring LED screen TVs, high-speed internet, minibar, safe box equipped with plug, in-room kettles and voice mail. Executive rooms located on the top floors of the hotel with a great view across the Marmara Sea, taking into frame the Princes' Islands, the gateway of Istanbul's elite and great place for sightseeing. Guests take advantage of the Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia's extensive meeting facilities at inside and outside venues, that can accommodate conferences, weddings, car product launches and other special events with the capacity of 5 to 900Marriott

name: Titanic Mardan Palace
address: Kundu Mah. Yasar Sobutay Bul. No: 450/1, Antalya 07110
description: This resort boasts one of the largest outdoor pools in Europe and 8 à la carte restaurants. Titanic Mardan Palace offers a private beach area and rooms equipped with luxury amenities. Each room has a balcony with views of Taurus Mountains, Mediterranean Sea or swimming pool. All rooms feature remote controlled air conditioning and lighting. Separate restaurants are dedicated to international cuisines. The main restaurant serves each meal. The rooftop bar offers views of the resort and the sea. The luxury spa offers therapies, a state-of-art fitness centre and a meditation room overlooking the indoor pool. The beauty therapy centre provides facial and body care. The centre of Antalya is just 15 km away and can be reached in just 20 minutes by car. EXPO 2016 Antalya is 17 km from Titanic Mardan Palace.

name: Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort
description: At Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort, we've created a space where modernity and beauty coexist in perfect harmony. Our design is inspired by the elemental forces of earth, fire, water, and air, seamlessly blending ancient and current influences to create a truly unique ambiance.For golfers, our resort is a paradise, with an exceptional 18-hole course designed by Colin Montgomerie, attracting the biggest names in the sport, such as Tiger Woods and Justin Rose. In addition, the golf club offers illuminated evening play, allowing golfers to enjoy the stunning course even after sunset."At Maxx Royal, we understand that true luxury is about more than just external beauty. That's why our deeply personalized service ensures that every guest receives an experience tailored to their specific needs and desires. We believe in creating extraordinary experiences that not only indulge your senses but also make a positive impact on the world we share.From impeccable service to stunning aesthetics, every cornerstone of our hospitality is infused with a human-centered commitment to excellence. We're proud to weave sustainable practices throughout our resort, ensuring that your stay with us is not only unforgettable but also mindful of the planet we call home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Pudra Suites Bodrum
address: Kumbahce Mah, Ataturk Cad No100, Bodrum 48400
description: Rooms Stay in one of 38 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Property Location A stay at Pudra Hotel places you in the heart of Bodrum, just a 4-minute walk from Bodrum Beach and within a 5-minute drive of Bodrum Castle. This hotel is 1 mi (1.6 km) from Bodrum Marina and 4.7 mi (7.5 km) from Bitez Beach. Dining Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Rollaway bed fee: EUR 15.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 1:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets allowed (no fees)Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Naz Liman Otel Bodrum
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 50 metres from Yahsi Beach, Naz Liman Otel Bodrum features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Less than 1 km from Ortakent Plaj and 9 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, the property offers a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms include a kettle, while some rooms include a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Naz Liman Otel Bodrum each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Guests at Naz Liman Otel Bodrum will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bodrum City, like cycling. Myndus Gate is 8.2 km from the hotel, while Pedasa Antique City is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 50 km from Naz Liman Otel Bodrum.

name: Maxx Royal Bodrum
address: Gölköy Mah 312 Sk No 3 Bodrum /Mugla No 3, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.3 km from Akkan Beach, Maxx Royal Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a hammam. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Maxx Royal Bodrum provides some rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a patio. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Maxx Royal Bodrum can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. The property has an in-house hot spring bath, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Maxx Royal Bodrum include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Dorman Suites Hotel
address: Bitez Mah. Halilim Cd. No 6, Bodrum 48470
description: Dorman Suites Hotel, which aims to make your experience unforgettable by bringing a different perspective to traditional holiday understanding,consist of 42 suites and grand suites. Our suites are available in categories with Aegean sea, nature and pool view.Dorman Suites Hotel is designed with the Inspiration of Aegean architecture, decorated with fruit trees, olive trees, bougainvilleas and several other flowers, located in only 200 meters from Bitez and Bitez Beach and 5 km from Bodrum, the favorite holiday and entertainment destination of the Aegean.You can have a massage in the greenery of our hotel, enjoy the sunset with a drink by the pool, do yoga on the lawn, ride a bicycle with our free bikes and discover the beauty of Bitez.In our quality restaurant which presents the distinguished tastes of the Aegean and Mediterranean Cuisine, we hope that you will enjoy our special menus and delicious cocktails and drinks, in a decent atmosphere away from noise and crowds. We will be honored to welcome you in both summer and winter months with our friendly staff who have adopted the principle of quality service and the satisfaction of our guests.You may even walk to the famous Aquarium Bay of Bodrum with its turquoise-colored clear water and sea life. Additionaly you may also visit famous historical and cultural places like Bodrum Castle, Myndos Gate, Halicarnassus Mausoleum, Museum of Underwater Archeology, Pedasa Antique City and the ancient theater of Bodrum.VRBO

name: Paradise Apart Hotel
description: Located just 300 metres from Gumbet Beach, Paradise Apart Hotel has an outdoor pool surrounded by sun loungers and parasols. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and air-conditioned apartments with a private kitchen. The apartments of Paradise include a bedroom, living room and a bathroom. Each apartment offers a balcony and pool views. Free Wi-Fi is also available in the apartments. Paradise Apart Hotel has an à la carte restaurant. There is also a snack bar serving a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks throughout the day. The centre of Gumbet district is just a 5-minute walk from this pet friendly hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km away.

name: Prague City Residence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include down comforters, a freezer, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel Ostas
description: Located just a 15-minute walk from Prague’s Old Town, Hotel Ostas offers a restaurant and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The closest tram stop is just round the corner. Group breakfasts and dinners can be arranged upon request. Guests can walk to the Florenc metro station in just 10 minutes or jump on a tram at Husinecká tram station, which is just a 6-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Mala Strana
description: The Hotel Malá Strana is located close to the Vltava River, a 5-minute walk from Charles Bridge and the National Theatre. It offers free Wi-Fi. Housed in an original historic Prague building, Hotel Malá Strana features rooms with a private bathroom. Some include a seating area. Guests can enjoy a winter garden with a flat-screen TV. There are plenty of restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk, which offer tasty Czech and international cuisine for much lower prices than those in the very centre.

name: City Castle Aparthotel
description: Situated in Prague, City Castle Aparthotel features a restaurant, inner courtyard views and free WiFi, 1.4 km from St. Vitus Cathedral and 3.3 km from Municipal House. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Prague Castle is 1.6 km from the aparthotel, while Charles Bridge is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vaclav Havel Prague, 8 km from City Castle Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hilton Prague
description: Award-winning hotel in the heart of Prague The newly renovated Hilton Prague is truly The Place for Big Imaginations.
