It combines an ideal location, between the historic Old Town, the vibrant Karlin full of local pubs and trendy hot spots and the business district. All of Prague’s major attractions and shopping centers are within short walking distance and the airport is just a 25 minute drive away. There are a lot of exciting amenities under Hilton Prague’s unique glass roof - newly refurbished guest rooms, excellent restaurants combining the best of the local and international cuisine, vast and flexible meeting space, state-of the art gym and spa, and the urban chic Cloud 9 Sky Bar & Lounge with its stunning views of the city. All this provides you with a great opportunity to experience Prague’s vibrant life while having a comfortable place to stay and enjoy. But don't just take our word for it - plan your stay and experience it yourself. Walking distance to the city centre, 25 minute drive from the airport 791 newly refurbished guest rooms, including two Executive floors Cvent #1 hotel for meetings and events in Europe for second year 3 restaurants and 2 bars including rooftop Cloud 9 Sky Bar & Lounge 5,000 sq. m of flexible functional space 38 versatile meeting rooms, a stylish Ballroom and a Congress HallHilton

name: Hotel Roma Prague
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Prague. It has a fitness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, an executive floor and a sauna. This modern hotel provides a number of facilities, such as an express check-in and check-out feature, a coffee bar and massage services. Amenities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. After a day of discovering the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a mini bar, an in-room safe and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Those staying at Hotel Roma Prague can relax at the on-site bar, conveniently based for a drink. A selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Hotel Roma Prague is under a 30-minute drive from Prague Vaclav Havel Airport and the Charles Bridge is a short stroll away. It is within walking distance of Andel Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Prague.Revato

name: NH Prague City
description: The NH Prague City hotel is perfectly situated right in the Smíchov area of the city, with shops, restaurants, and cafes nearby. The historical center of Prague is within a 20-minute walk, giving you easy access to the castle and the Charles Bridge. Anděl metro station is within walking distance and provides links to the rest of the city. The 309 rooms at NH Prague City offer free Wi-Fi, and some of the rooms have a balcony. Our Superior rooms are located on higher floors offering delightful views.  Each morning, NH Prague City serves a delicious fresh breakfast. For lunch and dinner, try Costa Praga with its International menu, or have a drink at the Red bar, before heading out into the city. For relaxation, there is a gym, sauna, and tennis courts. Parking is also available as well as a charging station for Electric vehicles. For events our 11 meeting rooms can accommodate up to 400 people. Our sister property, NH Collection Prague city is also nearby at the top of the hill, and connected to this hotel via a unique cable car.NH Hoteles

name: Park Holiday Congress & Wellness Hotel
description: The Park Holiday Congress & Wellness Hotel is 18 km from Prague's city centre in the Botič-Milíčov Nature Park. It offers free unlimited access to its large spa and wellness area. All rooms and suites are air-conditioned and feature a balcony and a private bathroom including bathrobes and slippers. You can choose from a wide range of spa and leisure facilities, like an indoor pool, a sauna, steam room, cardio equipment, tennis courts and bowling alleys. Catering services include the Sport Bar, the Bowling Bar and the Tetu Brissy Restaurant serving Czech and international cuisine. You can also treat yourself to a visit in the Beauty Salon. Průhonice Castle, the Průhonice Dendrological Garden and the Cestlice Water Park Aquapalace are a 5-minute drive away. Prague is easily reachable via exit 6 of the D1 motorway. Underground parking for 200 cars is available on site.

name: Penzion Kapr
description: No description found

name: Hotel Garni Villa Areka
address: Plesivecke Namesti 74, 381 01 Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: No description found

name: Boutique Hotel Romantick
address: U Zelene Ratolesti 232, 380 01 Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: This luxurious little hotel is located in a lovely historical building from the 16th century, just a 10-minute walk from the city centre. It offers a camera-guarded parking lot in the garden. Free WiFi and a computer area are also offered. Start your day at the rich breakfast buffet and set out to explore the charming UNESCO-protected town of Cesky Krumlov, offering a unique combination of historic buildings and scenic natural surroundings. Meals can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant with offers a traditional Czech cuisine and dishes for vegetarians as well.

name: Penzion Onyx
address: Na Svahu 172, Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: Just 900 metres from the Old Town of Cesky Krumlov, this bed and breakfast offers free access to Wi-Fi. Furnished in a traditional style, the rooms at Penzion Onyx offer a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. Guests also benefit from a minibar, a refrigerator, and tea and coffee-making facilities. The Onyx features a free internet terminal and a storage room for bicycles. There is an airy and light breakfast room. Secure, free private parking is available on site. The railway station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Pension Amadeus
address: Po Vode 283, Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: The Pension Amadeus is located on the edge of Cesky Krumlov's Old Town, a 5 minute walk from the main square. It offers secure parking on site and free Wi-Fi. All rooms are tastefully furnished, have an en-suite bathroom and a satellite TV. Some rooms are located in the attic and feature air conditioning. The Pension Amadeus enjoys a peaceful location on the banks of the Vltava river, near to the Town Park.

name: Hotel Barbakan
description: The Hotel Barbakan is located in the historical centre of Cesky Krumlov, next to the bridge over the Vltava river and a 5-minute walk from the main square and the castle. Housed in a building that was a part of the city fortification and was used to store arms and gunpowder, Hotel Barbakan offers nice views of the Vltava river from some rooms. All rooms have a private bathroom, satellite TV, electric kettle and tea/coffee making facilities.Free WiFi is provided. Hotel Barbakan is 1.5 km from the train station and 250 metres from the town's main bus station.

name: Hotel Garni Pod Skalkou
address: Pod Skalkou 536, Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: Only 300 metres from the historic Old Town of Český Krumlov, the Hotel Garni Pod Skalkou offers free on-site secured parking. A heated outdoor pool is available in summer. All rooms and apartments come with a flat-screen TV and most have a balcony or a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire building and you can make free use of the barbecue facilities in the garden. Guests at Hotel Garni Pod Skalkou can make use of a common area where an electric kettle, water and refreshment are at their disposal. The bus station is 300 metres away from the Pod Skalkou guest house. Shuttle service is available for an additional cost.

name: Ubytování U Bílé Paní
description: Set in a renovated historical building, Ubytování u BÍLÉ PANÍ is right in the centre of the UNESCO heritage part of Český Krumlov, and a 5-minute walk from Castle Český Krumlov. It offers family-run accommodation in traditional l8-century style and free Wi-Fi access. Offering original wooden furnishings, all rooms at the BÍLÉ PANÍ come with a flat-screen TV and a small fridge. The private bathroom features a shower or a bathtub. Free toiletries and slippers are offered in each. Breakfast is served every morning. There is also a self-service bar with a choice of refreshments. Guests can benefit from the free use of the microwave, electric kettle and the fridge in the common kitchen, as well as the terrace with seating facilities. The closest bus station is 900 metres from the property, while České Budějovice is 25 km away.

name: Penzion Top
description: No description found

name: Pension Zámecká Apartmá - Castle Apartments
description: Set up in a historic castle complex at the main entrance to the area, Pension Zámecká Apartmá offers modern accommodation fitted with a private bathroom. The city centre is a 5-minute walk away. The complex offers rooms of various sizes as well as apartments. Each unit has an en suite bathroom equipped with bathroom amenities. It is set in 3 buildings. A wide range of European cuisine is available for the buffet breakfast.

name: Penzion Hornicka
description: No description found

name: Pension Na Vyhlídce
address: Na Vyhlídce 362, Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: Pension Na Vyhlídce is a small family pension situated in a residential part of Český Krumlov. It offers a spacious garden with tables, chairs and a smoking area on the terrace. Free Wi-Fi throughout the building. Pension Na Vyhlídce provides accommodation in spacious and bright rooms and an apartment with a TV, a desk with chairs and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. The rooms also have a fridge, microwave oven, kettle and dishes, and the apartment has an equipped kitchen and a washing machine for a fee/electricity/. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling nearby, and horse riding is 2 km away. Bicycle storage is available in the guesthouse. Blanský forest with a lookout tower and Mount Kleť are 15 minutes away by car from the cable car station. The guesthouse is only 500 meters from the Vltava River, which you can ride on a raft or canoe. Canoes and rafts can be rented 500 meters from the guesthouse. About 400 meters from the guesthouse there is a recreational pond suitable for swimming, a restaurant and a children's playground. It is a 10-minute walk to the city center and 400 meters to the nearest restaurant. In the summer, music festivals and other cultural events are often held in the city. The castle garden with a revolving auditorium is 800 meters away. According to unbiased reviews written by guests, this area is one of the favorite parts of the destination Český Krumlov. Pension Na Vyhlídce has been providing accommodation to guests on  since April 17, 2012.

name: Hotel Konvice
address: Horni Ulice 146, 381 01 Český Krumlov, South Bohemia
description: Located right in the pedestrianized and UNESCO-protected centre of Cesky Krumlov, the Konvice hotel is only a few steps away from the main square. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access in the area of reception. The hotel consists of 2 separate buildings, rooms are located in the main building as well as in the building situated within a 2-minute walk. In the Konvice hotel's charming building first mentioned in 1539 no room resembles the other. Each is elegantly furnished and nicely decorated, some displaying original wooden beams. Every room is fully en-suite and features a satellite TV. In the newly renovated breakfast room you can enjoy a rich breakfast, which can also be enjoyed on the terrace with a wonderful view of the old town and the castle when the weather is nice and warm. Fresh baked goods, homemade jams, cold cuts and cheese, various muesli and yogurt, fruit, egg dishes and a freshly brewed coffee of your choice guarantee a good start to the day.

name: Penzion Kolbl
description: No description found

name: Penzion Tilia
description: Located within a 5-minute walk from the historical city centre of the UNESCO World Heritage Site Český Krumlov, Penzion Tilia provides modern accommodation units, free WiFi and a garden with seating area. The elegant rooms are fitted with hardwood floors and wooden furnishings, TV, and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. A local grocery shop is reachable in 200 metres from the Tilia, while the nearest restaurants can be found in the city centre, at 500 metres. The Horní Brána Bus Stop is 20 metres away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Penzion Restaurace Na Ostrove
description: Modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi are provided at Penzion na Ostrově. It is located in the centre of Český Krumlov and offers panoramic views of the castle and the Vltava River. The on-site restaurant serves typical Czech cuisine. All of the bright rooms have wooden floors. Each room features a sofa or a sofa bed and a bathroom with a shower. During summer, you can dine on Penzion na Ostrově’s terrace. On prior request, breakfast can be arranged. Český Krumlov’s Old Town is just 50 metres away. The castle is 100 metres from the guest house. České Budějovice and the Lipno Reservoir are both 25 km away.

name: Hostel 99
description: The family-run Hostel 99 enjoys a quiet location, a 10-minute walk from the historic centre of Český Krumlov, and offers you rooms with views of the Vltava river, an on-site restaurant and free Wi-Fi. You can choose between en-suite rooms and rooms with shared bathrooms. Linen and towels are included in the rates at Hostel 99. There is also a shared kitchen with a stove, a microwave, a refrigerator and kitchenware. You can taste typical Czech dishes in the restaurant and café on site. A secured parking area is available 200 metres from Hostel 99.

name: Hotel Palatin
description: Hotel Palatin is located in the centre of Karlovy Vary, along the famous promenade near the Tepla River and close to the Mill Colonnade. The rooms offer free WiFi. All rooms at the Palatin include a bathroom with hairdryer, a TV, and a minibar. The property offers buffet breakfast each morning. The massage parlour offers a wide range of massages and therapies. Hotel guests can also take advantage of discounts at nearby spa facilities The property offers airport shuttle service on request.

name: Boutique Hotel Saxonia
address: 2168/6 Pod Jelením Skokem, 360 01 Carlsbad, Carlsbad Region
description: Located in Karlovy Vary, 200 metres from Market Colonnade, Boutique Hotel Saxonia provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At Boutique Hotel Saxonia every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or an à la carte breakfast. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak Czech, German, English and Russian at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Boutique Hotel Saxonia include Mill Colonnade, Hot Spring and Church of St. Peter and Paul. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International, 7 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ferdinandhof Apart-Hotel
description: Located 600 metres from Mill Colonnade, Ferdinandhof Apart-Hotel provides accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a lift for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property. Some of the units include a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a shower and slippers. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and steam room. A bicycle rental service is available at Ferdinandhof Apart-Hotel, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Market Colonnade, Hot Spring and Church of St. Mary Magdalene. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International, 4 km from Ferdinandhof Apart-Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Boutique Hotel Corso
description: Situated in Karlovy Vary, within 300 metres of Market Colonnade and 600 metres of Mill Colonnade, Boutique Hotel Corso provides a spa and wellness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and some have city views. At Boutique Hotel Corso the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karlovy Vary, like hiking and cycling. Popular points of interest near Boutique Hotel Corso include Hot Spring, Church of St. Peter and Paul and Church of St. Mary Magdalene. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Slunecni lazne
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a hydromassage showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Karlsbad Grande Madonna
description: Offering views of the Saint Mary Magdalene Church, Karlsbad Grande Madonna hotel is located in a historic part of the town near to the spa springs, 100 metres from the Hot Spring, and offers a restaurant as well as a beer cellar. A wellness centre including a sauna, a hammam and a hot tub is on site. Free WiFi is available. Luxuriously equipped and elegantly furnished, the rooms feature satellite TV, a safety deposit box, a minibar, and a bathroom fitted with bathrobes slippers and a hairdryer. Savour specialities of the Czech and international cuisine or choose one of the dietary meals.

name: Chateau Cihelny
description: Situated in Karlovy Vary, 13 km from Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou, Hotel Château Cihelny features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel has a hot tub. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Hotel Château Cihelny can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Mill Colonnade is 13 km from the accommodation, while Market Colonnade is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 11 km from Hotel Château Cihelny.

name: Hotel Embassy
description: The family-owned Embassy Hotel is situated in the heart of Karlovy Vary, in direct vicinity to the thermal springs and 350 metres from the Hot Spring. It offers free parking on site, a restaurant and a fitness centre. The accommodation units are fitted with comfortable, stylish furniture, a minibar and satellite TV. Bathrobes are available in every bathroom. The Embassy's restaurant is one of the oldest in Karlovy Vary and is famous for its Czech and international cuisine and its historical interior. There are also sporting facilities nearby and tee times at the golf courses can be organised at discounted rates.

name: Pension Rainbow
description: Situated in a residential area, 2 km from Karlovy Vary’s spa centres, Pension Rainbow offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and a garden. Facilities include a winter terrace and a restaurant that serves breakfast and a complimentary welcome drink is also provided. Guests have access to a dining room where there is a fridge with drinks for purchase, a kettle and a large selection of tea, a coffee maker including coffee, a microwave oven, a toaster and an electric grill. Its rooms have en suite bathrooms. Welcome tea and coffee is offered for guests. Breakfast is served daily and includes freshly baked bread, pastries and homemade jams. Guests at Rainbow Hotel can relax in the winter garden, or with good weather, enjoy the sun in the well kept summer garden, with barbecue, sun loungers and table tennis. The private car park can be used free of charge. A local bus stop is 100 metres away.

name: Eurohotel Garni
description: The Eurohotel Garni is located not far from the business and spa center of Karlovy Vary. Our very stylish building offers bright and comfortable accommodation with its own garden and the free car park (watched by a video-camera). Free Wi-Fi access is also provided. All en-suite rooms at the Eurohotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and a mini bar. Seating facilities are available in each. Freshly prepared buffet breakfast is served in the hotel breakfast room every morning. In the center of Karlovy Vary you will find spa colonnades with hot healing springs, a 10-minute ride away, and architectural sights, including Baroque and Art Nouveau historical buildings.

name: Spa Hotel Imperial
description: Built in the early 1900s, Hotel Imperial is a well-known landmark in Karlovy Vary. Its award-winning spa centre offers an indoor pool, and the restaurant hosts cooking shows. Rooms here come with a satellite TV, a minibar and free internet access. There is a small seating area in each room. National cuisine is served at the non-smoking restaurant. Café Vienna offers traditional desserts and coffee specialities. In the evening, live music and cocktails are offered at the Imperial Club. Spa therapies at the Imperial include carbon dioxide baths and beauty treatments. There is a hot tub, sauna and fitness room. Bathrobes and slippers are included in the price. Other services offered at the property include a hairdresser`s, manicure and pedicure, as well as the possibility to book trips. There are 4 tennis courts which can be booked at the sports centre. Guests can also rent bikes and helmets or book Nordic Walking directly at the hotel.

name: A.Dalia
description: This charming familiar boarding house in Karlovy Vary is set amidst an attractive park-style garden with a little pond and offers you fully equipped double and triple rooms. Situated in the immediate vicinity of Karlovy Vary's spa facilities and the Collonade and about 500 metres from the town centre, the A.Dalia boarding house is an ideal base for a relaxing stay in this world-famous spa town.

name: Pension Family
description: Situated in Karlovy Vary, within 1.1 km of Mill Colonnade and less than 1 km of Market Colonnade, Pension Family features accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The guest house provides quiet street views and an outdoor fireplace. The rooms at the guest house are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. At Pension Family the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a picnic area. Guests at Pension Family will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karlovy Vary, like skiing, cycling and hiking. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Hot Spring, Church of St. Mary Magdalene and Church of St. Peter and Paul. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 4 km from Pension Family.

name: Pension Villa Maria
description: Situated in a quiet residential area of Karlovy Vary, 300 metres above the Collonade, the Pension Villa Maria offers free wired internet access and free parking. The rooms at the Villa Maria feature modern furniture and an elegant, private bathroom with a heated towel rail and a glass shower. They are equipped with an electric kettle, a CD and a DVD player and a refrigerator. Reservations for medical treatments at the Alžbětiny Lázně spa can be made at the guest house. A bus service to the spa is available. Manicure can be done in your room. Within a 50-metre radius you can find 4 restaurants, 2 grocery stores and a pharmacy. Karlovy Vary Airport is 5 km away.

name: Penzion Valkoun-Lilienfeld
description: A 5-minute walk from the Colonnade, the newly renovated Penzion Valkoun offers views of the Tepla River and elegantly furnished rooms with parquet floors and stylish bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire building and free parking is possible on site. The next bus stop is just 50 metres away. All rooms come equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle and a fridge. Apartments feature a fully equipped kitchenette.

name: Pension Escrime
description: Located in the quiet Růžový vrch part of Karlovy Vary, Pension Escrime is a 15-minute walk from the city centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and free public parking. A fitness centre can be used at an additional cost. The Escrime Pension’s modern, colourfully decorated rooms feature a seating area, a TV, an electric kettle with coffee and tea, and a bathroom. Karlovy Vary Airport is 9 km away, with a transfer service available on request and at an additional cost. Horní Nádraží Train Station is an 8-minute walk away, and it is 19 km to the Jáchymov Ski Area.

name: Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eden
description: Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eeden is located in a quiet area of Karlovy Vary, 3 bus stops from the centre of the resort and offers you en-suite rooms with flat-screen TV and refrigerator. You can enjoy river or garden views from your room. Free WiFi is available. At Villa Anastazis - Penzion Eden you will find a terrace and a snack bar. Other facilities offered include a shared lounge. The property offers free parking. A pool centre, a hockey stadium and a sports areal can be found only 300 metres away. Meeting and business facilities are offered for a surcharge and upon a prior request. The guest house is a 5-minute walk away from the Karlovy Vary Golf Course and from the Ice Hockey Arena. The U Draka restaurant is 400 meters away and a supermarket can be reached on foot in 10 minutes.

name: Vila Anton
description: Situated right next to the pedestrian zone in the historical centre of Carlsbad, Vila Anton is a 5-minute walk from Alžbětiny Lázně Spa Centre, to which guests are given a discount. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Vila Anton’s rooms look out onto the garden and are equipped with satellite TV, which has international channels, and a small seating area. All rooms have their own private bathroom and toilet. Each room is located on separate floor and is equipped with its own kitchen. The hotel serves continental and full English breakfasts, has a sun terrace, children’s playground and barbecue facilities, and offers massages and tours. Shared kitchen facilities are available to guests. Natural springs are located 500 metres from the property. The Carlsbad Dolní Nádraží Train Station is 1.5 km from the Anton, while the main bus station can be reached in 5 minutes on foot.

name: Pension Rak
description: Pension Rak is quietly located in Karlovy Vary, 300 metres from the centre. A common kitchen with a fridge and kitchenware is at guests' disposal. The garden has a seating area and the terrace on the first floor offers views of Mount Klinovec. Continental breakfast is served every morning. All rooms come with a private bathroom with shower and they are decorated in yellow, green and pink colours. Within 300 metres there are restaurants, a children's playground and the Alzbetiny spa with treatments and a swimming pool. Hiking trails are only a 5-minute walk from the Rak. Golf can be played in Cihelny, 6 km away, or Hurky, 5 km from the guest house. Pension Rak is 300 metres away from the bus station and 800 metres from Karlovy Vary Train Station. Transport services are offered upon request.

name: Retro Riverside Wellness Resort
description: Hotel Retro Riverside Wellness Resort is set in Březová, near the forest and the water dam and offers free WiFi, a restaurant serving international cuisine, and spa and wellness facilities free of charge. The spa and wellness area provides pools, 5 different types of sauna, a hot tub and fitness centre. All suites comprise air conditioning, a balcony and a flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels. Each unit has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. Staromlýnská Bus Stop is 1 km away. The popular spa town of Karlovy Vary is at a distance of 8 km. Bečov n. Teplou Castle is 15.4 km from the Riverside Retro.

name: Rubin Luxury Apartments
description: Offering a terrace, Rubin Luxury Apartments is situated in Karlovy Vary, 100 metres from Mill Colonnade. Market Colonnade is 300 metres away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units include a flat-screen TV, coffee machine, washing machine, tumble dryer and Apple TV. Some units have a seating area and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Each unit has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Rubin Luxury Apartments also includes a spa centre, saunas and relax zone. Hot Spring is 400 metres from Rubin Luxury Apartments. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny
description: Located in Karlovy Vary, 13 km from Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou, Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a terrace with a mountain view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a hammam. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny. Mill Colonnade is 13 km from the hotel, while Market Colonnade is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International Airport, 11 km from Hotel Villa Golf Cihelny.

name: Hotel Kapitol
address: Jaroslava Pruchy 1915/24, 434 01 Most, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Situated in the town of Most and the Hnevin Castle reachable within 1 km, Hotel Kapitol offers air-conditioned accommodation, a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, a indoor golf, a bowling, a terrace and a bar. Free WiFi is available in all areas and free private parking is possible on site. Each unit at Hotel Kapitol comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a laptop safe, a minibar, an electric kettle, a telephone and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Meals can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant serving a traditional Czech cuisine as well as international dishes. Shops and a hairdresser are also located at the property. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling.

name: Hotel Karlstejn & Spa
description: The Hotel Karlštejn enjoys an elevated position, 100 metres from the main square and 50 metres from Karlštejn Castle. It offers free WiFi and free monitored parking, a spa area and bike rental. Guest will be able to enjoy a free seasonal heated outdoor pool with salt water and exclusive castle views. All rooms at the Hotel Karlštejn offer views of the castle. They have a private bathroom, antique furniture and an LCD satellite TV. Aromatic coffee and other drinks can be enjoyed in the café bar. The restaurant has a summer garden and offers views of the castle. Guests can rent bicycles at the hotel or relax at the sauna and hot tub. A golf course can be found 2 km from the Hotel Karlštejn and an Aquapark can be reached within a 20-minute drive. Prague is 30 km away or a 30-minute train ride. The hotel offers a shuttle service on request.

name: Hotel U Kaplicky
description: The family-run Hotel U Kaplicky is a 10-minute walk from the Old Bridge in the historic royal town of Pisek. All rooms are en-suite and they come with wooden furniture and work desks. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. The restaurant serves traditional South Bohemian specialities as well as international cuisine. It has a smoker's area and there is a terrace as well. The forest is 500 metres away and there are cycling routes in the vicinity. The local bus stop is 30 metres from the property and the Main Train Station is 2 km away. Tennis courts can be found within 200 metres from the Hotel U Kaplicky while a swimming pool is 2 km away. Private parking is available on site for a surcharge of 200 CZK per night, as well as a lockable garage bike storage.

name: Hotel U Zvonu
description: Located in the centre of Vrchlabi in the Krkonose Mountains, family-run Hotel U Zvonu provides beautiful and spacious accommodation. It offers free parking, a breakfast buffet and free internet access. Lunch and dinner are available at the restaurant of a sister hotel, only 100 metres away. Guests of the U Zvonu will receive a discount. Guests of the Hotel U Zvonu can enjoy services of spa centre in a partner hotel Gendorf nearby, which features a sauna, hot tubs, a solarium, herbal steam baths and a wide range of beauty treatments and massages.

name: Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels
description: Situated in Brno, 2 km from Špilberk Castle, Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels boasts a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy a fitness centre at the property. Every room is fitted with a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guests can dine in the on-site Bruno Café Restauran, serving local cuisine. Trade Fairs Brno is 3.3 km from Cosmopolitan Bobycentrum - Czech Leading Hotels, while Villa Tugendhat is 800 metres from the property. Brno–Turany Airport is 9 km away.

name: Villa A. Malka
description: No description found

name: Wellness Pension 7
description: No description found

name: Hotel Osvit
address: 17. listopadu 1478, 293 01 Mladá Boleslav, Central Bohemian Region
description: Hotel Osvit is set in Mladá Boleslav, 1.8 km from Skoda Auto car factory and 50 km from Prague. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Every room includes a flat-screen TV, kitchen and private bathroom. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is room service at the property. A number of supermarkets and restaurants can be found around the property. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling. Bedřichov is 43 km from Hotel Osvit, while Poděbrady is 36 km away. Vaclav Havel Prague Airport is 59 km from the property.

name: DHSR Centralni Lazne
address: Goethovo Namsti 1, 353 01 Mariánské Lázně, Carlsbad Region
description: Situated in Mariánské Lázně, 300 metres from Colonnade by the Singing Fountain, Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa features accommodation with a bar and private parking. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a restaurant. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa the rooms include bed linen and towels. The wellness area at the accommodation is comprised of a hot tub and a hammam. Bike hire and car hire are available at Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. The Singing Fountain is 300 metres from the hotel, while Castle and Chateau Bečov nad Teplou is 23 km from the property. The nearest airport is Karlovy Vary International, 39 km from Ensana Centrální Lázně - Maria Spa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Brioni Suites
description: Set in Ostrava, Brioni Suites enjoys a central location on the famous and lively Stodolní Street, surrounded by restaurants and bars, and offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi. All spacious apartments feature luxurious furnishings, sound-proofed windows, living rooms with leather sofas, minibar inside and modern bathrooms. Some also feature a lounge chair or a pool table. Silesian Ostrava Castle is 2.5 km from the property and Ostrava Zoo Park can be reached within 4.5 km. Stodolní Train Station is 200 metres away.

name: Orea Spa Hotel Bohemia
description: Housed in a charming historic building, OREA Spa Hotel Bohemia Mariánské Lázně is located in the central part of Mariánské Lázně and offers newly established spa facilities. Choose from elegantly furnished rooms as well as from luxurious suites in our sister Orea Hotel Anglicky Dvur. The colonnade with the Singing Fountain and the healing springs are only 300 metres away. Indulge in various classic massages, reflexology, make use of curative treatments like inhalations, electrotherapy, paraffin packs and much more and treat yourself to a visit to the sauna. The lounge is ideally suited for small seminars, presentation, trainings and the like. The Bohemia hotel restaurant has a capacity of 150 seats and is open all day. Taste delicious Czech and international cuisine!

name: Design Pension Twenty
address: 34 Jirího Nám., 290 01 Poděbrady, Central Bohemian Region
description: No description found

name: Maximus Resort
description: Opened in June 2012, Maximus Resort features the Infinit Maximus Wellness and Spa Centre with an aquatic and sauna world including massages, a swimming pool, a hot tub, a steam bath, Kneipp bath and an outdoor cooling pool, all available at a surcharge. Stylishly decorated, most units have a terrace or balcony with views of the surrounding landscape. Each en-suite room comes with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some also have a seating area or a separate living room. The property contains only a 4-star area. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Maximus Resort. The property’s restaurant serves international cuisine, and also has a garden with barbecue facilities. Boat trips are available at Brno Dam, 200 metres away. There is also the hotel's beach bar Hribek, open from April to September. The Kaskáda Golf Course, a zoo, and the Přístaviště Bus Stop are all with 2 km. Brno city centre, the castles Špilberk and Veveří, and the Villa Tugendhat, which is famous for pioneering modern architecture in Europe, are all within a 15-minute drive. A shuttle service is available free of charge.

name: Residence Romanza
description: The elegant 4-star Residence Romanza is located in the centre of Marianske Lazne, 250 metres from the Spa Colonnade and Singing Fountain. This property offers 24 apartments, some with balcony or terrac. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the hotel's restaurant "Romeo & Juliet". A summer terrace and a private garden are also available. Relaxing massages, wellness services, and other spa procedures are offered at Residence Romanza. Free WiFi is provided. Tennis and racquetball courts, horseback riding trips and many other activities can be booked on site. The hotel features a private indoor garage for up to 9 vehicles. Many of the town's popular springs are within a 5-minute walk. The Mestsky Urad Bus Stop is 150 metres away.

name: Pytloun Self Check-in Hotel Liberec
description: Pytloun Self Check-in Hotel Liberec on the outskirts of Liberec, close to the I-35 expressway and only a 4-minute drive from the city centre. All rooms come with an LCD satellite TV, free coffee/tea set, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. This comfortable non-smoking hotel offers modern rooms, a friendly. Because of its central location, the Hotel Pytloun is an ideal starting point to explore the city of Liberec and the surrounding area.

name: Penzion Rotunda
description: No description found

name: Brioni Boutique Hotel 4
description: Brioni Boutique Hotel is located in the pedestrian zone, in the heart of Ostrava. It features air-conditioned rooms with a minibar, cable TV and free high speed WiFi of 150 MBit/s. A modern cedar wood sauna, a steam bath a are at guests’ disposal. Brioni Boutique Hotel provides secured parking for guests at an extra charge.

name: Wellness Hotel La Passionaria
description: The non-smoking Residence La Passionaria features spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from the spa park in Marianske Lazne. Free camera-surveilled parking is available on site and 100 metres away is a casino. Holistic spa treatments, massages as well as medical examination are offered. Tennis courts are within 100 metres from the La Passionaria and the swimming pool is 500 metres away. A ski slope with artificial snow and night skiing is 1.5 km away and cross-country ski runs are 3.5 km from the guest house. Cycling, hiking and Nordic walking, as well as horseback riding are available within 2 km radius. Guests can visit the Kladska Nature Reserve or the Chodova Plana Beer Spa, which are 10 km away.

name: Pension Jitrenka Hrensko
address: Hřensko 123, 407 17 Hřensko, Ústí nad Labem Region
description: Situated in Hřensko, 8 km from Saxon Switzerland National Park, Pension Jitřenka Hřensko features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers an ATM and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a tour desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast mountain views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Pension Jitřenka Hřensko can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hřensko, like hiking and cycling. Königstein Fortress is 17 km from Pension Jitřenka Hřensko, while Pillnitz Castle and Park is 38 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dresden Airport, 77 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pod Jasany
address: Horní 213, 543 51 Špindlerův Mlýn, Hradec Králové Region
description: Located amid the Krkonošsky National Park, Hotel Pod Jasany is only 1 km from the centre of the ski resort Špindlerův Mlýn. It offers a wellness centre. All rooms and apartments provide a bathroom, satellite TV and a safe. The suites offer views of the adjacent ski slopes and tea/coffee making facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. Le Petit Gourmand, Hotel Pod Jasany’s restaurant, serves international and Czech specialities, accompanied with French and Moravian wines. The property provides buffet breakfast, afternoon snacks and 3-course dinners. Guests can relax in the club room featuring an open fireplace, or in the spa area, which provides a sauna, a hot tub, massages and a view of the surrounding mountains. In summer, the hotel’s terrace and the covered patio can also be used for barbecues. The parking area is camera-surveilled.

name: Pytloun Wellness Travel Hotel
description: Set amongst 17th century timber buildings, this hotel offers non-smoking rooms and a communal kitchen with an electric hob. It is located in Liberec, 4 km from Ještěd ski resort. All rooms come with a satellite TV, free coffee/tea set, as well as a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Some apartments also have a private kitchenette. The front desk staff can help with queries such as conversion of foreign currencies. It provides storage facility for guests’ ski equipment. The Luxury Island Spa features an outdoor salt water pool, a Finnish sauna, an indoor tropical salt-herbal sauna, a hot tub and massages, all for a surcharge. Prior reservation at the spa is necessary. Pytloun Travel is 400 metres away from Liberec-Horní Ružodol Railway Station which provides easy access to the rest of Liberec. Guests can enjoy 30 minutes of free access to the spa between the hours of 9:00 - 14:00. It is necessary to reserve the spa in advance to avail the service.

name: Pension Mona
description: No description found

name: Rezidence Villa Gloria
description: The fully renovated historic Rezidence Villa Gloria can be found in the picturesque area of the Forest Source of Marianske Lazne and offers you nice views of the forest and the spa parks. Most of the rooms in the Rezidence Villa Gloria feature a balcony. The rich and healthy buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the quiet dining room or on the charming garden terrace. Free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. Rooms and apartements include kitchenette. Property offers Wellness & Spa and a fitness corner. About 200 metres away you can find tennis courts. The Colonnade is reachable within a 15-minute walk and if you enjoy dancing, then pay a visit to the Lunapark café, which is just 300 metres away. Hotel parking is available on site and for a surcharge.

name: Hotel Rössli
description: Just 100 metres from the banks of the Limmat river, the boutique Hotel Rössli is situated in the vibrant Old Town of Zurich, a 5-minute walk from Lake Zürich and the opera house. It offers you colourful rooms with free WiFi, an inviting bar and the Il Gattopardo restaurant serving Sicilian cuisine. Each of the stylish rooms comes with a minibar, flat-screen TV, bathrobes and slippers. Aromatic Sicilian and Mediterranean cuisine can be enjoyed in the Ristorante Il Gattopardo on site. The cosy Rössli Bar serves selected wines, single malts and Tapas. A multi-storey car park can be found a 10-minute walk from the hotel, but you can drive into the pedestrian area close to the hotel for unloading luggage. Zürich main station is just 4 tram stops away and you can reach Zürich-Kloten airport within 15 minutes from the Rössli hotel.

name: Sorell Hotel Rigiblick
description: The Sorell Hotel Rigiblick is located high above Zurich's skyline, offering spectacular panoramic views of the city, Lake Zurich and the Alps. The Sorell Hotel Rigiblick is well connected by public transport. The journey to Zurich's city centre and to the main train station by the Rigibahn railway or the tram takes only a few minutes. Guests can enjoy the cuisine of our restaurant partner. In the same building, Swiss Chef Vreni Giger and her team welcome guests from all over the world. The staff of the Rigiblick Hotel will be pleased to stock your refrigerator with whatever you like to have for breakfast. Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. If you travel by car, convenient parking is available in the hotels underground garage.

name: Boutique Hotel Helvetia
description: Our boutique hotel is a real jewel nestled in the heart of the city. With a great love for detail, classic art nouveau elements have been combined with a modern interior to create a unique living ambiance. The individual Boutique Hotel Helvetia offers a home from home in a globalised world to busy business travellers, city explorers and Zurich lovers alike. Discover our Library, Pool Bar, nearby Indigo Gym, Restaurant and legendary Bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: Gaia Hotel
description: Located in Basel, GAIA Hotel Basel is within easy reach of the Museum Tinguely and the Beyeler Foundation. It provides free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Basel SBB Railway Station. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. Corporate facilities include a 24-hour business centre. The rooms at GAIA Hotel Basel are air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and an in-room safe. GAIA Hotel Basel is situated amongst the area's popular sightseeing attractions, dining options, nightlife and shops, and the Kunstmuseum Basel is within walking distance. Basler Munster, Antikenmuseum Basel und Sammlung Ludwig and Zoo Basel are a short walk away.Revato

name: Hotel Tor
description: Enjoying a prime location in the heart of Geneva, only 5 minutes from the Cornavin Railway Station, the cosy and intimate family hotel Tor offers modernly designed and fully equipped accommodation. Housed in a classical old building, the hotel is close to the lake and within walking distance of the main shopping areas, international organisations and businesses. Tor Hotel combines the charm of high ceilings and old wooden floors with a contemporary new decoration. The different types and size of rooms will suit either business clients or tourists.

name: Evi's Home Hotel & Apartments
description: Evi's Home Hotel & Apartments features city views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Bern, 1.4 km from Stade de Suisse. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The wellness area at the aparthotel is comprised of a public bath and an open-air bath. Skiing and cycling can be enjoyed nearby, while a bicycle rental service, water sports facilities and a ski pass sales point are also available on site. Bernexpo is 1.7 km from Evi's Home Hotel & Apartments, while Bärengraben is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 102 km from the accommodation.

name: See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi
description: The See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi in Weggis is located right on the shore of Lake Lucerne. It offers panoramic lake views, indoor and outdoor pools and free parking. All of the spacious rooms and apartments have a cable TV and a balcony. The 1500 m² spa area include various steam baths and saunas, a Laconium and private spa suites. Fine Swiss and international cuisine and a wide range of wines are served in the restaurant of the See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi.

name: Hotel Sörenberg
description: Hotel Sörenberg offers modern rooms in the centre of Sörenberg, a 5-minute walk from the ski lift and cable car. The hotel serves homemade pizzas and has a sun terrace. The rooms at Hotel Sörenberg have parquet floors and are light and airy. They include cable TV as well as a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available as well. Lucerne is 53 km away, while Bern is 60 km and Interlaken is 100 km from the hotel. During summer, guests can take advantage of the Soerenberg Card, offering free access to the Sörenberg Cable Cars.

name: Hirschen Oberkirch
description: Set in Oberkirch, 27 km from Lucerne Station, HIRSCHEN OBERKIRCH - Design Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, the units at HIRSCHEN OBERKIRCH - Design Boutique Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. HIRSCHEN OBERKIRCH - Design Boutique Hotel offers a barbecue. The area is popular for hiking and skiing, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Lion Monument is 27 km from the hotel, while KKL Culture and Convention Centre Lucerne is 27 km away. The nearest airport is EuroAirport Basel–Mulhouse–Freiburg Airport, 81 km from HIRSCHEN OBERKIRCH - Design Boutique Hotel.

name: Free Spirit Lodge
description: Sörenberg’s Free Spirit Lodge offers units that each have a balcony or terrace with views of the surrounding landscape. The local ski lift and gondola are just 50 metres away, and the closest bus stop can be reached on foot in 4 minutes. Accommodation at the Free Spirit Lodge also has a fireplace, kitchenette, private bathroom, wood furnishings and wall panelling. Wi-Fi is available free of charge, and a fondue house and barbecue facilities can be used in the garden. A ski storage room can be used on site and ski passes can be bought from the staff. In Summer parking can be provided at the property. In good snow conditions, the property can be reached on skis. Sörenberg has been a recognized UNESCO biosphere reserve since 2001. The Free Spirit Lodge is just 300 metres from the village centre, and Golf Club Flühli-Sörenberg is a 10-minute drive away. Lucerne, Berne, Interlaken, Mount Titlis and Mount Pilatus can be reached by car in 1 hour. In winter, it is not possible to access the property by car.

name: Hotel Helvetia Intergolf
address: Route de la Moubra 8, 3963 Crans-Montana, Valais
description: Child friendly, beautiful residence "Appart-Hotel Helvetia Intergolf", built in 1989, renovated in 2010. House Equipment: hydro massage bath, playroom, lift, central heating system, massage, billiard table, laundry, storage room for skis, sauna (shared use), washing machine (shared use), tumble dryer (shared use). Access & Parking: communal parking. All-season motor access to the house. Situation: in the centre of Montana, quiet position. View from the apartment of the mountains. Surroundings of the house: garden (shared use), indoor pool (shared use, heated, length 10 m x width 4 m). Facilities and distances: shop 150 m, grocers 150 m, supermarket 150 m, restaurant 150 m, riding stables 500 m, cross-country ski trail 900 m, ski school 500 m, ice rink 200 m, children's playground 300 m, m cable car 700 m, bus stop 150 m. Please note, nearby is a motorway in 15 km, main road in 150 m and railway line in 1.5 km. The catalogue photo is just an example. There are more similar properties for rent in this same residence. Stay less than 7 days possible on request. ===== ACCOMMODATION DESCRIPTION ===== 3-room apartment for 6 people, 75 m2, comfortable furnishings. Living/dining room with satellite TV, cable TV, radio and dining-table. Smoking not allowed. Internet (Wireless LAN [WLAN]). 1 fold-away bed. Sleeping room with 2 single beds. Sleeping room with 2 single beds. Kitchenette with 4 hot plates, micro wave, oven, dining table, dishwasher, fridge and deep freezer. Food service: breakfast (extra), half-board (extra). Bath/WC and shower/WC. Balcony 10 m2, terrace furniture, 2 deck chairs. Other equipment: safe, children's high chair, telephone, hair dryer, iron. The following might be to be paid extra: Tourist tax.VRBO

name: Villa Sassa Hotel, Residence & Spa
description: Surrounded by a large park, Villa Sassa Hotel, Residence & Spa - Ticino Hotels Group offers a spacious spa area and panoramic views over Lugano, Lake Lugano, and the surrounding mountains. It is only a 15-minute walk from the city centre. Each of the comfortable rooms comes with a balcony, satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a bath or shower, toilet and amenities such as free toiletries, a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Villa Sassa’s 3,000 m² Spa and Wellness Club includes heated indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub, a sauna, a Turkish bath, a relaxation area, and a fitness centre. There is a wide range of beauty treatments and massages. The restaurant Ai Giardini di Sassa serves Swiss, Italian, and international cuisine, and in fine weather, guests can dine on the terrace. A bar is also on site.

name: Hotel Montpelier
address: 37 Rue du Centre sportif, 1936 Verbier, Valais
description: Centrally located in Verbier, 900 metres from the Medran and Savoleyre ski lifts, Hotel Montpelier features free WiFi in all areas of the property as well as a spa area including an indoor pool, a sauna and a steam bath. A sport shop can be found in the hotel as well. Each accommodation unit is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Most rooms have views of the mountains and some have a balcony. Each unit has an en-suite bathroom, some of which come with a bath. A breakfast buffet is offered every morning and guests can enjoy a drink and little snacks at the bar of Hotel Montpelier. The property has a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, a ski storage room and a garden. Guests can rent bicycles and skis on site. A bus stop is 20 metres away.

name: Hotel Piz Buin Klosters
description: Located next to the Gotschna Cable Car in the centre of Klosters, Hotel Piz Buin features a spa area and offers free WiFi access. A free shuttle service from Klosters Train Station is available. A balcony, cable TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer are featured in each of the Alpine-style rooms of the Piz Buin Hotel. Spa facilities include a swimming pool, a hot tub, 2 saunas, a steam bath, a massage shower, a foot bath, 2 treatment rooms, and a fitness area with Technogym equipment. The Bär's Bistro serves a wide range of food, drinks and coffee. A lockable ski and mountain bike storage room is provided.

name: Hotel Kreuz & Post
description: The suisse tradition Hotel Kreuz & Post Grindelwald enjoys a central location, 15 metres from the Grindelwald Train Station, close to many shops. It offers several restaurant, free WiFi, a wellness area with rooftop terrace and panoramic views of the Alps. All rooms offer panoramic mountain views and come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a radio and a telephone. Slippers and bathrobes are provided as well. In the various restaurants and in the panorama dining room you can enjoy traditional as well as modern cuisine. The Rooftop Wellness features a finish sauna, a salt sauna, low-temperature infrared cabin, a steam bath, a relaxation area with cocoon relax loungers and a foot bath experience, free of use for guests. Children can have fun in the playroom and there is also a library and a bright meeting room.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Davos
description: Hard Rock Hotel Davos enjoys a quiet yet central location, just 100 metres from the Schatzalpbahn Cable Car, 400 metres from the Vaillant Arena ice hockey stadium and a 10-minute walk from Davos-Platz Train Station and the Jakobshorn Cable Car. It offers stylish accommodation with free WiFi, a bar and a restaurant. There is a 1000 m² spa featuring a pool, steam room, kneipp basin and a sauna. There is also a fitness centre. The restaurant, the lobby and the bar are inviting places to spend relaxing hours after a day out in the mountains. Private parking is available on site as well for a fee, subject to availability.

name: Hotel Rosatsch
description: The family-run Hotel Rosatsch is located in the centre of Pontresina in the Engadine Valley, just 100 metres from the Alp Languard Chair Lift, and offers you a modern spa area, stylish rooms and discounted ski passes. Spread over the 4-star residence (deluxe rooms and junior suites) and the 3-star main building (single and double rooms), all rooms are decorated with modern and traditional objects. The spa area includes an indoor pool, a steam bath, a Lakonium and a fitness studio. Massages, body wraps and various beauty treatments are available as well. Additional facilities at the Rosatsch hotel include a well-equipped playroom for children. Hotel Rosatsch features 2 dining rooms where a rich breakfast is served each morning and the dinner for half-board guests in the evening. You can also enjoy a nightcap in one of the hotel bars with fireplace. A range of wines and selected teas are offered there. Upon request, Hotel Rosatsch offers free shuttle services from the train stations of Pontresina, Samedan and St. Moritz.

name: Hotel Bernina 1865
description: Located in the heart of the Samedan, Hotel Bernina 1865 is only 200 meters away from the main train station and 6 km from St. Moritz. Guests benefit from free WiFi, free parking, and a shuttle to the Celerina ski lifts. All rooms are decorated in traditional Engadin furnishings and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe, and a large bathroom with spa bath or rain shower. Some also have a spa bath or a rain shower. A rich breakfast buffet is served every day in the Imperial Hall which offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and ski slopes. It also offers a traditional Italian pizza in Pizzeria Bernina. You can also enjoy dinner in the restaurant. Engadin Airport is only 2 km from the Hotel Bernina 1865.

name: Hotel dala
description: Situated close to the thermal springs in Leukerbad, Hotel dala offers you a bio-sauna, a steam bath, an electric massage bed and fitness facilities. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. All rooms have a balcony with mountain views where guests can enjoy the morning or the afternoon sun. A hairdresser, an internet corner and self-service laundry can be found on site. The Leukerbad Card Plus is included for guests of Hotel dala. The card offers free use of local buses and discounted use of the cable cars and thermal baths. Free access to the Sportarena is granted, with facilities for tennis, squash, badminton and other sports. Hotel guests also receive a 50% discount to the Gemmi Cable Car. The city of Interlaken is reachable within a 3-hour drive. Parking spaces are only 100 metres away.

name: Valsana Hotel Arosa
description: The 4-star Superior Valsana Hotel Arosa enjoys a quiet location in the heart of Arosa at 1800 metres altitude and offers panoramic views of the Obersee lake and the mountains. It offers numerous sports and wellness facilities and free Wi-Fi. The three buildings are constructed to the highest environmental and energy standards and are characterised by state-of-the-art architecture in wood and stone. You can ski right down to the front door of the Valsana Hotel Arosa. The lifts are easily reachable by the local bus. You can also find arcades with a supermarket, sports shop and doctors’ surgeries on the ground floor. On the sun terrace above the arcades, you can enjoy the view of the surrounding mountain landscape from the restaurant with its terrace or from the spacious wellness and spa facilities.

name: Sasso Boretto Luxury Holiday Apartments
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as an oven and a stovetop. Other amenities include premium bedding, down comforters, a freezer, and towels.Expedia

name: Firefly Luxury Suites
description: The 4-star Firefly Luxury Suites at the foot of the Matterhorn in Zermatt is only a 3-minute walk away from the Klein Matterhorn cable car and a short walk from the village centre. The hotel offers modern, spacious suites and an indoor pool and spa area. Most suites feature a balcony and the larger ones an open fireplace. An à la carte breakfast is served to you in the suite at your desired time. A transfer from Zermatt's train station or parking areas is offered.Cost may apply

name: Boutique Hotel Bellevue
description: The Boutique Hotel Bellevue on the river Aare is situated near the Interlaken-West train station in the centre of the city, but enjoys a quiet location near the water. All rooms have balconies and a wonderful view of the river and the surrounding mountains. Various restaurants and shops, as well as a jewelry and watches store can be found in the immediate vicinity of Boutique Hotel Bellevue.

name: Waldhotel Fletschhorn Saas-Fee
description: Situated in Saas-Fee and with Allalin Glacier reachable within 16 km, Waldhotel Fletschhorn Saas-Fee features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a mountain view. Waldhotel Fletschhorn Saas-Fee offers some rooms that have a patio, and every room includes a coffee machine. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a vegetarian breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden. Guests at Waldhotel Fletschhorn Saas-Fee will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saas-Fee, like skiing, horse riding and cycling. Saas-Fee is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Hannigalp is 35 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milan Malpensa Airport, 161 km from Waldhotel Fletschhorn Saas-Fee.

name: W Verbier
description: Perched in the Swiss Alps at 1,531 meters with direct access to over 400 km of skiing and hiking terrain, W Verbier Retreat mixes urban design with an alpine touch. The 123 rooms and suites, each with fireplace, Signature W bed and private balcony are perfect for an intimate escape after an exhilarating day outside. Our luxury ski hotel offers a wide range of culinary options, including the bistronomic Bô!, the Eat-Hola Tapas Bar and the best mixology at W Living Room. Guests unwind in 1,300 sqm. of Alpine oasis at Away® Spa featuring two pools, 9 treatment rooms, 24/7 FIT gym and facilities. We offer 300 square meters of flexible event space. If you’re looking for more exclusivity, find our luxury residences, featuring 2 to 3 bedrooms, private kitchen, balconies and lounge spaces. The highlight is the easy access to all privileges and facilities of the Hotel right next door. From the W Mountain Concierge to the renowned and exclusive Whatever/Whenever service, W Verbier team is there to make it happen.Marriott

name: My Home Hotel
description: Situated in Winterthur, 19 km from Zurich Exhibition Hall, My Home Hotel - Free Parking features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a mountain view. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At My Home Hotel - Free Parking rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at My Home Hotel - Free Parking will be able to enjoy activities in and around Winterthur, like hiking. Zoo Zurich is 21 km from the hotel, while ETH Zurich is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Zurich Airport, 23 km from My Home Hotel - Free Parking.

name: The Cambrian
description: Offering panoramic views of the Swiss Alps, the Cambrian is located in the centre of Adelboden. It features a 700 m² spa area and a heated outdoor pool overlooking the mountains. The spacious, elegantly furnished rooms offer free Wi-Fi. They feature a flat-screen TV. Spa facilities at The Cambrian include an indoor pool, 2 saunas, a hot tub, and a modern gym. Guests can enjoy unique views of mountains and waterfalls from the sun terrace and the lounge, which features a fireplace and a billiard table. The Bryn Williams at the Cambrian Restaurant offers various dishes including fresh fish, meat and fresh vegetables. Guests can relax in the well stocked Axe Bar. Depending on availability you can use the hotel's underground car park or the parking lot. Bicycles are offered at an additional charge to explore the surroundings. A shuttle service takes guests to the ski slopes, also at an additional charge.

name: Pension Haus Sanz
description: Pension Haus Sanz is located in a green residential area easily reachable from the A2 and A23 motorways. The Vienna State Opera is reachable by tram in 25 minutes. Parking is possible for extra charge on the street. All rooms are soundproofed and have a private bathroom, satellite TV and offer views of the garden. Some rooms are styled according to specific themes like the Alps or Hundertwasser. Free wired internet is available in the public areas of the guest house. A buffet breakfast is offered in the breakfast room featuring a little waterfall. During the warmer months you can spend some relaxing time on the garden terrace of the Haus Sanz. A fitness centre can be reached on foot within 5 minutes. The City & Country Golf Club am Wienerberg is a 5-minute drive away. Within a 3-minute walk you can reach the Badner Bahn tram stop and in 7 minutes the Erlaaer Straße stop of the U6 metro line.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Vienna, located in four historic 19th-century palaces combines legendary service with Austrian hospitality. The 200 luxurious guest rooms and suites are generously proportioned and stylishly furnished. The Ritz-Carlton Club Lounge on the 7th floor pampers its guests with personalized service as well as five culinary offers per day. The Ritz-Carlton Spa has elegantly appointed treatment suites, an 18m indoor pool and a range of amenities that invite our guests to unique spa experiences. Unique culinary delights await guests at the farm-to-table Dstrikt Steakhouse, during aperitivo time at Pastamara - Bar con Cucina and the elegant hotel bar D-bar. Located on the 8th floor rooftop terrace, the Atmosphere Rooftop Bar offers a breathtaking view over the city. Located in the heart of the city and only a short walk from the city park, the luxury hotel is the perfect starting point to discover Vienna.Marriott

name: das Reinisch business hotel
description: Set in Schwechat, 13 km from Ernst Happel Stadium, Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a bar, the property is located within 14 km of Kunst Haus Wien - Museum Hundertwasser. The hotel has a sauna, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Austrian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Belvedere Palace is 15 km from Das Reinisch Hotel & Restaurant, while Vienna Prater is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vienna International, 4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Heinhotel Vienna Airport
description: Only a 5-minute drive from Vienna Airport, HEINhotel vienna airport offers free parking and free WiFi on the outskirts of Vienna, near the A4 motorway. The spacious rooms were redesigned in 2020 and are non-smoking and feature air conditioning. The hotel also has a bar, a sauna, and a fitness room. An air-conditioned meeting room is available as well. In good weather the rich breakfast buffet is also served on the terrace. HEINhotel vienna airport features its own 5.5-km jogging trail through the adjacent Donauauen National Park. The trade fair grounds (Messe Wien) are a 10-minute drive away from HEINhotel vienna airport. The city centre can be reached in 15 minutes. On request, an airport shuttle to the airport is offered at a surcharge.

name: Arion Cityhotel Vienna
description: Arion Cityhotel Vienna und Appartements is located directly at the Wienerberg recreation area, in the green southern outskirts of Vienna. A bus stop (line 360) is 100 metres away, offering connections to the city centre within 20 minutes. Since April 2017, high-speed fibreglass WiFi is available. The stylish rooms provide a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a bathroom with a bath. The apartments additionally come with a kitchenette. A restaurant, where guests can dine from 16:00 on, is a further feature of the hotel. The Arion Cityhotel is only a short drive from the A2 and A23 motorways. Sights like the Vienna Opera House can therefore be easily reached. Paid public parking is possible in the surroundings, while a parking garage is available for a surcharge and can be booked at the reception.

name: Gasthof Schorn
description: This family-run inn is located at the foot of the scenic Untersberg mountain, 8 km south of the city centre of Salzburg in the idyllic town of Sankt Leonhard. Gasthof Schorn offers traditionally furnished rooms with balcony, free WiFi access in the entire building, and free parking.The restaurant serves the region’s traditional cuisine and half-board with breakfast and a 3-course dinner is available. Salzburg can be reached by public bus from Gasthof Schorn in a short time. The Salzburg-Süd exit (A10 motorway) is close by. Gasthof Schorn is a convenient starting point for excursions to Berchtesgaden, the Königssee lake, the Werfen Ice Caves, and many other attractions.

name: Hotel Salzburg
description: This 4-star hotel is located between Salzburg Airport and the A1 motorway, on the western outskirts of Salzburg. It offers free WiFi in all areas and free private parking. Hotel Salzburg has a sauna with access to a terrace offering panoramic mountain views. The Italian restaurant Girasole serves light Mediterranean cuisine. The lobby features a free internet terminal and a reception providing ticket service and a tour desk. The Europark Shopping Centre is 1 km away and can be reached by car or bus. The Cineplexx Entertainment Centre is a 5-minute walk away, and an outlet shopping centre is directly opposite. A public bus is available to the city centre and the airport. Hotel Salzburg is a 5-minute drive from Salzburg Stadium and Klessheim Palace, which features a golf course and a casino. The casino can be reached with a free shuttle service. A golf shop with an indoor test centre is next door to the hotel.

name: Hotel Garni Römerhof
description: Only 8 km away from Innsbruck and combining modern facilities with a traditional style, the Hotel Römerhof enjoys a quiet location between woods and meadows, 80 metres from the Patscherkofel Cable Car and 2 km from the centre of Igls. Free WiFi and free private parking are available. The Römerhof offers bright and spacious rooms featuring a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Most of the rooms boast a balcony with mountain views. The apartments additionally come with a well-equipped kitchen. Bathrobes are available in all room categories for a surcharge. A rich and healthy buffet breakfast based on local ingredients is available every morning. The spa area offers a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a relaxation area. A riding stable, a golf course and a bob and toboggan track can be found in the immediate vicinity. A bus stop offering direct connections to Lans, Igls and Innsbruck is in front of the hotel.

name: Das Grüne Haus - Boutique Apartments ecofriendly
description: No description found

name: Blackhome Innsbruck City South I contactless check-in
description: Located 1.4 km from Innsbruck Central Station, Blackhome Innsbruck City South I contactless check-in offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Guests at Blackhome Innsbruck City South I contactless check-in can enjoy skiing and cycling nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. State Museum of Tyrol - Ferdinandeum is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Imperial Palace Innsbruck is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Innsbruck Airport, 4 km from Blackhome Innsbruck City South I contactless check-in.

name: Sporthotel Igls
description: Dating from 1889, this elegant chalet-style hotel in Igls, 1 km from the new Patscherkofel Cable Car and 5 km from Innsbruck, offers panoramic views over Innsbruck and the mountains, a private golf course, and a large spa area with an indoor pool. The individually designed rooms and suites at Sporthotel IGLS are furnished in an elegant Alpine style and offer panoramic mountain views. They feature a minibar, a seating area, satellite TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. A set menu of classic Austrian cuisine and Tyrolean specialties made from seasonal products from nearby organic farms are served in the restaurant. The Sporthotel also features a light-flooded winter garden and a rustically designed lobby with a bar and an open fireplace. The 500 m² spa features a spa lounge, Finnish sauna, Kneipp shower, relaxation areas, and fitness centre. The indoor pool provides direct garden access. In summer, guests can rent bicycles and benefit from 6 free guided hiking tours per week, organised in cooperation with the famous Alpine School of Innsbruck. Tennis courts are only a 5-minute walk away, and 2 other golf courses are also nearby.

name: Hotel Sandwirth
description: This traditional 4-star hotel in a neo-classical building in the centre of Klagenfurt is only 200 metres from the pedestrian zone and the Lindwurm Statue. Access to the relaxation zone with a sauna and gym equipment is free. The modern rooms at Hotel Sandwirth feature a classic design, air conditioning, a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV with Sky TV channels. WiFi is available in all areas for free. Café Sandwirth serves snacks and lunch dishes, homemade pastries, and a large selection of drinks. It features a library, a cafe lounge, and outdoor seating from spring to autumn. A rich breakfast buffet with regional, homemade products is served every morning. In summer, it can be enjoyed on the roof terrace. Guests benefit from a free internet terminal in the lobby. Massages are available on request. A public car park is 100 metres from the property. Lake Wörthersee is 4.2 km away.

name: Das Kaltschmid - Familotel Tirol
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Seefeld, DAS Kaltschmid features 2 gourmet restaurants and a large spa area. The indoor pool offers panoramic mountain views. DAS Kaltschmid offers free private parking. Spa facilities include saunas, a steam bath, and a hot tub. There is also a modern gym.
