Table tennis and billiards can be played at DAS Kaltschmid Since December 2017, The Happy Club kid's club includes extra benefits for children: breakfast, lunch at the Happy Club, cake/ice cream in restaurant "Am Kurpark", dinner and soft drinks, Child care 6 days a week at least 50 hours and Happy performances 6 times a week, Happy SPA with baby pool and children's pool with water slide, There are live music and dance evenings.

name: Hotel Norica Therme
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Bad Hofgastein, the 4-star superior Hotel Norica is directly connected to the Alpentherme Thermal Spa and offers free and unlimited access to it. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Norica Hotel feature an HD flat-screen cable TV, a seating area, a safe, and a bathroom with a hairdryer, make-up mirror, and free toiletries. Bathrobes and bathing towels are provided free of charge for use in the spa. Typical Salzburg dishes and international cuisine are served in Hotel Norica’s restaurant and the Blue Salon offers homemade Austrian pastries and coffee specialities. Beverages are available throughout the day at the bar or in the lounge that boasts a fireplace. Guests can attend a wine tasting in the wine cellar once a week. The in-house 1,500 m² Celtic Spa comprises an indoor pool with massage jets, different saunas, an infrared cabin, a sole steam cabin, showers with ice crushers, radon bath tubs, and relaxation areas. Special Celtic treatments are also offered. For the length of the stay, guests are also provided free and unlimited entrance to the Alpentherme Thermal Spa. An air-conditioned congress room with technical equipment can be used free of charge. Guests can use a ski storage with ski boot dryer. A free ski bus stops right next to the hotel.

name: Inntaler Hof
description: A short distance from skiing, cycling, and more, this family-friendly vacation home lets you experience it all. There's convenient covered onsite parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and head out to Seefeld Ski Area and Peace Bell in the Alpes, just a short walk away. Relax by the communal pool or sip a drink in the garden of this 753-sq-ft vacation home, which also features a porch or lanai and a fitness center. For a change of scenery, come inside and try your hand at table tennis, or enjoy the Internet, cable/satellite TV, and stereo. As you settle into this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a BBQ grill and a fireplace. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer and towels. The kitchen is stocked with a refrigerator. And you can even travel light because you'll have a dryer.VRBO

name: Hotel Pension Heike
description: Set in Aurach bei Kitzbühel, Hotel-Pension Heike is surrounded by a garden which includes a stream and a barbecue. It offer typical Alpine accommodation and free Wi-Fi. Free ski bus to Kitzbühler Alpen Ski Area stops only 100 metres away. Heike’s rooms are decorated in rustic Tyrolean style. They offer modern amenities such as a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a CD player. The cosy wood-panelled interiors include a bar and breakfast room with a traditional ceramic stove, where a breakfast consisting of local meats and cheeses is served daily. Guest can opt for a half-board option and dine in a partner hotel which is only a few steps away. The ski slopes can be reached within a 4-minute bus ride or in 3 minutes by car. The centre of Kitzbühel with its bustling restaurant and shopping scene is only 5 km away. The centre of Aurach can be reached within a 15-minute walk. Kitzbühel Golf Course is 2 km away. Lake Schwarz can be reached within 5 km. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Hotel Good Rooms Bad Ischl
description: Good Rooms GmbH Bad Ischl is set in Bad Ischl, 1.2 km from Kaiservilla. Katrinseilbahn is 1.1 km from the property. There is 1 free private parking space provided for each unit. All apartments offer a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, fridge, stove and oven. All apartments include a satellite TV, a seating area and/or balcony. Good Rooms GmbH Bad Ischl features free WiFi throughout the property. The area is popular for skiing and golfing. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling, fishing and canoeing. The nearest airport is Salzburg W. A. Mozart Airport, 47 km from Good Rooms GmbH Bad Ischl.

name: Hotel Feichtinger Graz
description: Hotel Feichtinger is located in the centre of Graz, only a 5-minute walk away from Graz Art Museum and the historic old town. WiFi access is available free of charge. The air-conditioned, spacious and sound-proofed rooms feature flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with shower and hairdryer. A rich breakfast buffet is served daily until 11:00, and Hotel Feichtinger also has a bar. Several restaurants and trendy shops are in the immediate vicinity. Lendplatz Square with its well-known farmer's market is right next to the hotel. All rooms on the second and third floor were renovated in 2020 and 2021 and furnished in a modern style.

name: Cella Central Historic Boutique Hotel
description: Located in the Old Town of Zell am See, just 300 metres from Lake Zell, the Cella Central Historic Boutique Hotel is a combination of vacation, enjoyment, party & cool events and features free WiFi and free access to spa facilities. The spa area includes a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, a Turkish steam bath, a hot tub, a rain forest shower, and relaxation benches. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked for a surcharge.Guests are also welcome to use the spa area at the neighbouring Sporthotel Alpenblick. All rooms and apartments are equipped with a seating area, flat-screen TV, small refrigerator, espresso machine and slippers (on request). Apartments vary in size and feature a living room, a kitchen and a dining table. The apartments are located in the building next to the hotel. The cityXpress cable car leading into the Schmittenhöhe Ski Area can be reached in a 3-minute walk. The train station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Neue Post
description: Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.

name: Das Elisabeth
address: Alte Arlbergstraße 48, 6580 Sankt Anton am Arlberg, Tirol
description: Set 350 metres from the centre of Sankt Anton, and the Rendlbahn and Galzigbahn cable cars, Pension Elisabeth offers free Wi-Fi and units with mountain-view balconies. A free ski bus stops directly outside. Rooms also contain a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Private bathrooms come with a shower and hairdryer. Freshly baked bread rolls are available on request for those staying in the apartment. Buffet breakfast is available and it is a 2-minute walk to the nearest restaurant. Grocery stores are in the town centre. Pension Elisabeth is 500 metres from Arl.rock and Arlberg-well.com, offering a variety of indoor sports and wellness facilities. It is possible to deposit your ski equipment for free at the Rendlbahn Cable Car. Free private parking is provided on site. The owners can advise guests on some interesting motorbike routes. The property also has lockable motorbike and bicycle storing, washing and basic repairing facilities. From early June to September, the St. Anton Summer Card is included in the rate. This card offers many free benefits and discounts, including free use of local cable cars for 1 day and buses.

name: Hotel Alpenpanorama
description: Hotel Alpenpanorama is settled amidst the Tyrolean nature in Söll, next to a forest and 2 km from the SkiWelt Wilder Kaiser - Brixental ski area. The location allows for panoramic views over the village, the surrounding mountains Pölven, Hohe Salve and Wilder Kaiser, and the valley inbetween. Free WiFi and complimentary on-site parking facilities are provided. All rooms are fitted with a balcony and a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms are equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning, and the hotel restaurant serves regional as well as vegetarian specialities in the evenings. The spa and wellness centre can be used free of charge, and comes with several saunas, a steam bath and a fitness room. Massages and treatments can be booked at an additional cost. Guests are also welcome to relax at the bar, in the garden or on the terrace. Hotel Alpenpanorama offers easy access to many skiing facilities and hiking trails.

name: Hotel Grüner Baum
description: Only a few minutes’ walk away from the lakeshore and the cable cars, this family-run hotel is centrally located in the pedestrian zone of Zell am See. Hotel Grüner Baum offers rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi access, that are scattered around the hotel grounds. Most rooms have a balcony with views of the Schmittenhöhe. There is a free internet terminal in the lounge. The property also features an underground car park and a parking lot available for extra charges. The spa area features 2 saunas and a relaxation room. It can be used free of charge, while bathrobes are provided at an additional cost. Classic Austrian cuisine and specialities from the in-house butcher shop await you at Hotel Grüner Baum’s à la carte restaurant. In summer you can also dine in the beer garden. A half board can be arranged. Greens Pub and the Greens XL cocktail bar offer cool music and trendy drinks. A fitness centre is 300 metres away, and a sun bed 100 metres. Massages can be booked at a nearby hotel. Guests of Hotel Grüner Baum receive a 30% green fee reduction at the Zell am See-Kaprun golf course (36 holes). Ski passes are available directly at the hotel, and ski equipment can be hired next door.

name: Kitzhof Mountain Design Resort 4 Sterne Superior
description: Surrounded by a picturesque mountain scenery, Hotel Kitzhof Mountain Design Resort is located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Kitzbühel. This 4-star design hotel features a 600 m² spa area with an indoor pool, a Finnish sauna, a steam bath and a solarium. Each room combines modern and traditional elements, like wooden material and natural light and includes a flat-screen TV. Free amenities include Wi-Fi and the use of the minibar in all rooms. Hotel Kitzhof’s spa area offers various beauty and body treatments. A fitness room featuring waterfall views is also available. Guests can enjoy local and international cuisine in the uniquely decorated restaurants. Tyrolean delicacies and healthy meals are also offered. In nice weather, meals are served on the terrace, next to a waterfall and a pond with views of Kitzbüheler Horn. Breakfast includes champagne and a wide range of regional products. The famous Hahnenkamm with the Streif downhill run is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Elements Resort Zell am See, BW Signature Collection
description: Mountain, Lake & Glacier await you at Elements Resort, located at the base of the mountain between the glacier and the lake. The beautiful sunny location, fresh air and a wide panoramic view of the Kitzsteinhorn are a permanent respite for the soul. This wonderful location is certainly the best starting point for great holiday moments. Whether climber, cyclist or golfer, the Zell am See - Kaprun region offers the right adventure for all active adventurers. Due to the ideal location of the Elements Resort Zell am See you are able to spend the whole holiday without your car. You can reach almost everything by foot from your Alpine Design apartment, whether lift station, supermarket, restaurant or train stop, everything is within walking distance. The Areit Xpress is only 850m away and is the ideal starting point to the fascinating hiking and skiing area Schmittenhöhe. The Zell am See - Kaprun golf course and the Tauern Spa Kaprun are also just a few minutes away by car. In the alpine design hotel, every little detail has been matched to perfectly combine luxury with comfort. Many of the 56 hotel rooms, apartments and penthouses are equipped with terrace and private sauna. After your skiing, hiking and active adventures, recharge your batteries in the wellness area of the Elements Resort. The in-house wellness area is equipped with a year-round heated outdoor pool, sauna, infrared cabin and relaxation room. If you have any energies left at the end of the day, we recommend going to the modern equipped fitness center. The house also has a ski storage room, where you can store your ski equipment in heated and lockable ski boxes. The aparthotel offers everything for an unforgettable holiday. The in-house Restaurant Elements spoils its guests with culinary specialties and combines Pinzgau's traditional cuisine with contemporary innovations. In this sense, the hotel combines skilfully cosiness with urban lounge flair. The hip resort is guaranteed not to leave much to be desired.bestwestern.com

name: Alpenparks Chalet & Apartment Alpina Seefeld
description: Located in Seefeld in Tirol in the Tyrol region, AlpenParks Chalet & Apartment Alpina Seefeld provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at AlpenParks Chalet & Apartment Alpina Seefeld can enjoy a vegetarian breakfast. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities and a steam room. If you would like to discover the area, skiing, cycling and hiking are possible in the surroundings. Golfpark Mieminger Plateau is 21 km from AlpenParks Chalet & Apartment Alpina Seefeld, while Golden Roof is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Innsbruck, 18 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Active by Leitner's
description: Active by Leitner’s offers spacious rooms with mountain views and a large spa area with a heated outdoor pool. Free WiFi and parking are available free of charge. Spa facilities include a steam bath, sauna, herbal sauna, sun bed, infrared cabin, and a fitness room. Active by Leitner’s also offers sports activities with private coaches. The rooms have flat-screen cable TV, glass fronts and big balconies or terraces. Dinner is served in the Winklhof restaurant, which is located in a renovated, 600-year-old farmhouse a few steps from the hotel. The centre of Kaprun is only a few minutes‘ walk away from Active by Leitner’s. Hiking and cycling trails start in front of the hotel, and the ski bus stop is only a 2-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Sieglhub
description: No description found

name: Sofitel Legend The Grand Amsterdam
address: Oudezijds Voorburgwal 197, 1012 EX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located between two historical canals in the heart of the city, The Grand boasts a rich history; from a 15th-century convent to royal lodgings, to the headquarters of the Admiralty to the City Hall of Amsterdam. The hotel offers five-star luxury in a unique ambiance, furnished with French elegance and grandeur. The spacious accommodations, the exceptional food and beverage proposition, the historic meeting/event venues and the indulgent Sofitel SPA captivate and seduce everyone into visiting this hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Amsterdam Airport
description: Find rest and productivity at Courtyard Amsterdam Airport. Conveniently located in Hoofddorp just minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, our hotel offers excellent amenities and comfortable accommodation for business and leisure travellers alike. Arrive at our AMS hotel with ease, thanks to our shuttle service to and from the Schiphol Airport. Our on-site restaurant, Brasserie Courtyard, serves hot breakfast options, craft cocktails and an all-day dining menu. Business travellers in Amsterdam love our hotel's event facilities, featuring 10 flexible function rooms, as well as unbeatable access to other business and corporate centres in Hoofddorp, AMS. At the end of a productive day, settle into one of our sleek hotel rooms or suites, boasting plush bedding, ample natural light, modern décor and premium entertainment options, including flat-screen TVs with Chromecast. Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, Courtyard Amsterdam Airport offers all you need to maximize your stay.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Express Amsterdam - Arena Towers
description: Holiday Inn Express Amsterdam Arena Towers is located in the bustling Amsterdam Southeast. Go bird watching at the Ouderkerkerplas or go to the Gaasperplas Park, a recreation and nature area on the Floriade terrain from 1982. In this park, you will find a water playground and various barbecue areas. The park is also ideal for walking, cycling, horse riding, water sports, and kite flying. Reach the bustling centre of Amsterdam within 15 minutes by metro. Take a cruise through the historic canals, visit the Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds, spot animals in Artis or visit the very first WONDR Experience Museum in the Netherlands. The modern hotel rooms are fully equipped for a pleasant stay. Think of television with various international channels and free coffee and tea-making facilities. Depending on your choice, your room has a double bed or two single beds and has a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and toiletries. In our Great Room, there is an Express Start Continental take-away breakfast box available daily, which is included in the room price for all our guests. A Starbucks To-Go Coffee bar is located on the ground floor. Maintain a sports routine? Our gym is open 24/7. If you come to the hotel by car, you can use the parking lot at the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Bed & Breakfast Jo Amsterdam
address: Burgemeester de Kievietstraat 63, 1111 GL Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Boasting inner courtyard views, Bed & Breakfast Jo Amsterdam features accommodation with a balcony and a coffee machine, around 4.8 km from Johan Cruijff Arena. It has a terrace, garden views and free WiFithroughout the property. A flat-screen TV with streaming services and a Blu-ray player are available. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Artis Zoo is 5.5 km from the bed and breakfast, while Royal Theater Carré is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol, 18 km from Bed & Breakfast Jo Amsterdam, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Private Studio - Free Parking
description: Set in Amsterdam, 3.9 km from A'DAM Lookout, Private Studio - FREE PARKING offers spacious accommodation and free WiFi. It is situated 6 km from Rembrandt House and Van Gogh museum. The bed and breakfast is accomodated with a dishwasher and a fridge, a living and dining area, 1 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A flat-screen TV with streaming is offered. Nearby is a bicycle rental service, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Dutch National Opera & Ballet is 6 km from the accommodation, while Artis Zoo is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 23 km from Private Studio - FREE PARKING.

name: 010 Studio City Center Rotterdam
address: 13 Maria van Reigersberchstraat, 3031 XL Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland
description: Featuring quiet street views, 010 Studio City Center Rotterdam is situated in the Kralingen-Crooswijk district of Rotterdam, 3.9 km from Erasmus University and 4.9 km from Plaswijckpark. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and slippers, while the kitchen has a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. A stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A a children's playground is also available for guests at the aparthotel. Diergaarde Blijdorp is 5.1 km from 010 Studio City Center Rotterdam, while Ahoy Rotterdam is 7.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rotterdam The Hague Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Chalet aan de Rotte
description: Featuring garden views, Chalet aan de Rotte features accommodation with a patio and a coffee machine, around 4.9 km from Plaswijckpark. It offers free WiFi, a garden and a restaurant. The chalet with a terrace and river views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the chalet. The chalet offers an outdoor fireplace. A bicycle rental service is available at Chalet aan de Rotte, while cycling and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby. BCN Rotterdam is 5.6 km from the accommodation, while Diergaarde Blijdorp is 7.2 km away. The nearest airport is Rotterdam The Hague Airport, 7 km from Chalet aan de Rotte.

name: Mabi City Centre
description: Hotel Mabi City Centre Hotel is situated in the historical part of the city, in a building where the Cinema Maastricht offered its services. The hotel offers a bar, cinema, free Wi-Fi and 24 hour reception. The design of the rooms draws inspirations from Art Deco style. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, luxury bedding and modern bathrooms. The hotel is located on a courtyard in the center of Maastricht. A continental breakfast buffet is available every morning in the breakfast area, Little Cannes and meals are served throughout the day at hotel's restaurant. In the afternoon, guests can enjoy a free glass of wine at Bar Twisted. The Onze Lieve Vrouwe Square, known for its cafés and terraces, is just a 10-minute walk away. The Vrijthof is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Upon arrival, all guests receive a local discount card for discounts at various entrepreneurs in Maastricht.

name: Maison Haas Hustinx & Spa
description: No description found

name: NH Maastricht
description: The NH Maastricht hotel neighbors the Maastricht Exhibition and Congress Center. A modern style hotel, NH Maastricht is a 30 minute walk from Maastricht Randwyck train station and nearby city center. Focused on providing the perfect stay for our guests, there are several local attractions nearby including the Helpoort, an ancient city wall now turned into a museum, and the Onze-Lieve-Vrouwe Basilica, a historical Romanesque church. For culinary options, the restaurants near NH Maastricht offer everything from a café serving soup and salad, Friture - Restaurant Reitz, to modern European cuisine at Beluga. For guests who prefer to dine in, NH Maastricht provides an in-house restaurant. Seasons serves international cuisine in a welcoming atmosphere and offers vegetarian and children’s options. For breakfast, the perfect stay is enhanced by a breakfast buffet or cooked to order hot dishes. Within our selection of comfortable rooms there are flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, and tea or coffee makers. Larger rooms are available and include sitting areas, minibars or offices and dining areas. NH Maastricht hotel has 9 meeting rooms and a beauty salon, gym, sauna, steam bath and spa are but a few of the extra features we provide for a unique and memorable experience.NH Hoteles

name: Derlon Hotel Maastricht
address: Onze Lieve Vrouweplein 6, 6211 HD Maastricht, Limburg
description: Derlon Hotel Maastricht is situated in the heart of the historic centre of Maastricht and offers free WiFi. Since 1870 on the Onze Lieve Vrouweplein, only a 5-minute walk from the Vrijthof and the Stokstraat can be reached within a 1-minute walk and offers a variety of exclusive shops. The hotel combines historic features with modern design and each of the air-conditioned, non-smoking rooms at Derlon Hotel Maastricht includes a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso coffee machine. Guests can enjoy an extensive buffet breakfast in the cellar, next to real Roman excavations. In addition, the accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk. Restaurant Derlon serves classic and contemporary dishes in a modern way with the use of fresh, local and organic products. There is also a champagne lounge and a terrace where guests can enjoy fine wines per glass. Maastricht Central Railway Station is less than a 15-minute walk from Hotel Derlon. Congress centre MECC is 3 km away by car.

name: Dormio Resort Maastricht
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Dormio Resort Maastricht offers accommodation in Maastricht. Guests can enjoy a meal in the restaurant or a drink at the bar. This city resort is located next to golf club International Golf Maastricht. Free private parking is available on site. All houses offered here, have a flat-screen TV and a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of coffee from your terrace or patio. Every house is fitted with a private bathroom. The Luxury houses feature a whirlpool and a sauna. Free swimming facilities are offered at the on-site swimming pool and gym facilities are available for guests. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including golfing and hiking. Vrijthof is only 4 km from Dormio Resort Maastricht, while Maastricht University is 3 km from the property. Maastricht Airport is 11 km away.

name: B&B Le Reve Maastricht
description: Set in Maastricht in the Limburg Region, 5 km from Vrijthof, B&B Le Rêve Maastricht boasts a terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a shared lounge at the property. Served daily, guests can enjoy communal breakfast at a shared breakfast table. A number of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling. Mecc Maastricht is 5 km from Le Rêve Maastricht, while Bonnefantenmuseum is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Maastricht Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje
description: Situated in Maastricht, Dormio Hotel Prins van Oranje offers an on-site michelin star restaurant with spectacular panoramic views. Guests can also enjoy a meal in the resorts restaurant, Proeflokaal Eten or a drink at the bar Proeflokaal Drinken. Free WiFi is featured. A swimming pool is available. Each room is fitted with a desk and a private bathroom. All guest rooms in Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje are offersh a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. The breakfast is served in the Proeflokaal. All guests can use the facilities of Dormio Resort Maastricht including free swimming facilities. The reception at Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje can provide tips on the area. The property is set 3.2 km from Basilica "Sint Servaas" at the famous Vrijthof square and 3.6 km from the "Onze-lieve-vrouwe" church and square. Maastricht University is 3.2 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Maastricht-Aachen Airport, 11 km from Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje.

name: Hotel Au Quartier
description: The 3-star Hotel Au Quartier is situated in an 18th-century building and is located right in the middle of the Jekerkwartier, in Maastricht's city centre. Onze Lieve Vrouwe Plein and Het Vrijthof are a 5-minute walk away. The bright rooms come with a cable TV. Each has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning in Salle a Manger. Restaurant Petit Bonheur opens onto the patio, and serves Italian and French specialities. The kitchen is open every day of the week for dinner. Lunch is only available for groups on request.

name: Private island: enjoy Burgundian Maastricht and the peace on the water
description: The Bootlodge is in a beautiful location in a natural environment. Unique and romantic, furnished for 2 people with private terrace. Your suite on the water. Suitable for a short or long vacation. Near the center of Maastricht. This space is suitable for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers. This BoatLodge is compact but very complete and wonderfully furnished for two. Located in a natural environment but close to the center of Maastricht. You have a comfortable bed 1.60 x 2.00, your own bathroom with toilet, shower and bathroom furniture, and a well-equipped kitchen. (o. a. Refrigerator, microwave / oven, kettle, 2 burner electric hob.) The living room has a sofa and dining area for two. The sliding door provides access to the outside terrace on the water. From the living room and from the terrace you have a spectacular view of the marina and the Pietersberg. That is enjoyment only with capital letter and the soft G!. (To make your experience extra special, you can optionally rent a leisure boat during the water sports season from 1 April to 1 November to make trips on the Pietersplas and the Maas. You can moor this on your own private terrace.)VRBO

name: H-House Architectural Residence
description: H-House Architectural Residence is located in Maastricht and offers self-catering accommodations with free WiFi access. Each villa overlooks the pool and garden. It will provide you with a living room and a TV. Guests can prepare their own meals in the well-equipped kitchen. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including golfing, cycling and horse riding. The property also offers an outdoor swimming pool. Vrijthof is 5.6 km away, while the train station Maastricht Randwyck is 1.1 km from the property. Maastricht Aachen Airport is 10.1 km away.

name: Sandton Eindhoven Centre
description: Located in the city centre of Eindhoven and only 150 metres from the Van Abbe Museum, Sandton Hotel offers a 24-hours fitness centre, free WiFi, a private parking garage and an on-site bicycle rental service. All of the rooms at Sandton Hotel Eindhoven City Centre have a work desk and a TV. The well-known Philips Music Centre is a 7-minute walk away from Sandton. You can reach the PSV Stadium in a 5-minute drive. Eindhoven Central Station is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a central minibar in the lobby and has a cosy lounge with a fireplace and a terrace.

name: Little Grand
description: Little Grand offers accommodation in the centre of Eindhoven, 600 metres from the train station. PSV - Philips Stadium is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. There is a seating and dining area in all units, as well as a flat-screen TV. Each suite comes with deluxe twin bedding. Extras include a laptop safe. The kitchen is fitted with a dishwasher, microwave and oven. Little Grand also includes a wellness and sauna. 24/7 butler service is offered. The property also offers special diet menus. Tongelreep National Swimming Centre is 2.7 km from Little Grand, while Holland Casino Eindhoven is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Eindhoven Airport, 6 km from Little Grand.

name: Hotel Lumen Zwolle
description: Hotel Lumen offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso machine. This hotel, situated on the stadium complex in Zwolle, benefits from a gym and elegant lounge. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Lumen features a spacious layout and includes a work desk and a minibar. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner at the Bluefinger Restaurant. The historic town centre is 2.8 km from Lumen Hotel. Zwolle Railway Station is 3.4 km from the hotel and Golfclub Zwolle is 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Grand Winston
description: The Best Western Plus Grand Winston combines unique contemporary style and architectural finesse in a modern design. The Hague and Delft are easily reached within the hotel's extensive transport links. Fine dining is provided with an internationally oriented menu and a reputation for superb food and quality service.bestwestern.com

name: Golden Tulip West Ende
description: This monumental former manufacturer's villa from 1880 is in the city centre, only 900 metres from Helmond Railway Station. Golden Tulip benefits from a cosy street terrace, free Wi-Fi and a restaurant. Each of the rooms at Golden Tulip Hotel West-Ende includes a flat-screen cable TV, air-conditioning and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms boast a bathroom with a spa bath. The centre of Eindhoven, featuring sights including the Philips Stadium, is a 15-minute car journey away. De Grote Peel National Park is 25 minutes away by car. Guests can rent a bicycle at the hotel. Brasserie Rubenshof serves elegant international cuisine prepared with seasonal ingredients. The dining room features grand décor with a large fireplace. Guests can also enjoy tapas at the hotel.

name: Auberge Du Bonheur
description: Nestled in the forest de Oude Warande on the edge of Tilburg, you will find the Auberge Du Bonheur. Enjoy the beautiful surroundings during a walk and benefit from free parking and free Wi-Fi. The hotel rooms are uniquely decorated and have a rustic atmosphere with warm colors and design. Each room features a flat-screen TV, box-spring beds and a private bathroom with a bath. Dressing gowns are provided for extra comfort. Breakfast is served each morning and has delicious choices to start your day well. Return to enjoy French cuisine in the well-known restaurant of Auberge Du Bonheur where dishes are prepared with local products. Taste fresh ingredients while enjoying beautiful views of the gardens. Auberge du Bonheur has a central location and is the ideal starting point for hiking or cycling trips. You can also visit the Efteling theme park in Kaatsheuvel. There are a few golf courses near the hotel as well. Free parking is also available. Electric vehicle charging station is available at the property.

name: Boutique Hotel The Roosevelt
description: Located in the centre of Middelburg, Boutique Hotel The Roosevelt offers various types of accommodation ranging from rooms to suites and apartments and free WiFi access is available. This hotel is in the possession of a Green Key Eco mark. Guests will find a bar, restaurant, garden, and spa facilities at this property. The served breakfast is always included in most room rate. Most rooms boast high ceilings and some rooms feature climate control. Featuring a rain shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The rooms will provide you with a seating area and a coffee machine. Extras include a desk and a laptop safe. At the hotelbar guests can enjoy cocktails, fine wines and bites. There is also a beautiful Courtyard where you can wine & dine and relax. Boutique Hotel The Roosevelt also serves breakfast. The à-la-carte restaurant 'The Lounge Wine & Dine' offers a variety of dishes from sea and land, along with a broad selection of high-quality wines. It also features a homarium with fresh lobster and oysters. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including golfing. The hotel is 200 metres from Zeeuws Museum and if you feel like visiting other cities in the province of Zeeland, you can visit Vlissingen (8 km away), Zoutelande (12 km away) and Domburg (14 km away). The train station can be found within 600 metres. Guests will find a bar, restaurant, garden, and spa facilities at this property. The served breakfast is included in the room rate for most room types.

name: Hotel Grand Canal
description: Hotel Grand Canal is quietly situated in the centre of Delft and yet 150 meters away from Delft’s Central Station, which offers many public transport facilities. All rooms have a homey setting and a view of the canals. You can enjoy an extensive breakfast in the breakfast room before exploring this historic city. This former canal house used to be the city’s prison and even earlier, the storage place for the V.O.C. At 50 metres from the hotel, there is a parking area. Hotel Grand Canal is situated close to the A4 and A13 to Amsterdam, Rotterdam and the Hague. Leiden is a 30 minute drive away.

name: NH Atlantic Den Haag
description: Set in the middle of the dunes, NH Atlantic Den Haag is located directly on the Kijkduin beach. Scheveningen, a lovely seaside town, and The Hague city center are only a 20-minute drive away. Conveniently, bus number 24 stops nearby and will take you to The Hague, where you can enjoy sights such as the Peace Palace, Madurodam miniature city and bustling squares. There is also a boulevard dotted with international restaurants along the ocean. NH Atlantic Den Haag offers a choice of 152 rooms with balconies. Most have large windows and some offer views of the ocean. The suites have themed designs, decorated in Asian, Mondrian and honeymoon styles. A fresh breakfast is served daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal with an ocean view at the Gusto Restaurant or head to Atlantic Beach right on the ocean. Some nights there is a live DJ, or unwind with a drink at the Sabor bar. For active travelers, NH Atlantic Den Haag offers bike rentals and a gym. There is also a heated indoor pool, solarium. An excellent choice for functions, there are 19 meetings rooms at the hotel. Free Wi-Fi and parking are available.NH Hoteles

name: Mercure Hotel Den Haag Central
description: Explore the beautiful city of The Hague and relax at the comfortable Mercure. The Mercure Hotel Den Haag Central is located in the vibrant heart of The Hague and is easily accessible by car and public transport, making it ideal for both business and leisure. The hotel offers a delicious daily breakfast buffet, a bar to unwind at and brasserie for an appetising lunch or dinner. All rooms are equipped with a comfortable bed, safe, flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The reception is at your service 24/7.accorhotels.com

name: Dormio Wijnhotel Valkenburg
address: Stationsstraat 21, 6301 EZ Valkenburg Aan De Geul, Limburg
description: The Dormio Wine Hotel Valkenburg is a high-profile hotel fully dedicated to the world of wine. Located within walking distance of the charming marlstone town of Valkenburg, with a view of the oldest railway station in the Netherlands. The rooms and suites all have a unique and special decoration. All rooms and suites are linked to a wine producer. This ensures that each room has its own wine theme and character, which is reflected in the interior of the room. Guests can enjoy a delicious breakfast or dinner in the wine restaurant. Small snacks and charcuterie are served in the wine bar. There is also a wine showroom with a selection of no less than 140 types of wine. The hotel has its own car park.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Nuland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Nuland - 's-Hertogenbosch is situated 10 minutes from the city of 's-Hertogenbosch, near the A59/A2 motorway. The hotel offers a restaurant and free parking. All spacious rooms come with a sitting area and TV. The rooms also have a private bathroom and hairdryer. The hotel offers a taxi service to the city centre of Den Bosch, at a surcharge. The surrounding neighbourhood is ideal for trips and walking or cycling tours.

name: Golden Tulip Zoetermeer - Den Haag
address: Kinderen Van Versteegplein 18, 2713 HB Zoetermeer, Zuid-Holland
description: Golden Tulip Zoetermeer - Den Haag is situated next to the A12 motorway and only a 5-minute walk from Zoetermeer Railway Station. It features a brasserie-style restaurant and bar with a garden terrace. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout. The modern rooms at Golden Tulip Zoetermeer - Den Haag feature warm décor and include satellite TV and tea and coffee making facilities. Golden Tulip is just over a 20-minute walk from the centre of Zoetermeer. Den Haag is 15 minutes away by car. The city of Delft, featuring Municipal Museum Het Prinsenhof, is 20 minutes’ drive away. The hotel offers car rental and packed lunch services for guests who wish to explore further afield. Some of the many activities available nearby include cycling, hiking and golf.

name: De Oolderhof
description: Beautifully situated on the edge of town, surrounded by water and fields, this luxury hotel offers exclusive suites and the perfect opportunity to relax. The practical layout of these spacious suites makes them highly suitable for longer holidays as well as weekend destinations. Enhanced by modern facilities, cosy sitting areas and a terrace or balcony, each suite has been furnished to meet your needs. A lift is also present. Creative dishes and hearty meals can be enjoyed in our restaurant next door, where a bar and convention rooms are also available to you. Situated between a bend in the Maas river and the centre of town, everything you need is a short stroll away.

name: Fletcher Hotel-Restaurant Arneville-Middelburg
description: Fletcher Hotel-Restaurant Arneville-Middelburg offers a wide range of facilities and is located 14 km from Domburg. Park your car for free and eat delicious meals in the Grand Café. All rooms have a private bathroom. The 2 junior suites provide extra space in which to work or relax. Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast buffet in the atmospheric restaurant Arneville on the ground floor. The hotel also offers party and conference rooms, a bar and its own catering service. The hotel's Restaurant Arneville serves an à la carte menu. The hotel is within walking distance of the town centre and the Middelburg railway station. Veere is 9 km away. There is plenty of parking space for your car.

name: Beachhouse Hotel
address: Boulevard Barnaart 59, 2041 JA Zandvoort, North Holland
description: Situated in Zandvoort, within walking distance to the beach, Hotel Beachhouse has a terrace. The property is close to Holland Casino Zandvoort. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and bike rental services. At the hotel, all rooms have a flat-screen TV. Hotel Beachhouse provides some rooms with sea views. Guest rooms at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Beachhouse. The accommodation offers guests free coffee and tea. Schiphol Airport is 18 km away.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Haarlem
description: Van der Valk offers rooms with extra-long beds, satellite TV and balcony only 2 km from Haarlem's city centre. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout. Tesla charging points are available. 'Restaurant Martinus' serves fair, modern but most of all tasteful dishes for every guest. During a business dinner or when going out with the family the menu will be able to serve dish for every occasion. During weekdays the restaurant serves a lunch buffet as well as a la carte, on Sundays a brunch is presented (reservation needed). The key sights of Haarlem, including the Grote Markt and Frans Hals Museum, are less than 10 minutes’ drive from Van der Valk Haarlem. Schiphol Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and free public parking is available in front of the hotel.

name: The Penthouse
description: Situated 4.6 km from Madurodam and 4.7 km from Paleis Huis Ten Bosch, The Penthouse At The Hague Tower in The Hague features air-conditioned accommodation with views of the city and free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment, while skiing and walking tours can be enjoyed nearby. Westfield Mall of the Netherlands is 5.9 km from The Penthouse At The Hague Tower, while TU Delft is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rotterdam The Hague Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Shanghai Hotel Holland
description: This unique hotel features Chinese-style décor and an elegant bar. Shanghai Hotel is located next to the A13 highway, only a 10-minute drive from Delft city centre. Guests benefit from a restaurant and lounge café. Each of the rooms at Shanghai Hotel Holland includes flat-screen cable TV, a desk and tea/coffee making facilities plus a refrigerator. The modern bathrooms have a bath or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy drinks at cozy lounge bar The Bund or have a meal in external on-site restaurant Shanghai Garden. Rijswijkse Golfclub is 1.6 km from the hotel. The centre of The Hague is just 15 minutes away by car. Shanghai Hotel is a 20-minute car journey from the city of Rotterdam and offers free on-site parking.

name: Occidental Costa Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Km. 4,5 | Cancún, Quintana Roo, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 4 星級住宿 可通往眾多當地景點。 海濱住宿 位置 位於 Cancun 郊區. Located in the heart of Hotel Zone 當地名勝 Isla Mujeres Ferry -.25 miles. Downtown Cancun - 3 miles. Plaza Flamingo - 3.75 miles. 休閒娛樂 設備齊全的健身中心 戶外游泳池 水上運動 兒童 兒童活動 提供兒童俱樂部 餐廳與休息室 4 Restaurants 3 酒吧 休閒餐廳 美食餐廳 一應俱全的酒吧/休息室 服務 24 小時櫃臺服務 有出租汽車服务 電梯 禮賓服務 會議設施 活動設施 住宿 358 間客房. 停車 提供飯店內停車WebBeds

name: Hyatt Zilara Cancun - Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5 HZ, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cancun. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km). For reliable service and professional staff, Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel caters to your needs.FarePortal

name: The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Plan an unforgettable getaway at The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa. Tucked away between the Caribbean Sea and a peaceful lagoon, our beachfront vacation ownership resort offers the perfect destination for family vacations or getaways with friends. Unwind at one of the sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches at our Cancun beach resort. Soothe tired muscles after an exciting day of Cancun adventures with a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our Cancun villa resort's restaurants and bars. Recharge in a spacious ocean-view or lagoon-view villa with a balcony and fully equipped kitchen, or select a comfortable studio with views of the water. All accommodations include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, we do not charge resort or per person fees.Marriott

name: Occidental Tucancun
address: Avda. Kukulcan, km. 13,5. Lote 24, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The family-friendly Occidental Tucancun hotel is ideally situated directly on the seemingly endless white sandy beach and enjoys fantastic views over the Nichupté lagoon and the azure blue of the Caribbean Sea. The Kukulkan Plaza and La Isla shopping centres are only a few steps away; Cancún International Airport and the city centre can be reached within a 25 minutes' drive.FarePortal

name: The Royal Sands
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 13.5 No 32, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: SATURDAY ARRIVALS ONLY. 7 NIGHT STAYS. Whether you are on a family vacation, romantic getaway for two, or an escape with friends, Royal relaxation is what you'll find at The Royal Sands. And let's not forget the on-site amenities; a week is simply not enough time to sample them all. There are freshwater pools for adults and children, a full- service spa, fitness center, beach, terrace and villa massage service, tennis courts with floodlighting for evening play, two restaurants and a snack bar, to name just a few. As an added benefit, guests are allowed access to amenities at all our Royal resorts in the Cancun area, with a free shuttle service between them. The beautiful villa sleeps 6 people and has a full kitchen and two balconies. VILLA AMENITIES Capacity: 6 Master bedroom with a King size bed Guest room with 2 double beds Flat screen TV, sound system and DVD Fully equipped kitchen Bathrooms with vanity outside of toilet/shower Terrace and balcony Dining room and Living room with 2 single Murphy beds Walk-in closets with safes Central air-conditioning Daily maid service (except Sundays) The Covid-19 pandemic is considered a foreseeable risk. By accepting this rental agreement and providing payment information, the guest acknowledges and accepts the risk that the pandemic may prevent travel or occupancy of the rental unit and that this will not serve as a basis for requesting a refund. Unavailable amenities, pool, beach, theme park, etc. does not merit a refund. This clause specifically removes the obligation of the owner to provide a habitable unit, if the cause is due to the Coronavirus pandemic. The Vrbo calendar helps provide availability and estimated price quote. Always inquire with the agent and do not reserve airfare until your confirmation has been received. Any issues with resort service, accommodations, physical plant, amenities, etc. are the direct responsibility of the developer and must be handled through the resort, not Concierge Realty. Photos are thought to be truly representative of the resort and accommodations. Any variation from the photo and actual property are unintentional, so guests are encouraged to do their own due diligence prior to reserving. Any variance or disruption including but not limited to renovation, unavailable amenity, change in decor, etc. during the stay, whether announced prior to reservation, occurring during the stay or announced after confirmation, is a matter strictly between the guest and resort, are not deceptive advertising, breach of contract or the responsibility of Concierge Realty. Note that the images are representative of this villa and that a specific view type is not implied nor promised by virtue of the images. A specific view category must be addressed with rental agent. Concierge Realty reserved the right to reserve any view category unless one has been agreed upon in writing. The resort confirmation will show the view designation and the villa will be placed within that view category unless, in a rare instance the view will be noted as "not guaranteed" in which case the resort reserves the right to place the guest anywhere within the property. Issues regarding view within the guaranteed view category are to be addressed with the resort management as Concierge Realty is not responsible for villa placement. Please be advised that if a non-domestic credit card is used to reserve a vacation rental, additional fees may be incurred. All details are accurate to the best of our knowledge. Any questions with regard to view, amenities, bedding configuration, decor or other details should be addressed with Concierge Realty, Winter Garden, FL. Guests are encouraged to do their own due diligence to assure that the resort and villa will meet their expectations.VRBO

name: The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun
address: Km 12.5 Boulevard Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Find the perfect getaway at The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun in Mexico. Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Explore popular Cancun attractions such as Tulum, Chichén Itza and more from our resort. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

name: Crown Paradise Club Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 18.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located along the Caribbean Sea, this Cancun hotel is 3.5 km from Aqua World Marina. It features a water park with 8 water slides and The Spa offers hair and body treatments. Every spacious room offers balcony with beautiful ocean views and air conditioning. All rooms are brightly decorated and include a satellite TV, refrigerator and coffee maker. Guests can enjoy a poolside massage or relax in the hot tubs. A gym and 2 tennis courts are available for active guests. Crown Paradise Cancun offers free on-site activities, such as a mini-golf course and game room with billiards. A variety of cuisine is available at Club Cancun’s 7 restaurants, including Japanese specialties at Fujiyama and Italian dishes at La Piazza. Beer and cocktails are served at 6 bars, such as Club Caribe Pool Bar and Beach Bar.

name: The Grand at Moon Palace Cancun
address: Carretera Cancun-Chetumal Km. 36.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: They say transcendence is rising above something to a superior state, it’s that precise moment where reality gets suspended and you’re in the moment, but the moment doesn’t define you—you have broken through boundaries. That’s the spirit that courses through our luxurious accommodations and villas. Ease into pure relaxation and bliss with complimentary Wi-Fi, free phone calls, smart TV, a bottle of wine upon arrival, double whirlpool tub, 24-hour room service. You don’t simply enter one of our suites—you get swept away by the possibilities. RESORT CREDIT: A WORTHY EXCUSE TO SPOIL OUR GUESTS It’s not just another day in paradise, it could mean $1,500. Stay 5-8 nights and make your stay even more magical with $1,500 to indulge in primping and pampering at the spa, championship golf, exotic tours, romantic dinners, scuba diving, and swimming with dolphins, wedding collections, and more. Accrue more credit when you stay longer. Make the most of The Grand experience with resort credit and relish deeper levels of extravagance. Important note: Please let us know if you would like to request for a different room/accommodation so we can check it's availability. Please note that prices may change depending on the room you would request.VRBO

name: Haven Riviera Cancun
address: Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Puerto Juarez Km 335, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The 5-star Haven Riviera Cancun offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Cancun. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Haven Riviera Cancun. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Haven Riviera Cancun is an excellent choice from which to explore Cancun or to simply relax and rejuvenate.FarePortal

name: Punta Blanca Beach House
address: Fraccionamiento Santa Fatima Manzana 3, Lote 1, Municipio Isla Mujeres, Zona Continental, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Costa Mujeres, 19 km from Cancun Bus Station, Punta Blanca Beach House features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Punta Blanca Beach House provides some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Punta Blanca Beach House. Cancun Government Palace is 20 km from the hotel, while Beto Avila Stadium is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 36 km from Punta Blanca Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan KM 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Visit paradise at The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun. Nestled on the beach between the Caribbean Sea and a tranquil lagoon, our Cancun beach resort offers the perfect destination for business trips and vacations in Mexico. Just six miles from CUN Airport, our Cancun Quintana Roo resort is a short ride to the aquarium, museums, waterparks, Isla Mujeres and water activities. Unwind at one of our sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches then schedule a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Find adventure with a snorkeling trip to the coral reef or other activities. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our on-site restaurants and bars. If you're in Mexico for a conference or family gathering, take advantage of our indoor venues, custom catering, planning services and event spaces. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite with views of the water. All rooms include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, our Cancun property does not charge resort or per-person fees.Marriott

name: Flamingo Ocean View
address: Carretera a Punta Sam, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo region, with Playa Blanca and Puerto Juarez Beach nearby, Flamingo Ocean View features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a solarium. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. The bed and breakfast has both a sun terrace and garden where you can relax, along with a private beach area. Cancun Bus Station is 5 km from Flamingo Ocean View, while Cancun Government Palace is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 23 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún
address: Calle Quetzal No.11, Km 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Placed near the Nichupté lagoon in the Hotel Zone of Cancun, Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún is only a short distance from Plaza Caracol. Area attractions, including the Cancun Convention Center are located close to Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún. Plaza Caracol, a large shopping center as well as a number of nightclubs and restaurants are nearby. Rooms are furnished with kitchenettes, stoves and private balconies. Guests can also take advantage of the hotel's outdoor swimming pool. Rate does not include an eco-tax of 72,62 MXN per room per night, which must be paid upon arrival.

name: Beachscape Kin Ha Villas & Suites
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun resort is a 3-minute drive from Pok-ta-Pok Golf course, in northern Cancún. This hotel offers an outdoor pool, children’s pool, convenience store and salon with massage services. The Beachscape Kin Ha Villas and Suites provide guests free Wi-Fi in public areas, a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can work out in the gym or use the laundry facilities. Suites come with cable TV and a private balcony. A full private bathroom, cable TV, balcony and full kitchen are also some of the features offered by these accommodations. Kin Ha Villas and Suites offers 2 on-site restaurants that include breakfast and lunch, while à la carte options are available for dinner. Guests can also dine at La Palapa, a beach bar and grill. There is a wide range of restaurants and bars within a short walk. The hotel offers direct access to the beach, which is popular for snorkelling and swimming. The property also boasts convenience stores and spa services on site. Beachscape Kin Ha Villas is 12 miles from the Cancun Airport.

name: Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel
address: 4 Cenzontle Zona Hotelera, 77500 Puerto Juárez, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel is within a 30-minute drive of Cancun International Airport and offers an infinity pool. Those staying at the property can also make use of free wireless internet. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the hotel, such as a lake, a tour desk and luggage storage. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel features 28 rooms that are equipped with everything required for a comfortable stay. Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel is a convenient place to explore nearby Gran Puerto and Spa at The Royal Sands. An airport shuttle service is also available on request.Revato

name: The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 4.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Tortuga Beach and La Isla Shopping Mall. This 4-star aparthotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Playa Tortugas and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Puerto Cancun Marina Town Center. Dining Satisfy your appetite with American cuisine at La Palapa Restaurant, one of the aparthotel's 4 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 4 bars/lounges.
