name: Flamingo Cancun Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 11, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! Flamingo Cancun Resort has been welcoming  guests since Sept 13, 2010 Most popular facilities 1 swimming pool Spa Fitness center Room service Restaurant Facilities for disabled guests Non-smoking rooms Bar Good Breakfast Beachfront ATM & Currency Exchange: Need cash? There's an ATM and a currency exchange service at this property.VRBO

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Ocean Dream Cancun by GuruHotel
address: Boulevard Kukulcán km 9, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With 2 outdoor pools, an on-site dive centre and à la carte, international restaurant, Ocean Dream BPR is located in Cancún, right on a beautiful white-sand beach. It is just 100 metres from restaurants and nightlife. Each spacious, modern room here includes a cable TV, safety-deposit box and free WiFi. They also boast a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Ocean Dream BPR Condo Hotel you will find a private beach area. Cancun Convention Centre, plus small stores, banks and bars, is just a 5-minute walk away. Plaza Caracol shopping centre is just 850 metres from the hotel, while Cancun International Airport can be reached within 25 minutes by car. The property offers free parking.

name: Pensjonat B&b Nad Rudawa
description: Only 4 km from the city centre, you can enjoy a good nights sleep at B&B Nad Rudawą in the tranquil residential area of Wola Justowska. This small B&B hotel has a cosy atmosphere and the helpful staff will make you feel at home. The comfortable rooms and studios are individually decorated and include free Wi-Fi. There is also free private parking on-site, and all room prices include a hearty Polish or continental breakfast with home baked bread. B&B Nad Rudawą is an ideal place for rest and relaxation. It is located right next to the Rudawa River and near lots of beautiful green areas, such as Decjusza Park. Kraków city centre and the main railway station can easily be reached by bus in 15 minutes, and the airport in Balice is only 10 km away. From October onwards guests will have the possibility to participate in yoga lessons held from Monday through to Thursday.

name: Hornigold w Zielonej Kamienicy
description: Located in the centre of Katowice, Hornigold W Zielonej Kamienicy offers stylish and comfortable accommodation in a Modernist tenement house with satellite TV and free WiFi. Some apartments include a spa bath. There are also rooms featuring tea making facilities and private bathrooms with hairdryers. A varied breakfast buffet is offered daily. Paid parking is available upon prior reservation. Guests of the Hornigold W Zielonej Kamienicy can relax in the recreation centre, which features a sauna and hot tub. Only hotel guests, upon prior payment, have access to the recreation centre. The residence is 600 metres from Katowice Central Station. Spodek sport and concert venue is within 1.4 km. The Silesia Museum is within 950 metres. Many tourist attractions, restaurants and bars are in the immediate area of the Hornigold W Zielonej Kamienicy.

name: Pembroke Hall
description: No description found

name: Clayton Hotel Liffey Valley
description: A 5-minute walk from Liffey Valley Shopping Centre, this modern non-smoking hotel is a short drive from Dublin city centre, and has a swimming pool, gym and free internet access. Clayton Hotel Liffey Valley offers excellent value accommodation. Check the availability for special offers on 5-day advance bookings, 2-night stays and 3-night stays. Every private bathroom has a hairdryer. Clayton Hotel Liffey Valley has good road access and is situated on the M50/N4 intersection at Liffey Valley. It is about 6 miles from the city centre and 9 miles from Dublin Airport. Guests can enjoy complimentary use of Clayton Hotel Liffey Valley's state-of-the-art leisure centre, which includes an 20-metre swimming pool, a children's paddling pool, a sauna, and a steam room, along with a gymnasium. The property also boasts an indoor kid's corner. For modern Italian cuisine, guests can dine in the New Gusto Restaurant, where advance booking is recommended. Freshly cooked Asian food is served in The Globe Bar and Restaurant. Children's menus are available.

name: Mount Pleasant Country House
description: Situated in Lucan, Mount Pleasant Country House offers accommodation with a hot tub. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a microwave and fridge. Cycling and fishing can be enjoyed nearby. St. Edmundsbury Hospital is 600 metres from the country house, while Primrose Hill is an 8-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Retro Camper Hire
description: Ford Transit – 2.5 Diesel 5 speed manual RHD Sleeps 4 – Travels 4 Electric controlled Bluetooth heating system Gas cooker Sink 3 way fridge 12v / 240v / Gas 21″ Smart TV 15 ltr fresh water tank capacity 12v socket x 1 230v socket x 2 All prices quoted include insurance. The insurance covers standard liability only. A €1500 security deposit is taken and then returned after the vehicle is returned back with no damage to the vehicle. It can take up to 28 days for security deposit to be returned. In most cases its returned within 48 hours. If the vehicle is returned damaged the driver is responsible for the first €1500 of repair costs. Pick up and and drop off time: 11am unless otherwise agreedExpedia

name: Beechtree House
address: 37 Weston Drive Lucan, Co. Dublin, Dublin
description: Beechtree House has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Dublin, 13 km from Phoenix Park. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Beechtree House features a garden and sun terrace. Kilmainham Gaol is 13 km from the accommodation, while Heuston Train Station is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dublin, 19 km from Beechtree House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Lodge guesthouse
description: Located in Brittas, The Lodge guesthouse provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a fridge, an oven, and a microwave. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby. The Square Tallaght is 11 km from the lodge, while St. Stephen's Green is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Dublin Airport, 33 km from The Lodge guesthouse.

name: Kilmurry Lodge Hotel
description: Kilmurry Lodge Hotel is a family run hotel, ideally located just a 5-minute walk from the University of Limerick and the National Technological Park, Castletroy. Limerick’s vibrant city centre is just 10 minutes away. Set amongst 3 acres of gardens, this charming hotel offers guest rooms with power showers, free WiFi access, complimentary onsite parking and full Irish breakfasts. The spacious rooms at the Kilmurry Lodge Hotel also feature TVs, hairdryers and irons. Tea/coffee making facilities are provided in all guest rooms and there are complimentary newspapers available each morning at reception. Nelligan’s Bar & Restaurant operates daily, serving a menu for both lunch and dinner. All dishes are made from locally sourced and fresh produce. An extensive buffet breakfast is served in the Kilmurry Suite each morning. Castletroy Golf Club is less than a 5-minute drive away and a city centre bus service is available outside the front of the hotel. Shannon International Airport is just 20-minutes via car with easy access to Cork and Dublin via the new motorways. The Kilmurry Lodge Hotel is a non-smoking hotel and this policy is strictly enforced. A minimum penalty of EUR 150 will be imposed on guests found to be in breach of this policy. Early check-in or late check-out requests are charged from EUR 10 per hour and are subject to availability. When booking 5 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements will apply. This property does not accept cash payments. A valid credit card is required upon check-in for all bookings, including prepaid bookings. A pre-authorisation of your card will be taken upon arrival for incidentals. The credit card must be in the guest’s own name and a corresponding photo ID will be required. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

name: The Montenotte Hotel
description: With fantastic city views, The Montenotte Hotel is just one mile from Cork city centre. In a tranquil location, it offers spacious modern rooms, a pool and free parking. Bright rooms all have en suite bathrooms with baths and showers. They all feature TVs, hairdryers, irons and tea/coffee making facilities. Wi-Fi is available in public areas of the hotel. Apartments are services fortnightly. Perched high over the city, the Panorama Bistro & Terrace provides fantastic views and has a full a la carte menu available every day. Guests can enjoy afternoon tea whilst taking in the views of Cork city. The Montenotte has superb leisure facilities include a gymnasium, sauna and hot tub. Aquarobics and swimming lessons can be taken in the 20-metre pool. The hotel offers guests an in-house cinema, where films are shown nightly. Cork’s shops, theatres and the Beamish Brewery are just a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The world famous Blarney Stone and Cork Airport are both within 5 miles of the Montenotte.

name: Bella Vista Hotel & Self Catering Suites
description: In the town of Cobh, the family-owned Bella Vista Hotel overlooks Cork Harbour. This luxurious Victorian villa offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, a traditional Irish Bar, restaurant and free parking. Bedrooms at The Bella Vista Hotel & Self Catering Suites feature a satellite LCD HDTV and tea/coffee-making facilities. Bathrooms have baths and showers and most rooms have views of Cork Harbour, the second largest natural harbour in the world. The award-winning Continental Restaurant has ocean views and serves European and Chinese food. The cosy Full Rustic Bar offers Guinness, a fine selection of whiskeys and open fires. Each morning, you can enjoy a buffet breakfast of homemade brown bread, scones, and muffins, as well as cereals or a full Irish breakfast. Cobh town centre is just a 5-minute walk away and fishing is available at the harbour. There are around 30 golf courses within a 30-minute drive. Bella Vista caters to fishing groups and is able to organise boat hire for fishing trips as well as fishing tackle and equipment.

name: Mulberry Lodge
description: Mulberry Lodge is located in Blarney, 1 km from Blarney Stone and 1.7 km from Blarney Woolen Mills, in an area where hiking can be enjoyed. Set 1.7 km from Blarney Castle, the property offers a garden and free private parking. This property is fitted with 1 bedroom, with fridge, a flat-screen TV and 1 bathroom with a shower. There is also a private entrance for guests to use. Guests at the property can enjoy a continental breakfast. The nearest airport is Cork Airport, 18 km from Mulberry Lodge.

name: An Stór Townhouse
description: Situated in the heart of Midleton, An Stór is within 30 minutes' drive of Cobh, Youghal, and Cork. Free WiFi and free private parking is available at the property. An Stór Townhouse offers en-suite rooms, as well as a studio apartment. Breakfast is offered to guests. A variety of shops, restaurants and traditional Irish pubs can be found within 5 minutes’ walk from the property. Cork Airport is 28 km from An Stór Townhouse.

name: Moorepark West House
address: Moorepark Fermoy Cork P61Xn50, Fermoy P61 XN50
description: No description found

name: Westlodge Hotel & Leisure Centre
description: Set amid 30 acres of landscaped gardens, The Westlodge Hotel is situated just on the edge of Bantry town, overlooking Bantry Bay, in West Cork. It offers a fine restaurant, a fully licenced bar, an indoor pool, a hot tub, and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at The Westlodge Hotel & Leisure Centre feature a TV and an en suite bathroom with bath, shower and hairdryer. Sugarloaf Restaurant overlooks Bantry Bay and Borlin Valley and serves only local produce including fresh fish and local meats. During the summer months there is nightly entertainment in the hotel lobby. The Health & Leisure centre boasts a sauna, steam room, squash and outdoor tennis. Guests can access these facilities free of charge. There is also a range of aromatherapy massages available. Bantry town centre is only a 15-minute walk away and a food and craft market is held every Friday. Bantry House & Gardens are just 5 minutes’ away. Whilst Bantry bay Golf Club is a 10-minute drive. Beautiful countryside and walking routes surround the hotel, including The Sheep’s Head Way. Guests can benefit from discounts when visiting selected local attractions.

name: The Maritime Hotel
description: Featuring over 100 designer rooms, some with sea views and balconies, and others overlooking mature woods this luxury accommodation is situated very conveniently for the famous bay of the region. Superbly located on the water’s edge, The Maritime Hotel enjoys uninterrupted sea views across Bantry Bay. At the Maritime Hotel, everything you desire for a short break or extended stay awaits you. You can enjoy a pampering, relaxing holiday or host an elegant event. The facilities offered by the Club Maritime leisure centre are chic by any standard. Club Maritime features a large swimming pool and a children's pool, sauna, steam room, hot tub and gymnasium.

name: Rodeen Country House
description: Located on the Beara Peninsula, where the Beara Way meets the Wild Atlantic Way, Rodeen Country House is 2.4 km from Castletownbere. Free WiFi and free private parking are available on site. All rooms feature en-suite facilities. You will find a shared lounge at the property with a log-burning stove. There is a garden where you can relax. The area is popular for golfing, cycling and hiking.Rodeen is 11.5 km from Dzogchen Beara, while Dursey Island is 24.8 km away. Cork Airport is a 2-hour drive along the coast.

name: Ballinwillin House
description: A working farm where you can see pigs, wild boar, and red deer roaming the pastures, Ballinwillin House offers sumptuous guest rooms with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a modern, tiled en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy traditional Irish food beside a roaring fire in colder months. High-quality artisan food is served, and you can buy goods from the farm shop or try traditional wine tasting on site. Ballinwillin House dates back to 1727, and is set in 80 acres of grounds in Ireland’s pretty Golden Vale. Guests can simply relax and enjoy the picturesque countryside. Ireland’s largest mountain bike trails at Ballyhoura are just 20 minutes’ drive away, and the house offers free bike storage, washing, and servicing. Transport to and from the trails can be arranged for an additional charge.

name: Clonakilty Accommodation An Úllórd Getways
description: Set in Clonakilty in the County Cork region and University College Cork reachable within 49 km, Clonakilty Accommodation An Úllórd Getways offers accommodation with free WiFi, BBQ facilities, a garden and free private parking. Some accommodation includes a balcony with mountain views, a fully equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower. A terrace is available for guests at the lodge to use. The nearest airport is Cork Airport, 46 km from Clonakilty Accommodation An Úllórd Getways.

name: Clonakilty Park Hotel
description: In the heart of Clonakilty, this luxury hotel has a leisure centre with an indoor pool, sauna and steam room. With a modern restaurant and bar, the beautiful coastline is just 10 minutes away by car. Clonakilty Park Hotel’s leisure facilities include a 20-metre swimming pool, sauna, hot tub and fitness room. A 3-screen cinema is also within the complex. There is a fully supervised indoor play zone and a teen zone with Xboxes, Playstations, and Wii consoles. There is also a children's camp daily during all school holidays. Each spacious room at Clonakilty Park Hotel & Leisure Centre has a flat-screen TV/DVD player, a mini fridge and ironing facilities. The private bathrooms all include a hairdryer. Serving a varied menu with traditional Irish dishes, Twist Bar & Bistro uses fresh local produce. The Twist Bar offers a selection of local craft beers, stouts, wines, ciders, spirits and speciality teas and coffee.

name: Abbey View House
description: Abbey View House provides rooms in Youghal near Tynte's Castle and St. Mary's Collegiate Church. The property is situated 38 km from Fota Wildlife Park, 42 km from Cathedral of St. Colman and 48 km from Cork Custom House. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.1 km from Youghal Front Strand. All units at the guest house are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Every room comes with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while some rooms here will provide you with a terrace and some have city views. At Abbey View House rooms come with bed linen and towels. Cork City Hall is 48 km from the accommodation, while Kent Railway Station is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Cork Airport, 53 km from Abbey View House.

name: The Square townhouse Fermoy
description: Set in Fermoy and within 35 km of Cork Custom House, The Square townhouse Fermoy features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFithroughout the property. The property is located 36 km from Cork City Hall, 36 km from Kent Railway Station and 37 km from Saint Fin Barre's Cathedral. The guest house has family rooms. At the guest house, every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units at The Square townhouse Fermoy come with a seating area. Páirc Uí Chaoimh is 38 km from the accommodation, while University College Cork is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Cork, 41 km from The Square townhouse Fermoy, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thatched Cottage / 200 year old farm house
description: How about a vacation on a 200 year old property in the southwest of the 'Green Island'? Self-catering holiday or half board in a comfortably furnished 2-6 person apartment on fish-rich Lough Allua in unspoiled nature. Tirna Spideoga - the country of the robins, lies between the villages of Inchigeelagh and Ballingeary, in one of the few Irish cultural enclaves on the island. The cottage is embedded in a huge nature park. Its location is a good starting point for interesting tours, and the Gougane Barra National Park is nearby. The port town of Bantry, the flower island 'Garinish Island' and Glengariff are also worth a visit. This village is the starting point for a tour of the Beara Peninsula over the Healy Pass. You should also take your time for the most famous route, the Ring of Kerry. If you don't just want to spend your vacation in the car, there is a varied program. Ireland, the land of anglers and canoeists: Lough Allua, about 10 km long, the lake nearby, offers trout, pike, perch, coarse fish etc. Our fishing boats, with motor on request, as well as a fishing shop and smokehouse, are available at any time. Licenses are not required here. We also organize weekly deep-sea fishing trips for up to 30 different types of fish, such as: B Conger eels, cod, pollack, coalfish, ling, wrasse etc; but also different types of shark such as. B. the blue shark. Rods and fishing equipment are included in the price for sea fishing, which is around 40 to 50 € for a day trip. You can explore Lough Allua and River Lee in our one and two two-seater canoes, the daily rent here is € 15 per person incl. Pick-up and delivery service. Riders, hikers, nature lovers u. Cycling enthusiasts: The 'Green Island' is characterized by a flora and fauna that is unique in Europe. If you want to explore these unique landscapes on your own, you can do this with the tours or mountain bikes available to you. The daily rent is € 7. Almost every street here is a cycle path with very little traffic, behind every curve there is a new panorama. Ireland, the country for culture lovers. This country offers a lot of programs for hikers, mountaineers, surfers, golfers etc. We provide you with an experienced and qualified hiking guide who brings you closer to the historical and geographical peculiarities of the surrounding area on organized hikes. You may also want to explore the area from the back of our horses. A riding instructor will give you lessons in the riding area behind the house and, of course, experienced riders can also go horse riding. Riding helmets and boots of all sizes can be provided. Guinness and Irish Folk: The pubs of Inchigeelagh and Ballingeary invite you to a cozy sing along. Not far away is the highest pub in Ireland - Top of Coom-. Here, as well as in the award-winning Mills Inn, the instruments are unpacked on Thursdays and weekends. Visit the world-famous Jameson Distille in Midleton, where you can take a guided tour and a good 'whiskey test'. Regardless of whether you are looking for peace and seclusion on our former riding stables in a thatched cottage, planning a fishing trip, riding vacation or just want to relax, cook for yourself or let yourself be pampered: the landscape of West Cork and the You will not soon forget warm and open residents.VRBO

name: Berehaven Pods
description: Situated in Castletownbere in the County Cork region and Hungry Hill reachable within 3.9 km, Berehaven Pods features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a private beach area and free private parking. The campground provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. Berehaven Pods offers a picnic area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Dunboy Castle is 10 km from Berehaven Pods, while Puxley Mansion is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kerry Airport, 94 km from the campground.

name: Clayton Hotel & Leisure Club Sligo
description: Rooms Stay in one of 162 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Property Location Located in Sligo, Clayton Hotel & Leisure Club Sligo is in the mountains, within a 5-minute drive of The Model and The Castle Gallery. This 4-star hotel is 1.2 mi (2 km) from Sligo Abbey and 5.8 mi (9.3 km) from Rosses Point Beach. Dining Grab a bite at Sinergie Restaurant, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. name: Rockhill House
address: F92R523 Rockhill House, Rockhill Letterkenny, Letterkenny
description: Located 2 km from Letterkenny, County Donegal, the historic Rockhill House offers accommodation in a Manor House set in 100 acres of woodlands. 11 km from Glenveagh National Park and Castle and 80km from Slieve League. The property provides a shared lounge and a bar, free WiFi and free onsite parking are available. At the Manor House, all rooms include a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. The units in Rockhill House are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer. A full cooked breakfast is available each morning at the property. A selection of activities are offered in the area, such as cycling and hiking. Malin Head is 80km from the property. Guests can arrive here easily from Donegal, Derry and Belfast Airports. There is also have a helipad for those who wish to arrange an arrival by private helicopter. Rockhill House is more than just another Donegal hotel. It is a beautiful hidden gem in the Donegal hills which has been carefully and lovingly restored to its Georgian glory, standing again as a unique, family run Country Manor House and Estate bringing genuine hospitality suffused with old-style elegance and modern ease and comfort. You can choose to enjoy our Spirit of Place in Rockhill House itself or just across the Courtyard in one of The Coach House suites. Rockhill House Each of our 19 bespoke bedrooms in the House tell parts of Rockhill’s story so far, from the Vandeleur and Lady Norbury suites (references to the 19th Century owners who added the impressive façade we enjoy today) to the O’Carroll room, named for a local Rockhill historian and a former member of the Irish Armed Forces who was stationed at Rockhill during its time as an Army Barracks. The Coach House Superior Rooms at Rockhill House brings you a different take on the Estate and our Spirit of Place, with the former stables, coach and groom block transformed into 8 luxury private spaces with personal seating areas and complimentary mini larders in each suite.

name: Ocean Sands Hotel
description: In the heart of Enniscrone, a picturesque seaside town in County Sligo, this hotel is situated on a hill overlooking the Atlantic Ocean near to 5 km of golden beach. The hotel enjoys spectacular views of Killala Bay, Enniscrone Pier and the Valley of Diamonds. With the hotel’s new dinner package you can enjoy breathtaking views of the beach from the back garden. Located within 5 minutes walk of the hotel is Enniscrone's championship golf links designed by the renowned Eddie Hackett. Other golf courses in the area include Ballina Parlands course, Carne Links in Belmullet, Strandhill, and Rosses Point links in Sligo. Children’s activities in the area include Waterpoint: a fully-equipped water park, health suite and sports centre. The hotel also provides a choice venue for large and small events including conferences, training, team building, workshops and off-site meetings.

name: Copper Kettle B&B
description: The Copper Kettle is just a 2-minute walk from Killarney Train Station. It offers en suite rooms with satellite TVs, Wi-Fi access and home cooked breakfasts. Rooms at the Copper Kettle feature wooden floors, radios and hairdryers. They also include telephones and tea/coffee making facilities. Killarney National Park and St Mary’s Cathedral are both within a 10-minute walk from the Copper Kettle. The Kettle is the ideal base to explore the Ring of Kerry and the Dingle Peninsula. Salmon and trout fishing is available at the nearby Lough Leane. There are several golf courses in the area.

name: The Westwood
description: No description found

name: Boyne View House
address: Boyne View Drinadaly Trim Co Meath C15 Prr0, Trim Meath
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a Smart TV and a garden. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Doonbeg Ireland
address: Doonbeg Golf Club Doonbeg 00000 IE, Doonbeg
description: Located in Doonbeg, Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland is an easy drive from Kilkee and provides a sauna. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa, White Horses. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a playground and babysitting/child services. Every room at Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland includes tea and coffee making facilities and cable/satellite channels, while the bathrooms feature bathrobes and showers. All offer an in-room closet, an in-room safe and ironing facilities. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Guests can experience scenic countryside walks or make use of Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland's bike rental service to explore the surrounding area. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Hotel Woodstock, an Ascend Hotel Collection Member
description: Hotel Woodstock is located in the beautiful countryside of Woodstock, Ennis, Co. Clare. The property offers free WiFi and parking. Each bedroom offers an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries. The rooms feature tea and coffee making facilities, a TV, telephone and desk. The hotel bar offers full dining from full Irish breakfast, lunch and dinner, specialising in locally sourced ingredients. Guests are able to use the Leisure Centre which includes a gymnasium, swimming pools and hot tub, and a steam and sauna area. The hotel is surrounded by a stunning parkland championship golf course which is operated independently. Guests can enjoy scenic walks in the beautiful surrounding countryside, and both Shannon Airport and Lahinch are only a 30-minute drive away. The Cliffs of Moher are 42 km from the hotel.

name: Strandhill Lodge and Suites
description: Overlooking Mount Knocknarea, the Strandhill Lodge and Suites are 10 minutes’ walk from sandy beaches and just 1-mile from Sligo Airport. Rooms have i-Pod docks and sea or countryside views. The spacious modern rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV with DVD player, work desks and minibar. Ironing equipment, hairdryers and tea/coffee-making facilities are provided. Strandhill has several excellent pubs and restaurants offering traditional Irish and international cuisine, local ales and freshly caught fish specials. The Voya Seaweed Baths and Spa are a 10-minute walk away and fantastic surfing is available on the beach. Strandhill Golf Club is just 500 metres away. Free parking is available.

name: Coastal View House
description: Coastal View House is located on the Wild Atlantic Way in Doolin, just 15 minutes' drive to the Cliffs of Moher Visitor Centre and 2 km away from local pubs and restaurants. The property offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and free WiFi. Each room includes a flat screen TV and a private bathroom. A hairdryer and tea and coffee making facilities are also available. Popular activities near the guest house include hiking, surfing, sea kayaking, mountain biking, horse riding, rock climbing and golf. Doolin Pier and the ferry port to the Aran Islands are 4.6 km away from the property. Doolin Cave is 1.3 km away from Coastal View House. The nearest airport is Shannon Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Decoy Country Cottages
description: Located in the County Meath countryside, in the province of Leinster, Decoy Country Cottages offer luxurious self-catered accommodation with landscaped gardens, free Wi-Fi and private parking. These stylish cottages are set only 11 minutes’ drive off the M3 motorway. All the houses at Decoy Country Cottages feature country-style kitchen/dining areas, spacious living rooms and oak furniture in the bedrooms. All provide a flat-screen satellite TV with DVD/CD player, a fireplace and barbecue facilities. All cottages have access to an indoor children’s play area with games and toys. Guests can also use fitness and games facilities. There is a golf course only 5 km away. Navan is the nearest town, and is less than 10 km from the properties. Dublin Airport is a 30-minute drive away. The archaeological complex in Hill of Tara is set 6 km away.

name: The Gateway Hotel
address: Inner Relief Road, Dundalk A91 EF88
description: The Gateway Hotel Dundalk, where extraordinary experiences and unmatched service await you. Our magnificent 14-storey building stands tall, offering 129 exquisitely designed en-suite bedrooms, setting the standard for the most luxurious accommodation in Dundalk. If you’re seeking a remarkable breakaway, look no further; we have created the perfect setting for you. Conveniently situated less than an hour away from the vibrant cities of Dublin and Belfast, and just a short 45-minute drive from Dublin airport, The Gateway Hotel Dundalk is your gateway to the best of both worlds. For our business travelers, Finnabair Industrial Park is easily accessible, and Dundalk Institute of Technology is conveniently located within a two-minute walk, making us the perfect choice for your business trips. Moreover, staying at The Gateway Hotel Dundalk opens up a world of exploration in Ireland’s Ancient East. Immerse yourself in nature’s beauty with Slieve Gullion forest park or revel in the stunning walking trails of Carlingford Lough, a scenic 30-minute drive from our hotel.

name: The Reserve at Muckross Park
description: With gorgeous views of the mountains, these self-catering apartments are situated in the heart of Killarney National Park, and have free parking on site. Muckross House and Gardens, Torc Waterfall and Ross Castle are just minutes away. Free WiFi is available throughout. All rooms include a TV and DVD player and include a kitchen fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is also a private bathroom with a bath. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units Our award winning spa includes a Vitality Pool and Thermal area which guests over 16 under adult supervision can access complimentary. For an extra charge, a full Irish breakfast is served in the in Yew Tree Restaurant, and continental and children's breakfasts can be requested. You can also dine in Major Colgan's Traditional Irish Pub.

name: Westport Heights
description: Westport Heights offers family-friendly accommodation in Westport on the Wild Atlantic Way, offering views of the town and Croagh Patrick. Free parking is offered and the Great Western Greenway walking and cycling trail is 100 metres from the property. The town centre, with a selection of shops, cafes, restaurants and bars is a 10 minute walk from the property. Guest enjoy a continental buffet style breakfast each morning. All of the individual rooms have a flat-screen TV, a hairdryer and free WiFi. Guests can relax on the outdoor seating and dining area, surrounded by the gardens. Free tea/coffee making facilities are available all day in the guest lounge. The area is popular with horse riding, sailing and fishing. Westport Golf Club is 4.4 km away. Clew Bay Heritage Centre is 3.1 km from Westport Heights, while Rockfleet Castle is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ireland West Knock Airport, 55 km from the property. If you book 5 or more rooms this will be classed as a group. The hotel will contact you directly as a deposit schedule will be issued to you to pre pay for your group prior to arrival. A €100.00 deposit per room per night will be requested at check-in for incidental charges for all rooms. Guests using credit cards will have their card pre -authorised for the full amount, and the balance ( if any) will be released upon check-out. Guests paying by debit cards will be charged upfront for the full amount, and the balance (if any) will be reimbursed in cash upon check-out. Please note that all Special requests are subject to availability & additional charges may apply. A damage/noise deposit of €300 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check -out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property and the absence of noise disturbance complaints related to your stay

name: Vintage Hotel
description: No description found

name: Hotel Laxnes
description: Located in the coastal town of Mosfellsbaer, this hotel is just off Iceland’s scenic Ring Road. Central Reykjavik is 10 minutes’ drive away. Both Wi-Fi and on-site private parking are free. Each guest room at Hotel Laxnes features a seating area, work desk and TV. Some also have a kitchenette and a balcony with scenic views. The spacious rooms are simply, yet comfortably decorated. Daily specials, light meals and refreshments can be enjoyed in Laxnes’s restaurant and bar. Staff will gladly help to arrange area activities such as horse riding, fishing and kayaking. Whale watching tours and jeep safaris are also common.

name: Reykjavik Domes
description: Located 8.9 km from The Pearl, Reykjavik Domes offers accommodation with a terrace, as well as a garden and barbecue facilities. Free WiFi is providedthroughout the property. There is a private bathroom with shower in some units, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. Hallgrímskirkja Church is 9.1 km from the luxury tent, while Solfar Sun Voyager is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Reykjavík Domestic, 10 km from Reykjavik Domes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apotek Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Hafnarstræti Hostel
description: Hafnarstræti Hostel offers capsule sleeping pods in Akureyri. Guests can choose from single or double bed capsules. Free WiFi is available. You will find a shared kitchen, gift shop, and shops at the property. Barbecue facilities are also available on site. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including whale watching and cycling. Akureyri Church and Hof Cultural and Conference Center are about 350 metres from Hafnarstræti Hostel. Akureyri Airport is 3 km from the property.

name: Akureyri Backpackers
description: Situated in central Akureyri, Akureyri Backpackers offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with access to shared bathroom facilities. A swimming pool and hot tubs are a 1-minute walk away. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed in Backpackers Akureyri’s on-site bar and café. A buffet breakfast is served each morning. Cars can be rented on site. Staff can help arrange activities like horseback riding, rafting and various sightseeing trips. Coffee shops, bars and restaurants are found in the surrounding area. Akureyri Botanical Garden is 1 km from the hotel and Akureyri Airport is a 5-minute drive away. Public parking spaces are available nearby on weekdays for free, from 16:00 until 10:00 and on weekends (There is a fee during the hours of 10:00 - 16:00 on weekdays). The One-Bedroom Apartment is next door to Hafnarstræti 100, check-in via Akureyri Backpackers main property.

name: Hotel Kjarnalundur
description: Featuring panoramic views of the scenic nature surroundings, Hotel Kjarnalundur is 5 km from central Akureyri and just 2 km from the Akureyri Airport. It offers an on-site restaurant. A flat-screen TV and wooden floors are featured in all rooms. Each room has a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or on Kjarnalundur's terrace. Free use of a sauna can also be enjoyed. Free WiFi is available. Hiking, cycling and golfing are common area activities. The Hof Cultural and Conference Centre, as well as the Akureyri Church are both within 7 minutes' drive of the hotel.

name: Akureyri Hostel
description: Set a 10-minute walk from central Akureyri, this family-owned hostel offers basic rooms with a TV and free Wi-Fi access. Iceland’s Ring Road/Route 1 is right next to the hostel. A wardrobe is featured in all rooms at Akureyri Hostel. Rooms have either private or shared bathrooms. Relaxation options include a furnished terrace and a TV lounge.Staff can help arrange activities like horse riding and whale watching. Guests can prepare their meals in the well-equipped guest kitchen. Akureyri Golf Club is 5 km from the hostel. Hlidarfjall Ski Centre is within 10 minutes’ drive. Discounts are available for guests with certain restaurants and activities such as whale watching.

name: Vaðlahof
description: Featuring sea views, Vaðlahof features accommodation with a balcony and a kettle, around 31 km from Godafoss Waterfall. Boasting free private parking, the country house is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as skiing and hiking. This country house will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, a terrace, a seating area and a CD player. The kitchen features a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave and there is hot tub with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The country house offers a hot tub. Barbecue facilities are provided. Hof - Cultural Center and Conference Hall is 7.2 km from Vaðlahof. The nearest airport is Akureyri Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Eyvindarholt Guesthouse
description: Located in Álftanes, a 15-minute drive from central Reykjavík, Eyvindarholt Guesthouse features bright and modern accommodation with free WiFi, scenic views, as well as Icelandic art and design. The property offers private and fully equipped apartments, some with a sea view. Produce grown on site or in a nearby greenhouse is often served for breakfast. The guesthouse offers, free private parking and a large, surrounding garden with a children's playground. A number of activities are offered in the area, such as bird watching, golfing and horse riding. Keflavik International Airport is less than 40 minutes' drive from Eyvindarholt Guesthouse.

name: Villa apartment Hafnarfjordur - Ideal for Aurora
description: Authentic, spacious and private Icelandic home in guiet area, that has hosted many happy guests from many continents and different cultures. They´ve all loved it. Apartment carefully maintened in it´s 1960 near orginal style which is the building year of the villa. We want to share the Olduslod Villa apartment with like minded people to enjoy in harmony with nearby nature and our hospitality. Our greatest wish is that our guests leave happy and replenished by the energy from their stay, wanting to come back and share the experience with friends and family. Experience Iceland in a nutshell on the Reykjanes peninsula less than 20 min drive. See photos by host who will direct you to these places. We can guide you in a high end Toyota Landcruiser 4x4 against a nominal fee. Free WiFi, parking, modern kitchen in a typical and original sixties/seventies apartment.VRBO

name: Kirjuvekkir8a
description: No description found

name: Media Luna Guesthouse
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and free WiFi. Other amenities include a hair dryer, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a toaster.Expedia

name: Hotel Grimsborgir by Keahotels
description: This hotel is located in Ásborgir, within the Golden Circle Region in South Iceland. Selfoss is 15 minutes' drive away from the hotel and 21 km away from the boundary of UNESCO-listed Thingvellir National Park. You can admire the sky and surrounding mountains from the room or outdoor hot tubs. The hotel offers free northern lights wake up calls. WiFi and parking are available free of charge. All rooms at Hotel Grimsborgir by Keahotels come with a balcony or terrace, flat-screen TV, minibar, bathrobes and slippers and private bathroom. The guest rooms have access to 29 private or shared outdoor geothermal hot tubs. The apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen, barbecue grill and private hot tub. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Live music entertains nightly at Grimsborgir's restaurant, and the menu features international dishes made with fresh local ingredients. In the summertime you can enjoy your meal on the patio. Laugarvatn is 34 km from Hotel Grimsborgir by Keahotels, while Reykjavik city centre is 70 km way. Geysir geothermal park and Gullfoss waterfall are about 50 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Brú Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Hotel Dalvik - Aurora Leisure
description: Hotel Dalvík is on the Eyjafjörður Fjord, 600 metres from the geothermal swimming pool and 35 minutes’ drive from Akureyri. It offers views of Tröllaskagi Mountain. Hamar Golf Course is 4 km away. Hotel Dalvík offers rooms with either private or shared bathroom facilities. All rooms have Wi-Fi access. General facilities include a laundry room, a garden and a sun deck with picnic tables. The lobby has a bar, a sitting corner and an internet computer. Fjord cruises, whale watching boats and sea angling trips depart from Dalvík harbour, which is 250 metres from the hotel. The ferry for Grimsey Island departs form there 3 times a week, Popular activities in the area include horseback riding, snowmobiling and mountain skiing.

name: Black Beach Suites
description: Offering a sun terrace and views of the sea, Black Beach Suites is situated in Vík in the South Iceland Region. Reynishverfisvegur Beach is within 4 km of the property. Free WiFi is available. All units include a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units feature a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a microwave. A toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. Free private parking is also available at this aparthotel. Bed linen is offered. The area is popular for skiing and golfing. Dyrhólaey peninsula is 16 km from the property, and Vik town centre is 7 km away.

name: Tehúsið Hostel
description: Tehúsið Hostel has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Egilsstadir. Located around 34 km from Hengifoss, the hostel with free WiFi is also 24 km away from Gufufoss. The accommodation offers karaoke and a shared kitchen. All guest rooms at the hostel come with a seating area. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Tehúsið Hostel also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for hiking and skiing, and bike hire is available at Tehúsið Hostel. The nearest airport is Egilsstaðir Airport, 2 km from the hostel.

name: Minniborgir Cottages & Restaurant
description: Set a 17-minute drive from Selfoss village, these modern cottages include a private kitchen, furnished terrace and a seating area with TV and DVD player. The world famous Geysir is a 30-minute drive away. All units at Minniborgir Cottages & Restaurant have thermal heating and include a private bathroom with shower. Some include a spa bath. Guests can relax in the on-site hot tubs or on the sun terrace. A playground is available for children, while a laundry room is found in the service house. Horseback riding trips and day tours can also be arranged on site. The on-site restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner all-year round. Laugarvatn village is 18 km from Minniborgir.

name: Guesthouse Kiljan
description: No description found

name: Stracta Hotel
description: Stracta Hótel is located is on the south coast of Iceland in the village Hella. Gullfoss Waterfall, the Great Geysir and Thingvellir National Park are all within 83 km of the property. Stracta is next door to many of the spectacular attractions in Iceland. Seljalandsfoss waterfall and Skógafoss waterfall are only 30-45 min drive from our hotel. The Black sand Beach in Vík is 1 hour drive from our hotel. If you like hiking then Thorsmörk is the place to visit! Our modern and Nordic style hotel has private rooms with private facilities. All rooms have private bathroom and Flat screen TV. Free WiFi and plenty of free parking. Hot tubs and sauna are available to our guests. You're welcome to enjoy the hot tubs and sauna free of charge. Enjoy our delicious breakfast buffet that is included in the room rate. Our hotel has a Bistro open 11:30-22:00 and our Bar is open 24/7. Our staff will be happy to welcome you - our reception is open 24/7! Welcome to Stracta Hotel! Our hotel is perfectly located to explore the south coast of Iceland. Our modern and Nordic style hotel has private rooms with private facilities. All rooms have private bathroom and Flat screen TV. Free WiFi and plenty of free parking. What is better than to relax in our hot tubs or blow some steam off in our sauna after a long day of travels?! You're welcome to enjoy the hot tubs and sauna free of charge. You will be enjoy our delicious breakfast buffet that is included in the room rate. Our hotel has a Bistro open 11:30-22:00 and our Bar is open 24/7. Our staff will be happy to welcome you - our reception is open 24/7! Studios are decorated in a typical Nordic style, with hardwood parquet floors, comfortable beds and soothing neutral colors. The Studio cottage is 24m2 (258 sq. ft.) in size. They are ideal for couples or friends or even small families. The sofa is a good option for one adult or two children to sleep on.VRBO

name: Mánagisting Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Varmi Guesthouse Apartments & rooms
description: These modern, self-catering apartments are located in the village of Hveragerdi, 45 km from Reykjavík. Each offers free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchen and access to a shared, furnished garden terrace. The 1-bedroom Varmi Guesthouse Apartments & rooms all have a seating area with a sofa bed and TV. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and toiletries. Staff can help arrange horseback riding trips. Free public parking is possible next to Varmi Guesthouse. The area is known for their heated greenhouses and volcanic hot springs that are popular to hike around. Restaurants, shops and a public swimming pool are within a 10-minute walk, while Selfoss is less than 14 km away.

name: Steinhúsið
description: No description found

name: Grand-Inn Bar and Bed
description: Grand-Inn Bar and Bed has a garden, bar and shared lounge in Sauðárkrókur. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The guest house offers quiet street views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available. At the guest house, the rooms are equipped with a outdoor furniture, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. At Grand-Inn Bar and Bed each room is equipped with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Sauðárkrókur, like skiing and hiking. The nearest airport is Akureyri Airport, 123 km from Grand-Inn Bar and Bed.

name: Isafjordur Hostel
description: Isafjordur Hostel is set in Ísafjörður and offers accommodation with shared bathrooms. The hostel's sister property Hotel Isafjördur is located just 400 metres away, where a 24-hour front desk is found. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. Hiking is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the hostel. Westfjord Maritime Museum is a 12-minute walk away.

name: Fagrahlíd Guesthouse
description: Set in a renovated farmhouse in the southern town of Fljótshlíd, this guest house offers views of the Eyjafjallajökull and Mýrdalsjökull glaciers. Free WiFi, an outdoor hot tub and a furnished terrace with a BBQ are also available. Individual modern décor and furnishings are provided in each of Fagrahlíd Guesthouse's rooms and apartments. Guesthouse Fagrahlíd's daily breakfast buffet includes organic produce and homemade bread and cakes. During summer, a soup supper can be arranged on advanced request. Bicycle storage and a drying room are also available on site. The ferry terminal to the Westman Islands is 25 km away, while the town of Hvolsvöllur is 7 km from the guest house. Staff can arrange area activities such as nature walks, cycling tours and mountain hiking trips on Trihyrningur.

name: Westman Islands Inn
description: 1.9 km from Vestmannaeyjar Golf Club, Westman Islands Inn is situated in Vestmannaeyjar and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Gjábakkafjara Beach. At the inn, each room has a desk. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Westman Islands Inn rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The nearest airport is Vestmannaeyjar Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Husafell
description: Discover adventure amongst nature’s mighty forces, or spend quality time relaxing – the inspiration is yours for the taking. Experience Iceland’s unique bathing culture in our geothermal pools, called Lindin. Featuring a golf course this contemporary hotel offers unique opportunities to relax among the lush landscape of Húsafell. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with a TV, a minibar and cable channels. Featuring a bath or shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk, safety deposit box and bed linen. At Hótel Húsafell you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and bar. The in-house restaurant offers an array of nordic and international dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a tour desk and luggage storage. Relaxing in the Canyon bath (guided tour, fees on the website), hiking, cycling and horse riding can be enjoyed in the surroundings. Thingvellir, a UNESCO listed national park, is 105 km away. Borgarnes is 65 km away. Reykjavík Domestic Airport is 130 km away. Keflavík International Airport is 174 km away.

name: Killara Hotel & Suites
description: Killara Hotel & Suites accommodation is a newly renovated, mid 70’s icon building influenced by its emerging local precinct. Cool white and grey accents, high gloss finishes and contemporary details pay homage to its original origins, highlighting the modern & contemporary look of the precinct. We hope its thoughtful colours, room design will inspire and invigorate you. Located only 15 kms North of the Sydney CBD, 5 minutes from Macquarie Park & Chatswood Business & Shopping District. Here you’re surrounded by the North Shore & Sydney city’s hidden gems. The iconic Manly & Northern Beaches is a 20-minute drive with its famous surf breaks and golden sands. The hotel is located only 25 minutes to Sydney International Airport. Make your way around Killara, Lindfield, Pymble & Gordon’s ’s renowned café scene. Hang about the green habitat, play a round of golf next door at Killara Golf Club or venture to Lane Cove or Kuringai National Park. Stroll to Chatswood or Macquarie Shopping Centre to indulge in your fashion purchase or the abundance of eat street food scene which is synonymous with the precinct. Embrace the community and experience all this thriving urban neighborhood has to offer at Killara Hotel & Suites, your boutique North Shore hotel in Sydney.

name: Manly Paradise Motel & Apartments
description: Directly opposite Sydney's famous Manly Beach, Paradise Motel and Apartments boasts sea views and is within close walking distance to a variety of shops, restaurants and cafés. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned accommodation offers flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. All apartments are individually furnished and include a private balcony overlooking Manly beach. Manly Paradise Motel & Apartments are just a 7-minute walk from Manly Wharf.

name: Abcot Inn
description: Offering a large outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi throughout the property, the Abcot Inn is located a short walk from restaurants and convenience shops. All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities, an en suite bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms feature a kitchenette or a spa bath. Continental or cooked Australian breakfast is available daily at the buffet, or room service can be ordered. In-room evening meals are also available. The Abcot Inn is located across the road from the Kareela Golf and Social Club. It is a 20-minute drive from Sydney International Airport. Cronulla Beach is a 15-minute drive away and Kogarah and Hurtsville are just a 10-minute drive.

name: Hotel Bondi
description: Located across the road from Bondi Beach, guests enjoy free WiFi at Hotel Bondi. You can enjoy a meal at the onsite bar and restaurant or use the gaming lounge facilities. Some rooms have a balcony with sea views. Bondi Hotel is a 7-minute drive from Bondi Junction and a 15-minute drive from Sydney CBD. Sydney Airport is a 22-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer ironing facilities and a bathroom with free toiletries. Some rooms have a kitchenette or a sofa. Room service is also available. Guests can relax on the shared balcony.

name: Quest North Sydney
description: Set in Sydney, Quest North Sydney offers free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a fitness centre, a shared lounge and a garden. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. From November 2020 to January 2021, a breakfast basket is provided with products for self-cooking in your apartment, subject to availability. The aparthotel offers a sauna. A car rental service is available at Quest North Sydney. Luna Park Sydney is 2 km from the accommodation, while Circular Quay is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Kingsford Smith, 14 km from Quest North Sydney, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Sebel Sydney Manly Beach
description: The hotel offers the finest in accommodation and service. Each stylish room and suite features a spacious bedroom, luxurious bathroom, laundry facilities, contemporary furnishings, a work desk, modem connection, and dedicated data point. Just a short stroll away, you'll find cosmopolitan cafes, trendy galleries, boutiques, surf shops, and the sparkling waters of Manly Beach. The hotel is the gateway to Manly's unique beach culture.accorhotels.com

name: Linley House
description: Offering free WiFi and free on-site parking, Linley House is located across from Lane Cove River where guests can enjoy fishing, kayaking and scenic walks. The air-conditioned guest rooms offer a TV and a radio with alarm functions. Toilet and bathroom facilities are shared for most rooms. The property offers a communal lounge room, laundry facilities and an outdoor terrace. Barbecue equipment is available for use. Linley House is 10 km from central Sydney and just 500 metres from Hunters Hill’s suburb centre. It is 5.4 km from Chatswood Golf Club and 16 km from Sydney Airport.

name: Vulcan Hotel Sydney
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Darling Harbour, Vulcan Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fireplace, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Access to the hotel's golf course (within 3 km), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Sydney, Vulcan Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Sydney Bondi Junction, An IHG Hotel
description: At Holiday Inn and Suites Sydney Bondi Junction, we are there for the moments that matter. Whether you are travelling for business or leisure, we offer a home away from home. Our studio suites are equipped with a kitchenette and amenities. The hotel's convenient location means you are a short walk from Bondi Junction Transport Hub, providing easy access to Sydney CBD, Sydney Cricket Ground, Moore Park, Randwick Racecourse and the iconic Bondi Beach. Bondi Junction has a variety of dining and entertainment options or choose to relax in your suite if you prefer to self-cater. Whether it is time with friends, family, colleagues or clients, at Holiday Inn and Suites Sydney Bondi Junction, we pride ourselves on delivering warm and welcoming hospitality. So what are you waiting for. Book your next stay with us now.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Airport
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Airport is less than 20 minutes’ drive from Sydney City Centre and Paddington District. Free WiFi at 1 Mbps for four devices per room, per day is available. Each room offers a kitchen or kitchenette and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Apartments come complete with a seating and dining area, washing machine, microwave and refrigerator. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to Sydney Airport’s Adina Apartment Hotel. Amenities provided include meeting facilities and a fitness centre. Sydney Airport is 600 metres away. The hotel is also 20 minutes' drive from Botany Bay and 6 km from Sydney Football Stadium/Sydney Cricket Ground, Randwick Race Course, and Centennial Park.

name: Meriton Suites Zetland
description: Meriton Suites Zetland offer luxurious self-contained accommodation just 5 minutes’ drive from the lively Danks Street cafés. The air-conditioned suites feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests enjoy unlimited, free WiFi at the property. Union Pay is accepted here. Meriton Suites Zetland are 3 minutes’ drive from Moore Park Golf Course, and 15 minutes’ walk from Green Square Train Station. Sydney International Airport and Sydney CBD are both a 15-minute drive away. All suites have a well-equipped kitchenette or kitchen with a microwave and refrigerator. Each suite has a spacious living and dining area.

name: Perouse Randwick by Sydney Lodges
description: Perouse Randwick by Sydney Lodges is a small family-owned property located in the heart of Randwick in Sydney, just 20 minutes’ walk from Coogee Beach. The University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital and Sydney Children’s Hospital are each a 5-minute walk away. The property is located opposite a bus stop, and only 20 minutes' by bus or tram from Sydney’s city centre or the famous Bondi Beach. All rooms feature air-conditioning, free WiFi up to 1GB per day, flat-screen TV's, a small refrigerator and tea and coffee-making facilities. Each room also includes a private en suite bathroom with free toiletries. Premium linen and towels are included. Some rooms feature a private balcony. Perouse Randwick by Sydney Lodges offers guests the use of a shared communal kitchen and guest laundry. There are a number of restaurants and cafés in The Spot area, just a 5-minute walk from Perouse Randwick by Sydney Lodges.

name: Coogee Sands Hotel & Apartments
description: Coogee Sands Hotel and Apartments is located just 20 metres from the picturesque Coogee Beach and a 15-minute drive from Sydney CBD and Airport. The rooms and apartments at Coogee Sands feature air conditioning, cable TV, and fully-equipped kitchenettes with microwaves. Coogee Sands Hotel offers free undercover car parking, 24-hour reception and guest laundry. Guests can relax on the large rooftop sundeck and barbecue area, enjoying panoramic ocean and park views. The Randwick Racecourse, Sydney Cricket Ground, and Sydney Football Stadium are a short drive from Coogee Sands Hotel. Other nearby attractions include Centennial Park, the Entertainment Quarter and iconic Bondi Beach.

name: Novotel Sydney Olympic Park
address: 11, Olympic Blvd, Herb Elliott Ave, Sydney, NSW 2127
description: Check in to 4-star comfort at Novotel Sydney Olympic Park hotel with stadium, arena, showground and aquatic center at your door. Enjoy dining in the restaurant or terrace and take in views over Sydney Olympic Park. Novotel Sydney Olympic Park is the ideal choice for guests attending an event or business conference at Sydney Olympic Park.accorhotels.com

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Chippendale
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Chippendale is located in Sydney and is close to the area's popular attractions. It also provides a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and a swimming pool. The property offers modern accommodation, and is the perfect base for both holiday makers and business travelers. There is also a barbecue area available for guests to use. This property provides apartments with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all offer an in-room safe, a seating area and a refrigerator. Adina Apartment Hotel Sydney Chippendale is close to Redfern Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Sydney and its surrounding areas. There are a variety of nightlife, shopping and dining options a stone's throw away.Revato

name: The Miller Hotel North Sydney
description: The Miller Hotel North Sydney (Formerly Rydges North Sydney) is perfectly situated within close walking distance to North Sydney’s bustling business district and only a short journey over the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge to Sydney’s city centre. The Miller Hotel North Sydney is perfect for both corporate and leisure guests given it’s wide range of room types, including 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom suites as well as onsite underground parking. Its location is ideal for the North Sydney CBD and office cluster and leisure attractions such as the Taronga Zoo, Luna Park and Darling Harbour, while the Kingsford Smith International Airport is only 11 km from the hotel.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Burwood
description: Comfort Inn & Suites Burwood offers a range of modern rooms, suites and apartments. The hotel is only 8 minutes’ drive to Sydney Olympic Park and 20 minutes drive to Sydney city centre. Guests can enjoy the spacious landscaped courtyards with barbecue facilities, or the dining room which serves dinner and breakfast. Covered car parking is available. The property is 25 minutes' drive from Sydney Airport and is central to a range of hospitals and health services in the Burwood area. Westfield Burwood is a 5-minute drive away, which offers a cinema and range of shopping and dining experiences. Conveniently located in Sydney’s inner west, a shuttle bus service is available that connects to local train stations including Burwood, Strathfield and Campsie.

name: Nesuto Chippendale
description: Nesuto Chippendale Sydney Apartment Hotel offers serviced apartmentslocated on the fringe of the city of Sydney, just 2kms from Sydneys CentralBusiness District and within walking distance to the University of Technology(UTS) and Sydney University.We are located in Chippendale, approximately 2km from the heart of the cityon the southern side towards Central Railway Station. Our location makes forthe ideal accommodation for either the corporate or leisure traveller whilstbeing close by to all of the great icons in central Sydney. Chippendale has also more recently become known as one of the key creative art districts of Sydney, with more than a dozen galleries in the small neighbourhood including White Rabbit Gallery, MOP Projects, and Pine Street Creative Arts Centre.Chippendale is notable for being the location of the 168-year-old Carlton& United brewery which closed in December 2006. The site has since beenredeveloped into commercial and residential space called Central Park whichincludes a large new park called Chippendale Green.We have a selection of fully self-contained studio and one bedroomapartments all with balconies, kitchenettes and laundry facilities along witha rooftop swimming pool and sauna, gymnasium, rooftop terrace and BBQarea, undercover security parking, high speed WiFi access throughout theproperty and tour desk facilities.Nesuto Chippendale Sydney Apartment Hotel offers all the comforts of homewhilst providing the convenience of apartment style hotel accommodationwhich is ideal for corporate and leisure travellers looking for short term orextended stay accommodation within Sydney.iHotelier/iStay

name: Meriton Suites Waterloo
description: Meriton Suites Waterloo offers refurbished, self-contained accommodation, just 10 minutes’ drive from central Sydney and Sydney International Airport. Guests have access to an off-site indoor pool, a hot tub and a fitness centre located 3 minutes' walk from the hotel. Guests enjoy unlimited free WiFi at the property. This refurbished apartment complex is situated opposite Moore Park Golf Course. Sydney Cricket Ground (SCG), Sydney Football Stadium and Royal Randwick Racecourse are all within a 5-minute drive away. The air-conditioned suites each have laundry facilities and a flat-screen TV. Studios offer a kitchenette, while all other suites have a full kitchen. The property is 5 minutes’ walk from a number of trendy cafés and restaurants on Danks Street. A supermarket and a number of fast food options are located within the complex. Additional toiletries, shaving kits, dental packs and extra towels are available from reception.

name: The Village Bondi Beach
description: Located just 2 minutes' walk from world famous Bondi Beach, The Village Bondi Beach offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms. Renovated in June, 2017, the hostel is a 20-minute drive from Sydney Harbour and the city centre, and 25 minutes’ drive from Sydney Airport. Markets, shops, restaurants and cafes are all within 2 minutes’ walk from the property. Facilities include a guest laundry, kitchen, TV room and lounge room. All rooms include a private bathroom and secure keycard entry. There is a bus stop located at the end of the street. Free WiFi is available with a limit of 500mb per day. Additional WiFi can be purchased for an additional charge. The famous Bondi Icebergs Restaurant & Bar is a short 10-minute walk from The Village Bondi Beach.

name: Studio 8 Residences - Adults Only
description: Welcome to Studio 8 Residences. Whether its for work or play we have you covered with Sydneys latest accommodation offering, incorporating seamless design with functionality and style. Situated in the City Of Ryde, Studio 8 boasts the convenience of location with ample transport options right on our doorstep without the hustle and bustle of the inner city. You will find endless cafes and restaurants in this leafy urban playground making Studio 8 a perfect place to call your home away from home if its for just one night or an extended stay.Studio 8 Residences also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Sydney. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping and private car parking are just a few of the facilities that set Studio 8 Residences apart from other hotels in the city. Featuring a rooftop terrace with city views and BBQ facilities, the adults-only Studio 8 Residences offers accommodation in Ryde and is situated opposite the Top Ryde City Shopping Centre. Discover an engaging blend of professional service and a wide array of features at Studio 8 Residences.iHotelier/iStay

name: Manly Pacific Sydney MGallery Collection
description: Influenced by the local spirit and romance of Manly's iconic heritage, Manly Pacific Sydney Mgallery Collection boasts front-row seats to the famous Manly beach in Sydney, Australia. Be it a beachside romance, a coastal conference or a change of pace where you can stretch out your days, you enter a new world of possibility at Manly Pacific Sydney Mgallery Collection. Feel the change of pace that comes with a coastal lifestyle. Feel Manly Pacific.accorhotels.com

name: Veriu Green Square
description: Veriu Green Square provides a comfortable setting when in Sydney. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free Wi-Fi. The hotel provides luggage storage, a dry cleaning service and a 24-hour reception. A lift, a business centre and a laundry service are also provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. They feature a seating area, an alarm clock and a refrigerator. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Veriu Green Square is an ideal base to explore the Sydney Opera House and Kings Cross, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The hotel also offers easy access to Sydney Airport.Revato

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney
description: Located in Sydney, Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney is an easy drive from Kings Cross and provides public parking on site. The various facilities this modern property has to offer include a concierge, a heated pool and a 24-hour reception. This stylish property provides a range of amenities, including luggage storage, a safe and wireless internet access in public areas. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. All apartments are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a refrigerator, a private balcony and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the apartment's sitting area. Sydney's attractions, including Sculpture by the Sea and Bondi Beach, are easily accessible on foot from Adina Apartment Hotel Bondi Beach Sydney. Sydney Airport is a 30-minute drive away.Revato

name: Bijoux Beach House
description: Located in Freshwater, 1.1 km from Curl Curl Beach, Bijoux Beach House provides accommodation with a garden, free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk, and full-day security. Guests benefit from a patio and a picnic area. The chalet is equipped with 1 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with garden views. Freshwater Beach is 1.5 km from the chalet, while Manly Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Sydney Kingsford Smith, 28 km from Bijoux Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Morgans Boutique Hotel
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace with views of Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge, The Social Hotel, Sydney offers accommodation in the trendy Darlinghurst district. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. Morgans Hotel Darlinghurst offers independent rooms and apartments with flat-screen cable TV. Each room has a microwave, a refrigerator and a kettle. Some rooms have a full kitchen or a balcony. Guests can access the roof terrace with panoramic views of the eastern suburbs and Sydney Harbour. Just 10 minutes’ drive from the city centre, Morgans Hotel is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants, bars and nightlife of Kings Cross. Trains from Kings Cross to central Sydney depart regularly. Oxford Street is a 10-minute walk from The Social Hotel, Sydney. The hotel is a 25-minute drive from Sydney International Airport. LATE CHECK IN REQUIREMENTS Please contact the property directly if you require late check-in. Guests will be required to send a copy of their drivers license, passport prior to check in and if a valid ID was not received the booking will be canceled.

name: Nesuto Pennant Hills
description: Located within a 10-minute walk of Pennant Hills Railway Station, Nesuto Pennant Hills Apartment Hotel is an ideal base when in Sydney. It also offers a swimming pool and a sauna. The property provides a number of amenities, including room service, a 24-hour reception and a golf course. A fitness centre can be readily accessed by guests wanting to keep active while travelling. The air conditioned apartments at Nesuto Pennant Hills Apartment Hotel include a kitchen with a refrigerator and a microwave. All provide tea and coffee making facilities, ironing facilities and an alarm clock. The property offers breakfast each morning that guests can enjoy before venturing out to explore the surrounding region. Nesuto Pennant Hills Apartment Hotel is within walking distance of Thornleigh Railway Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. The Sydney Harbour Bridge is within an easy car ride from the property.Revato

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Coogee Sydney
description: Offering an indoor pool, Adina Apartment Hotel Coogee Sydney is located in Sydney and is a short walk from Coogee Beach. Guests can also enjoy complimentary internet access throughout the property. The property has a fitness centre with free weights, a swimming pool and cardiovascular equipment. Family facilities include highchairs. Apartments are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a flat-screen TV, floor-to-ceiling windows and a rain shower. Each provide tea and coffee making facilities, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Adina Apartment Hotel Coogee Sydney is set in the popular tourist destination of Eastern Suburbs. Bondi Beach and Kings Cross are just a short drive from the property.Revato

name: Middle Park Hotel
description: The historic Middle Park Hotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi and a large flat-screen TV. It is located 10 minutes’ drive from Melbourne city centre. Free street parking is available nearby the property. All rooms at the boutique-style Middle Park Hotel have been individually designed and feature air-conditioning and en suite bathroom with shower.
