The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner. It serves classic dishes matched with an extensive list of drinks including cocktails, wines and beers. Middle Park is located 1.5 km from Albert Park and 2.5 km from St Kilda. Port Phillip Bay is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. There is no lift. Rooms are located on the 1st and 2nd floors.

name: Element Melbourne Richmond
description: Find your focus in Melbourne, Australia. Element Melbourne Richmond is our eco-friendly hotel near sports arenas and the Yarra River. Light-filled hotel rooms and suites offer striking views of the city and are pet-friendly for the perfect family retreat in Richmond. Award-winning Heavenly® Beds by Westin and spa-inspired bathrooms with rain showers help you feel restored. Live well with hotel amenities such as a library lounge area, laundry and dry-cleaning services, car parking and electric vehicle charging points. Get moving at our 24-hour Motion Fitness center or head to the trails near Yarra River with one of our bicycle rentals. Join us at Mint Lane, our al fresco restaurant and bar, or opt for a quiet, private evening to yourself with in-room dining. If you're hosting a special event or meeting, take advantage of nearly 3,000 square feet of event space including catering, expert planners and an outdoor terrace with views of Melbourne. Live your life as you see fit at Element Melbourne Richmond.Marriott

name: W Melbourne
description: Reveal to revel at W Melbourne, sitting in the heart of the Melbourne CBD on the iconic Flinders Lane, the luxury hotel takes its design cues from the laneways that it sits between. Extending the laneway culture inside, 294 bold rooms and suites peel back the layers and revel in the city’s creative history. 830 square meters of ultra-modern event space will set the stage for spectacular events. Vibrant restaurants and bars electrify the experience; with Warabi offering Japanese omakase dining, Lollo taking you from day-to-night, celebrating Melbourne’s multicultural cuisine influences, subterranean cocktail bar, Curious is the bar to see and be seen in and Culprit is a café come bar that serves up your double shot latte, to an afternoon spritz. Head to Level 14 for the state-of-the-art FIT gym then dip and a sip poolside in WET®, all whilst soaking up city skyline views.Marriott

name: Quay West Suites Melbourne
description: Quay West is ideally located at Southbank overlooking the Yarra River. Adjacent to shops, restaurants and bars, next door to Hamer Hall & the National Gallery of Victoria, and a stroll to the sporting stadiums of Melbourne. Offering fully self-contained one, two and three bedroom apartments and all the services and facilities of a 5 star hotel. Experience our magnesium mineral pool and steam room along with modern gym and spa. Enjoy the ambience of Jarrah Restaurant and Bar with outdoor terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Tyrian Albert Park Lake
description: Tyrian Serviced Apartments Melbourne offers modern, luxury accommodation in Melbourne. You can swim in the rooftop terrace pool with views of Albert Lake or work out in the building's fitness centre. A hot tub and sauna are also available for you to relax in. The property overlooks the Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit. The property is just 4 km from Melbourne CBD, where guests have access to Melbourne's famous lane ways, cafes and shopping. The Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne is just 1.2 km from the property. Each apartment blends aesthetic style with functionality offering a private balcony and bathroom with luxury amenities. Some units offer fully equipped kitchens, fitted with quality stainless steel appliances. Free WiFi is available in each apartment. Watch the sunset with a drink or enjoy a BBQ on the rooftop terrace.

name: Cosmopolitan Hotel
description: The Cosmopolitan Hotel Melbourne is ideally located at the heart of vibrant St Kilda, only 2 minutes from Acland Street's café culture and with a tram stop in front of the hotel. Luna Park, Palais Theatre, St Kilda Arts Market and The Esplanade are all on the doorstep. The Cosmopolitan offers modern accommodation options from minimalist rooms to contemporary hotel rooms and well-equipped serviced apartments. All units feature free WiFi and off-street parking. The conference room and shared lounge feature much natural light and audio-visual equipment. It offers a capacity for 40 people theatre style.

name: Fairways Resort
description: Located within Rosebud Country Club, Fairways Resort offers a restaurant and bar. It features suites with a private outdoor courtyard. Fitted with air conditioning and heating facilities, suites feature a flat-screen TV and internet access. A private bathroom with a hairdryer is included. All rooms have a toaster and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can play a round of golf at the 36-hole championship golf course or visit the tour desk for activities like horse riding, boating or visits to nearby attractions. The resort offers a guest laundry and provides free parking. View Restaurant offers a modern Australian menu with a variety of wines. Alternatively, barbecue facilities are available. Fairways is a 10-minute drive from Peninsula Hot Springs and The Enchanted Maze Garden. Within a 30-minute drive away are Point Nepean National Park and Ashcombe Maze & Lavender Gardens.

name: Quest Grand Hotel Melbourne
description: Located at 33 Spencer Street Melboourne,Grand Hotel Melbourne is a historic Melbourne icon offering fully self-contained apartments with a modern kitchen. Guest facilities include an indoor heated pool and spa pool, fitness centre with sauna. 400 MB of free WiFi is included per day. Beautifully restored to retain its 19th-century origins, with wrought iron railings and Victorian-era windows, Grand Hotel Melbourne is located in Melbourne CBD, within a 5-minute walk of Crown Casino, Southbank, Docklands and Marvel Stadium. Gaylord Restaurant offers Tandoori cuisine originating from Northern India during the Mughal times. The menu is extensive with enticing specialties and modern international classic dishes. Front desk is open from 7 am to 11 pm. Grand Hotel Melbourne also features a small library, concierge service. Each studio and apartment offers absolute comfort and including high ceilings. Some with a view of the city below.

name: The Sebel Melbourne Moonee Ponds
description: Our fully furnished apartments are ideal for short and long stays and is the perfect out of town location for business & leisure travelers. Facilities include in room Wi-Fi, Google Chrome-cast, housekeeping services and use of the onsite fitness center. Secure on-site parking is available and subject to availability (additional charges may apply). Close to essential shops, public transport and with an array of restaurants for your dining pleasure.accorhotels.com

name: Naima Hotel
description: Located in Melbourne, 2.3 km from Middle Park Beach, Naima Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The accommodation features evening entertainment and luggage storage space. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Naima Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. St Kilda Beach is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 15 km from Naima Hotel.

name: Boathouse Resort Studios & Suites
description: Ideally located opposite Blairgowrie beach, the Yacht Club and Marina, Boathouse Resort Studios and Suites offers free WiFi, an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ facilities. The resort boasts an onsite restaurant and bar, Panda. There are shopping and other dining options within a 2-minute walk. All split-system air-conditioned accommodation offers an open-plan living and dining area with a sofa and flat-screen TV with Blu-Ray DVD player. Each feature a separate bathroom with a hairdryer and complimentary amenities. There are tea/coffee making facilities, a refrigerator, microwave, sink and a Nespresso coffee machine in each accommodation. Each upstairs suite offers a balcony and high cathedral ceilings. Some accommodation features a spa bath. Situated in the Mornington Peninsula, Boathouse Resort Studios and Suites is 4 minutes’ drive from the Sorrento car ferry. Peninsula Hot Springs is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Rye Hotel - One Four Nelson
description: Located in Rye, One Four Nelson offers hotel accommodation just 50 metres from the shores of Port Phillip Bay. All its modern suites feature a balcony or patio overlooking the outdoor pool. Contemporary furniture and kitchenettes are featured in all suites. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and free WiFi connection for 1 device per day, and some offer a hydromassage bath. Guests of One Four Nelson can relax on the terrace around the pool, or soothe their muscles in the spa pool. In-room massage treatments can also be scheduled. The Rye Hotel Pub is a few steps from One Four Nelson and features bar with games room and a restaurant. It is open for breakfast, light meals and al fresco dining on the balcony.

name: Mercure Melbourne Albert Park
description: Mercure Melbourne Albert Park is centrally located on Queens Road overlooking the picturesque Albert Park Lake, the renowned F1 Australian Grand Prix track and situated adjacent to parks, sporting facilities and a golf course. The property has access to one of Melbourne's largest Conference & Events centers. Choose from 32 function rooms with over 2,600 square meters of space with a seating capacity of up to 1400 guests. Spacious, modern and comfortable rooms & suits are suitable for any occasionaccorhotels.com

name: City Edge Serviced Apartments East Melbourne
description: City Edge East Melbourne Apartment Hotel provides a comfortable setting when in Melbourne. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free Wi-Fi. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the property, including luggage storage, express check-in/check-out and car hire. Laundry facilities, a tour desk and a ticket service are also provided. All apartments are air conditioned and boast their very own sitting and dining area. Each have tea and coffee making facilities, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. City Edge East Melbourne Apartment Hotel is close to shops, dining and Melbourne's nightlife. Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex is only a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Quest Maribyrnong
description: Quest Maribyrnong provides a comfortable setting when in Melbourne. It also offers free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a rooftop terrace. The hotel has a fitness centre with a terrace. There is also disabled parking for guests with a car. The rooms at Quest Maribyrnong are air-conditioned and offer a refrigerator, bottled water and a coffee maker. They provide an alarm clock, an in-room safe and blackout curtains. The hotel has private parking on site and is within easy driving distance of Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex, Collins Street and Federation Square. Melbourne Airport is a 25-minute drive away.Revato

name: Ciloms Airport Lodge
description: Just a 10 minutes’ drive from Melbourne International Airport, Ciloms Lodge features free WiFi access and indoor swimming pool. A free airport shuttle is available at any time of the day. Air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV. Ciloms Airport Lodge is a 25-minute drive from the Melbourne city centre. Melbourne Zoo and the University of Melbourne are each 20 minutes’ drive away. All rooms come with en suite bathrooms with a hairdryer. Each room includes a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. The 24-hour front desk can arrange and luggage storage services.

name: Airport Tourist Village Melbourne
description: Airport Tourist Village Melbourne is a 5-minute drive from Direct Factory Outlets, and a 10-minute drive from Tullamarine Domestic & International Airport. It offers a free parking on site. Guest rooms come with either a kitchen or a kitchenette. Rooms feature reverse-cycle air conditioning. The en suite bathroom comes with shower and a hairdryer. The property has a games room and a DVD library. A coin-operated laundry service is provided. Melbourne Airport Tourist Village is a 10-minute drive from the Living Legends, and a 15-minute drive from the Sunbury Wine Region. It is within a 35-minute drive from Melbourne’s CBD and the National Gallery of Victoria. Located next door, Reflections Restaurant serves international dishes for breakfast and dinner. Both buffet and a la carte options are offered.

name: Quest Prahran
description: Quest Prahran offers self-contained apartments within 2 minutes’ walk from Chapel Street and The Prahran Market. Each has a fully equipped kitchen and laundry, plus a separate lounge/dining area. All apartments at Quest Serviced Apartments Prahran are air-conditioned and include a Smart TV with broadband internet access. Most apartments also have a private balcony. Each of the 2 and 3-bedroom apartments has a second bathroom. Secure on-site car parking is available. Valet dry cleaning and a pantry shopping service can be arranged. Guests can charge their meals from selected local restaurants back to their apartment. St Kilda Road and the Royal Botanic Gardens are both 15 minutes’ walk from the complex. It is a 10-minute walk to the Alfred Hospital. Melbourne city centre is just a 10-minute drive away. It is a 10-minute drive to Cabrini Hospital and The Avenue Hospital is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Treasury on Collins
description: Treasury On Collins is set in the heart of Melbourne and is within an easy walk of Melbourne Aquarium. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is within walking distance from Flinders Street Station. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at the hotel, such as an executive floor, an express check-in and check-out feature and free Wi-Fi. Guests are able to relax with a book in the library. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature premium amenities such as luxury toiletries, slippers and a pillow menu. For those who would like to cook independently, there is a kitchenette that is conveniently equipped with a microwave and a refrigerator. The on-site restaurant offers local cuisine in an elegant setting. Treasury On Collins is close to Melbourne's well-known attractions, with Bourke Street Mall just a 10-minute walk away. Guests can also visit Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and Federation Square.Revato

name: Box Hill Motel
description: Situated in Burwood, 8.3 km from Chadstone Shopping Mall, Box Hill Motel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. This 3-star motel offers free WiFi. The motel has family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the motel the rooms include bed linen and towels. Princess Theatre is 15 km from Box Hill Motel, while Rod Laver Arena is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 31 km from the accommodation.

name: Quest Frankston on The Bay
description: Located in the heart of the Frankston restaurant precinct, 200 metres from the beach, Quest Frankston on the Bay features a fitness centre, a sun terrace with BBQ facilities and a conference centre. It offers self-contained accommodation with kitchen facilities. All air-conditioned apartments feature a seating area, a work desk and a flat-screen TV. Each includes a refrigerator, microwave, oven and stove. Quest Frankston on the Bay is 750 metres from Frankston Railway Station. It is 45 minutes' drive from central Melbourne. Melbourne Airport is an hour's drive away.

name: Mercure Melbourne St Kilda Road
description: Located in the centre of the St Kilda Road Melbourne district, minutes from Albert Lake where the Melbourne Grand Prix takes place, The Alfred Hospital, Fawkner Park, the American Consulate and many corporate names, Mercure St Kilda Road is a short tram ride away from the City. Newly refurbished & exceptional level of comfort, premium beds, kitchenette, balconies, ensuite showers, free wifi and chrome cast TV technology in every room. Onsite restaurant, bar, gym and laundry.accorhotels.com

name: Quest St Kilda Road
description: Quest St Kilda Road features a fitness room and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Melbourne, 2.9 km from Middle Park Beach, 1.8 km from Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne and 2.5 km from National Gallery of Victoria. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. After a day of cycling or fishing, guests can relax in the shared lounge area. Shrine of Remembrance is 1.8 km from the aparthotel, while Arts Centre Melbourne is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 15 km from Quest St Kilda Road.

name: Quest St Kilda Bayside
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from St Kilda Beach, Quest offers accommodation with a private balcony and a fully equipped kitchen. Guests enjoy a fitness centre and there is a heated pool and BBQ facilities available in the summer months. Each studio and apartment features an LCD TV, dining area, laundry facilities and a private bathroom with its own 50 litre hot water system. Guests are welcome to self-cater using their fully equipped kitchen which offers an oven, refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher. Alternatively, you can dine at nearby restaurants that can have your meal costs added to your room bill. Quest St Kilda Bayside are just 500 metres from the Albert Park Grand Prix Circuit and a 10-minute walk from Luna Park and The Esplanade Hotel. It is a 15-minute drive from Melbourne's city centre.

name: The Sands by Nightcap Plus
description: The Sands by Nightcap Plus has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Carrum Downs. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, an ATM and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, each room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a kettle, while some rooms have a kitchenette with a microwave. At The Sands by Nightcap Plus rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Dandenong Train Station is 14 km from the accommodation, while Victoria Golf Club is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 59 km from The Sands by Nightcap Plus.

name: Quest on Dorcas
description: Quest on Dorcas is only 10 minutes’ walk from the National Gallery of Victoria, and 5 minutes’ drive from Crown Casino. Melbourne Cricket Ground is a 10-minute drive, and Melbourne Airport is a 25-minute drive away. The air-conditioned apartments have laundry facilities and a kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Each apartment has a spacious lounge and a private balcony. Guests have access to a fitness centre, a liquor store, a cafe and secure covered parking (fee) and free WiFi. Restaurant and grocery deliveries can be organised.

name: Park Regis Griffin Suites
description: This modern property in Melbourne provides free wireless internet, as well as luggage storage and a tour desk. It is ideally positioned for guests wishing to visit local attractions. This stylish property provides a car rental desk, a dry cleaning service and a designated smoking area. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. The apartments are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a DVD player. They all have an alarm clock, heating and a desk. Park Regis Griffin Suites serves breakfast each morning, and has a bar where guests can relax with a drink. Park Regis Griffin provides parking and is a brief car ride from Albert Park. It is within a 20-minute walk of Windsor Railway Station and Prahran Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Melbourne.Revato

name: The Sebel Melbourne Malvern
description: The Sebel Melbourne Malvern is located in picturesque Malvern. Our stylish, spacious and exquisite serviced apartments provide guests with all the comforts of home. The Sebel Malvern is within walking distance to local restaurants and bars and near to Melbourne CBD, Monash University, Caulfield Racecourse and Chadstone Mall. We offer guests 24 hour reception, car parking (cost apply), onsite executive boardroom, dining, media room, gym, spa & sauna. Perfect for individual, corporate or family travellers.accorhotels.com

name: Eltham Gateway Hotel
description: Set on 2 acres of beautiful gardens, Eltham Gateway Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with garden views and 32-inch flat-screen TVs. The property features conference facilities,free Wi-Fi and free parking. Eltham Gateway Hotel & Conference Centre is 30 minutes’ drive from Melbourne Tullamarine Airport. The Yarra Valley Parklands and the Doncaster Westfield Shopping Centre are each a 10-minute drive away. Eltham Gateway Hotel is only 800 meters away from a well-known wedding venue " Ballara Rception. All rooms have an en suite bathroom, and most rooms also feature a kitchenette, there is a guest laundry facilities onsite and room service is also available. Some of the hotel rooms have been newly renovated and refurbished.

name: Quest Flemington Central
description: Located adjacent to Flemington Racecourse, Quest Flemington Central have access to beautiful facilities, including an infinity pool, fitness centre, BBQ and a rooftop terrace. Quest Flemington Central are 15 minutes' walk from Melbourne Showgrounds, 12 minutes' drive from Melbourne Zoo and 17 minutes' drive from Melbourne CBD (Central Business District). On the inside, each apartment offers luxury and both city and racetrack views. Complimentary WiFi, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen are provided. Etihad Stadium is 4.1 km from Quest Flemington Central, while Melbourne Museum is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Best Western Plus Buckingham International
description: Stay at this boutique Melbourne motel, located in the suburb of Highett, a short distance from Southland Shopping Centre and Highett Railway Station, giving you easy access to Melbourne's City Center. Bayside beaches are just three kilometers away. The Best Western Plus Buckingham International offers 4 Star accommodation in Melbourne, including 67 rooms and four apartments. All rooms feature free wireless broadband and eight channels of Foxtel® cable television. Other facilities at this Melbourne hotel include a pool and barbeque, set in quiet, immaculately groomed gardens. The Best Western Plus Buckingham International is renowned for weddings and functions, and can accommodate up to 150 guests, while Deux Soeurs is open Tuesday to Saturday 6:00 pm to 9:30 pm serving French cuisine. For superior customer service and a convenient location in Melbourne, make a reservation at the Best Western Plus Buckingham International today! Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Nightcap at The Cheeky Squire
description: Featuring a bar and free WiFi, Nightcap at The Cheeky Squire is located in Frankston, 400 metres from Frankston Arts Centre. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The hotel features an Australian restaurant. The units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a microwave. All rooms in The Cheeky Squire are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 58 km from the accommodation.

name: Pan Pacific Melbourne
address: 2 Convention Ctr Place, South Wharf, Melbourne, VIC 3006
description: Less than a 20-minute stroll from Southern Cross Railway Station, Pan Pacific Melbourne offers guests an ideal base when in Melbourne. It offers city views and complimentary Wi-Fi. This modern hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, a ballroom and an executive floor. For families Pan Pacific Melbourne offers babysitting/child services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a mini bar and an iPod docking station. The bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and a shower, and come with a hair dryer and bathrobes. Pan Pacific Melbourne's on-site restaurant, Dock 37 Bar & Kitchen, is a popular place to enjoy a meal. Attractions close to the hotel include Melbourne Aquarium, Docklands Stadium and Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex. Guests can also visit the King Street Bridge and Rialto Towers.Revato

name: Nightcap at Sandbelt Hotel
address: Cnr. South & Bignell Roads, Moorabbin, VIC 3165
description: Located within a 10-minute drive of Melbourne’s ‘Sandbelt Golf Courses’, Nightcap at Sandbelt Hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an onsite bar and restaurant. All guest rooms feature a TV with cable channels. Nightcap at Sandbelt Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Karkarook Lake and Park. It is a 5-minute drive from both Yarra Yarra Golf Club and Commonwealth Golf Club. Melbourne CBD is a 25-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms offer a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They have a seating area, a desk and ironing facilities. The bathroom has a shower and a toilet. Children will enjoy the indoor play area complete with a playground and DVDs. Other facilities include billiards tables and a laundry. Guests enjoy free parking.

name: Seasons Botanic Gardens
description: Seasons Botanic Gardens combines the space and independence of self-contained apartments with the amenities of a luxury hotel. It is located on St Kilda Road, Melbourne and overlooks Melbourne's Royal Botanic Gardens. The Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) is located just 2.2 km from the property. Seasons Botanic Gardens offers facilities such as heated indoor pool, fitness centre, spa pool, sauna and self-parking. All the apartments are non-smoking and come with spacious living areas and balconies. The building also includes a business centre with meeting facilities. Seasons Botanic Gardens is located 1 km from Southbank Theatre, while the Rod Laver Arena is 1.5 km away. It is an 8-minute drive from Alfred Hospital and 1 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.

name: Norwood House Motel & Reception Centre
description: Norwood House Receptions and Motel has 15 rooms and features an indoor pool. This modern motel is situated in Mt Eliza. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Wi-Fi is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. They are also equipped with a toaster, a DVD player and a microwave.Revato

name: Best Western Mill Park Motel
description: Best Western Mill Park Motel offers 4-star accommodation in Melbourne. All rooms are on the ground floor and have access to high-speed wireless Internet. Choose from king and queen spas, family, twin and standard rooms. Other facilities at Best Western Mill Park Motel include a breakfast dining room, breakfast baskets, room service, breakfast and conference/meeting room facilities. Guests staying at the Best Western Mill Park Motel will be within walking distance of cafes, restaurants and supermarkets. Westfield Plenty Valley Shopping Centre, Epping Plaza and University Hill Shopping complex are a short, five-minute drive away. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Suites Point Cook Seasons 5
address: 454 Point Cook Road, Point Cook, VIC 3030
description: Quality Suites D'Olive is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Melbourne. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, laundromat, taxi service are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), indoor pool, massage, garden. Quality Suites D'Olive combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Melbourne unforgettable.Agoda

name: Nightcap at Seaford Hotel
description: Offering a sports bar, saloon bar and a private function space, Nightcap at Seaford Hotel features accommodation just 4 minutes' drive from the Frankston Foreshore. There is an indoor children's play area to keep children entertained. Free unlimited WiFi is offered. All contemporary rooms offer a flat-screen TV, refrigerator, desk, heating, air-conditioning and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room also boasts a rain shower. Seaford Hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Cranbourne and Dandenong. Central Melbourne is 40 minutes' drive away.

name: St Kilda Accommodation
description: Set within 600 metres of St Kilda Sea Baths and 5 km of Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne, St Kilda Accommodation provides rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Melbourne. Around 5 km from Shrine of Remembrance, the property is also 5 km away from Melbourne Arts Centre and offers free WiFi. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen for guests. National Gallery of Victoria is 5 km from the hostel, while Crown Casino Melbourne is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 32 km from St Kilda Accommodation.

name: Sandhurst Motel
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, Sandhurst Motel offers a selection of apartments, villas and motel rooms. All include heating, air conditioning and an LCD TV. Sandhurst Motel is a 10-minute drive from the shops, cafes, restaurants and Sunday Market in Frankston town centre. Melbourne city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. The self-contained villas feature a full kitchen and a lounge and dining area. Each motel room includes tea/coffee making facilities, TV and an en suite bathroom. 1 room features a corner spa bath. All towels and bed linen are provided. Guests have access to a BBQ area, coin-operated laundry facilities and a fully equipped shared kitchen.

name: Quest Sanctuary Lakes
description: Quest Sanctuary Lakes is surrounded by a golf course designed by pro-golfer Greg Norman. The serviced apartments feature private balconies with beautiful views over the golf course or lake. All units at Sanctuary Lakes Quest Apartments are two storey townhouses and include a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartments have spacious living and dining areas. Private laundry facilities and satellite television are also provided. Guests have free access to Sanctuary Lakes Resort, which is only 200 metres away. They can make use of the facilities including the indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. A fitness centre and tennis court are also available. Quest Sanctuary Lakes is just a 15-minute drive from the West Gate Bridge in Melbourne. Tullamarine and Avalon airports are both a 30-minute drive away.

name: Carrum Downs Motel
description: Featuring a seasonal swimming pool, Carrum Downs Motel offers air-conditioned motel accommodation on the beautiful Mornington Peninsula. Carrum Downs Motel is a 10-minute drive from the cafes and restaurants of Frankston's town centre. It is 45 minutes' drive from Melbourne and 90 minutes' drive from Phillip Island. All accommodation includes a microwave, refrigerator, toaster, tea/coffee making facilities and bed linen. Each offers a private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can enjoy alfresco dining using the BBQ facilities or prepare a meal in the fully equipped communal kitchen. There is also a shared lounge area, a secure exercise area and coin-operated laundry facilities. Pets are welcome in certain rooms by prior arrangement.

name: Mantra On Russell
description: Mantra on Russell is within close proximity to all of Melbourne's premium attractions including boutique shopping, famous eat streets and a superb array of cafes and bars, theaters, sporting venues and cultural experiences. Offering studio and apartment-style rooms all featuring air-conditioning, fully-equipped kitchens, bathrooms, laundry facilities and most apartments also have a private balcony (please request).accorhotels.com

name: Quest Ivanhoe
description: Just a 4-minute drive from the Yarra River, Quest Ivanhoe offers BBQ facilities and a business centre. The property is located within close vicinity to Austin & Warringal Hospital Precincts, and 400 m from Ivanhoe Train Station. All guest rooms feature a satellite flat-screen TV and some rooms have a balcony or a kitchen. Quest Ivanhoe is a 4-minute drive from La Trobe Golf Club and a 10-minute drive from La Trobe University. Melbourne CBD is a 15-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms offer a microwave, fridge, toaster and tea and coffee making facilities. They feature a desk and ironing facilities. The bathroom has a hairdryer and towels and linen are provided. Other facilities on offer include a guest laundry, dry cleaning and meeting/ banquet facilities.

name: Discovery Parks - Melbourne
description: The 4-star Discovery Parks - Melbourne offers a swimming pool. It is located within 9 km of Melbourne's main city centre. Accommodation options include fully furnished, ground-level villas and cabins that are surrounded by native gardens. Discovery Parks - Melbourne has easy access to and from the Tullamarine Airport and major highways. An outdoor meal can be enjoyed in the barbecue area and guests can relax in the games room. There are bus stops nearby that offer buses to Melbourne city’s shopping, dining options and night life.

name: Quest Epping
address: Corner of Cooper And Miller Street, Thomastown, VIC 3076
description: Located within 19 km of Melbourne Museum and 19 km of Melbourne Zoo in Epping, Quest Epping provides accommodation with seating area. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre and terrace. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, a business centre and laundry service at the property. Hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Princess Theatre is 20 km from Quest Epping, while Melbourne Central Station is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Tolarno Hotel
description: Tolarno Hotel features original local artwork, stylish guest rooms and free WiFi. The property awards art prizes to the outstanding works of students from local colleges, and these master pieces are exhibited in the hotel’s foyer. The air-conditioned guest rooms are fitted with a fridge, a microwave and a flat-screen TV. Each features unique art pieces, blending vibrant colours with an artistic ambience. Hotel Tolarno is a 10-minute walk from Acland Street Galleries and the Grand Prix Track. It is a 12-minute walk from Sunday Esplanade Market. Palais Theatre is 3 minutes' drive away. Airport shuttle services are available at a cost.

name: Quest Moorabbin
description: Quest Moorabbin is situated in Melbourne and offers free wireless internet. It is conveniently located for guests wishing to discover the area's attractions. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the hotel, including luggage storage, concierge and car hire. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a coffee maker, an iPod docking station and a private balcony. For guests who like to cook independently, there is a kitchenette that is equipped with a refrigerator, a dishwasher and a microwave. For guests who enjoy discovering local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide variety within walking distance. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: Quest Cheltenham
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from Cheltenham Railway Station, Quest Cheltenham offers self-contained accommodation with SMART TV's, Foxtel Business IQ and unlimited Wi-Fi. Offering 24 x 7 gymnasium access - 150 metres from front door. All air-conditioned apartments feature complimentary unlimited internet, and a well-equipped kitchenette or kitchen. Most apartments also include a private balcony and laundry facilities. Quest Cheltenham is located in the heart of Cheltenham, 2 minutes’ walk from the Charman Road shopping and dining district. Beaumaris Bay is just a 5-minute drive away. Guests can indulge in a range of guest options all within easy reach. The front office team / tour desk can recommend local attractions and help guests with travel arrangements.

name: Links Lodge at The Dunes
description: Links Lodge at The Dunes features a restaurant, bar and shared lounge in Rye. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Links Lodge at The Dunes each room has a balcony with views of the golf course. The accommodation offers à la carte breakfast every morning. Parking is available directly outside every room. Melbourne CBD is 97 km from the accommodation, while Sorrento is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Melbourne Airport, 122 km from the property. The property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Airport International Motel Brisbane
description: Airport International Motel Brisbane is only 10 minutes’ drive from both Brisbane Airport and Brisbane city centre. Free WiFi, free car parking and free guest laundry facilities are available. Airport International Motel Brisbane offers individually decorated suites and apartments with air conditioning, 82-cm LCD cable TV. Apartments with a balcony are available. Brisbane Cruise Terminal is 11km from Airport International Motel Brisbane. Eagle Farm Racecourse is a 3-minute drive away. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, internet kiosk and 2 conference rooms. Our restaurant is currently closed.

name: City Star Lodge
description: This clean, modern motel is located at Kangaroo Point, a peaceful yet convenient setting just 2 km from Brisbane CBD. Its facilities feature an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms are modern in style. Amenities include a TV, a mini refrigerator, and tea and coffee facilities. There is also a communal kitchen available for guests' use. CityStar Lodge faces a pleasant park just a short walk from the Gabba. You can also easily reach the riverside walk, CityCat riverboat services and buses to the city centre. Relax by the outdoor pool, or enjoy use of the barbecue area which is available upon request. Free secure parking is available.

name: Nightcap At Springwood Hotel
address: Cnr Springwood & Rochedale Road, Brisbane, QLD 4127
description: Featuring an on-site restaurant and a bar, Springwood Hotel is located in Logan, just a 15-minute drive from Brisbane CBD. TAB is also on site, and free parking is provided. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, a TV and a fridge. Guests can prepare tea and coffee using an electric kettle. Towels are included in your private bathroom. Hotel Springwood is a 30-minute drive from Gold Coast. Brisbane Airport is a 20-minute drive away. The on-site bistro offers traditional pub food, along with a range of drinks.

name: Darra Motel and Conference Centre
description: The Darra Motel and Conference Centre is located in Darra, a light industrial and business district of Brisbane. We are easily accessible via the Ipswich Motorway and Centenary Highway with easy access to many commercial, entertainment and sporting facilities.The Darra Motel offers the choice of Standard, Executive and Family rooms with a bar, restaurant and function room for your convenience.Our rooms feature en-suite, individual climate control, flat screen TV with Foxtel and complimentary WIFI with the Executive rooms having full kitchenettes.iHotelier/iStay

name: Gabba Central Apartments
description: Located just a short stroll from Woolloongabba Busway Station, Gabba Central Apartments provides guests with an ideal base while in Brisbane. It offers free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a sauna. This modern property provides a coffee bar, a sun deck and a rooftop terrace. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. Gabba Central Apartments provides 44 air conditioned apartments equipped with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with cable/satellite channels, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Located in Woolloongabba, the property is close to popular clubs and pubs. The Gabba is also within a 10-minute walk.Revato

name: Comfort Inn North Brisbane
description: Enjoy a great nights rest and wake up to a hot, tasty breakfast when you stay at our hotel in Carseldine, AU. Amenities include breakfast, meeting space, an outdoor pool, guest laundry facilities and copy, print and fax machines. Guest rooms feature microwaves and refrigerators, premium bedding, work desks, flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Ideal for work-related travelers or those seeking a vacation hotel, our Comfort Inn provides you with easy access to local attractions like the Big Easy Golf and Leisure Centre, Westfield Chermside, Brisbane Entertainment Centre, Aspley Homemaker City, Carseldine Central, Aspley Hypermarket Shopping Centre and the Hidden World Playground. Complete your plans for your getaway by booking a room at our hotel in Carseldine, AU. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with the Choice Privileges Rewards program.priceline.com

name: Aspley Motor Inn
description: Offering free WiFi and streaming service, Aspley Motor Inn offers air conditioned accommodation with each room fitted with a flat screen TV, just 2.2 km away from Prince Charles Hospital. The property also features an outdoor pool and a BBQ area. Truck parking is also available at Aspley Motor Inn. All rooms have a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a kitchenette. There are restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Aspley Motor Inn Brisbane is 5 minutes’ drive from Westfield Chermside Mall, and 15 minutes’ drive from Brisbane Entertainment Centre. Brisbane International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. The tour desk can provide sightseeing advice and book local attractions. The property also offers a guest laundry and luggage storage facilities.

name: Quest Kelvin Grove
description: - Experience tranquillity, a home away from home at 4.5 star Quest Kelvin Grove. - Quest Kelvin Grove is in the centrally located in a unique and creative inner-city precinct and only 2kms away from Brisbane; just 3 minutes’ drive from the Brisbane CBD, Suncorp Stadium, Victoria Park Function Venue and Driving Range, RNA Showgrounds, Royal Brisbane Women’s Hospital and Queensland Ballet Academy and just 15 minutes’ away from both international and domestic Brisbane airport. Victoria Park & La Boite Theatre, QUT, Woolworth, 30 cafes and restaurants are on the doorstep of the hotel. - Quest Kelvin Grove provides guest with access to wide range of amenities including a refreshing outdoor swimming pool, 24 hours fitness centre and BBQ area. Recently fully refurbished Studio, One bedroom, Two bedroom and Three bedroom provide with the ultimate in comfort and convenience. All apartments feature a fully equipped kitchen, private laundry facilities & balcony whilst Studios have kitchenette facilities and access to a free onsite laundry. All rooms has a smart TV, air-conditioning and unlimited free Wi-Fi as well. - Quest Kelvin Grove is here for your perfect stay for both short and long stay. This Serviced Apartments provides guests with access to a wide range of exceptional amenities including a alfresco BBQ area, fitness centre, and a refreshing outdoor swimming pool. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, ensuring that guests can stay connected throughout their stay.

name: Essence Suites Taringa
description: Essence Suites Taringa offers a comfortable setting when in Brisbane. Guests can also enjoy free Wi-Fi. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a coffee bar, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Guests can also enjoy disabled parking. Essence Suites Taringa provides air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, floor-to-ceiling windows and a rain shower. All offer an alarm clock and a seating area. The hotel also offers afternoon tea. Essence Suites Taringa provides easy access to Brisbane City Hall, South Bank Parklands and Suncorp Stadium. The Gabba is just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Toowong Central Motel Apartments
address: 38 Jephson St (Cnr. Lissner St.), Brisbane, QLD 4066
description: Offering fully-serviced, self-contained studio apartments with free unlimited WiFi, Toowong Central Motel Apartments is 2 minutes' walk from bus stops and Toowong Railway Station. This property 2 minutes' walk from Toowong Village Shopping Centre and 5 minutes' walk from Regatta Ferry Terminal. Suncorp Stadium and the University of Queensland are both 6 minutes' drive away. The spacious, air-conditioned apartments feature a kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each studio comes with a private balcony and a flat-screen TV with streaming capabilities. Guests enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, BBQ facilities and free on-site and undercover parking for cars and trailers. A breakfast-to-go pack is available from the reception.

name: Mantra on Queen
description: Just 20 minutes from Brisbane airport, whether you're visiting Brisbane for work or checking out the sights with the family, Mantra on Queen has spacious hotel rooms and apartments, in the city centre. Our Brisbane accommodation provides the perfect place to relax after a long day shopping or sightseeing around the city. With fully equipped kitchens in all apartments, you can whip up some home cooked food while taking in the surrounding river or city views.accorhotels.com

name: Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel
description: Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel is just 3 minutes' walk from the Howard Smith Wharves development on Brisbane River and a 2-minute walk from the centre of Fortitude Valley. The property features a fitness centre and a sauna and is a 5-minute walk from James St or New Farm Park and a 10 minute drive from Brisbane CBD. Central Brunswick Apartment Hotel offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries and a shower over the bathtub. Apartments with a fully equipped kitchen are available. Central Brunswick Apartments are located in Fortitude Valley, Brisbane’s entertainment district. Brisbane Airport is a 30-minute drive away. You can enjoy a meal in the barbecue area. The property also offers dry cleaning and luggage storage facilities.

name: Manly Marina Cove Motel
description: Manly Marina Cove Motel is a 4 star boutique motel situated within the grounds of the Royal Queensland Yacht Squadron (RQYS), right on Moreton Bay. Open from 7am daily, the RQYS offers waterfront dining for breakfast, lunch and dinner 7 days a week. Manly Marina Cove is 5 minutes’ drive from the picturesque Manly Harbour Village precinct, filled with restaurants, cafes and boutiques. The property is 25 minutes’ drive from Brisbane Airport and Brisbane CBD. Rooms at the Manly Marina Cove offer individual patios or balconies, with some featuring views towards Moreton Bay and the islands. Each is fitted with a small fridge, a microwave and a large 55 inch smart TV and free wifi. A small plunge pool and coin-operated laundry machines are available. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Brisbane International - Virginia
description: Boasting a sauna and a swimming pool, Brisbane International - Virginia is located in Brisbane and offers modern accommodation. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site parking. Brisbane International Virginia has a gym with cardiovascular equipment, a weight machine and a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include a business centre and meeting rooms. Brisbane International Virginia Hotel provides 107 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. They are also equipped with an alarm clock, heating and a hair dryer. Lunch and dinner are served every day at Rocklily, specialising in local cuisine. In the evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Brisbane Airport is a 15-minute drive from Brisbane International - Virginia. Brisbane Entertainment Centre is also a short car trip from the property.Revato

name: Paramount Motel
description: Paramount Motel is located 2 km from central Brisbane and a 5-minute drive from South Bank. It features an outdoor pool, barbecue facilities, and guest rooms with free Wi-Fi and a full kitchen. This is a self-check in property. We don't have a reception, we only have housekeepers in charge of the housekeeping tasks. You will be provided with a door code. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with ironing equipment. The attached kitchen comes with an oven, a fridge and a microwave. The property offers coin-operated laundry facilities. Free parking is provided on site. Motel Paramount is a 20-minute walk from South Bank Parklands and a 20-minute drive from Brisbane Airport. It is a 5-minute walk from the Gabba Cricket Ground and a 10-minute drive from City Botanic Gardens. We do not accept luggage before or after the check-in.

name: Novena Palms Motel
description: Less than 20 minutes' walk from Northgate Railway Station, Novena Palms Motel offers guests a convenient base while in Brisbane. It is a 10-minute drive from Brisbane Entertainment Centre and offers free public parking on site. There are a range of facilities on offer to those staying at Novena Palms Motel Brisbane, such as luggage storage, an airport shuttle and limited hours room service. Guests can also enjoy disabled parking. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. They all have an alarm clock, ironing facilities and an in-room closet. Brisbane Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Novena Palms Motel. Brisbane City Hall, Suncorp Stadium and South Bank are only an easy drive from the motel.Revato

name: Eatons Hill Hotel
description: Offering modern accommodation with a fitness centre and indoor pool, Eatons Hill Hotel is set in Brisbane in the Queensland Region, 15 km from Brisbane Entertainment Centre. Guests can choose from one of the hotel's many restaurant options. There are function spaces available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a king-size bed, Smart TV with cable channels, free WiFi and tea/coffee making facilities. Rooms include a private bathroom with complimentary Appelles toiletries and a hairdryer. Free covered parking is also available for guests. Eatons Hill Hotel is located nearby various restaurants, shops, cafes and supermarkets. The nearest airport is Brisbane Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Brisbane Holiday Village
description: Ideally located for sightseeing, Brisbane Holiday Village is a 15-minute drive from central Brisbane. Guests of the self-contained accommodation can enjoy a large outdoor pool with a waterfall feature, an 18-hole mini golf course and a full-size tennis court. Brisbane Holiday Village is a 4-minute drive from Westfield Garden City, a 20-minute drive to Suncorp Stadium and a 35-minute drive to the famous Gold Coast theme parks. Brisbane Airport is a 30-minute drive away. For your convenience, the property is close to bus stops. The air-conditioned modern cabins boast a patio or balcony, a fully equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV. All cabins include a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Set on 33 landscaped acres, Brisbane Holiday Village features a children's lagoon, 350m bike track and a playground. Guests can watch staff feed the Wild Rainbow Lorikeets that come to the park daily. On quiet days, you can rent DVD movies and board games from reception. The on-site restaurant is open seven days and offers affordable meals for families and can cater for large groups. Coin-operated laundry facilities and a convenience store can be found on site.

name: Herston Place Motel
description: Featuring air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and a flat-screen TV, Herston Place Motel is just 5 km from the Brisbane Convention and Exhibition Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and a barbecue area set in lovely gardens. Free parking is available on site. Motel Herston Place is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Royal Brisbane and Women’s Hospital. Brisbane Airport and the Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary are each a 20-minute drive away. A microwave, refrigerator and tea and coffee maker are standard in all rooms. Each room has a seating and dining area, and a bathroom with a bathtub and hairdryer.

name: Amora Hotel Brisbane
description: This relaxed hotel in Brisbane offers free wireless internet, as well as a sauna and an outdoor pool. It is steps from St John's Cathedral, restaurants and nightlife options. Amora Hotel Brisbane has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. Convenient services include an express check-in/check-out feature and a luggage storage facility. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all include a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. Those staying at Amora Hotel Brisbane can enjoy the on-site bar, suitably based for socialising in the evening. Places to dine at the hotel include Two Donkeys Cafe and Pantry Restaurant. The area surrounding Amora Hotel Brisbane is well-known for its shopping. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Roma Street Busway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Brisbane.Revato

name: Brisbane Gateway Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, table tennis, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Ingenia Holidays Taigum
description: Colonial Village boasts a large outdoor pool. Guests can choose between a room, studio or cabin, some featuring a private balcony or patio area. Prepare a tasty meal using the BBQ facilities. The tour desk can help book trips to Moreton Bay and Moreton Island. All accommodation features a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Most cabins feature a patio offering garden views. Nudgee College Sports Facilities and Nudgee Golf Course are 4 minutes’ drive from Colonial Village. Westfield Chermside Shopping Centre and Brisbane Entertainment Centre are each a 6-minute drive away.

name: Balmoral Queenslander
description: No description found

name: Brisbane Marriott Hotel
description: Located in Brisbane, Australia, the charming capital of Queensland, Brisbane Marriott Hotel invites you to experience a stunning mix of serenity and cutting-edge urban style. Enjoy our prime location in the CBD next to the Brisbane River. Visit nearby sights like South Bank, the Brisbane Showgrounds, Suncorp Stadium and Queen Street Mall. Savour delicious meals at Motion Dining or sample the fine wines at M Bar, our hotel's lively lounge. Leisure travelers, our CBD hotel also features an outdoor pool and contemporary fitness centre. Relax in your Brisbane hotel accommodation with river views, plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Discover all this and more at Brisbane Marriott Hotel in Queensland, Australia.Marriott

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square
description: Conveniently situated, Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square offers easy access to Brisbane's main sightseeing areas. Guests can also enjoy free internet access. This modern hotel provides a number of facilities, such as a 24-hour reception, babysitting/child services and valet parking. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's seating area. Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square is located in the heart of Brisbane’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Brisbane City Hall is less than five minutes' walk away.Revato

name: Central Cosmo Apartments
description: Featuring a sauna, Central Cosmo Apartments is located in Brisbane and offers modern accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Sauna and Gym. Central Cosmo offers guests on-site parking, as well as free Wi-Fi to make the most of throughout their stay. Corporate facilities include a business centre. The apartments at Central Cosmo Apartments Brisbane are air-conditioned and offer a coffee maker, a mini bar and a private balcony. For guests who would like to cook independently, there is a kitchen that is equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave and a refrigerator. Central Cosmo Apartments is close to shops, dining and Brisbane's nightlife. It is also within walking distance of Suncorp Stadium.Revato

name: Quality Inn Airport Heritage
description: Less than 20 minutes' stroll from Doomben Railway Station, Quality Inn Airport Heritage offers guests an ideal base while in Brisbane. It also offers a car rental desk, limited hours room service and a swimming pool. This stylish motel provides conference rooms, laundry facilities and a shuttle service. Wireless internet is also provided. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room dining area and a refrigerator. They all have a sofa bed, bottled water and a flat-screen TV. Brisbane Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Quality Inn Airport Heritage Brisbane. Brisbane City Hall, Suncorp Stadium and South Bank are only an easy car ride from the motel.Revato

name: Wynnum Anchor Motel
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ facilities, Wynnum Anchor Motel is located 15 minutes’ drive from Brisbane Airport. This bayside motel offers free WiFi and free on-site parking. Wynnum Motel is 25 minutes’ drive from Brisbane City Centre, and 45 minutes’ from the iconic Gold Coast Theme Parks including Dreamworld. A range of shops and bike tracks are within 5 minutes’ drive. All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV. All rooms feature a microwave, refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathroom includes a.shower and free toiletries.

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane is situated centrally in Brisbane and is minutes on foot from Queen Street Bus Station. It features complimentary Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and a swimming pool, and is within a 10-minute walk of Brisbane City Hall. There are a variety of amenities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and meeting facilities. There is also private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a flat-screen TV and blackout curtains. They feature a laptop safe, a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. The on-site restaurant serves Asian and fusion cuisine in a modern setting. Guests can also enjoy a relaxing cocktail at Boom Boom Room. Adina Apartment Hotel Brisbane is within walking distance of Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre, South Bank and South Bank Parklands. It is within walking distance of Roma Street Busway Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Brisbane.Revato

name: The Waterloo Bay Hotel
description: The Waterloo Bay Hotel features a restaurant, a sports bar and free on-site parking. It is a 5-minute drive from Wynnum Central Train Station and 3 km from Manly Boat Harbour. Some rooms offer free WiFi access. The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a microwave, a fridge and an electric kettle. Additional amenities include TV and ironing equipment. The property has a kids’ game room and a children’s playground. There is also a coin-operated laundry facility. Same-day dry cleaning services can be requested. FIG Restaurant/Bar serves lunch and dinner daily. Specialties include parmigiana, fresh seafood, salads and pasta. Sports Bar and TAB features simple counter meals and offers beer on tap. Hotel Waterloo Bay is 350 metres from Wynnum Shopping Centre and 900 metres from Wynnum Golf Club. It is within a 30-minute drive of central Brisbane and the Brisbane Airport.

name: Art Series - The Johnson
description: Set in Spring Hill on the doorstep of Brisbane's vibrant CBD, THE JOHNSON takes its design cues from celebrated Australian abstract artist, Michael Johnson. Offering guests a choice of self-contained, open-plan suites including an elegant penthouse, 50-metre pool with a sundeck, a gymnasium, plus conference and events facilities, lashings of Johnson artworks in-house art libraries and a dedicated art channel.accorhotels.com

name: Accommodation on Westlake
description: Accommodation on Westlake features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Mount Ommaney, 14 km from University of Queensland - St Lucia, 15 km from Suncorp Stadium and 16 km from Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre. Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, oven, microwave, toaster, fridge and stovetop. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. Accommodation on Westlake also offers a car rental service and a business centre with free WiFithroughout the property. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Queensland Performing Arts Complex (QPAC) is 16 km from the accommodation, while Roma Street Station is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brisbane Airport, 27 km from Accommodation on Westlake.

name: Fig Tree Farm B&B Highvale-Farmstay near Brisbane!
description: Fig Tree Farm Cottage B&B is located on 5.5 acres in picturesque Highvale. We are located only 7 minutes from popular Samford village. The cottage has outstanding mountain views and a variety of friendly animals to hand feed. Come and unwind and make some awesome family memories. A country breakfast is provided for every day of your stay! The cottage is new and has a large patio, ducted aircon, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom + 1 ensuite, a full kitchen and laundry. Wifi is complimentary and we have a TV with Netflix. The cottage is perfect for staying in if you are attending a nearby wedding, or just need a relaxing country escape! Recommended for children 3yrs+. Our 4 resident hand-reared goats (including 2 pygmy goats) are extremely friendly and love a cuddle, to be handfed and brushed! New to the farm are 2 bottle fed lambs that guests are also welcome to feed and brush! We offer 'guinea pig encounters'. We have 3 adult guinea pigs and 1 baby guinea pig. Guinea pig interactions will always be introduced by the host as they are cared for as part of the Fig Tree Farm family. We also have a newly built 'Chick Inn' with 15 chickens so you can collect farm fresh eggs in a basket to cook yourself! Periodically we also hatch chicks! We live on the property and care for the animals continually thorough out the day, so all the animals will be introduced personally and any special instructions will be given on arrival. Fig Tree farm Cottage does not welcome outside dogs as we have farm animals to care for on the property. The patio is perfect for escaping the hustle and bustle of busy lives, while sitting and enjoying a wine or coffee. The cottage patio is not overlooked by the main house so it feels very private. Two of the 3 bedrooms have mountain and paddock views. The master bedroom boasts an en-suite with a large shower. The cottage has outstanding mountain views and a feeling of country charm. The entire cottage is fully air-conditioned and is tastefully decorated. There are a large variety of indoor and outdoor games available to keep children and adults alike entertained! These include obit tennis, badminton, volleyball, giant lawn bowling, a cricket set, cards, board games, car sets, dinosaurs, a tea set, interactive activity books, children books and puzzles etc. To make the cottage even more accessible to people with mobility issues we have added removable door ramps, a removable shower lip ramp, 2 types of shower chairs (one with arms and a back and a wheelchair friendly transferable seat), a removable toilet surround safety rail to aid standing up, a non slip shower mat, a chair protector, mattress protectors and a bed assist frame to aid getting out of bed. Guests can access most of the bottom section of the property including the paddocks, seasonal creek, pine forest that overlooks the local cricket pitch, chicken coop, lamb paddock, orchard and goat enclosure. We have recently added a 'share garden' in self wicking vegetable beds so guests can pick fresh herbs, lettuces and more to eat during their stay! I will be available as required during the hours of 8am-5pm by phone and in person when I feed the animals. Additionally I will be contactable between 5pm till 8am via text. We live on site as it is our family home and we care throughout the day for the animals that are located near the cottage. Samford village is just 7 minutes away by car to visit the swings at the park, or have an icecream. If you fancy eating out there are plenty of highly regarded venues to choose from. There are coffee shops and cafes located in the village as well as fine dining venues available. Pause and The Little Tree Bakery and Brewhouse, to mention 2, come highly recommended. If you would like to explore the surrounding area for a day trip we are close to Mt Glorious, Dayboro and the popular Cedar Creek Falls. Travena Glen farm is nearby for a day out to take the kids horse riding and Lyell Deer Sanctuary has friendly deer to hand feed! Harry Potter fans will be delighted by the Harry Potter shop called 'The Store of requirement' and is located within Samford village. Cedar Creek is also nearby to take the children for a picnic and a swim in the rock pools! The Samford Valley Rail Trail goes 8.3 km from Ferny Grove to Samford Valley and is great for cycling or walking. Farmers makets are on the 2nd Saturday of the month at St Pauls Anglican Church and there is a market every Sunday at Ferny Grove station. There is a train station in Ferny Grove (approx 15 mins away) that goes directly into Brisbane City. I will be available as required during the hours of 8am-5pm by phone and between 5pm till 8am via text. We live on site as it is our family home and we care throughout the day for the animals that are located near the cottage. Samford village is just 7 minutes away by car. If you fancy eating out there are plenty of highly regarded venues to choose from. There are coffee shops and cafes located in the village as well as fine dining venues available. Pause and The Little Tree Bakery and Brewhouse, to mention 2, come highly recommended. If you would like to explore the surrounding area for a day trip we are close to Mt Glorious, Dayboro and the popular Cedar Creek Falls. Travena Glen farm is nearby for a day out to take the kids for a farm animal petting experience or horse riding. Harry Potter fans will be delighted by the Harry Potter shop called 'The Store of requirement' and is located within Samford village. The Samford Valley Rail Trail goes 8.3 km from Ferny Grove to Samford Valley and is great for cycling or walking. Farmers makets are on the 2nd Saturday of the month at St Pauls Anglican Church and there is a market every Sunday at Ferny Grove station. There is a train station in Ferny Grove (approx 15 mins away) that goes directly into Brisbane City. We do not allow guest dogs as we have farm animals to care for.VRBO

name: Warders Hotel Fremantle
description: Set in Fremantle and with Bathers Beach reachable within less than 1 km, Warders Hotel Fremantle Markets offers concierge services, rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Warders Hotel Fremantle Markets the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Warders Hotel Fremantle Markets you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Fremantle South Beach is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Claremont Showground is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 30 km from Warders Hotel Fremantle Markets.

name: Great Eastern Motor Lodge
description: Located in Perth, Great Eastern Motor Lodge is 2 minutes' walk from the Swan River, restaurants and shops. It offers self-contained apartments with free cable TV. Some apartments boast a large corner spa bath. Great Eastern Motor Lodge is within 7 minutes' drive of the WACA and Perth Airport. Each air-conditioned apartment offers a kitchenette, a dining setting and a private bathroom. All apartments include a lounge area with a sofa suite. Guests can enjoy complimentary toiletries. At Great Eastern Motor Lodge you will find a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, a dry cleaning service and laundry facilities. The property offers free parking as well as free airport transfers (for flights only) to all terminals for all guests 8 years of age and over. The airport shuttle is available from 04.00 to 22.00 excluding weekends and public holidays

name: Bentley Motel
description: Just a 4-minute drive from the business district of Welshpool, Bentley Motel features an outdoor swimming pool. Guests enjoy air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV. Curtin University is an 8-minute drive away. The rooms feature a kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and toaster. They also offer a dining table and an iPod docking station. The en suite bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. Motel Bentley is a 15-minute drive from Canning Vale and Perth’s city centre. Fiona Stanley Hospital is less than 20-minutes' drive away.

name: Canning Bridge Auto Lodge
description: Situated in Perth in the Western Australia region, Canning Bridge Auto Lodge features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. The aparthotel offers a barbecue. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and garden at Canning Bridge Auto Lodge. Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre is 7.8 km from the accommodation, while WACA is 8.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 17 km from Canning Bridge Auto Lodge.

name: Quest South Perth Foreshore
description: Quest South Perth Foreshore features views over the Swan River and out to Perth city centre. Guests can enjoy the alfresco BBQ entertaining area. Perth CBD is just 3 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered. The property offers guests a choice of studio, one or two-bedroom apartments. All apartments feature an LCD TV, air-conditioning/heating and an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. The Studio Apartments include a kitchenette, while the one and two-bedroom apartments feature a fully-equipped kitchen as well as a dining area, allowing guests to prepare and enjoy their own meals. The one and two-bedroom apartments also feature a washing machine and dryer. A business centre and conference facilities are also available for guests use. There are a variety of cafes and restaurants within a 3-minute walk from Quest South Perth Foreshore, while a supermarket is a 4-minute drive away. Perth Zoo is just 300 metres from the property and the Royal Perth Golf Club is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 16.6 km from the accommodation.

name: Tradewinds Hotel Fremantle
description: Located in Perth, Tradewinds Hotel Fremantle is within a 40-minute drive of Perth Airport and provides a rooftop terrace and a swimming pool. Guests also have access to complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site parking. The hotel has 83 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Fitness centre. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as an iPod docking station, a rain shower and a pillow menu. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Those staying at Tradewinds Hotel Fremantle can sit down to Mediterranean cuisine at the in-house bar, conveniently based for a meal and a drink. Breakfast is available all week and room service can be enjoyed. A choice of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Tradewinds Hotel Fremantle is also close to the area's well-known restaurants and bars, plus the Army Museum of Western Australia is a 10-minute stroll away. East Fremantle Oval and the Fremantle Arts Centre are a brief stroll away.Revato

name: Ocean Beach Hotel
description: Set in Perth, 300 metres from Cottesloe Beach, Ocean Beach Hotel offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. The property is situated 600 metres from Swanbourne Beach, 4.4 km from Claremont Showground and 8.8 km from Kings Park. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a kettle, a bath or shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms come with a private bathroom and bed linen. Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre is 11 km from Ocean Beach Hotel, while Perth Concert Hall is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Swan Valley Oasis Resort
description: Swan Valley Oasis Resort is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Perth. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, car park, room service, are at hand. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, garden. For reliable service and professional staff, Swan Valley Oasis Resort caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Indian Ocean Hotel
description: The Indian Ocean Hotel is located just a 5-minute walk from Scarborough Beach. This 3.5 star hotel offers accommodation in the heart of the Sunset Coast. Guests enjoy free in-room WiFi and limited free secure parking. There is a swimming pool, a hot tub and a games room. Indian Ocean Hotel is located a 15-minute drive from Perth city centre and a 20-minute drive from Fremantle. Hillary’s Boat Harbour is a 10-minute drive away. The hotel offers a wide range of room types, providing the perfect place to relax after a day at the beach or exploring the city. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with free movie channels. They offer a bar refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. They have a private bathroom with a shower. The onsite Indian Ocean Hotel bar offers live entertainment 5 nights a week. Nearby activities include shopping, live entertainment, weekend markets, restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Guests may need to purchase tickets for live acts, should they wish to attend the show. Toastface Grillah serves coffee, toasted sandwiches and bar snacks.

name: Astoria Retreat Bed & Breakfast
description: Astoria Retreat B&B is 15 km north of central Perth and there is a direct highway connecting the property to the city and the airport. It is 12 minutes’ drive from the beaches on the Sunset Coast and 8 minutes’ drive from the historic town of Swan Valley. Each modern room offers private entry, along with air conditioning and electric blankets for all-year-round comfort. All rooms include a safety deposit box, a work desk and a TV. Continental breakfast is served each morning in the elegant breakfast room, which has been decorated with antiques and a collection of paintings. Business guests enjoy the convenience of Astoria Retreat, which is located in the middle of several business centres.

name: Quest Scarborough
description: Only 200 metres from Scarborough Beach, Quest Scarborough offers an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with BBQ facilities. All apartments include cable TV and DVD player. Located in the Perth suburb of Scarborough, all accommodation at Quest Serviced Apartments Scarborough comes with a seating area, work desk and coffee/tea making facilities. Some apartments have a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and laundry facilities. The key sights of Perth, including the Western Australia Museum, Holmes á Court Gallery and West Perth Botanic Gardens are 30 minutes’ away by car. Guests who wish to explore more of the local area can make use of the hotel tour desk.

name: Pier 21 Apartment Hotel Fremantle
description: Pier 21 is ideally situated beside the Swan River. Port Beach is less than 20 minutes’ walk away. All of the modern apartments have balconies. This apartment hotel benefits from an indoor pool with spa, as well as an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can make use of the communal barbecue facilities. All rooms feature a 40-inch flat-screen TV and Biology guest amenities. Pier 21 was awarded Best Apartment/Suite Accommodation at the 2015 Australian Hotels Association Industry Awards. The property is located just 3 km from the centre of Fremantle home to attractions such as Fremantle Prison and Fremantle Markets. Fishing Boat Harbour is just a 10-minute drive, and Perth CBD is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Metro Hotel Perth
