description: Just a short drive from 100 St Georges Terrace, Metro Hotel Perth provides a comfortable setting and boasts exclusive views of Perth. It also offers free Wi-Fi. There are a range of facilities available to those staying at Metro Hotel Canning, such as meeting rooms, a coffee bar and highchairs. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. They each offer an in-room closet, heating and a private bathroom. Metro Hotel Canning Perth features an on-site restaurant, Red Bill Restaurant, which offers dinner in a modern setting. Metro Hotel Perth provides a convenient place to discover nearby Kings Park and Perth Zoo, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in South Perth.Revato

name: Fraser Suites Perth
description: Conveniently situated, Fraser Suites Perth allows for easy access to Perth's main hot spots. It also provides a sauna, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Fraser Suites treats guests to a range of recreational amenities and services, such as bicycle rental and Indoor heated swimming pool. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like vip rooms and massage services. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a flat-screen TV and slippers. Each provide a kitchenette, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Guests in search of a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than Perth Fraser Suites's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for breakfast. In the evening, guests are able to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at Fraser Suites Perth, there are a variety of eateries situated close by. The hotel also offers parking for guests travelling by car.Revato

name: Novotel Perth Langley
description: Novotel Perth Langley hotel is ideally situated in Perth's CBD offering unparalleled hospitality. Located near Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre, shopping malls, restaurants and iconic tourist attractions. Experience 4.5 star accommodation with 256 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites with Swan River and city views. Providing a range of rooms to accommodate the whole family or suites to impress someone special.accorhotels.com

name: Coranda Lodge
description: Located in Perth, Coranda Lodge is within a 30-minute drive of Perth Airport and offers a swimming pool. Guests also have access to free wireless internet and on-site parking. This relaxed bed & breakfast offers a sun deck, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests have access to a terrace and a barbecue area. The comfortable rooms at Coranda Lodge offer a private bathroom, an exclusive courtyard and direct pool access. They are air conditioned and provide a private terrace, a private garden and a coffee maker. Facilities include an iPod docking station as well as a kitchen, an in-room dining area and a refrigerator.Revato

name: Discovery Parks - Swan Valley
description: Nestled in the Perth foothills, within the famous Swan Valley wine region, Discovery Parks - Perth Vineyards offers a relaxing environment only 14 km from the city centre. Guests enjoy a swimming pool, BBQ area, a children’s playground and a games room. The air-conditioned cabins are spread around the landscaped grounds. They all come with self-catering facilities. Take a few days to relax and taste your way through a region full of wineries, breweries, cafés, restaurants and even a chocolate factory. Other activities and attractions include river cruises, horse riding, walking trails, 3 golf courses and historical Guildford and Midland.

name: Broadwater Resort Como
description: Ideally situated overlooking the Swan River and only minutes from the Perth central business district, Broadwater Resort Apartments features private balconies or terraces perfect for meals with lovely river views. This premium resort specialises in long-stay business trips, small business seminars and regional guests. It is ideally located for those wishing to mix business with pleasure in city style, without the hassles of city traffic. Relax around the pool or in the garden. When ready to go out, ask first at the tour desk for advice. Rent a car for longer excursions. Return for fun in the garden using the barbecue facilities.

name: Quest Innaloo
description: Quest Innaloo has a fitness centre and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Perth, 10 km from Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre, 11 km from Perth Concert Hall and 11 km from Claremont Showground. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. A business centre and vending machines with drinks and snacks are available on site at the aparthotel. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Kings Park is 12 km from Quest Innaloo, while WACA is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Ocean View Motel
description: Located just 3 minutes' walk from beautiful North Beach and 7 minutes' walk from the Flora Terrace dining precinct, this motel offers accommodation with a balcony or terrace. Guests enjoy free parking. Each room at Ocean View Motel North Beach includes air conditioning and heating. Guests can enjoy free on-site parking. All rooms are equipped with a TV, refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. Each has an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and bed linen and towels are provided. Positioned just off West Coast Drive and conveniently located between Scarborough and Hillarys Boat Harbour, Ocean View Motel is just 20 minutes' drive from the Perth's city centre and a 35-minute drive from Perth Airport.

name: Acclaim Kingsway Tourist Park
description: Featuring a solar-heated swimming pool and a recreation room with a billiards table, Kingsway Tourist Park is 15 minutes’ drive from Hillary’s Boat Harbour. Guests enjoy a tennis court, a children’s playground and a BBQ area. Located alongside Lake Goollelal, Madeley Kingsway Tourist Park is 15 minutes’ drive from Sorrento Quay. It is 25 minutes’ drive from Perth Zoo. Perth Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away. All accommodation features a refrigerator, tea/coffee making facilities and electric blankets. Some accommodation offers a fully equipped kitchen or a patio. Guest facilities include a self-service laundry, an internet kiosk and a small grocery store.

name: Banksia Tourist Park
description: Situated in Perth in the Western Australia region and Optus Stadium reachable within 18 km, Banksia Tourist Park features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available in the kitchen, as well as a kettle. Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area. WACA is 19 km from the holiday park, while Perth Concert Hall is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 7 km from Banksia Tourist Park.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Goodearth Perth
description: Within a 20-minute walk from Claisebrook Railway Station, Comfort Inn & Suites Goodearth Perth offers guests an ideal base when visiting Perth. It is conveniently located in the city centre. The hotel provides its guests with free private parking on site, as well as free wireless internet to make the most of throughout their stay. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. They each offer a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a radio. The on-site restaurant offers international and local cuisine in a relaxed setting. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants are also found in the area. The hotel is close to Perth's well-known attractions, with St Mary's Cathedral and Perth Concert Hall just a 10-minute walk away. Perth Town Hall, Council House Perth and WACA Oval are each within walking distance.Revato

name: North Coogee Beach House
description: Only a few steps to the beach, the North Coogee Beach House is a modern double storey townhouse with ocean view. The 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom house is located just 50m from Woodman Point, Coogee Beach and less than 10 minutes drive to Fremantle. It is a short walk to the Port Coogee Village Shopping Centre, Dome Cafe, two playgrounds, a public lagoon and a yacht club. The holiday rental has a fully equipped kitchen, free wifi, reverse cycle air-conditioning, free parking in the rear garage and all essentials are provided to make your stay like home. Maximum occupancy is 5 persons. If you have more than 5 persons, please do not book this holiday rental and refer to Fremantle Colonial Home instead. About: Master bedroom (2nd floor) - queen bed, private ensuite (bathroom & toilet), ocean view Second room (2nd floor) - queen bed Third room (2nd floor) - double bed Living and meals area at the ground floor 2nd bathroom include a toilet and shower (2nd floor) 3rd powder room / toilet (Ground floor) Laundry area Outdoor alfresco area. Free wifi, free parking at rear garage (2 car space), TV, split-air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, towels, linens, baby cot (subject to availability at the time of booking), high chair, hair dryer, body wash and shampoo.VRBO

name: Discovery Parks - Perth
description: Discovery Parks – Perth offers a range of cabins and villas just 30 minutes’ drive from Fremantle. Guests enjoy free access to BBQ facilities and a children's playground. Discovery Parks – Perth is 15 minutes' drive from Perth Airport and 25-minute drive from Perth's city centre. It is a 45-minute drive from Rockingham. Facilities include a self-service laundry and free on-site parking. Internet and fax/photocopying facilities are available for an extra charge. The tour desk can arrange trips to Rottnest Island. All accommodation includes a flat-screen TV, DVD player, dining area and private bathroom. Cooking facilities include a refrigerator, microwave, toaster and kettle. Some cabins have a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Quest Fremantle
description: Situated in Fremantle, Quest Fremantle offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a fitness centre and a garden. The units at the aparthotel have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a dishwasher, kettle, and an oven. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some feature a balcony. Quest Fremantle offers a terrace. A bicycle rental service is available at this property and cycling can be enjoyed nearby. University of Notre Dame Australia is a 4-minute walk from the accommodation, while Fremantle Visitor Centre is 300 metres away. Perth Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Be. Fremantle
description: Be. Fremantle is a self rated 4.5 star serviced apartment complex comprising a mix of spacious Studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments.Fully refurbished in 2015 our apartments enjoy a stunning location directly on the waterfront with views across the Indian Ocean, Challenger Marina and Fishing Boat Harbour that surround the property.A brand new Ocean View Tower opened in May 2017 comprising Studio and One Bedroom apartments.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Beaconsfield Hotel
description: Set in Fremantle, 1.1 km from South Beach, The Beaconsfield Hotel offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Around 1.5 km from Bathers Beach, the property is also 2.5 km away from CY O'Connor Beach and offers free WiFi. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. Rooms are complete with a shared bathroom equipped with free toiletries, while certain units at the hotel also provide guests with a seating area. Popular points of interest near The Beaconsfield Hotel include Fremantle Fishing Boat Harbour, The Meeting Place Community Centre and Fremantle Prison. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Dianella Budget Rooms Happy Place To Stay & House Share For Long Term Tenants
description: Set in Perth, within 9 km of Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre and 9 km of Perth Concert Hall, DIANELLA Budget Rooms Happy Place to Stay & House Share For Long Term Tenants offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is located 9 km from WACA, 10 km from Optus Stadium and 14 km from Kings Park. The guest house has family rooms. At the guest house all rooms include a shared bathroom. The rooms feature a large double-door fridge, living area, sofa and TV. At DIANELLA Budget Rooms Happy Place to Stay & House Share For Long Term Tenants guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. Claremont Showground is 16 km from the accommodation, while State Theatre Centre of Western Australia is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 18 km from DIANELLA Budget Rooms Happy Place to Stay & House Share For Long Term Tenants. No parking on site for large vehicles but at nearby public parking spaces at Deasey Place or Belleview Crescent parallel to Yirrigan Drive.

name: Haven Studio Hideaway near Airport
description: Situated in Perth, 20 km from Optus Stadium, Haven Studio Hideaway near Airport features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. Located around 23 km from Perth Concert Hall, the guest house with free WiFi is also 26 km away from Perth Convention and Exhibition Centre. The property is non-smoking and is set 21 km from WACA. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the guest house rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen. Kings Park is 28 km from Haven Studio Hideaway near Airport, while Claremont Showground is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Perth Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Adabco Boutique Hotel
description: Built in 1897, Adabco Boutique Hotel offers guests free WiFi and a 55-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels. A communal kitchen and outdoor terrace is located on each floor. Located in the heart of Adelaide, Adabco Boutique Hotel Adelaide is 10 minutes’ walk from Rundle Mall. The bustling Central Markets and the peaceful Botanic Gardens are each a 15-minute walk. Adelaide Airport is a 20-minute drive away. A work desk, refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities are standard in all rooms. Each modern air-conditioned room is decorated in neutral colours, and features lovely wall art. Guests can relax in the lounge, which features leather sofas and a large flat-screen TV. The hotel also offers a guest laundry and a tour desk that can book trips to Victor Harbor and the Barossa Valley. Please be advised The Adabco Boutique Hotel has partnered with Cafe Bocelli for all breakfast offerings. Be advised breakfast is not on site but located 1 minute walk East of the hotel. Hotel voucher is required to receive breakfast at Cafe Bocelli. The friendly staff at Cafe Bocelli are there to assist you and answer and breakfast related queries. For further information please contact the hotel directly 08 8100 7500

name: North Adelaide Boutique Stays Accommodation
address: 190 Gover Street North Adelaide, Adelaide, SA 5006
description: Nestled in picturesque Gover St and surrounded by Adelaide's beautiful architectural homes, this property offers boutique style accommodation, with 1, 2 and 3 bedroom studios. Built in 2014, North Adelaide Boutique Stays Accommodation are located 2 km from Adelaide City Centre and within walking distance of local bars and the dining precinct. The iconic Adelaide Oval and Adelaide Festival Centre are a short stroll along O'Connell Street. Each studio offers complimentary WiFi, cable channels and limited on-site parking. In room amenities include a Nespresso coffee machine, iPad, kitchenette facilities, mini bar and ensuite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a fantastic night's sleep with a pillow top mattress and pillow menu. Hairdryers, towels and toiletries are available from reception upon request.

name: Adelaide Rockford
description: Adelaide Rockford hotel is a contemporary 4 star hotel located in the bustling West End's arts precinct. Centrally located in the CBD, the hotel is within minutes walking distance to Adelaide Oval, Convention Centre, Casino, Shopping & Dining precincts. We are excited to share a renovation update; our stunning new reception is now open and the rooftop pool is also now open just in time for Summer.accorhotels.com

name: Ensenada Motor Inn and Suites
description: Ensenada Motor Inn and Suites is a short 1-minute walk from Glenelg Beach and a 5-minute walk from various local dining options. Featuring views of Colley Reserve, the property offers free WiFi and free off-street parking. Fully air-conditioned, each room offers an iPod dock, a DVD player and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms come with double glazed windows and have a seating area. Same-day laundry and dry cleaning services are available. The staff at the tour desk can assist with booking day trips and winery tours. Luggage storage is provided. Ensenada Motor Inn is adjacent to the Moseley Square and a 5-minute drive from Harbour Town Outlet Shopping Centre. It is a 2-minute walk from Holdfast Shores Marina and The Beachouse Fun Park. Adelaide International Airport is a 12-minute drive away.

name: Morphettville Motor Inn
description: Situated in Glenelg, 3 km from The Beachouse, Morphettville Motor Inn features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The motel features a spa and wellness centre and free WiFi. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the motel, every room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Morphettville Motor Inn have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Morphettville Motor Inn. The motel offers a barbecue. Adelaide Parklands Terminal is 6 km from Morphettville Motor Inn, while Victoria Square is 8.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adelaide Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Quest Port Adelaide
description: Boasting a fitness centre and free WiFi, Quest Port Adelaide is just 3 minutes' walk from Fishermen's Wharf Market and 6 minutes' walk from both the South Australian Maritime Museum and the National Railway Museum. Limited parking is available. Quest Port Adelaide's modern apartments are 8 minutes' drive from TechPort, 12 minutes' drive from West Lakes and 17 minutes' drive from Prospect. Adelaide CBD (Central Business District) is 27 minutes' drive from the property. Each self-contained apartment has a flat-screen TV and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, toaster, stove top, kettle, microwave, refrigerator and coffee machine. The bathrooms have free toiletries and hairdryers.

name: Parador Inn
address: 728 Tapleys Hill Rd, West Beach, SA 5024
description: Set in Adelaide, 2 km from West Beach, Parador Inn offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Certain units at the property feature a patio with a city view. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Parador Inn have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at Parador Inn will be able to enjoy activities in and around Adelaide, like cycling. Henley Beach is 2.5 km from the hotel, while The Beachouse is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Adelaide, a few steps from Parador Inn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Majestic M Suites
description: Majestic M Suites features a fitness centre and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Adelaide, 1.9 km from Adelaide Oval, 1.8 km from Adelaide Convention Centre and 2.3 km from Beehive Corner Building. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Art Gallery of South Australia is 2.6 km from Majestic M Suites, while Rundle Mall is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Adelaide Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Adelaide, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Adelaide is the city’s leading luxury hotel. Located in the heart of the city, guests can access everything from world-class restaurants and lively bars, to cultural and nature-based experiences. Spacious guest rooms are well-appointed, offering expansive city or river views. Exceptional culinary experiences await at our award-winning restaurants, Riverside Restaurant and Shiki. Experience the height of luxury, personalised service, and elegance at InterContinental Adelaide.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Buxton Manor
description: This 4.5 star boutique hotel is housed in a luxurious mansion, close to Adelaide Cricket Oval and many restaurants, pubs, and nightclubs. Free parking and free shuttle bus are available. The historic mansion features an Arts & Craft inspired décor of an English country house. It features half an acre of rose-filled gardens and lawns with sun lounges, umbrella's and 2 wood fire BBQ's. Buxton Mansion provides 4 spacious apartments and 1 spa cottage with complimentary on-site laundry facilities. Just a short stroll from Buxton Manor is over 80 of Adelaide's best cafés and restaurants. Complimentary delivery of room service is also available from selected restaurants nearby, including Scuzzi Café and Beyond India. Within a 5-minute walk guests can reach 2 major parklands, golf links, historic walking trails, and Adelaide Aquatic Centre. Art deco Picadilly Cinema with 3 up to the minute theatres and Art Galleries are also nearby.

name: Comfort Inn Glenelg
description: Comfort Inn Glenelg is located a 6-minute tram ride from Glenelg Beach. The motel features an outdoor swimming pool and barbecue area. Adelaide International Airport is 4 kilometres away. Close to Marina Pier, Harbour Town Discount Shopping Centre and popular beachside restaurants. Guests at the Comfort Inn Glenelg have free access to the tennis court and park located within a few minutes’ walking distance of the motel. Laundry services is also available. All rooms at the Comfort Inn Glenelg feature microwave, TV and tea and coffee facilities. They also come with hairdryer, air conditioning and ironing facilities. Comfort Inn Glenelg is located only 15 minutes from Adelaide by tram. The Adelaide Zoo, Adelaide Oval and Botanic Gardens are 10 kilometers away.

name: Fire Station Inn
description: Situated in cosmopolitan North Adelaide, the unique Fire Station Inn offers boutique-style accommodation set within a historic fire station. One of the suites boasts a fire truck in it's bedroom. Each of the 3 suites feature luxurious king-size bathrooms with a spa bath. Choose between the romantic Loggia Suite, the spacious 2 bedroom Penthouse or the Fire Engine Suite, complete with an authentic fire truck, fireman’s pole and fireman dress-up uniforms. Breakfast can be arranged upon request and delivered to your suite each morning. Beyond India Restaurant nearby provide free room service. Guests staying at Fire Station Inn can make the most of the free shuttle bus that runs from the CBD past the fire station. Alternatively, you can reach the city centre via a 25-minute walk.

name: iStay Precinct Adelaide
description: Located in the heart of Adelaide, iStay Precinct Adelaide offers self-contained apartments with a private balcony and city views. It features an indoor swimming pool, spa pool and sauna. All air-conditioned apartments have a spacious living area with flat-screen satellite TV and a DVD player. Each apartment includes laundry facilities and a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave and refrigerator. iStay Precinct Adelaide offers a 24/7 reception desk, dry cleaning and luggage storage facilities. The tour desk can recommend local attractions and help guests with travel arrangements. The popular Gouger Street, with its trendy shops, restaurants and bars, is 5 minutes’ walk away. Adelaide Convention Centre and Central Markets are each a 10-minute walk away.

name: The Playford Adelaide - MGallery
description: Experience The Playford MGallery, a true masterpiece nestled in the heart of Adelaide, where classical elegance harmoniously embraces contemporary luxury. Just a short 9km journey from Adelaide International Airport, our exquisite Art Nouveau-inspired hotel boasts 182 beautifully appointed guestrooms and suites, lavishly designed to envelop you in comfort. Our prime location opposite The Convention Centre, Casino and Oval ensures you're at the epicenter of everything this vibrant city has to offeraccorhotels.com

name: Mawson Lakes Hotel & Function Centre
description: Built from the ground up in the early 2000s, the Mawson Lakes precinct offers picturesque reserves, playground and promenades. The Mawson Central Shopping Centre and main lake are only a stones throw from the Hotel.Offering city style with country service, with an extensive range of hotel rooms, apartments and suites.Enjoy Lunch or Dinner in our Bistro, Counter Meals in our Sports Bar or Club Bar, or relax outside in our Alfresco Dining area.Mawson Lakes Hotel offers an excellent choice of modern conference and event facilities incorporating four function rooms ranging from an intimate boardroom to three large function rooms, with retractable walls to accommodate up to 345 guests.Offering everything for business and leisure, come and see for yourself why our superior service makes Mawson Lakes Hotel the perfect choice.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quest King William South
description: Just a 3-minute drive from Victoria Square, Quest King William South offers self-contained apartments with free WiFi and access to a fitness centre. Some apartments have a private balcony. There is a tram stop located directly outside the building, providing direct access to the city centre. The apartments are a 4-minute drive from both Adelaide Central Market and Beehive Corner Building. Rundle Mall is 6 minutes’ drive away. There is a cafe located next door and breakfast packs are available from reception for an additional charge. Each air-conditioned apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a bathroom with free toiletries. Most have laundry facilities. Breakfast packs are available, from reception for an additional charge of $12 each.

name: Discovery Parks - Adelaide Beachfront
address: 349 Military Road, Semaphore Park, Stirling, SA 5019
description: Located by the beach at Semaphore, this holiday park features a swimming pool, children’s playground and BBQ area. All accommodation includes air conditioning and en suite bathrooms. Discovery Holiday Parks - Adelaide Beachfront is just 16 km from central Adelaide. It is less than 10 minutes’ drive from shopping and dining at West Lakes. Facilities include BBQs with covered seating areas, coin-operated laundry facilities and a shared kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, toaster and kettle. The kiosk sells newspapers, drinks and grocery items. All accommodation at Discovery Parks - Adelaide Beachfront has a TV, refrigerator, microwave and toaster. Most offer full kitchen facilities with oven and stove.

name: Levi Adelaide Holiday Park
description: Located only 5 km from Adelaide city centre, Levi Adelaide Holiday Park features a children’s playground, tennis courts and free electric BBQs. All accommodation includes air conditioning and flat-screen TV. Nestled on the banks of the River Torrens and Linear Park, Levi Park is a 10-minute drive from Adelaide Zoo and a 15-minute drive from Adelaide Oval. The Barossa Valley Wine Region is only 1 hour away. Facilities include luggage storage, self-service laundry facilities and an internet kiosk. The tour desk can arrange tours to the Barossa Valley and Kangaroo Island. There are local restaurants within 500 metres of the holiday park. Some accommodation types include a full kitchen or kitchen, balcony or courtyard, ceiling fans and DVD player.

name: Quest Mawson Lakes
description: Featuring an on-site fitness centre and a large outdoor BBQ terrace, Quest Mawson Lakes offers stylish studios and apartments with large LCD TVs, kitchen or kitchenette facilities and secure car parking. All accommodation features heating, air conditioning, cable TV, DVD player and a writing desk with wired or WiFi high-speed internet access. Each apartment has kitchen and laundry facilities, plus separate living and dining areas. The elevated BBQ terrace at Quest Apartments Mawson Lakes is an ideal space for friends and families to gather and the on-site fitness centre is well-equipped. Local restaurants are within a 10-minute walk. Just 12 km from Adelaide city centre, Quest Mawson Lakes is surrounded by lakes and landscaped parks. It is a 20-minute drive to RAAF Base Edinburgh. University of South Australia is 500 metres away.

name: Stamford Plaza Adelaide
description: Located in the heart of the city, Stamford Plaza Adelaide provides easy access to Adelaide's main retail areas and tourist attractions. It has complimentary wireless internet, a bar and is a stone's throw from Adelaide Casino. Guests can enjoy Stamford Plaza's relaxation facilities, including a rooftop pool, plus keep fit at Gymnasium. Guests are invited to unwind on the rooftop terrace while taking in views of the city and the park. The hotel also has its very own gym, Pool Area. Stamford Plaza Adelaide Australia features 335 air conditioned rooms. Hot drinks can be brewed with the provided coffee and tea supplies. Cooked breakfasts are served at TG's and Ginza Miyako each morning before guests leave to discover the local area. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests can also order from the drinks menu at Cascades Cocktail Lounge. Stamford Plaza Adelaide Hotel is located in the heart of Adelaide’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. North Terrace, Rundle Mall and Adelaide Convention Centre are also within walking distance.Revato

name: Majestic Roof Garden Hotel
description: The award-winning 4.5-star Majestic Roof Garden Hotel is located only 50 metres from the bars, restaurants and shopping of Rundle Street. Guests have access to the rooftop garden with panoramic city views. It is a 5-minute walk to Rundle Mall and 10 minutes to the Art Gallery, Adelaide University and Museum. Adelaide Convention Centre, National Wine Museum and Adelaide Zoo are 20 minutes away. All rooms at The Majestic Roof Garden Adelaide feature modern bathrooms, king-size beds, full minibar and free Wi-Fi access. 24-hour room service and 24-hour reception are available. Facilities include a business centre, fitness room, in-house restaurant and on-site secure parking. The rooftop is home to the unique and flexible function rooms, which are bright and naturally lit through floor-to-ceiling glass doors. The function space features audio-visual equipment and catering options through the in-house restaurant.

name: Largs Pier Hotel Motel
description: Guests at Largs Pier Hotel can enjoy stylish accommodation in a heritage-listed building. This waterfront property is 15 minutes’ walk from Semaphore Beach and features an on-site restaurant. Some rooms offer a balcony and sea views. Largs Pier Hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from the South Australian Maritime Museum. Adelaide City Centre is 30 minutes’ drive away. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV. They offer tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. The private bathroom includes a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy hot breakfast, seafood, and wood-fire pizza from the restaurant. There is also an on-site liquor store and coin operated laundry facilities.

name: St Francis Winery
description: Set amongst picturesque gardens, St Francis Winery features an indoor swimming pool. It offers free WiFi and free parking. Guests can dine at the on-site restaurant and a bar. This historic venue is just 15 minutes’ drive from Seacliff Beach and 20 minutes’ drive from McLaren Vale Region. Adelaide City Centre is 30 minutes’ drive away. Accommodation options include self-contained apartments and suites. All room types are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels. They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

name: Mick O'Sheas
address: Main South Road, Port Noarlunga South, SA 5163
description: Located in Hackham, 24 km from The Beachouse, Mick O'Sheas provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, each room has a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Mick O'Sheas have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Mick O'Sheas will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hackham, like hiking, diving and fishing. Adelaide Parklands Terminal is 27 km from the hotel, while Victoria Square is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Adelaide Airport, 28 km from Mick O'Sheas.

name: Bnb with sea views and pool
description: Bnb with sea views and pool, a property with a garden and a terrace, is located in Seacliff, 14 km from Adelaide Parklands Terminal, 17 km from Victoria Square, as well as 17 km from Adelaide Convention Centre. The air-conditioned accommodation is 8.4 km from The Beachouse, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site. The bed and breakfast comes with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. Rundle Mall is 17 km from the bed and breakfast, while Beehive Corner Building is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Adelaide Airport, 10 km from Bnb with sea views and pool.

name: La cachette bushland hideaway
description: Set in Ironbank, 22 km from Victoria Square, La cachette bushland hideaway offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Offering a bar, the property is located within 23 km of Rundle Mall. The air-conditioned rooms provide a garden view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. Every room has a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the guest house all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. You can play tennis at La cachette bushland hideaway, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. Adelaide Parklands Terminal is 23 km from the accommodation, while Beehive Corner Building is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Adelaide Airport, 24 km from La cachette bushland hideaway.

name: The Farm Willunga
description: Offering a restaurant, The Farm Willunga is located in Willunga. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at this working farm will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. You can enjoy sea view from the room. At The Farm Willunga you will find a garden and barbecue facilities. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling. The property offers free parking. Adelaide Airport is 38 km away.

name: Cobblers Cottage B&B
description: A historic 1856 stone heritage listed cottage fully renovated, centrally located in Willunga and within a two minute walk to the Farmers Market, Russells Pizza and many restaurants. Cobblers maintains its sense of history with original slate floors, baltic pine, wood fire and recycled jarrah but featuring modern conveniences including a large 2 person spa, generous bathroom, 42"led tv, fully ducted air conditioning, full kitchen including a coffee pod machine and separate dining area. To the rear is a private patio with a bbq and off street parking. This cottage offers a large amount of space for two people, who will be the only occupantsExpedia

name: Mantra Sun City
address: 4217 3400 Gold Coast Highway (Ocean Avenue), Surfers Paradise, Gold Coast, Qld, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Bask in the warmth of the Gold Coast with a stay at the Mantra Sun City Surfers Paradise hotel. With accommodation including hotel suites, apartments, and penthouses and views of the hinterland and the Pacific Ocean, there's no better place to stay to make the most of Surfers Paradise. Try one of the chef's specials at Koastal Kitchen, or grab a drink with friends at the cocktail bar before heading out.accorhotels.com

name: The Island Gold Coast
address: 3128 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Located in the heart of Surfers Paradise, The Island offers modern boutique accommodation with the popular Rooftop Bar and vibrant restaurant and bar, Goldie. Guests can relax on the sun terrace, or enjoy a swim in the pool. The vibrant bars, restaurants and shops of the Gold Coast are all within a 5-minute walk. Free WiFi is provided. Each air conditioned room has a balcony with either city, mountain or pool views. There is a flat-screen TV and a kettle. The private bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Casino is 3.2 km from The Island, while Pacific Fair Shoping Centre is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 20 km from The Island.

name: Equinox Resort
address: 3458 Main Beach Parade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Stunning ocean views are offered from the balcony of each apartment at Equinox Resort. Set opposite Narrowneck Beach, this resort features a hot tub, an outdoor swimming pool, and both tennis and squash courts. Guests can work out in the fitness centre, or play air-hockey and billiards in the games room. Located on the Gold Coast, Equinox Apartments are 15 minutes’ walk from Cavill Avenue in the heart of Surfers Paradise. It is 5 minutes’ drive from Seaworld and 30 minutes’ from Coolangatta Airport. Tickets to theme parks such as Dreamworld and Wet ’n’ Wild can be booked via the tour desk.

name: The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast
address: 1 Casino Drive, Broadbeach Island Gold Coast, Broadbeach, Qld, Australia, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located in Gold Coast, The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast provides complimentary Wi-Fi and a gym. It is situated a brief stroll from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site day spa, Azure Spa & Fitness. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus a ballroom and a heated pool. There is also a lively casino on the property. Rooms at the hotel come with tea and coffee making facilities, flat-screen TVs and rain showers. They are air conditioned and offer movies-on-demand, an in-room safe and slippers. To start the day, guests are able to have breakfast at The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast's on-site restaurants, then later experience Italian meals at Cucina Vivo or Japanese cuisine at Kiyomi. Eateries at the hotel include M & G Cafe and Bar and Uncle Su. Guests are also able to relax with a drink at Outdoor Bar. The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast is situated amongst the area's well-known attractions, including Oasis Shopping Centre and Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, which are within walking distance. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: The Atrium Resort
description: Featuring magnificent views over the sparkling Broadwater, The Atrium Waterfront Resort is perfectly located on the quieter Northern end of the Gold Coast. Whether you’re spotting our elusive dugong, chasing crabs, building sandcastles, having a swim, strolling or cycling along the waterfront pathways stretching for kilometres in either direction, checking out the nearby Harbour Town Premium Outlet Shopping, newly opened Eat Street dining precinct or the Gold Class Cinemas you can do it all from our fabulous Gold Coast holiday accommodation. The Atrium Waterfront Resort offers self-contained apartments perfect for a Family Holiday, Business trip or romantic weekends away. We have something to suit everybody. Choose from Broadwater view, superior and standard apartments. Or for those looking to maximise their savings our budget apartments are a great option. When you’re not out and about make the most of our onsite facilities, Take in the amazing views from the spectacular Newly refurbished - "Heated" Rooftop Pool & Spa. The roof top also boasts a great Family BBQ area that has 2 Electric BBQ's, tables and Chairs. There is a lovely ground level Pool & Spa (New Sauna is arriving soon!), flood lit tennis court, gym, kids games room and adults billiards lounge. We have an onsite Cafe open for breakfast and lunch (7am-2pm). Everything you could want from your Gold Coast Holiday is close by, we are just a 10 minute drive from the famous Surfers Paradise strip. 15 min from Broadbeach, Pacific Fair and the Casino. Most importantly you can be at any of our world-renowned theme parks in under 20 minutes. We can even book your theme park tickets and many other attractions making your holiday as stress free as possible.

name: Oceana On Broadbeach
description: Located at the beachfront near Broadbeach, these luxurious apartments have spacious balconies with panoramic views of the ocean. The property is a 5-minute drive from Surfers Paradise. Guests enjoy a spa, fitness centre and a barbecue area with a gazebo. All apartments at Oceana On Broadbeach are self-catering units set in an expansive layout. Each one has modern comforts such as a well-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can relax at the elegantly designed lap pool is 30m long. The other pool is 20m long and heated. Oceana On Broadbeach is a 3 minute walk to the Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre.

name: Blue Heron Motel
address: 2323 Gold Coast Highway, Mermaid Beach, QLD
description: Set in a central beachside location, Blue Heron Boutique Motel is a beautifully renovated boutique motel featuring modern rooms, a garden and BBQ area created by an award-winning landscape designer. The motel offers a large swimming pool, free WiFi and free parking. The rooms feature a fresh, coastal palette, with unique textiles. Each of the rooms include a Nespresso coffee pod machine, selected teas and complimentary bathroom amenities. Also provided is air conditioning and heating, a flat-screen Smart TV and all are located on the ground floor. Guests can also make the most of additional services such as the beach side picnic hampers, bike hire, free beach towels and guest laundry. Blue Heron Boutique Motel is 5 minutes' walk from many of the Gold Coasts' popular restaurants and cafes as well as local stores. Surfers Paradise is a 15-minute drive away, while Cbus Super Stadium and Metricon Stadium are both within 20 minutes' drive. The tour desk can arrange tickets and transfers to all of the Gold Coast’s attractions such as Dreamworld, Sea World and Wet 'n' Wild.

name: Ipanema Holiday Resort
address: 2865 Gold Coast Highway, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Surfers Paradise, Ipanema Holiday Apartments promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Take advantage of the hotel's car park, airport transfer, babysitting, family room, BBQ facilities. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, mirror, non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. Discover all Gold Coast has to offer by making Ipanema Holiday Apartments your base.Agoda

name: Trilogy Surfers Paradise
address: 21-31 Cypress Avenue Surfers Paradise, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4226
description: Set amongst tropical gardens with a heated outdoor swimming pool, these apartments are only 300 metres from Surfers Paradise Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from shopping, nightlife, restaurants and cafés. Each apartment at Trilogy Surfers Paradise is air-conditioned and features a fully equipped kitchen with granite work surfaces and stainless steel appliances. All units have balconies. Facilities at Trilogy Surfers Paradise Apartments include a covered BBQ area, sauna and spa pool. Guests have access to a fitness centre. Free covered car parking is provided. Seaworld is only a 5-minute drive from Trilogy Apartments Gold Coast. Dreamworld, Movie World and Wet 'n' Wild are within a 25-minute drive.

name: Surfers Chalet
address: Cnr Aubrey & Garfield Terrace, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Offering an outdoor pool, sauna and a hot tub, Surfers Chalet is situated in Surfers Paradise, 25 minutes' drive from Tweed Heads. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are available in some units. A microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a kettle. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher, an oven, and a refrigerator. Towels and bed linen are available. Coolangatta is 20 km from Surfers Chalet, while Kingscliff is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Spindrift on the Beach
description: Located on the beach front, Spindrift on the Beach - Absolute Beachfront offers self-contained apartments boasting ocean views from a private balcony and direct beach access. Guests enjoy a heated beachfront pool, a spa pool and BBQ facilities. Spindrift on the Beach - Absolute Beachfront Gold Coast is situated between the patrolled flags of beautiful Nobby’s Beach. Shops and restaurants are only a 5-minute walk away. Each of these 2 bedroom apartments features 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. All apartments include cable TV and free on-site parking. Unlimited WiFi is provided. The tour desk can arrange tickets for the Gold Coast’s theme parks. Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre is just 5 minutes’ drive from Spindrift on the Beach - Absolute Beachfront. Gold Coast Coolangatta Airport is only 16 km away. The property is situated beside Nobby's Beach Surf Club, which is open for lunch and dinner.

name: Montego Sands Resort
description: No description found

name: Island Beach Resort
description: Island Beach Resort is located in the heart of Broadbeach on the Gold Coast. The resort features a swimming pool, spa and free undercover parking. Guests have access to free unlimited WiFi. All apartments at Island Beach feature a full kitchen and separate laundry. The living room has a smart TV. Island Beach Resort is close to the Gold Coast Convention Centre, Star Casino and Pacific Fair. Kurrawa Surf Club and a variety of restaurants and supermarkets are a short walk away.

name: The Darling At The Star Gold Coast
description: Located in Gold Coast, 750 metres from Kurrawa Beach, The Darling at The Star Gold Coast provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a bar and to a casino. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel each room is fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. Popular points of interest near The Darling at The Star Gold Coast include Broadbeach, Mermaid Beach and The Star Gold Coast. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Iconic Kirra Beach Resort
description: Featuring a swimming pool, Iconic Kirra Beach Resort is located in Gold Coast and is a five-minute walk from Kirra Beach. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary wireless internet and on-site parking. The resort has a gym with cardiovascular equipment, a swimming pool and a sun deck. It also provides luggage storage, a sun deck and highchairs. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a private balcony, a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a ceiling fan and an in-room closet.Revato

name: Bel Air on Broadbeach
description: Offering a sauna and an infinity pool, Bel Air on Broadbeach is located in Gold Coast and is a short walk from Pacific Fair Shopping Centre. It is conveniently positioned for guests wanting to visit local attractions. There are a variety of amenities at the property that guests can enjoy, such as a kids pool, luggage storage and a gym. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The apartments include air conditioning and feature a private balcony and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a microwave. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the apartment's living area. Bel Air on Broadbeach has a conveniently located café where guests can unwind with a drink before discovering the area. The property also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a selection of well-known eateries in the local area to discover. The area surrounding Bel Air on Broadbeach is popular for its shopping. The Wave and Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Windsurfer Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, table tennis, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Grande Florida Beachside Resort
description: Offering 2 large lagoon swimming pools, 6 BBQ areas and apartments with a private balcony, the Grande Florida Beachside Resort is ideal for family and weekend escapes. The resort has direct access to Miami Beach. The air-conditioned apartments overlook either the pool area or of the lovely tropical gardens. Each apartment has 2-3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. All include a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and free cable TV. Free covered parking is also provided. Grande Florida Resort is 5 minutes’ drive from Burleigh Head National Park, and 10 minutes’ drive from Broadbeach. Gold Coast Airport is a 20-minute drive away. The lagoon pools can be enjoyed by both children and adults, with one heated and offering waterfalls. The onsite tour desk books tickets for Gold Coast theme parks; Dreamworld, Seaworld and Wet ‘n’ Wild. Grande Florida is a great choice for travelers interested in family-friendly recreation, theme parks and beach walks.

name: Dorchester on the Beach
description: Set right on the beach, Dorchester On The Beach features self-catering apartments with a private balcony offering lovely ocean views. Guests enjoy a private beach area, free WiFi and an outdoor heated swimming pool. Dorchester On The Beach Apartments are 5 minutes' walk from the Northcliffe Tram Station. The property is 5 minutes’ drive from Jupiters Casino and the popular Pacific Fair Shopping Centre. Gold Coast Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Each of the air-conditioned apartments include a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and a dining area. All offer a living area with a sofa, free cable TV and a DVD player. Free secure covered onsite parking is provided for one car. All apartments have lift access. The tour desk can book tickets to Gold Coast theme parks, including Dreamworld, MovieWorld and Wet 'n' Wild.

name: Brighton Shores
description: Brighton Shores is situated in Gold Coast’s vibrant Southport district, featuring picturesque panoramic views of the Broadwater marina, ocean and hinterland. Brighton shores offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available for short or long-term stay. Oversized apartments feature ducted air conditioning with spacious living areas, private balcony, large kitchen, laundry facilities and satellite TV. Guests also enjoy unlimited Wi-Fi along with secure on-site parking. Most apartments have lovely ocean views. Enjoy your stay with Brighton’s fantastic resort style facilities featuring an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ area, indoor heated lap pool, sauna, spa, billiard room and gymnasium. Woolworth’s supermarket is located just across the road, along with restaurants, cafés, pharmacy, beauty and hairdresser. Australia Fair Shopping Centre is located within 5 minutes’ walk which offers numerous specialty stores and Event cinemas. For added convenience, the Gold Coast Light Rail Tram (G:link) station is located at the buildings doorstep which provides easy transport to Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, Gold Coast restaurants, universities and hospitals.

name: Azzura Greens Resort
description: No description found

name: Nobby Beach Holiday Village
description: Just 500 metres from the beach, Nobby Beach Holiday Village offers self-contained air-conditioned accommodation in the heart of the Gold Coast. The swimming pool has a waterslide and wading pool. Nobby Beach Holiday Village Gold Coast is just a 10-minute drive from Surfers Paradise and 20 minutes’ drive from Gold Coast Airport. Jupiter’s Casino and Pacific Fair Shopping Centre are 3 km away. Facilities include a BBQ area, convenience store, internet kiosk and self-service laundry facilities. Guests have access to a children’s playground, board games, DVD rentals and bicycle hire. Each villa, cabin and holiday unit includes a DVD player, flat-screen TV and a seating area. All have a kitchenette with refrigerator, toaster, microwave and tea/coffee making facilities.

name: Rainbow Commodore Coolangatta
address: 255 Boundary Street, Rainbow Bay, Coolangatta, Coolangatta, QLD 4225
description: Rainbow Bay Rainbow Commodore Coolangatta offers spacious accommodation with private balcony just 100 metres from Rainbow Bay Beach. Facilities include a swimming pool, a hot tub and a half-court tennis court. Each of these 2-bedroom apartments features a separate lounge and dining area with cable TV, plus a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, oven, stove, dishwasher and microwave. Some apartments boast stunning ocean views. Free secure undercover car parking is provided at Rainbow Commodore Holiday Apartments. Guests have access to a games room with a pool table. The tour desk can arrange sightseeing trips and local activities. Rainbow Bay Rainbow Commodore Coolangatta is only a 5-minute walk from many shops, cafes and restaurants. Twin Towns International Club is 500 metres away, offering a variety of restaurants and entertainment.

name: Tiki Hotel Surfers Paradise
address: Corner Ferny Avenue & Wahroonga Place, Surfers Paradise, QLD
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, Tiki Hotel Surfers Paradise is situated in Gold Coast, 700 metres from SkyPoint Observation Deck and 3.7 km from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre. On level 1 at the property, you will find an outdoor swimming pool with water slide and 2 BBQ areas for guests to use. There is secure car parking beneath the hotel. Apartments are air conditioned with either a kitchen or kitchenette facilities. The Star Gold Coast is 3.8 km from Tiki Hotel Surfers Paradise, while Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 3.9 km away. Gold Coast Airport is 22 km from the property.

name: Pelican Cove Apartments
address: 6 Back Street, Biggera Waters, Biggera Waters, QLD 4216
description: Relax by the heated outdoor pool and spa pool at Pelican Cove, only 15 minutes’ drive from Surfers Paradise. Each spacious apartment has a private balcony offering garden or pool views. Guests enjoy free WiFi. Pelican Cove Apartments Gold Coast are a 15-minute drive from Seaworld, Wet ‘n’ Wild, Movie World and Dreamworld. Gold Coast Coolangatta Airport is only 45 minutes' drive away. Each apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a stove, a dishwasher and a microwave. A separate dining area and a lounge room with air conditioning and satellite TV are provided. Laundry facilities are provided. Free secure covered car parking is included. The large gardens include a BBQ area and tennis half-court. Guests can purchase theme park tickets, day tours and dinner cruises from the reception desk.

name: Broadbeach Savannah Resort
description: Broadbeach Savannah Resort offers self-catering accommodation just 5 minutes’ walk from Broadbeach. Most apartments have a spa bath and private balcony. The property offers guests access to a swimming pool, fitness centre and sauna. Broadbeach Savannah is just 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Star Casino and the Gold Coast Convention Centre. Coolangatta (Gold Coast) Airport is 25 minutes’ drive. Limited covered parking is available. Free street parking is available. The privately owned and managed apartments come with air conditioning, a well-equipped kitchenette and laundry facilities. Each apartment has cable TV, and most also offer gorgeous ocean views. There are a number of restaurants and cafés within a 3-minute walk.

name: Montana Palms Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as an oven and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Wyndham Surfers Paradise
address: 3018 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: With its world-class surf breaks, soft sand and thrill-filled theme parks Australias Gold Coast is a vacation destination for all ages. Wyndham Hotel Surfers Paradise offers easy access to all the family-friendly attractions the area has to offer. Catch an entertaining show experience a dolphin encounter at Sea World Queensland or ride the Super Tubes HydroCoaster and take the Pipeline Plunge at Whitewater World. Experience the Sky Voyager and Shockwave rides at DreamWorld or get up close and personal with native wildlife with the parks Tree Kangaroo Experience. Go diving, snorkeling or whale watching along the breathtaking Great Barrier Reef. The Gold Coast is also home to fantastic shopping and a variety of dining options just a short stroll from the resort. Plan a day exploring the lush hinterland and its charming villages, artisan galleries and antique shops. There are numerous opportunities to learn about the Aboriginal culture of the region through tours and excursions, art and dance workshops and seasonal festivals like the monthly Didgeridoo Jam at Didgeridoo Festivals in Bellbird Park. This resort offers one- and two- bedroom condo-style resort suites that comfortably sleep four to six guests. One- bedroom condo-style resort suites comfortably sleep four guests with one king bed in the private bedroom and a sleeper sofa in the living area. Two-bedroom condo-style resort suites comfortably sleep six guests with one king bed in the master bedroom, two twin beds in the guest bedroom and a sleeper sofa in the living area. You will also appreciate the convenience of separate living/dining areas, laundry facilities and a full kitchen. Stay connected during your stay with Wi-Fi access (fee).iHotelier/iStay

name: Sunburst Motel
description: Just 2 minutes’ walk from The Broadwater, Sunburst Motel features free Wi-Fi, a saltwater swimming pool and a barbecue area with outdoor seating. Free parking is available on site. All air-conditioned rooms have a microwave, refrigerator and tea and coffee maker. Each room features a seating area and ironing facilities. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are standard in all rooms. Sunburst Motel Biggera Waters is 10 minutes’ drive from Surfers Paradise, and 15 minutes’ drive from the Gold Coast theme parks, including Dreamworld and Movieworld. Gold Coast Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

name: Karana Palms Resort
description: Close to theme parks, this smoke-free apartment brings it all within reach. Cavill Avenue is within an easy 9-minute walk and Chevron Renaissance is also a quick 7-minute walk away, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Gold Coast by hopping on a metro at Cypress Avenue Station, just a short 10-minute walk away. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this apartment, which also features a furnished balcony. As for the great indoors, you can try your hand at billiards, or enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a sitting area, a sofa bed, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer and towels. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: The Breakers
address: 60 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: The Breakers Gold Coast is situated in Gold Coast and is close to the area's tourist attractions. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site parking. Those staying at the property are welcome to benefit from the relaxation facilities, which include an outdoor heated pool. There is also a BBQ area on-site for guests to use. The apartments are air conditioned and include a kitchen, a refrigerator and a private balcony. They each have a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and an in-room dining area. The area surrounding The Breakers Gold Coast has a range of restaurants and cafés. Sea World is only a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Sandcastles On The Broadwater
description: Sandcastles offers self-contained accommodation just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Surfers Paradise. Guest facilities include a swimming pool, games room, fitness centre, free parking and massage services. The spacious apartments at Sandcastles on the Broadwater come with full kitchen and laundry facilities. All air-conditioned units have a private balcony and cable TV. Guests can enjoy a meal in the barbecue area, or unwind in the spa bath. The tour desk can assist guests with travel arrangements and tickets to theme parks and cruises. Luggage storage is also available. Sandcastles Gold Coast is located only 15 minutes’ drive from major theme parks, including Dreamworld and Wet ‘n’ Wild Water World. A number of shopping outlets are just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Pacific Coast Motel
description: Pacific Coast Motel is situated in Gold Coast, within 2.3 km of Broadwater Parklands Beach and 2.4 km of Southport Broadwater Parklands. Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, the 3-star motel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 800 metres from Harley Park Beach. Guest rooms are equipped with a fridge, microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the motel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Australia Fair Shopping Centre is 3 km from Pacific Coast Motel, while Harbour Town Gold Coast is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 31 km from the accommodation.

name: Quest Robina
address: 3 Centreline Place, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4226
description: Featuring a heated swimming pool, access to new fitness centre, a garden and views of the garden, Quest Robina is set in Gold Coast and offers accommodation with free high-speed WiFi, and specific dedicated pet-friendly apartments (subject to availability, additional charge from hotel and notification to hotel Reservations). Private secure parking is available on site (charges apply). Offering a balcony, all units are air conditioned and feature a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. A business centre is available on site at the aparthotel. Quest Robina features a barbecue. Robina Town Centre is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 21 km from Quest Robina.

name: Elite Gold Coast
address: 28 Chisholm Road, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4211
description: Elite Gold Coast features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Gold Coast. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave. At Elite Gold Coast every room comes with bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis and mini-golf at the accommodation. Metricon Stadium is 1.5 km from Elite Gold Coast, while Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 28 km from the hotel.

name: La Costa Motel
description: Situated opposite Gold Coast Airport, this refurbished boutique motel offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour check-in and a free airport shuttle. The beautiful Bilinga Beach is only 100 metres away. These air-conditioned studios feature their original polished wooden floorboards and offer a flat-screen TV, DVD player, microwave, fridge, tea and coffee making facilities. Southern Cross University is 1 km from the property, while John Flynn Hospital is 3.5 km away. Kirra Beach and Coolangatta Beach are both 10 minutes’ walk from La Costa Beachside Motel Bilinga. It is 20 km to Surfers Paradise and 40 km to the Wet ‘n’ Wild Water World and Dreamworld theme parks. Guests have free use of vintage bikes and beach towels. The motel’s front desk books theme park tickets, public transport tickets and has a DVD library. A complimentary breakfast basket is provided in your room.

name: Royal Woods Resort
description: No description found

name: Bay of Palms
description: Set on peaceful Pine Lake, Bay of Palms resort offers a solar heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa pool, a bar/lounge, a barbecue area and free parking on site. The property has a games room with a pool table and a table-tennis table. Guest rooms are smoke-free and fitted with air-conditioning, a microwave, a fridge and a flat-screen TV with a DVD player. This resort has laundry facilities and offers free WiFi. Bay of Palms is a 3-minute walk from the Pines Shopping Centre and a 5-minute drive from both Currumbin Beach and Palm Beach. It is a 10-minute drive from Gold Coast Airport and a 35-minute drive from Dreamworld, Warner Bros. Movie World and Wet ‘n‘ Wild theme parks.

name: Santana Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and free WiFi. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, dial-up Internet, and table tennis.Expedia

name: Golden Riviera Beach Resort
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as an oven and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: One The Esplanade Apartments on Surfers Paradise
address: 1 The Esplanade, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: Located 200 metres from Surfers Paradise Beach and 1.3 km from Broadbeach in the centre of Gold Coast, One The Esplanade Apartments on Surfers Paradise provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Some of the units include a cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Barbecue facilities are available and guests can also relax in the garden, beside the pool with a view, or on the sun terrace. Budds Beach is 1.5 km from One The Esplanade Apartments on Surfers Paradise, while SkyPoint Observation Deck is 200 metres away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Riviera Bed & Breakfast
description: Set amongst 8 acres of tropical rainforest, the 19th-century Riviera Nerang offers guests an outdoor swimming pool, barbecue facilities and massage services. Riviera Bed And Breakfast is within 20 minutes’ drive of popular Gold Coast theme parks, including Dreamworld and Wet ‘n’ Wild Water World. Surfers Paradise is a 25-minute drive away. Nerang Riviera B&B features French Provincial style decor with mosquito nets. All rooms feature either a shared veranda or a private balcony with garden views. Facilities include a guest lounge with a shared kitchenette, which includes a microwave, refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. A laundry and ironing service is available for an additional charge. The Riviera features French specialty breakfast on weekends, and continental breakfast on weekdays, served on the deck with views of the rainforest and exotic birds. French and Italian cuisine is available for dinner upon advance reservation.

name: 424 Trees Tiny Home
description: 424 Trees Tiny Home in Tallebudgera provides adults-only accommodation with a rooftop pool, a spa and wellness centre and a garden. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The units come with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and a wardrobe. Every room has a private bathroom with a hot tub, a hair dryer and free toiletries. At the guest house the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. 424 Trees Tiny Home offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna, a hot tub and a wellness packages. Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary is 12 km from the accommodation, while Burleigh Head National Park is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Gold Coast, 21 km from 424 Trees Tiny Home, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Santa Fe by the Broadwater
address: 7-9 Roberts Street Labrador, Qld, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4215
description: Set in Gold Coast in the Queensland region, with Harley Park Beach and Broadwater Parklands Beach nearby, Santa Fe by the Broadwater offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, pool views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Santa Fe by the Broadwater offers a barbecue. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the year-round outdoor pool. Southport Broadwater Parklands is 1.8 km from Santa Fe by the Broadwater, while Australia Fair Shopping Centre is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 30 km from the aparthotel.

name: Cairns Colonial Club Resort
description: Set in Cairns, 3.3 km from Cairns Station, Cairns Colonial Club Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Cairns Colonial Club Resort have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. At Cairns Colonial Club Resort you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Australian and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The hotel offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Cairns Colonial Club Resort, and car hire is available. Cairns Convention Centre is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Cairns Flecker Botanic Gardens is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 3 km from Cairns Colonial Club Resort.

name: Cairns Central Plaza Apartment Hotel
description: Cairns Central Apartments is a 4.5 star apartment hotel in the heart of Cairns CBD, opposite Cairns Central Shopping Centre. All units have ocean or hinterland views. It is within walking distance of popular attractions including the Esplanade, Night Markets, Cairns Convention Centre, Reef Casino and nightclubs. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, free parking and free Foxtel. Luxury accommodation options include spacious studios one, and two-bedroom apartments that are elegantly styled and include a fully equipped kitchen (studios have a microwave and kettle), and a large flat-screen TV with cable channels. They feature individual air conditioning in addition to ceiling fans and secure undercover parking. Guests can relax at the rooftop pool and spa and enjoy the sweeping views, or utilise the meeting and conference space that includes an executive boardroom. The on-site tour desk can provide more information on the area and local attractions. This is one of our guests' favourite parts of Cairns, according to independent reviews.

name: Golden Sands Beachfront Apartment Resort
description: Offering a lagoon-style heated swimming pool, an onsite cafe/restaurant, and a tennis/basketball court, Golden Sands Beachfront Resort is just a 1-minute walk from lovely Yorkeys Knob Beach. We offer well-appointed, self-contained air-conditioned apartments with private balconies and a lift. Complimentary secure underground parking and free Wi-Fi plus we now offer car rental onsite Golden Sands Beachfront Resort is 5 minutes’ drive from Yorkeys Knob Boating Club, Marina and Half Moon Bay Golf Club. The Skyrail Rainforest Cableway is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Sunshine Tower Hotel
description: Cairns Sunshine Tower Hotel is ideally located just 3 blocks from the city centre and 10 minutes' drive from the Cairns International Airport. The hotel has a beautiful backyard with a large sun deck, an outdoor swimming pool, heated spa and barbecue facilities that can be used free of charge. The hotel's location is the perfect starting point for exploring the Great Barrier Reef, Daintree Rainforest and Atherton Tablelands. The rooms are decorated in a tropical style, and all have air conditioning, tea/coffee facilities, a fridge and a private en suite bathroom. Get advice at the tour desk before exploring the area. Guests also enjoy free WiFi and free secure car parking.

name: Cairns Gateway Resort
description: No description found

name: Argosy on the Beach
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, a private beach and a sauna, Argosy on the Beach is located in Cairns and provides comfortable accommodation. It also offers a ticket service, luggage storage and a tour desk. Argosy On The Beach Apartments Cairns provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. There is also a BBQ area available for guests to enjoy. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchen, a private balcony and a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax in the welcoming seating area. Cairns Airport is less than a 25-minute drive from Argosy on the Beach. Kuranda Scenic Railway is just an easy drive from the resort.Revato

name: Blue Lagoon Resort
address: 22 - 26 Trinity Beach Road, Trinity Beach, QLD 4879
description: A 4-minute walk from Trinity Beach, this palm-fringed resort offers accommodation with balconies overlooking rainforest mountains. It features 2 outdoor pools and a tennis court. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The area surrounding the property has many cafés along the shore and the local shopping centre is 500-meters away. The resort has free parking and is a 20-minute drive from Cairns city centre and 15 minutes' drive from Cairns International Airport. Rooms at the Blue Lagoon Resort combine tropical elements with contemporary design. They all have flat-screen TVs and a radio. Each room includes modern cooking facilities and a balcony. Guests have free access to the Blue Lagoon in-house fitness centre. Barbeque pavilions are located within the resort. Paradise Palms Golf Course is a 7-minute drive away.

name: Melaleuca Resort
description: Located in Palm Cove’s beachfront, this 4-star accommodation offers self-contained apartments, a lagoon-style pool, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking. William Esplanade Bus Stop is less than 5 minutes’ walk. Spacious and set in a minimalist décor, each apartment is equipped with air conditioning, a well-equipped kitchen and a large balcony with views of the tropical garden and swimming pool. Guests can also relax using any of the 3 in-pool spas at Melaleuca Resort. Other leisure amenities include barbecue facilities and a guest library. Cairns International Airport is a 25-minute drive away from the resort. Paradise Palms Country Club is 6 km away.

name: Pullman Palm Cove Sea Temple Resort and Spa
description: Pullman Palm Cove Sea Temple Resort & Spa is an upscale, 5-star AAA rated resort, located on the southern end of the beach at Palm Cove - a boutique resort village in Tropical North Queensland. Located just 25 minutes north of Cairns Airport, the Pullman Sea Cove Resort is nestled around three spectacular swimming pools & two Spas, including one for children's use, all perfectly located near the Lagoon Bar, serving lunch, snacks and drinks throughout the day.accorhotels.com

name: Amaroo at Trinity
