description: This comfortable property in Cairns offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as an outdoor heated pool and outdoor tennis courts. Featuring views of Trinity Beach, it also provides a wide range of amenities, including a sun deck, a tour desk and luggage storage. Amaroo At Trinity offers a garden to relax in, as well as free private parking on site. There is also a BBQ area on-site for guests to use. The apartments are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. They all offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room dining area and an in-room safe. Cairns Airport is within a 20-minute drive of Amaroo At Trinity, as is Kuranda Scenic Railway.Revato

name: Coral Sands Beachfront Resort
address: Cnr Trinity Beach Road & Vasey Esplanade, Trinity Beach, QLD 4879
description: Featuring a private beach and a swimming pool, Coral Sands Beachfront Resort is situated in Cairns and provides modern accommodation. Guests also have access to free Wi-Fi and on-site parking. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at Coral Sands, such as a tour desk, luggage storage and an airport shuttle. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at Coral Sands Beachfront Resort Cairns are air-conditioned and include a refrigerator, an in-room dining area and a private terrace. For guests who like to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a microwave, a dishwasher and an oven. Coral Sands Resort is within a 20-minute car trip of Cairns Airport and Kuranda Scenic Railway.Revato

name: Vision Cairns Esplanade
description: Situated on the Cairns Esplanade, this 5 star property features self-contained apartments. Guests enjoy 2 swimming pools, a sauna and a fitness centre. Each apartment features a spacious living room which opens onto a balcony or patio with an outdoor setting. All apartments include a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and satellite TV. Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pool, surrounded by a lovely palm tree garden. There is a tour desk, massage service and BBQ area available for guest use. Vision Apartments are just 100 metres from restaurants, shops and bars. It is a 5-minute walk from Cairns Reef Fleet Terminal and Cairns Cruise Ship Terminal. Cairns Airport is 7 minutes’ drive away.

name: Mantra Amphora
description: Directly across from one of Palm Cove's most pristine beaches, Mantra Amphora is the perfect spot for your next tropical getaway. Hotel Rooms, 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Apartments are ideal for couples and families alike. Destress with a dip in our large free-form pool or let the kids splash around in the wading pool.accorhotels.com

name: Bellevue At Trinity Beach
description: Situated in Cairns, Bellevue At Trinity Beach offers comfortable accommodation with sweeping sea views. It also provides an outdoor pool, a tour desk and free Wi-Fi. Those staying at the property can make the most of the property's gardens. There is also on-site parking for those with a car. The apartments at Bellevue At Trinity Beach are air-conditioned and include an iPod docking station, a private balcony and a refrigerator. For guests who like to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is equipped with kitchenware, a microwave and a dishwasher. Bellevue At Trinity Beach is under a 20-minute drive from Cairns Airport. Kuranda Scenic Railway is within a short drive from the property.Revato

name: Trinity Links Resort
description: Set 6.7 km from Cairns Convention Centre, Trinity Links Resort offers an infinity pool, a spa and wellness centre and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The accommodation has a hot tub. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, mountain views, a seating area, cable TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Trinity Links Resort offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub and sun terrace. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Cairns Station is 7 km from Trinity Links Resort, while Cairns Regional Gallery is 7.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 14 km from the aparthotel.

name: Reef Palms
description: Located 200 metres from the Esplanade and offering free Wi-Fi, Reef Palms offers self-contained studio and apartments, plus a swimming pool with recreational spa, barbecue area and full laundry facilities. Guests can enjoy the quiet and relaxed atmosphere of Reef Palms Cairns, only a 20-minute walk from central Cairns. The outdoor restaurants and bars of the Esplanade are a 3-minute walk away. Designed in traditional Queenslander style, all rooms include a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, spacious indoor living space and a private balcony. The tour desk at Reef Palms can arrange trips to local attractions, including The Great Barrier Reef, Kuranda Skyrail, Daintree Rainforest and Cairns Tropical Zoo. Reef Palms Resort is 4 km from Cairns Airport and transfers to the airport are available.

name: First City Caravilla
description: Located less than 5 km from Cairns city centre, First City Caravilla offers holiday cabins with flat-screen TV and cooking facilities. Guests have access to an outdoor pool, and free WiFi. First City Caravilla Cairns is only 6 km from the restaurants and bars of Cairns Esplanade. Cairns International Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Facilities include a covered BBQ area and self-service laundry. Free internet access is available at the guest computer. The tour desk can arrange Great Barrier Reef cruises and Skyrail passes. Each holiday cabin includes a mini refrigerator, tea/coffee making facilities and ceiling fans. There is also a radio, opening windows and private patio in every cabin.

name: Cascade Gardens
description: Centrally situated, Cascade Gardens allows for easy access to Cairns's best hot spots. The multiple amenities this stylish property offers include free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and luggage storage. Q Resorts Cascade Gardens Cairns provides a garden to relax in, as well as free private parking on site. There are a wide range of activities, such as hiking, horse riding and 4WD tours, meaning everyone in the family will have an entertaining stay. The apartments are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a coffee maker and a private balcony. The kitchen has full cooking facilities and there is an in-room dining space where guests can enjoy their meals. The area around Cascade Gardens has a variety of restaurants and cafés. It is within a 20-minute walk of Cairns Railway Station and Reef Fleet Terminal, which allows convenient access in and around Cairns.Revato

name: The Beach Place
description: Located in Yorkeys Knob, The Beach Place is a perfect starting point from which to explore Cairns. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, convenience store, gift/souvenir shop, taxi service, luggage storage are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include boats, canoe, hiking trails, wind surfing, snorkeling. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at The Beach Place.Agoda

name: Nightcap At Balaclava Hotel
description: Offering a restaurant, a bar and a children's playroom, Balaclava Hotel is an 8-minute drive from the Cairns Esplanade. It features air-conditioned rooms with cable TV. All rooms have a refrigerator and an electric kettle. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Balaclava Hotel Cairns is a 5-minute drive from Cairns Central Shopping Centre, and a 10-minute drive from Cairns Convention Centre. Cairns Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Graziers Steakhouse offers lunch and dinner daily, and specialises in steaks, burgers, chicken Parmigiana and fish and chips. The bar is the perfect place for a drink with friends. The hotel offers a children’s room with a PlayStation console, as well as face painting every Friday and Saturday night. It also has a function room and laundry facilities.

name: Floriana Guest House
description: No description found

name: Sarayi Boutique Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Palm Cove overlooking the Coral Sea, Sarayi offers spacious beachside accommodation. Sarayi Boutique Hotel is located opposite a patrolled beach and provides a great starting point for local tours to Cairns, the Great Barrier Reef and the Daintree Rainforest, which hotel staff can book for you. All air-conditioned rooms feature a 42-inch plasma-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. Each has a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a spa and relax with a sunset cocktail.

name: Cairns Beach Resort
description: Located at Holloways Beach, Australis Cairns Beach Resort is just 10 minutes' drive north of Cairns City. It offers 4-star apartments set amidst tropical, landscaped gardens. The 1-bedroom apartments are self-contained with kitchen and laundry facilities, and have private balconies which overlook the resort's beautiful gardens, pool area or the Coral Sea. Enjoy the BBQ facilities and relax in the landscaped pool area. A tour desk is available to assist with local attractions. Car rental services are provided on site. Cairns International Airport is 15 minutes' drive away.

name: The Reef Retreat Palm Cove
description: Set among groves of paperbark trees, The Reef Retreat offers 4-star accommodation just 1 minute's walk from the beach at Palm Cove. All rooms include spacious private balconies with pool and garden views. Each room at The Reef Retreat Palm Cove features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Also available are three-bedroom apartments located off-site, which feature a full kitchen and a terrace or balcony with street or pool views. Palm Cove’s upscale restaurants and shops are a short walk away. Facilities include a large heated swimming pool. There is an impressive terraced barbecue area in the shade of the surrounding tropical trees. Palm Cove offers award-winning dining, boutique shopping and world-class golf. It offers easy access to the Great Barrier Reef, Daintree Rainforest, Cape Tribulation and Kuranda. The Reef Retreat is 22 km from Cairns Airport. Free covered parking is available.

name: South Cairns Resort
description: Located just 6 minutes’ drive from Cairns city centre, South Cairns Resort offers an outdoor lagoon pool and free on-site parking. Each of the air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and microwave. Each room features ceiling fans and tea/coffee making facilities. Family rooms, inter-connected rooms and pool view rooms feature a small kitchenette. The renovated South Cairns Resort boasts a children's playground and a BBQ and picnic area. Daily tours can be arranged at the tour desk. This property is within 5 minutes' walk of shops, cafes and restaurants. It is a 3-minute drive from Stockland Shopping Centre.

name: Cairns Crystal Cascades Holiday Park
description: Located in Cairns in the Queensland region and Cairns Station reachable within 15 km, Cairns Crystal Cascades Holiday Park provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, pool with a view and free private parking. Each unit comes with a balcony offering mountain views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a kettle. The holiday park offers a picnic area. Guests at Cairns Crystal Cascades Holiday Park can enjoy cycling and fishing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Cairns Convention Centre is 16 km from the accommodation, while Tjapukai Aboriginal Cultural Park is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 14 km from Cairns Crystal Cascades Holiday Park.

name: Sea Temple Palm Cove
description: Located 100 metres from Palm Cove Beach, Sea Temple Palm Cove offers water sports facilities, an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the aparthotel serves Asian cuisine. Sea Temple Palm Cove offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub, a spa facilities and a wellness packages. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Clifton Beach is 700 metres from Sea Temple Palm Cove, while Ellis Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Cairns, 23 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rocky Resort Motor Inn
description: Located only 2 km from Rockhampton city centre, Rocky Resort Motor Inn features a restaurant, bar and outdoor swimming pool. Guests enjoy free WiFi. Rocky Resort Motor Inn is a 5-minute drive from Rockhampton Zoo and Botanic Gardens. It is 40 minutes’ drive from the beaches and islands of the Capricorn Coast. All air-conditioned rooms at Rocky Resort feature a minibar, an LCD TV, and free wireless internet access. Some rooms also feature a spa bath. The restaurant offers a variety of meals for both breakfast and dinner. Free undercover car parking is available and there is a guest laundry on site.

name: Merewether Motel
description: Just a 3-minute drive from Merewether Beach, guests enjoy free WiFi, BBQ facilities at Merewether Motel. All refurbished rooms feature a satellite Smart TV. Merewether Motel is a 5-minute drive from Merewether Golf Club and a 6-minute drive from the heart of Newcastle. Hunter Stadium is an 8-minute drive away. All air-conditioned guest rooms feature a fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer ironing facilities and a bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. The motel offers are an onsite mini market, laundry facilities and a sun terrace.

name: Regal Port Douglas
description: Regal Port Douglas is just 200 metres from the beach, right at the start of the restaurant strip in Port Douglas. It offers deluxe accommodation with free private parking and a heated outdoor swimming pool. The resort offers studios and fully equipped apartments. Some have spa baths and others have a hot tub on the balcony. Regal Port Douglas Hotel's privileged location is a short walk from award-winning restaurants, chic bars and boutiques and the Sunday Foreshore Markets.

name: Coffee House Apartment Motel
description: Centrally located, just 1 block from Rockhampton's CBD shopping precinct and nightlife, Coffee House Apartment Motel offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by tropical gardens, a BBQ area and free covered parking. The self-contained apartments boast a private balcony. Coffee House Apartment Motel is a 15-minute walk from the Fitzroy River and several historical buildings. It is only a 10-minute drive from Rockhampton Airport. All apartments are air-conditioned and overlook the courtyard and/or swimming pool area. Each has a lounge area offering a flat-screen TV. Luggage storage, laundry services and dry cleaning are available for guest convenience.

name: Northpoint Motel
description: Built in September 2016, nestled on the New England Highway, 9 minutes' drive from Toowoomba City Centre, Northpoint Motel offers studio and apartment accommodation with access to free WiFi, cable channels and access to both a guest laundry and free parking. Each studio comes with a kitchenette that has a refrigerator, microwave and a stove top, while the apartments have a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a separate living area with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. Empire Theatre is 4.3 km away, Queens Park is 4.8 km away and Grand Central Shopping Centre is 5.1 km away. Toowoomba Showgrounds is 11.8 km from Northpoint Motel Apartments.

name: Comfort Inn Bay of Isles
description: Just 100 metres from Esperance town centre, Comfort Inn Bay of Isles offers free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, a bar and an outdoor swimming pool. It is situated on the Esplanade, a 5-minute drive from Twilight Beach and the start of the Great Ocean Drive. All air-conditioned rooms feature a 50-inch flat-screen TV with 20 cable channels and tea/coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom comes with shower and a hairdryer. Eljays Restaurant serves breakfast and dinner daily. House specialties include fresh local seafood, steaks and vegetarian options. There is also an extensive wine list for your enjoyment. Bay of Isles Comfort Inn is a 2-minute drive from Esperance Hospital and a 10-minute drive from Pink Lake Country Club Golf Course. Cape Arid National Park is a 45-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Windarra On High
description: Built in 1876, Windarra on High is located in East Launceston. This heritage listed home is a 10-minute walk to the city centre. Cataract George Reserve is 9 minutes' drive from the property. The refurbished property combines heritage characteristics with a modern twist. Guests enjoy a complimentary continental breakfast. Launceston Airport is 14.4 km away.

name: Observatory Guesthouse - Adults Only
description: No description found

name: Byron Bay Yha
description: Located in Byron Bay town centre, Byron Bay YHA offers backpacker accommodation just 400 metres from Main Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a tropical garden and games room. Guests enjoy free WiFi in communal areas. The extended boutique-style hostel features air-conditioned, private and share en-suite rooms. Guests can relax in the renovated outdoor dining area or make use of the extended kitchen and BBQ facilities. Guests can borrow surfboards and bodyboards. Luggage can be securely stored in the locker room. Contemporary artworks and graffiti walls by Australian artists can be enjoyed throughout the hostel. Guests can enjoy free off road parking or secure parking for an additional charge. Byron Bay YHA is situated 150 metres from the coach terminal. It is less than 5 minutes’ walk to bars, cafes and restaurants.

name: Baudins of Busselton Bed and Breakfast - Adults only
description: Offering free continental breakfast, free WiFi and barbecue facilities, Baudins of Busselton is just 650 metres from Geographe Bay. It features air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station and a DVD player. Baudins of Busselton Bed and Breakfast - Adults only is 2 minutes’ drive from Busselton Visitor Centre, and 4 minutes’ drive from Busselton Jetty. The town centre is a 15-minute stroll away. All rooms have a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can prepare a meal in the communal kitchen or BBQ area, or relax in the guest lounge, which offers a flat-screen TV, DVD and CD player. The property also offers a laundry and luggage storage facilities. The property featured in the 2015 Booking's Best awards for best local/international B&B and best accommodation for mature couples. It was also awarded a Tripadvisor Travellers Choice award, Australia in 2017. Baudins Bed & Breakfast has private bedrooms and shared kitchen/living/dining areas for guests. Sgared areas are shared with other guests at the guesthouse. SGARED should be SHARED.

name: At The Sound
description: At The Sound Noosa Motel is centrally located right on Noosa Sound, just 1.5 km from Hastings Street and Noosa’s Main Beach, and a short stroll from the Noosa River. It's the ideal spot for those wishing to get away from it all, and only a few minutes from the heart of Noosa. Spend your days strolling along Hastings Street soaking up the relaxed Noosa beach lifestyle - fabulous shopping, cafés and restaurants, and sun, sand and sea. At Noosa River, a variety of water activities is available, such as jet-skiing, canoeing, kayaking and kite surfing. Some apartments have a large corner spa bath in the bathroom. When you wish to explore the surrounding areas, the friendly staff are pleased to offer you their extensive local knowledge and assist you in booking tours.

name: City Golf Club Motel
description: City Golf Club Motel is located in Toowoomba and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi, and also features an 18-hole golf course. The motel provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. Guests can take advantage of the recreational facilities on offer, such as a BBQ/picnic area and miniature golf. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator and ironing facilities. City Golf Club Motel's restaurant is open for dinner and provides an ideal setting for those who wish to stay close to everything the property has to offer. A selection of dining options are also available in close proximity to the property. The motel has easy access to The Empire Theatre, University of Southern Queensland and Heritage Oval. An airport shuttle service is also available on request.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Apollo International Hotel
description: The Best Western Plus Apollo International Hotel is conveniently located on the Pacific Highway only ten minutes south of the Newcastle Central Business District in the retail, commercial, and medical services hub of Newcastle, in the suburb of Charlestown. Guests enjoy stylish and contemporary 4.5-star hotel rooms and suites, with free Wi-Fi and a balcony with views across the tranquil bushland setting. All rooms are equipped with luxurious pillow-top bedding and large flat-screen televisions with free Foxtel. The acclaimed Babbington's Bar and Grill, with a floor-to-ceiling glass wall overlooking the floodlit bushland reserve, offers a relaxed atmosphere, making it the perfect spot to unwind at the end of the day or enjoy your favorite drink while overlooking tranquil bushland. If you're looking for relaxation or exercise, you can make use of our outdoor pool or gym. Other services include a self-service laundry, free undercover parking, valet laundry, dry cleaning, and a free computer with internet access and printing for use 24 hours per day. The Best Western Plus Apollo International Hotel is able to cater to a wide range of functions and events. The hotel will meet all of your needs with four function rooms, each boasting natural light, breakout areas, modern technology, and professional friendly service. Ideally situated minutes from the John Hunter Hospital, McDonald Jones Stadium, and Charlestown Square, the hotel is a great location to access a cluster of galleries and boutiques in Newcastle. The hotel is located just a short drive from the vast blue water expanse of Lake Macquarie or Nine Mile Beach and only an hour away from the Hunter Valley where you'll enjoy over 120 wineries and vineyards. For all bookings arriving before 6 p.m; payment will be required on arrival with a valid Photo ID. For all bookings arriving after 6 p.m; a deposit of the first night will be taken from the guaranteed credit card provided. Otherwise, the room will be released if the transaction declines.bestwestern.com

name: Casa Nostra Motel Mackay
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Mackay city centre, Casa Nostra Motel Mackay boasts an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Guests enjoy rooms with a flat-screen TV with free cable channels. Casa Nostra Motel Mackay is an 8-minute drive from both Mackay Airport and Harrup Park Country Club. It is a 10-minute drive from Mackay Harbour and Mackay Golf Course. All air-conditioned rooms feature a desk, fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, as well as ironing facilities.

name: Fern Bay Motel
description: Located a 2-minute walk from Newcastle Golf Club and 11-minute drive from Newcastle Airport, Fern Bay Motel a licensed bar and a restaurant open for breakfast and dinner. Guests enjoy free WiFi, & BBQ facilities. All refurbished rooms feature a Smart TV. Golf packages and tours can be booked at the motel. Free WiFi is provided. All rooms at Fern Bay Motel feature private bathrooms, air conditioning, Microwave, Mini Fridge, ironing facilities and tea/coffee making facilities. Guests at Fern Bay Motel can order beer, red/white wine or pre-mix drinks at the on-site bar. Breakfast and Dinner are available in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. Buses leave every half hour outside the door (06:00 to 07:00 Mondays through Saturdays) for Stockton Ferry and a leisurely cruise to Newcastle CBD. Fern Bay Motel is a 20-minute drive from Newcastle city centre and a 17-minute drive from Hunter Stadium. Sydney is a 2-hour drive away and free private parking is possible on site.

name: Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort
description: Set on 30 acres of lawns and landscaped gardens, Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort features an indoor heated swimming pool, 1 tennis court and 2 half basket-ball courts. Each apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen. All apartments at Surf Leisure Resort Wollongong include a lounge area with TV and sofa. Some rooms have a private terrace or balcony, while most rooms feature air conditioning. Barbecues with outdoor seating are located around the resort. Guests have access to mini golf. There is also a children’s playground and bicycles are available for hire. Situated behind a long stretch of beach between Fairy Meadow and Towradgi Beaches, Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort is a 30-minute drive from Jamberoo Recreation Park. It is less than 10 minutes’ drive to the shops and restaurants in Wollongong city centre.

name: Casa Nostra Motel
description: Casa Nostra Motel offers self-contained accommodation in Rockhampton. Air-conditioning are provided in all rooms Guests have access to an outdoor pool, laundry facilities and an on-site restaurant. There is a 24-hour front desk and a garden. The 1, 2 and 3-bedroom villas are spacious and are located 150-metres from the highway. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Some units include views of the pool or garden. The rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. The nearest airport is Rockhampton Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Corrimal Beach Tourist Park
description: Featuring direct access to the golden shores and rolling waves of Corrimal Beach, this tourist park features self-contained cabin accommodation. Guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite The Pantry Cafe or share a meal with friends using the BBQ facilities. All self-contained cabins boast a patio offering garden views and an outdoor dining setting. The cabins feature an oven, stovetop, microwave and fridge. There is a dining and lounge area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. Children will love the playground with equipment. You can hire bicycles to explore the surrounding area, or head to the tour desk where the staff can assist in organising local activities. There is also a mini mart on site. Wollongong is just a 12-minute drive away. Jamberoo Action Part is a 30-minute drive and Minammurra Falls and Rainforest is a 40-minute drive.

name: Burnett Riverside Hotel
description: Overlooking Burnett River, Riverside Hotel features free on-site parking, just 5 minutes’ drive from the famous Bundaberg Rum Distillery. Air conditioning is standard in all rooms. Located in the heart of Bundaberg, Burnett Riverside Hotel is only 10 minutes’ drive from Bundaberg Airport and Bundaberg Golf Club. Mon Repos Conservation Park is a 20-minute drive away. The modern rooms include a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. Many rooms also have a spa bath or a private balcony. Guests have access to shared laundry facilities. Offering outdoor dining with lovely river views, H2O Restaurant & Bar serves an à la carte menu based on local produce. The bar features a range of local beers and wines. The tour desk can arrange trips to Lady Elliot Island, Hervey Bay whale watching trips and local Bundaberg Rum tours. The motel also offers dry cleaning and luggage storage facilities.

name: Highlander Motor Inn
description: Highlander Motor Inn offers direct access to the Toowoomba Base Hospital and is 2 km from the Grand Central Shopping Centre. It features free high-speed Wi-Fi, free on-site parking and a seasonal solar-heated saltwater pool. Each of the air-conditioned guest rooms offers tea/coffee making facilities, a microwave and a Smart TV with built in apps to access your own streaming services as well as YouTube. All rooms have an en suite bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A free guest laundry is available and barbecue facilities can be found at the pool area. Luggage storage is also provided. Motor Inn Highlander is 2 km from Toowoomba Transit Centre and 3.8 km from Cob & Co Museum. It is 1.8 km from the City Golf Club and 3.5 km from Queens Park. please note that the motel is 2 storey building

name: Crystalbrook Byron
address: 77-97 Broken Head Road, Byron Bay, NSW 2481
description: Set within a stunning 18-hectare rainforest, guests staying at Crystalbrook Byron can relax their body and mind with free daily yoga classes or immerse themselves in the outdoors, with endless trails through the rainforest. Take a guided walk with the resort’s ranger and learn about the rainforest’s history and unique eco-system. Unwind poolside with signature cocktails and pool service by the 25-metre infinity pool. Then dine at the on-site restaurant, with seasonal menus based on a farm-to-plate philosophy, accompanied by an extensive selection of local and international wines. Each suite has a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and both slippers and bathrobes. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels in each accommodation type as well as a kitchen with a kettle, minibar, microwave and a refrigerator.

name: Bryants Motel Roma
description: No description found

name: Hibiscus Resort And Spa
description: The boutique-style Hibiscus Resort and Spa features spacious suites and tropical gardens only 300-metres from Four Mile Beach. The tropical-themed accommodation each feature a balcony offering lovely pool and garden views There is a great selection of large open-plan studio accommodation or spacious one-bedroom suites available, many of which have a spa bath. All include an outdoor dining area overlooking the property. Guests can relax by the hotel’s pools or enjoy a massage or treatment at the Hibiscus Spa. The Hibiscus Resort & Spa is a couple of minutes' walk from the main shopping area in Port Douglas Village. It is an ideal base for exploring the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest.

name: Riviera on Ruthven Motel
description: Riviera on Ruthven is 1.5 km from the town centre and a 5-minute walk from Toowoomba City Golf Club. It offers free wifi internet access, an outdoor swimming pool, and free parking on site. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each is equipped with a fridge, tea/coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a hairdryer. A guest laundry service is available. The staff at the tour desk can assist with making travel arrangements. Barbecue facilities can be found near the pool area. Breakfast can be enjoyed in our Breakfast Room. Ruthven Riviera is a 5-minute walk from Toowoomba City Golf Club, and 2.4 km from Toowoomba Railway Station. It is 2.2 km from Grand Central Shopping Centre, 3.6 km from Cobb & Co Museum, and 2.6 km from Queens Park.

name: The Gerald Apartment Hotel
description: The Gerald Apartment Hotel is located in Geraldton and offers free Wi-Fi and a rooftop terrace. There is also a fitness centre with fitness classes, pilates classes and free weights. There are a range of facilities on offer to guests of the hotel, including fitness classes, meeting rooms and a convention center. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a rain shower, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. They all feature a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. Serving fusion, international and seafood dishes, The Gerald Apartment Hotel's relaxed restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the cosy lounge bar. A wide variety of dining options can also be found close by. The Gerald Apartment Hotel is close to the area's popular sightseeing attractions, including Geraldton Visitor Centre, which is a short walk away. Sunset Beach and Glenfield are also just a short drive from the property.Revato

name: Glenmore Palms Motel
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, Glenmore Palms Motel is just a 10-minute drive from the heart of Rockhampton. All rooms offer free WiFi and a satellite flat-screen TV. Glenmore Palms Motor Inn is a 3-minute drive from Central Queensland University and a 7-minute drive from Rockhampton Shopping Fair. Rockhampton Airport is a 15-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms feature a dining area, fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They offer a seating area and a desk. Some rooms have a kitchenette and patio area. Guests can share a meal using the BBQ facilities or enjoy room service. Laundry facilities are also on offer.

name: Hotel Laguna
description: Hotel Laguna offers suites and apartments with free WiFi available throughout the complex and in your apartment. Hotel Laguna is in the heart of Noosa and just across the road from the beach. It has an outdoor swimming pool and barbecue area. All accommodation at Hotel Laguna includes a private bathroom and air conditioning. Some have a balcony overlooking the tranquil Noosa River. Full kitchen facilities or a kitchenette are provided. Guests can relax in the landscaped gardens surrounding the swimming pool. Other facilities include a guest laundry and tour desk. Beach toys and boogie boards are available to hire. Hotel Laguna is a 35-minute drive from Sunshine Coast Airport.

name: The Q Motel
address: 112 Gladstone Rd, Bruce Highway, Rockhampton, QLD 4700
description: Located just 4 km from Rockhampton Airport, The Q Motel Rockhampton is situated centrally and offers a restaurant and bar. All rooms feature free Wi-Fi and free continental breakfast with a large variety of food. The Q Motel Rockhampton is just 3 km from the Rockhampton Golf Club and Rockhampton Botanical Gardens. The Aboriginal Dreamtime Cultural Centre is 15 minutes’ drive away. Guests can enjoy Thai cuisine with Free room-service available and also a selection of drinks. All spacious guests rooms are air conditioned. There are refurbished Executive suites upstairs with sliding doors leading out to a private balcony. Some Family rooms offer self-contained kitchen facilities. There is an on-site BBQ outdoor area and laundry facilities available.

name: Ambassador On Ruthven
description: In the heart of Toowoomba, Ambassador on Ruthven is within a 5-minute drive of Grand Central Shopping Centre and Empire Theatre. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Toowoomba? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 915 square feet (85 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Citywalk Motor Inn
description: Boasting a central yet quiet location, Citywalk Motor Inn is just a 5-minute walk from Rockhamption’s central business district. It features free WiFi access, free guest laundry services and free parking on site. Modern guest rooms are fully air conditioned and feature plenty of natural light. There are queen beds throughout and amenities include a microwave, ironing equipment and a flat-screen TV. Luggage storage is provided. The hotel is able to provide crockery and cutlery packs for guests to prepare simple meals. Citywalk Motor Inn is a 7-minute drive from the Rockhampton Airport and 2.4kms from Rockhampton Botanical Gardens.

name: Central Park Motel
description: Featuring a swimming pool and 2 dining options, Central Park Motel is just 4 km from Rockhampton Airport. All rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms offer a spa bath. Guests enjoy 2 hours of free Wi-Fi per stay. All accommodation features a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms include a balcony, microwave or lounge area. Each has an en suite bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Central Park Motor Inn is 10 minutes’ drive from central Rockhampton and several shops and services.

name: Big4 Adventure Whitsunday Resort
address: 25-29 Shute Harbour Road, Airlie Beach, QLD 4802
description: BIG4 Adventure Whitsunday Resort is located in Airlie Beach, 4.1 km from the main street and Abell Point Marina. Whitsunday Art Gallery is 800 metres from the property, while Whitsunday Plaza Shopping Centre is 850 metres away. Free private parking and free limited WiFi is available on site. The accommodation comes with a seating area. A TV and DVD player are available in some units. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a kettle. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher. There is a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries in each unit. Towels are provided. All rooms offer views over the garden, pool or Waterslide Park. BIG4 Adventure Whitsunday Resort also includes a year-round outdoor pool, which is heated in winter and 13 waterslides. You can play tennis, mini-golf and pedal carts at the property. The property also offers a mini-market, poolside massage and an outdoor cinema. Tours can be arranged by the property. Nearby activities include ocean rafting, fishing, diving, snorkelling, sailing and kayaking. The nearest airport is Whitsunday Coast Airport, 27 km from BIG4 Adventure Whitsunday Resort.

name: Windmill Motel & Events Centre
description: Just 5 minutes’ drive from Mackay town centre, Windmill Motel & Events Centre boasts a tennis court and an outdoor pool. Enjoy lovely lake views from the lake deck. Enjoy breakfast or dinner at the hotel's onsite restaurant, 'The Mill' Restaurant & Bar, creating dishes with quality produce. All accommodation offers air conditioning and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms feature a spa bath, kitchenette or a balcony with views. As a guest of the Windmill Motel & Events Centre you have access to free WiFi, a swimming pool, tennis court, covered parking and a guest laundry. Truck, caravan and motor home parking is available. Windmill Motel is 10 minutes’ drive from Mackay Golf Course and Mackay Harbour. The property is located next to Mackay Gooseponds where you can walk, run or feed the ducks.

name: Blue Mountains Heritage Motel
description: Blue Mountains Heritage Motel is set in the centre of Katoomba, just 3 minutes' drive from the Three Sisters. Guests enjoy free on-site parking and limited free WiFi per room, per day. Surrounded by restaurants, cafes, shops and bars, Blue Mountains Heritage Motel is just 3 minutes’ drive or 10 minutes' walk from Echo Point, The Edge Cinema and the Aquatic Centre. The air-conditioned rooms are individually styled and include heating and ceiling fans. Each room features a queen-size bed, en suite bathroom, a flat-screen TV, a microwave and a refrigerator. Laundry facilities are also available.

name: Marina Terraces Port Douglas
description: Just 350 metres from the Port Douglas Marina, Marina Terraces feature a free Wi-Fi in all apartments, the lobby and pool area. A private balcony with garden views is standard in all apartments. Free parking is available on site. Marina Terraces Port Douglas is 2 minutes’ walk from Four Mile Beach and 1 minute from the main shopping and dining district of Macrosson Street. Cairns International Airport is a 1-hour drive away. All apartments have laundry facilities and a full kitchen with a microwave and refrigerator. Each air-conditioned apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. The tour desk can book tours to the Great Barrier Reef and the Daintree Rainforest. The hotel also offers luggage storage and airport transfers (charges apply).

name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Port Douglas
address: 316 Port Douglas Road, Port Douglas, QLD 4877
description: Large lagoon pool with swim up pool bar, short walk to Four Mile Beach, rainforest setting, resort town with access to the world heritage listed Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest. Games area includes Pool Table, dart boards, table hockey, able football, table tennis, giant chess and jenga.Wyndham

name: Katoomba Town Centre Motel
description: Situated in central Katoomba, this motel is located in the heart of Australia's World Heritage-listed Blue Mountains National Park. Guests enjoy free on-site parking and 21-minutes of free WiFi per room, per day. A full hot buffet breakfast is available daily for an additional charge. Katoomba Town Centre Motel is a 3-minute drive from The Three Sisters, Echo Point and Scenic World. Within an hours' drive away are Jenolan Caves, Megalong Valley and Mount Tomah. Fitted with air conditioning and central heating, rooms at the motel include electric blankets, a built-in wardrobe, toaster and a microwave oven. Katoomba Motel provides an internet kiosk and laundry facilities. Guests can be entertained in the games room, or have a barbecue in the garden.

name: Villa Nova Motel
description: Featuring suites with a flat-screen TV, Villa Nova Motel is just 350 metres from City Golf Club. It offers free WiFi and parking is available on site. Motel Villa Nova is 5 minutes’ drive from the Botanic Gardens, the University of Southern Queensland and Toowoomba Railway Station. Toowoomba Airport is a 10-minute drive away. All air-conditioned suites have a kitchenette with a microwave, refrigerator and a kettle. Each suite has a separate living and dining area. Some suites also have a spa bath.

name: Lazy Lizard Motor Inn
description: Featuring an outdoor heated pool and BBQ area with outdoor seating and tropical gardens, this hidden gem of a motel is just a 12-minute walk from Four Mile Beach. All studios offer free high speed WiFi and guests can enjoy free undercover parking. The Lazy Lizard Motor Inn is 4 minutes' drive from central Port Douglas and Crystalbrook Superyacht Marina, while Mossman Gorge is a 25-minute drive away. All air-conditioned studios have renovated kitchenettes and a flat-screen TV with a DVD player. Free DVD rental is available at reception. Each spacious, bright and airy studio is decorated in neutral colours and includes a work desk, couch and an outdoor patio, overlooking the lush tropical gardens. The Lazy Lizard Motor Inn Port Douglas offers a free tour desk which books cruises to the Great Barrier Reef and arranges snorkeling, diving and fishing trips. Tours to the Daintree Rainforest can also be arranged, with pickups from reception.

name: Silkari The Pavilions Port Douglas
description: Port Douglas and its surrounds are truly magnificent, making it one of the most beautiful tropical holiday destinations. No other region in the world is bordered by two World Heritage listed areas as is the Port Douglas region. Silkari The Pavilions Port Douglas is an adults only peaceful oasis set back on Macrossan Street, combining spacious studio courtyard or balcony rooms, one bedroom balcony apartments and dual key two bedrooms balcony apartments. Relax in our heated pool or spa or take a short stroll to beautiful 4 Mile Beach, the marina, restaurants, cafes, boutique shops or the grocery store.iHotelier/iStay

name: Metro Motel Rockhampton
description: A 5-minute drive from Rockhampton Train Station, Metro Motel Rockhampton offers an outdoor pool, free parking on site and free WiFi access. The Rockhampton Airport is just 4.6 km away. Fully air conditioned, each room is fitted with a Start television and tea/coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The property offers barbecue facilities for guests’ use. Laundry, ironing equipment. Motel Metro Rockhampton is within 4 km of the Rockhampton Botanic Gardens and the Rockhampton Zoo. The Mount Archer National Park is 15 km away.

name: Comfort Resort Blue Pacific
description: Offering a beachfront location and two swimming pools, Comfort Resort Blue Pacific is a 15-minute drive from Mackay city centre, Mackay Harbour and Blue Water Trail. It is set on a long stretch of beach in Mackay with approximately 6 km of golden sand. Guests enjoy free WiFi, beachfront BBQ facilities and a half tennis court. Mackay Airport is a 30-minute drive away. All accommodation at Comfort Resort Blue Pacific Mackay offers air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD's as well as a microwave, fridge and stove. Most units have a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or billiards in the games room and arrange activities at the tour desk. There are a range of dining options and a convenience store within walking distance.

name: Oyster Cove Chalet
description: Oyster Cove Chalet offers spacious guest accommodation, situated on 6 acres of lovely bushland and gardens. All rooms feature a private patio, each with barbecue facilities. Each room at Oyster Cove Chalet Tasmania features heating and air conditioning. All kitchenettes include an electric frying pan, electric steamer, toaster and tea/coffee making facilities. Every room offers a private patio with outdoor furniture and garden views. Guest laundry facilities are available. Free on-site car parking is provided. The seaside town of Kettering is only a 3-minute drive away. It is a 3-minute drive to the Bruny Island ferry port. Please note that Oyster Cove Chalet does not offer the use of Spa Baths in any room.

name: Ocean Breeze Resort
description: This comfortable resort in Noosa Heads offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a sauna and an outdoor pool. Just a short walk from Hastings Street, it provides comfortable rooms equipped with a refrigerator, a private balcony and a kitchenette. Ocean Breeze Resort offers a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. Family amenities include babysitting/child services. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. After a day of sightseeing in the region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They each offer a private bathroom, a seating area and an in-room dining area. Guests staying at Ocean Breeze Resort can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. Ocean Breeze Resort is within a 10-minute walk of Noosa Main Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Noosa Heads.Revato

name: Discovery Parks - Hobart
description: Just 10 km from Hobart city centre, Discovery Parks - Hobart features a children’s playground, BBQ facilities and a beach volleyball court. Each cottage and cabin includes self-catering facilities. All accommodation features electric heating, en-suite bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Each cottage, cabin and villa has either a kitchenette or a full kitchen with gas stove and dishwasher. Spacious villas featuring a separate lounge area with sofa and DVD player, plus a balcony with BBQ facilities, are available. Discovery Parks - Hobart has a fully serviced conference centre with meeting and banquet facilities. Guest laundry facilities are available. Situated in beautiful natural surroundings, this holiday park is a 5-minute drive from the Meehan Range State Recreation Area, which offers scenic hiking, abseiling and picnic facilities.

name: Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort
description: Just a 10-minute drive from the heart of Coffs Harbour, Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort is located in the beautiful grounds of the Pacific Bay Resort precinct and offers studios, 1-bedroom apartments and a Penthouse, with ocean, lake or mountain views. Guests enjoy direct beach access, 3 heated pools and a spa and wellness centre. Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort is a 3-minute drive from the Big Banana and an 8-minute drive from the Dolphin Marine Conservation Centre. Coffs Harbour Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Full use of an offsite fitness centre is available to all guests, where you can choose from 50 group fitness classes a week including yoga, cycling, boxing, bodypump, and many more. Guest's can also get active with a 9 hole golf course (charges apply), 3 tennis courts and a basketball court located within our resort. You can dine at the onsite restaurant and bar, or take a short walk to Charlesworth Bay, to use the BBQ facilities with family and friends located right next to the beach.

name: Club Tropical Resort Port Douglas
address: Corner Macrossan & Wharf Street, Port Douglas, QLD 4877
description: Set amongst tropical gardens with an outdoor swimming pool, 2 hot spa pools and a sauna, Club Tropical Resort with Onsite Reception & Check In offers apartment accommodation with kitchenette and private balcony. All rooms have views of the landscaped water gardens, Great Barrier Reef or the mountains of the Mossman Gorge. Air conditioning, ceiling fans and heating are also provided. Each room at Club Tropical Port Douglas features including a large flat-screen TV with satellite and movie channels, DVD player and stereo system. Guests have access to laundry facilities and free secure undercover car parking. The tour desk can arrange car hire, airport transfers and tours of the Great Barrier Reef. Located in the heart of Port Douglas, Club Tropical Resort with Onsite Reception & Check In is 150 metres from Marina Mirage Port Douglas and 500 metres from Four Mile Beach.

name: Bay Villas Resort
description: Bay Villas Resort offers spacious studios and apartments just 8 minutes’ walk from Port Douglas town centre. Most apartments overlook the resort-style swimming pool and barbecue facilities. Each studio and apartment at Bay Villas Resort Port Douglas features air conditioning, cable TV and a private balcony or courtyard. Some include a full kitchen, separate dining area and private laundry. Free covered car parking is provided. Facilities include a guest laundry, barbecue area and 2 outdoor swimming pools, one is heated and the other has a spa pool. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The famous Four Mile Beach is just an 5-minute walk from Bay Villas Resort. The tour desk can arrange Great Barrier Reef cruises, Daintree Rainforest tours, and transfers to/from Cairns Airport.

name: Leichhardt Motor Inn
description: This peaceful motel in Toowoomba provides free Wi-Fi, as well as luggage storage and a saltwater swimming pool. It has free public parking on site and is close to restaurants and shops. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of Leichhardt Motor Inn, including a terrace, laundry facilities and a BBQ/picnic area. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. They all offer a seating area, an alarm clock and ironing facilities. Leichhardt Motor Inn Toowoomba is close to the area's tourist attractions, including City Golf Club and The Empire Theatre, which are a short walk away. University of Southern Queensland, the Cobb & Co Museum and Heritage Oval are a short drive away.Revato

name: Port Douglas Motel
description: Boasting an outdoor saltwater pool, free on-site parking and BBQ facilities, Port Douglas Motel is just 3 minutes' walk from Four Mile Beach. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi access, a kitchenette and a 42-inch flat-screen TV in all rooms. Port Douglas Motel is just 50 metres from the local restaurants and shops on Macrossan Street. It is 40 minutes' drive from Kuranda Scenic Railway and Skyrail. It is an hour's drive from Cairns Airport. The refurbished air-conditioned studios each offer a sofa, a DVD player and an in-room safe. All rooms include a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests have access to free pool towels, communal laundry facilities and a free DVD library. The tour desk books water sports and day trips. A shuttle service is available on request.

name: Sails Port Macquarie - By Rydges
description: The Sails Resort Port Macquarie By Rydges is located at Pelican Bay, 10 minutes' drive from the town centre. It overlooks the Hastings River and Marina and features rooms with stunning water or garden views. Guests enjoy free unlimited WiFi. The waterfront resort boasts a swimming pool with private cabanas, entertainment terrace, heated spa, private jetty, paddle boards, limited parking, room service, and a waterfront pavilion with private chapel and landscaped gardens. The stylish and contemporary rooms have en suite bathrooms and the majority of rooms feature a large private balcony or patio. Heating, air conditioning and cable TV are provided. The Boathouse Bar & Restaurant is open for Breakfast & Dinner. Room service is also available.

name: Thirroul Beach Motel
description: Located in Wollongong, less than 1 km from Mccauleys Beach, Thirroul Beach Motel provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 20 km from Nan Tien Temple, 33 km from Historical Aircraft Restoration Society Museum and 36 km from Shellharbour City Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Austinmer Beach. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms include a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at the motel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Wollongong, like hiking and fishing. Jamberoo Action Park is 41 km from Thirroul Beach Motel, while Royal National Park is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Shellharbour Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Bkk39 Airport hotel
address: ซอย กิ่งแก้ว 39/1, Racha Thewa 10540
description: Bkk39 Airport hotel has city views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Ban Khlong Prawet, 19 km from Mega Bangna. Some of the units have a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving American, Thai and local cuisine. Bkk39 Airport hotel offers a sun terrace. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Bangkok International Trade and Exhibition Centre BITEC is 24 km from Bkk39 Airport hotel, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi, 4 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Summit Windmill Golf Residence
description: Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is located along Bangna-Trad Road, a 40-minute drive to central Bangkok. The hotel features free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, an outdoor pool and a golf course. The air-conditioned units come with private balconies, living area and a kitchen. Washing machines and ironing facilities are provided. The hotel offers a DVD library and laundry services. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk and free onsite parking. Thai and European cuisines are served at The Café. Golfer’s Lounge provides Asian specialties, international beer and cocktails. Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is a 15-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park
description: Indulge in the convenience of a prime hotel location in Bangkok. Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, located in the Silom district of Bangkok. Only steps from Sala Daeng BTS Station and Silom MRT Station, puts you right in the heart of the city. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, our location ensures easy access to cultural attractions and shopping complexes. Within minutes, you can explore Silom's renowned shopping destinations, such as Siam Paragon, Chinatown, and the Chao Phraya River. Our hotel is the preferred choice for corporate events and customized banquets, boasting eleven meeting venues. Whether you're hosting a conference or planning a special celebration, our dedicated team is here to provide personalized service. Experience a seamless check-in process with the assistance of our dedicated Japanese-speaking guest relations and friendly front desk team located in the lobby on the 23rd floor. Elevating your stay with our newly renovated rooms providing breathtaking views of the vibrant Bangkok cityscape. From international delights to local specialties. Treat your taste buds at Panorama all day dining restaurant. Explore further dining options at Xian Tian Di Chinese Restaurant. Enjoy a selection of premium whiskeys at The Finishing Post Bar, or a glass of craft beer at Tap It. Book your stay with us and make the most memorable trip in Bangkok.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa
description: Situated in lush surroundings between Suvarnabhumi International Airport (BKK) and the city centre, Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa is the perfect starting point for discovery in Thailand. From Bangkok's modern nightlife to its ancient temples and palaces, fully immerse yourself in our culture. Sensory experiences are found throughout our five-star luxury resort in Bangkok, from visionary meeting rooms that encourage innovation to restaurants that delight the palate. For hours of leisure and entertainment, visit Explore Spa by Le Méridien, Summit Windmill Golf Club or our outdoor saltwater infinity pool. Delight in unexpected accommodation with your freestanding bathtub, glass-enclosed rain shower, or LM BED with an artistic rendering of a traditional Wai greeting. Every hotel room at our Bangkok luxury resort includes sweeping golf course views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony or terrace. Change your perspective at Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok
description: Located in Bangkok, Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is within a 30-minute drive of Suvarnabhumi Airport and provides a plunge pool and a saltwater swimming pool. It offers city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. All rooms are air conditioned and boast their very own seating and dining area. They feature a full kitchen, plus a private bathroom with a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Room service is also offered during certain times. Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is close to Asok BTS Skytrain Station, making it easy for guests to explore Bangkok and its surrounding areas. Benjasiri Park, Soi Cowboy and Terminal 21 are a 10-minute walk away.Revato

name: Thomson Residence Hotel
address: 42 Bangna Trad Soi 4, Bangna Trad Road, Bangkok
description: Providing a range of self-catering units with free Wi-Fi, Thomson Residence offers modern comforts a 10-minute walk from BITEC Bang-na Exhibition Centre. It has a fitness room and open-air indoor pool. Thomson Residence Serviced Apartments is a 10-minute drive from Central Bang-na and a 30-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Free sheltered parking is available. Featuring light wood furnishings, spacious units feature a pantry and ample workspace. A flat-screen TV and washing machine are standard in all rooms. Some rooms have a private balcony. Added conveniences include in-room dining and laundry and dry-cleaning services. Round-the-clock security and daily newspapers are available.

name: The Airport Greenery Hotel
address: 185/28 Wulai Road, Haiya, Maung, Hai Ya, Chiang Mai 50100
description: The Airport Greenery Hotel is a green energy service apartment and hotel located a minute’s drive from Chiang Mai Airport. It offers free Wi-Fi, free transfer from the airport and rooms with private balconies. Rooms at The Airport Greenery Hotel have hot showers powered by solar and wind energy. They feature cable TV, a minibar, microwave and work desk for guest’s convenience. Room service is also provided. Hotel facilities include a restaurant, business centre, a barber and beauty shop. Guests can enjoy massages and relax at the indoor swimming pool. Laundry and dry cleaning services are provided. Bicycle and car rental can also be arranged. The Airport Greenery Hotel has a 24-hour front desk and provides airport transfers. Guests can shop at The Central Airport Plaza or head to Chiang Mai Golf club located within 3 km of the hotel.

name: Merchant House Chiangmai
description: Set in Chiang Mai, 1.5 km from Chiang Mai International Convention and Exhibition Centre, Merchant House Chiangmai offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is around 4.6 km from Chiang Mai 700th Anniversary Stadium, 5.8 km from Chang Puak Market and 5.9 km from Wat Pha Lat. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Three Kings Monument is 6.7 km from Merchant House Chiangmai, while Chedi Luang Temple is 7.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Baiyoke Ciao Hotel
address: 8/11 Nimmanhaemin Rd., T. Suthep, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Baiyoke Ciao offers serviced apartments in central Chiang Mai along the trendy Nimmanhaemin Road, where guests will find plenty of local bars and restaurants. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and an on-site restaurant. Free parking is available. The air-conditioned apartments at Baiyoke Ciao are equipped with a satellite TV and safety deposit box. The kitchenette area comes with a microwave and fridge. The hotel provides 24-hour security, laundry and massage services. Other facilities include a tour desk and currency exchange. For more dining options, guests can explore the neighbouring restaurants and coffee shops. In-room dining is also available. Baiyoke Ciao is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai Airport. Chiang Mai University is within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Yellow Pillow village
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, 2.5 km from Chiang Mai International Convention and Exhibition Centre, Yellow Pillow village features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.9 km from Chiang Mai 700th Anniversary Stadium. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Yellow Pillow village have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a patio. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. À la carte and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Chang Puak Gate is 5.3 km from Yellow Pillow village, while Chang Puak Market is 5.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai
address: 502 Moo 1, Mae Rim-Samoeng Old Road, Chiang Mai 50180
description: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai overlooks rice fields and mountains in Mae Rim Valley. It features luxurious bungalows with outdoor living spaces. A spa and outdoor swimming pool is available. Four Seasons Chiang Mai offers bungalows decorated with original paintings and Siamese art pieces. It has polished teak floors and rich Thai cotton fabrics. Private bathrooms overlook the garden and feature a separate dressing area. The resort features a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can also make use of the tennis court or head for a soothing massage. Free bicycle rentals are provided. Other facilities include yoga and cooking classes and babysitting service, which are available with an additional cost. Guests can dine al fresco on the home-style Italian cusine at the open-air Terraces Restaurant while enjoying views of the surrounding rice paddies and distant Doi Suthep. For a more relaxed afternoon and evening, head over to the Ratree Bar and Lounge to enjoy fine wines and signature cocktails. Private dining experiences and a 24-hour room service are also available. Four Seasons offers free shuttle service from Chiang Mai City, which is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Vc@suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment
address: 61 Moo.3, Airport Road, T.Suthep, Chiang Mai 50200
description: VC@Suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment is conveniently located within a 7-minute walk from Chiang Mai Airport. Offering non-smoking modern Thai-Lanna rooms with free Wi-Fi, the hotel comes equipped with an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna. VC@Suanpaak is a 10-minute drive from Wat Chedi Luang and a 15-minute drive from Wat Phra Singh and the trendy Sunday Walking Street. The city’s iconic landmark, Wat Phrathat Doi Suthep, is a 20-minute drive away. Furnished with wooden interiors and traditional-inspired décor, each air-conditioned room features a private balcony overlooking the pool, a 32-inch cable flat-screen TV and a refrigerator stocked with minibar. Shower facilities and a bathtub are included in an en suite bathroom. Free toiletries, a bathrobe and a hairdryer are provided. For convenience, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help guests organise sightseeing tours or arrange massage services. Other facilities include laundry service, meeting facilities and a chargeable shuttle service. Suanpaak Restaurant serves excellent selections of Thai and International cuisine. For a healthy menu, Salad House offers a variety of fresh salad dishes. VC@Suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment provides delicious breakfast and noodle dishes between 11:00-21:00.

name: Shewe Wana Suite Resort
address: 290,292 Charoen Muang Road, T. Watket, Chiang Mai 50000
description: This intimate boutique property offers restored Thai-style suites with colonial influences and attentive service. Nestled in tropical greenery, it features 2 outdoor pools, and free WiFi throughout. Boasting a spa bath and fine teak fittings, tastefully furnished suites are surrounded by tropical greenery and landscaped gardens. They come with a flat-screen TV and private balcony. Shewe Wana Suite Resort is only a 10-minute walk from the local night bazaar and shops along the Ping River. It is a short walk from San Pa Khoi Market where northern Thai food and fresh fruit can be sampled. It is a 20-minute walk from Chiang Mai Old City and a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The resort also provides a tour desk, laundry services, and free parking lot. Aside from a daily breakfast, the 2 on-site restaurants serve a variety of vegetarian, Thai dishes. The restaurants also feature garden views and various customized menus like gluten-free meals, which is available upon request. Guests who wish to use airport transfer service are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. There is an extra charge to add on to the transport. This can be noted under "Special Requests" during booking or by contacting the property by using the contact details found on the booking confirmation. Guests who wish to check in after 23:00 hrs are kindly requested to inform the property in advance for check-in arrangements.

name: Noble Place Chiangmai
description: Located in front of Central Robinson Department Store and just only a 5-minute ride from Chiang Mai International Airport, Noble Place Chiangmai offers free Wi-Fi throughout the property. A 5-minute drive to the City Center, Night Bazaar and Airport Driving Range, Noble Place Chiangmai is a 10-minute drive to Saturday Walking Street and 15-minute drive to Sunday Walking Street and Central Kad Suan Kaew. Chiang Mai Bus Station and Chiang Mai Train Station are a 30-minute ride away. Featuring a balcony, air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and minibar. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Free private parking and free luggage storage is available. A soothing massage can be enjoyed at the spa. Guests can arrange a sight-seeing trip at the tour desk or rent a bicycle to explore the town. A range of Thai and International cuisine is available at Noble Place Restaurant.

name: Villoft Zen Living Resort
description: Located in Thalang, 6.2 km from Wat Prathong, Villoft Zen Living Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sun terrace and to a hot tub. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave, a stovetop and a toaster. At Villoft Zen Living Resort each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 7.4 km from the accommodation, while Two Heroines Monument is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 15 km from Villoft Zen Living Resort.

name: Sunwing Kamala Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Providing a shuttle service to Phuket International Airport, as well as free Wi-Fi, Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is a comfortable place to stay in Kamala. It also provides water slides, a kids club and a swimming pool. The resort offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and a playground. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchenette, a refrigerator and a private balcony. All provide a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. Guests of Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ are welcome to experience European, Asian and Thai cuisine at Som's Kitchen, or try Thai, Asian and European meals at Fino. Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is close to Kamala's well-known attractions, with the Phuket FantaSea only moments on foot from the property. Guests can also visit Kamala Beach.Revato

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: Chalong Miracle Lakeview
description: Chalong Miracle Lakeview offers self-catering accommodation with WiFi access in the unit, while free private parking is available on site. Located in Chalong, Chalong Miracle Lakeview is 400 metres from Tiger Muay Thai and MMA Training Camp. It is 950 metres from Chalong Temple and 9.5 km from Chalong Pier. Phuket International Airport is 37 km from the property. All units feature a private balcony, a seating area and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Chalong Miracle Lakeview, guests will find a daily maid and ironing services. A trip can be arranged at a tour desk. Airport shuttle service is provided at an additional charge.

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Sai Rougn Residence - Sha Extra Plus
description: Stop at Sai Rougn Residence to discover the wonders of Phuket. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, grocery deliveries, daily housekeeping, 24-hour security, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. Sai Rougn Residence combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Phuket unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Mai Khao, Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+ provides stylish 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a swimming pool and a sauna. The air-conditioned rooms feature plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. The hotel provides 22 rooms, each with a private balcony, a spa bath and slippers. Each has a bathroom that offers bathrobes and a hair dryer. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. Phuket International Airport is a 25-minute drive from Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+. Those wishing to explore the region can also visit Sa Khu, situated an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: Ocean Rock Kalim
description: Situated in Patong Beach in the Phuket Province region and Kalim Beach reachable within 1.4 km, Ocean Rock Kalim features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a rooftop pool and free private parking. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A stovetop, a minibar and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A car rental service is available at Ocean Rock Kalim. Patong Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 33 km from Ocean Rock Kalim, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Lake Chalong Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated in Chalong, 400 metres from Chalong Temple, The Lake Chalong Hotel SHA Plus features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star resort offers a restaurant. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort the rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An American, Asian or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Chalong Pier is 4.8 km from The Lake Chalong Hotel SHA Plus, while Prince of Songkla University is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 37 km from the accommodation.

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: Allamanda Laguna Phuket
description: Located on Phuket's Bang Tao Beach, Allamanda Laguna Phuket - offers spacious accommodation, easy access to a golf course and friendly service. Allamanda Laguna Phuket - is just a 20-minute drive from the airport, Phuket Town and Patong Beach. The hotel offers a free shuttle bus to Laguna Phuket Golf Club. Suites feature an Asian contemporary design. They are fitted with a separate living room and a fully equipped kitchenette. Allamanda Laguna Phuket - has a swimming pool and offers kayaking, paddle boats, as well as other leisure activities.

name: Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus offers relaxing stays set on a peaceful hillside. It boasts a 680m² outdoor pool with a jetted pool, spa and free shuttles to Nai Harn Beach. Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus is a 15-minute drive from Kata Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surrounded by tropical greenery, spacious villa-style rooms feature a private balcony and outdoor rain showers. They have free WiFi and a sofa at the seating area.
