Guests can get a good workout at the well-equipped gym or enjoy relaxing massages at Ayurveda Destination Spa. Other facilities include a tour desk, gift shop and library. Boasting stunning sea views, the property's restaurant serves Thai Mediterranean specialities in a casual setting. There is also a wine cellar.

name: The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - Sha Extra Plus
address: 77 Moo 8, Chaofa West Road, T. Chalong, Chalong 83130
description: The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and terrace in Chalong. The property is around 2.4 km from Chalong Beach, 2.2 km from Chalong Temple and 2 km from Chalong Pier. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop. The units feature a wardrobe. At The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. You can play table tennis and darts at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Chinpracha House is 9.1 km from the accommodation, while Thai Hua Museum is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 39 km from The Thames Pool Access Resort & Villa - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
description: The luxury resort in Krabi offers 276 elegant styled rooms and suites set within a beautiful tropical garden. Guests at the beach resort enjoy the largest lagoon swimming pool in Krabi, a spa, restaurants serving Thai, Italian and Indian cuisine, and luxury speedboat tours to nearby islands. You also get to pamper your kids with fun activities and kids meals with MyKids package.accorhotels.com

name: The Pelican Residence & Suite Krabi
description: The Pelican Krabi luxury apartments offer a self-service experience that combine the service and quality of a beach destination hotel with the freedom and privacy of apartment living. Klong Maung Beach is located just 50 meters away across the street from the property. Guests can enjoy the beautiful nature of Krabi while dining at the beachfront restaurants or hike up to explore a bar with a mountain view. Located in a quite area of Klong Maung beach, our modern and spacious apart-hotels are a hidden gem for couples, families, and long term stay guests, who expect a little bit more from their accommodation. These apartments have been designed to offer a real home away from home feel and are available for daily rentals, weekend getaway, short breaks and long term monthly/yearly rentals. The comfortable suites feature a separate living room, dining area, bedroom, bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, and large balcony. Fully furnished, the air-conditioned units come with a flat-screen TV, a sofa and views of the ocean or pool. Some units have a private swimming pool and a shower or bathtub, which can be found in the private bathroom. The Pelican Krabi also have other common facilities such as the Fitness Centre, working lounge, common pool, and kids’ corner. Free private parking is also available on-site. The property is a 15-minute drive from Ao Nang and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from The Pelican Krabi.

name: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort
description: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offers a modern setting while in Krabi. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort boasts luxurious amenities, including a limousine service and Spa Krabi. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The rooms at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a kitchenette. Those staying at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort can indulge in a drink at Cocovida Pool Bar, before savouring a meal at Mangosteen’s. Places to dine at the resort include Toh Kin Khaw and Limoncello Italian Restaurant. Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort is within walking distance of Khlong Muang Beach. Ao Phra Nang and Tup Kaek Beach are within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Play Poshtel & Cafe'
address: 66/6 Panurat rd., Paknam, Muang, Krabi 66/6 Panurat rd., Paknam, Muang, Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: Set in Krabi town, 2.7 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram, Play Poshtel & Cafe' offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy American and Chinese dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. All rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some units at the hotel have a city view. At Play Poshtel & Cafe' each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Thara Park is 3.9 km from Play Poshtel & Cafe', while Krabi Stadium is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 10 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort
description: Located along Tubkaek Beach, Anyavee Beach Resort offers rooms and villas with views of Ao Nang Bay from the balcony. It also features a swimming pool and beachfront restaurant. Rooms at Anyavee Tubkaek are decorated in a modern Asian design. Offering an LCD TV, they also have a coffee/tea maker, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can have a refreshing swim in the pool, which also has an attached children's pool. To relax, massage services are available. Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort- SHA Plus is a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. The tourist centre of Ao Nang Beach is just 20 minute drive away. Half and full day tour arrangements can be made at Anyavee, along with car rentals. Free private parking is offered.

name: W Koh Samui
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui
description: The luxurious Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui offers a 5-star tropical getaway in Ko Samui, with its very own beachfront, beautiful sea view infinity pool, and pampering spa services. Overlooking Ban Tai Beach, it has 4 dining options. Spacious air-conditioned villas feature modern Thai decor and large patios with views of the sea. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, each has a DVD player, TV and a Thai-style sofa. En suite bathrooms present a terazzo bathtub and rainshower. Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui is located along Mae Nam Beach and is about 25 minutes' drive from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. Guests can take PADI-certified diving and snorkelling lessons, or even take part in elephant trekking tours. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive away. Boasting 180° views of the ocean, as well as outdoor seating, Lai Thai Restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine all day. Fresh seafood barbecue and international dishes are offered at the casual Beach Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars.

name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus is situated on the island’s northwestern tip, a quiet oasis on Laem Yai Bay. Windsurfing, golf and a spa are featured. Each room is fitted with a private infinity pool, private bar and iPod dock. Guests can enjoy views of the gardens or Gulf of Siam on the outdoor day bed. The bathroom’s glass doors open onto the private deck for an al fresco bathing experience. Chilled towels are offered at Koh Samui Four Seasons’ beachside infinity pool. Guests can recharge with a game of tennis, a variety of beach sports or a workout at the fitness centre. A large book and DVD library is provided. The hotel’s SIAMSEAS cruising boat offers access to Marine National Park and a variety of other locations. The resort is about a 30-minute drive from both Big Buddha and Koh Samui International Airport. The Four Seasons’ restaurant serves fresh local seafood seasoned with exotic herbs from nearby gardens. Both Thai and International cuisine are offered. The Beach Bar serves a variety of tropical cocktails.

name: Coco Palm Beach Resort
description: Our swimming pool will be closed from 16th-31st October 2023 due to renovations. During this period you still enjoy our beach activities. Set on peaceful Maenam Beach, Coco Palm Beach Resort boasts beautifully landscaped grounds away from Samui’s bustle. Offering free WiFi and parking, it boasts a beachfront outdoor pool and beachside restaurant. Coco Palm Beach Resort is about 10 km from Samui Airport and Nathorn Pier. It is 5 km from lively Bophut and is a 1-minute walk from Lomprayah Pier. Featuring Thai-style designs and wood furnishings, air-conditioned bungalows are set amidst tropical greenery. They come with satellite TV, heated showers and bathrobes. Leisure afternoons can be spent with a Thai massage or relaxing stroll in gardens. Added conveniences include a business centre, tour desk and water sports facilities. A delicious selection of Thai, Asian and international dishes can be enjoyed at Palm Terrace Restaurant while Thai Lantern offers panoramic views of the gulf. A poolside bar serves refreshing cocktails.

name: Conrad Koh Samui
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4, Hillcrest Road, Amphur Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Experience complete luxury at this stylish resort in your own villa with infinity-edge pool. Conrad Koh Samui is situated on the south-western tip of the island, overlooking the azure reefs of the Gulf of Thailand from its unique position on a scenic hillside. Set only a few steps from an idyllic white-sand beach, the resort features stunning sunset views. Ride in one of a variety of our luxury limousines from Koh Samui airport, only 45 minutes from the resort, and to destinations throughout the island. The resort's secluded location is home to 65 free-standing one bedroom villas overlooking the pristine Aow Thai beach and sprawling across 25 acres of dramatic hillside. All villas have private terraces and a minimum 10m infinity-edge pool. This incredible resort boasts unobstructed ocean views and a range of sumptuous amenities and modern conveniences guaranteed to please the most discerning travellers. Two and three bedroom luxury pool villas are also available at the exclusive residential wing, Conrad Koh Samui Residences. Plan an unforgettable celebration or design the wedding of your dreams at the exclusive Conrad Koh Samui. Hold the ceremony on the powder white sands of the beach as the sun sets over the iconic five islands or celebrate with an evening gala dinner in the resort's function room. Enjoy a variety of on-site recreation activities and water sports during your stay. Energize in the contemporary 24-hour Fitness Centre and practice yoga outdoors on the sun-soaked, wooden deck. Experience Thailand's legendary snorkelling and incredible views of the coast at our on-site diving and sailing booking centre, sunbathe on the resort's beach or the sea terrace, or in an over-water hammock. Soothe mind and spirit with a relaxing holistic beauty treatment in our opulent spa.Hilton

name: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort
description: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort is set on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Anantara Spa and Chang Noi Kids' Club. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Couples on a romantic getaway will adore the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Rooms at Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort feature a complimentary fruit bowl and a rain shower. All are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a marble bathroom and a private terrace. The en suite bathrooms provide slippers, bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Guests of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort are welcome to experience international cuisine at Tree Tops Signature Dining, or try Asian and international meals at OceanKiss. Guests can enjoy scenic countryside walks or make use of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort's bicycle rental service to explore the surrounds. For those travelling by car, parking is available and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Khwan Beach Resort
description: Khwan Beach Resort is set on Koh Samui and provides 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi. Just a short stroll from Mae Nam Pier, it offers comfortable rooms equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. The hotel provides a garden to relax in, as well as free private parking on site. Airport transfers and a laundry service are available upon enquiry. Khwan Beach Resort provides 9 air conditioned rooms. Each have their very own seating area and a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests staying at Khwan Beach Resort can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. For those spending the day out, the hotel offers packed lunches if required. Khwan Beach Resort is within walking distance of Maenam Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mae Nam.Revato

name: Pause on Samui Residences
description: Set in Bophut in the Koh Samui region, with Bophut Beach and Bang Rak Beach nearby, Pause on Samui Residences offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The accommodation is air conditioned and has a sauna. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The holiday home offers a children's playground. A kids pool is also available at Pause on Samui Residences, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Fisherman Village is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Big Buddha is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 3 km from Pause on Samui Residences, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Sandalwood Luxury Villas
description: Overlooking the scenic Gulf of Siam, Sandalwood Resort’s luxurious villas occupy a prime hillside location. Featuring nine private infinity pools and one communal pool with stunning sea views, it has a spa and free WiFi. Boasting private balconies with sweeping views of the coast, Sandalwood villas feature a blend of traditional Thai decor and modern amenities. They come with a spa bath, flat-screen TV and well-equipped kitchenette. Leisurely afternoons can be spent on the loungers at the sundeck. For a pampering experience, Sanctuary Spa offers soothing treatments. Exploring Koh Samui and neighbouring islands is easy with the help of a tour desk. After a long day out, head back to the Sandalwood Resort for a delicious meal at Blue Ginger Restaurant. Enjoy authentic Thai dishes as you take in views of Chaweng Bay. Sandalwood Luxury Villa Resort is about 10 km from Samui International Airport, while it is 26 km from Nathon Pier.

name: Shasa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui
address: 116/1 Moo 2 Tambon Mared, Laem Set, Koh Samui 84310
description: Nestled in a tropical hillside, this 5-star property boasts 3 beachfront pools and spacious suites overlooking the beautiful Gulf of Thailand. It offers attentive service, hearty buffets and free Wi-Fi. Located away from the crowds of Samui, ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus & Residences, Koh Samui offers shuttles to the Chaweng and Lamai beaches. It is 45 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. Bright and airy, well-designed suites feature modern interiors with fully furnished kitchens. They come with a flat-screen cable TV, laundry facilities and spacious bathrooms with a large bathtub. Guests can take relaxing dips in the hydro-therapy pool or get a Thai massage at the spa. The resort also houses fitness facilities, a library and games room. Beyond The Sea Siamese Brasserie offers a spread of fine Thai and international dishes. It also features an extensive wine list and gourmet coffees.

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
description: The Sea Koh Samui is located along the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach, a 10-minute drive from Nathon. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The contemporary rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV and a spacious living area. A kitchen area with microwave is provided. Rooms come with an indoor or outdoor hot tub. The Sea Koh Samui is a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Town. Samui Airport is about 11 km away. A fitness centre is available for guests wishing to keep up with their regular work-out. The spa features massage treatments. A tour desk and car rentals are available. Drinks and cocktails are available by the pool. Guests can dine in-room with room service.

name: Samui Reef View Resort
description: Nestled in the foothills, 4 km south of Lamai Beach, Samui Reef View Resort boasts accommodations with views of the Gulf of Thailand, the island's coastal reefs, mountains and the jungle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each air-conditioned unit at Samui Reef View Resort comes with a refrigerator, a kettle, a safe as well as a cable TV. The en suite bathroom is equipped with hot shower facilities. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, located in the middle of the resort, with a wading area suitable for children. Arranging a day trip to the waterfalls, elephant trekking through the jungle or a visit to the tiger zoo or aquarium are all possible at the property. For guests wishing to explore the island and surrounding areas on their own, scooter or car rental is available. Situated next to the pool is the on-site restaurant and bar where guests can sample a selection of Thai and European dishes as well as cool drinks while admiring views of the ocean. Breakfast can also be enjoyed every morning from 07:00 - 10:00 hrs. Located near Hua Thanon, it takes 40 minutes by car from the airport to the hotel and half an hour from Nathon Pier.

name: Bhumlapa Garden Resort
description: Stretching over 3 acres of landscaped grounds, Bhumlapa Garden Resort offers standalone accommodation, a 5-minute walk from Bo Phut Beach. It features an outdoor pool, a spa, and free Wi-Fi. Overlooking the pool or surrounding tropical gardens, villas present an Oriental-style décor with flat-screen TVs, minibar and DVD players. Luxurious and decorated with artworks, they provide well-equipped kitchenettes with cooking facilities. The restaurant serves both Thai and European food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ villas. Local eateries are only a 5-minute walk from Bhumlapa Garden Resort. It offers a shuttle service from Koh Samui Airport, located a 10-minute drive away. Various water activities are available, including diving, snorkeling and fishing. Alternatively, enjoy relaxing massages at the spa.

name: Panorama Samui Residences
address: 79/7 Bang Por Soi 4 Moo 6 Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: When you stay at Panorama Samui Residences in Koh Samui, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Nathon Pier and Bo Phut Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Bang Po Hut
description: Set in Ban Bang Po, 800 metres from Bang Po Beach, Bang Po Hut offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. Some rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. The resort offers a barbecue. Fisherman Village is 11 km from Bang Po Hut, while Big Buddha is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Chor Chang Villa Resort
address: 59/17 Moo 5, Choeng Mon Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Stylish accommodation with modern facilities are provided at Chor Chang Villa Resort. Offering free on-site parking, it is just a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. Chor Chang Villa Resort is only a 5-minute walk from Choeng Mon Beach. It is a 10-minute drive from both Big Buddha Temple and Fisherman Village. Chaweng Centre is a 15-minute ride away. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, all units are provided with air conditioning, a fridge and a safety box. Shower facilities are in the en suite bathrooms. Guests can laze by the pool. The resort's restaurant serves a selection of Thai and Western cuisines.

name: Boujis Boutique Resort
address: 103 B Moo 3, Bophut Chaweng Noi, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set within the scenic parkland of Chaweng, Boujis Boutique Resort provides comfortable accommodation and a wide range of facilities, such as free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and an express check-in and check-out feature. It is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and offers free private parking on site. The resort has 16 rooms and has been recently refurbished. It also provides babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, an in-room dining area and slippers. Each have their very own sitting area and a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Samui International Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Boujis Boutique Resort. Wat Phra Yai is within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Bangpo Village
description: Enjoying a beachfront location on Bangpo Beach, this hotel offers simple bungalows featuring wood flooring, private balconies and tropical views. Bangpo Village also features a tour desk and massage services. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. It takes only 10 minutes by car from the hotel to Santiburi Golf course. The Bangpo Village provides a shuttle service to Samui Airport, located a 25-minute drive away. Bungalows offer spacious and well-appointed interiors with a kitchenette, seating area and an en suite bathroom. They are fitted with a minibar, air conditioning and feature a work area in all private balconies. For leisure, guests can visit Chaweng’s famous nightlife spots, located a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Car and motorbike rental facilities are available at the hotel. Room service is provided for convenience. Alternatively, guests can make use of the hotel’s barbecue facilities.

name: Conrad Koh Samui Residences
description: Conrad Koh Samui Residences are situated within Conrad Koh Samui Resort & Spa on Thailand's third largest island, Koh Samui, surrounded by the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand. The idyllic luxury resort island is highly accessible from key gateway cities in Southeast Asia and only a 60-minute flight from Bangkok. Located on the south-western tip of the island, the residences showcase dazzling sunset views from all 15 of its two- and three-bedroom Oceanview Pool Villas. These deluxe villas are set over two levels. Separate living and dining rooms with kitchenette are located on the upper level, and bedrooms, private pool and outdoor deck are on the lower level. The villas are perfect for families and friends who wish to share the ultimate vacation experience. The 25-acre property consists entirely of beautifully decorated, free-standing contemporary Thai-style villas built along the rocky peninsula to ensure the greatest level of privacy and unobstructed ocean views. Conrad's array of world-class facilities cater to every need - from incredible culinary delights at three restaurants, two lounges and bar, private wine cellar and in-villa dining experience to beach-side activities and water sports – and enable guests to keep to their routines, discover new experiences, or just relax at the award-winning spa. Young families will be delighted with the large, infinity-edge main pool with an ocean view, and the Kid's Club, which also offers babysitting services and fun activities. Guests will find basic items at the resort shop. For those who wish to shop for local goods, the DoiTung Lifestyle Shop sells Thai handicrafts and momentos made by hilltribe people in the north of Thailand. Conrad Koh Samui Residences is an ideal choice for conferences, intimate meetings and celebrations. From spectacular gala events to informal celebrations or a private beachfront wedding, the resort offers a unique variety of indoor and outdoor locations to create the wedding of your dreams.Hilton

name: Samui Zenity
address: 42/4 Moo 3, Soi 5, Mae Nam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Samui Zenity is located near Maenam beach and local activities (restaurant, local markets, bar) The hotel provides a free shuttle service to and from Maenam Beach, scooter rental is available on site. Offering mountain views, it has an outdoor swimming pool with a waterslide, a large equipped shared kitchen, a bar, breakfast and restaurant service. Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV, refrigerator. All rooms have a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of tea from your terrace or balcony. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Samui Zenity features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can order food at Samui Zenity, delivered to the property by local restaurant. Local foods can be found nearby. In addition, you'll have to practice sports in our gym. There is ticket service at the property. Samui Zenity also provides daily shuttle services to Maenam Pier at an additional charge. Mae Nam Pier is 4 km away. Samui Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Laura Guest House Samui
description: No description found

name: Baan Sukreep Resort
description: Set in tropical landscapes, Baan Sukreep Resort offers a peaceful retreat just a 5-minute walk away from Chaweng Noi Beach. It provides an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a daily buffet breakfast. All rooms open out to a private balcony with pool or tropical views. Each room has a minibar, a safety deposit box, cable TV and a private bathroom. Baan Sukreep Resort is a 10-minute drive from shops at Chaweng’s lively centre, and a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport. It provides chargeable airport transfers and free parking. Samui’s natural beauty can be easily explored with help from the tour desk or by renting a motorbike or car from the property. Added conveniences include daily housekeeping, laundry service and in-room massage. The poolside restaurant and lounge bar provides a relaxing setting for hearty Thai, Burmese and European meals and drinks.

name: Ps Thana Resort
description: Surrounded by lush gardens, PS Thana Resort offers cosy and comfortable rooms with air conditioning and private balconies. Free parking at the resort is available. Samui International Airport and Chaweng Beach are within a 20-minute drive from PS Thana. Big Buddha Temple is only a 10-minute ride away. All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a cable TV, a seating area and a fridge. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. There is a tour desk at the resort to help guests with city tour arrangements. Laundry service is available. Guests can enjoy Thai and international favourites offered at P.S. Restaurant.

name: Chaweng Lakeview Residence
description: A 5-minute drive from Chaweng Centre, Chaweng Lakeview Residence offers modern villas with a kitchen and a private balcony as well as a shared swimming pool. It is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and has free Wi-Fi. Furnished with simple yet stylish decor, each villa comes with a flat-screen cable TV with streaming services, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Free toiletries are included in a bathroom. Shuttle service can be arranged for guests, as well as car and motorbike rental services. Daily cleaning services are provided. For convenience, Chaweng Lakeview Residence provides a variety of services including laundry, luggage storage and private chef. Free private parking is possible on site. Within 100 metres, guests will find a nearby restaurant and bar.

name: Phalarn Inn Resort
description: Phalarn Inn Resort is located along Meanam Beach in North Samui, a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Beach. The hotel offers an outdoor pool and restaurant. Rooms at Phalarn Inn are surrounded by tropical gardens and come with either air-conditioning or fan. Standard amenities include hot water showers. The hotel serves a daily breakfast at its onsite café. Guests can book day trips at the tour desk or relax by the outdoor pool. They can also play golf nearby. Car rentals are available. Phalarn Inn Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport and Nathorn Town. It is less than a 5-minute walk from Lomprayah Pier.

name: Riviera Beach Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Riviera Beach Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Bophut and has a terrace, restaurant and bar. Boasting a private beach area, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a few steps from Bophut Beach, 1.1 km from Bang Rak Beach and 300 metres from Fisherman Village. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Riviera Beach Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Riviera Beach Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Big Buddha is 4.5 km from the hotel, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from Riviera Beach Hotel.

name: Paradise Island Estate
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club
description: Located in Bangrak Beach, 1.7 km from Big Buddha, The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The popular Fisherman's Village is a 5-minute drive away. All fully furnished rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, pool or garden are featured in certain rooms. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. This hotel has a secluded beach area and car hire is available. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling and diving. The Chaweng Beach area is a 15-minute drive away, while Samui Airport is is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Skye Beach Hotel
address: 8/135 Plai Laem Soi 5 M.5, Bophut, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: No description found

name: Karma Resort
description: Facing the beachfront, Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers 4-star accommodation in Bophut and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. A few steps from Bophut Beach and 1.7 km from Mae Nam Beach, the property offers a shared lounge and a terrace. Guests can enjoy American and French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bophut, like hiking, snorkelling and cycling. W Koh Samui Beach is 2 km from Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Fisherman Village is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 5 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Samujana Villas
address: 63/154 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samujana Villas is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including a private beach, an infinity pool and a butler service. It has a gym, as well as outdoor tennis courts, free Wi-Fi and a private cinema. The property provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. It offers body treatments and a sun deck, as well as fitness classes. All the villas at Samujana Villas include direct pool access, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are air conditioned and offer a marble bathroom, a coffee maker and a private garden. A mini bar, a private terrace and a private balcony are also provided to guests. Samujana Villas has easy access to Choeng Mon Beach. Those wanting to explore the area can also visit Chaweng, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: The Aiyara
address: 45 Moo 2 Baan Krod Bangpa-in Ayutthaya Baan Krod Bangpa-in Ayutthaya, Ayutthaya 13160
description: Set in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with hot tub and a hair dryer. A minibar and kettle are also featured. Guests at ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya can enjoy an American breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Japanese and Thai cuisine. The wellness area at ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya is comprised of a hot tub and a fitness room. Guests can swim in the pool with a view, go golfing or relax in the garden. Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 6.5 km from the aparthotel, while Wat Mahathat is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 45 km from ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Diamond Resort
address: 201 Moo 1, Latya Erawan Rd, Tambon Ladya, Kanchanaburi, Kanchanaburi 71190
description: Located in Kanchanaburi, within 14 km of The Bridge of the River Kwai and 15 km of Kanchanaburi Railway Station, Diamond Resort provides accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is set 17 km from Malika R.E.124 The Siamese Living Heritage Town, 18 km from The Jeath War Museum and 31 km from Wat Tham Seu. The accommodation offers karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with mountain views. At the hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Death Railway Museum is 15 km from Diamond Resort, while Wat Tham Phu Wa is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 158 km from the accommodation.

name: Boutique Raft Resort, River Kwai
description: Located in Kanchanaburi, Boutique Raft Resort, River Kwai features rooms on a floating raft and within the resort’s main building. It also offers a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi in the lobby and the restaurant. Guests can choose from the River Kwai Suites or Boutique Suites. All rooms come with air conditioning, en suite bathroom with hot shower and room service. Meals and beverages are served at the resort’s restaurant. Services available include laundry, dry cleaning and a tour desk. The resort provides free parking. A ride on a bamboo raft lets guests explore the river. A visit to the Hin Dat Hot Spring offers relaxation.

name: The Residence Resort & Spa Retreat
description: Luxurious villas with private pools, full kitchen facilities and spacious lounge areas await at The Residence Resort. A 2-minute drive from Bangtao Beach, it boasts a spa and fitness facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available inside the property. Featuring a rooftop area for outdoor dining and barbecues, these large villas offer warm colour schemes and laundry facilities. There is a TV, DVD player and spacious bathrooms. The Residence Resort & Spa Retreat provides a free shuttle service to Tesco Lotus and Bangtao Beach (Catch Beach Club). It is a 25-minute drive from Patong’s nightlife and a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy meals throughout the day from 06:30 - 21:30 hrs in the privacy of their own villas. For dinner, a personal chef can also prepare private barbecues in villas.

name: Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin
address: 33/17 Soi Mooban Huadon, Petchasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: A lovely beachfront property just outside Hua Hin Town, Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin offers a relaxing getaway with an outdoor pool and sea-facing restaurant. Rooms and villas are nestled amidst tropical gardens. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings and beddings, Anantasila’s rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of surrounding greenery. Each room comes with cable TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Private bathrooms have a bathtub and shower. Guests can play a round of mini golf, or relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Massages can be enjoyed on the beach, by the pool, or in the privacy of guests’ rooms. Beach views accompany meals at the restaurant, which serves Thai, Western and Italian specialities. Cocktails are available at the beach bar. Anantasila Villa is a 15-minute drive from Hua Hin’s town centre. It provides a free shuttle to a bus stop where guests can catch a minibus to the town centre.

name: Narawan Hotel
address: 250/131 Hua Hin Soi 94 Petchakhasem Rd, Hua Hin 77110
description: Combining modern and Northern Thai decor, Narawan Hotel, Hua Hin is just 500 metres from Hua Hin Beach and Market Village Shopping Complex. It has an outdoor pool and free in-room internet. Fully air-conditioned and fitted with tiled flooring, rooms feature a private balcony and a cable TV. Guests can relax at the sun loungers surrounding the outdoor spa pool or rent a motorbike to explore Hua Hin at leisure. The hotel also provides laundry services and a 24-hour front desk. The off-site restaurant serves a daily Asian and Western buffet breakfast. Narawan Hotel, Hua Hin is 2 km from the local Night Market and vibrant nightlife options.

name: Scandia Beach Hotel
description: Set in Jomtien Beach, Scandia Beach Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. The aparthotel offers a continental or Asian breakfast. The restaurant at Scandia Beach Hotel serves American, Thai and Asian cuisine. The accommodation offers a picnic area. A car rental service is available at Scandia Beach Hotel. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Dongtan Beach, Jomtien Beach and Pratumnak Beach. The nearest airport is U-Tapao Rayong-Pattaya International, 41 km from Scandia Beach Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Rayong City Centre
address: 554/4 Sukhumvit Road, Tumbol Noen Pra, Rayong 21000
description: Holiday Inn & Suites Rayong City Centre, the first and only international branded hotel in Rayong city offers fresh & comfortable 288 guest rooms including: Standard Room, Premium Sea View Room, One Bedroom Suite, One Bedroom Club Corner Suite and Two Bedroom Suite in modern style with our signature ‘Soft & Firm’ pillows. The hotel is located in the heart of Rayong, adjacent to Passione Shopping Destination and within close proximity to Rayong's favourite attractions such as Yomjinda Old Town, Saengchan Beach and many night life entertainment hot spots. The renowned Samed Island is just 20 kms from the hotel. U-Tapao International Airport is just 33 kms away or a 30 minutes drive from the hotel. Dining options range from authentic Thai to International cuisine, conveniently available within our hotel restaurant outlets, including CU Lounge & Bar, The Brasserie Global Dining and ‘Elementi Rooftop Grill & Bar’ on 30th floor. With 9 elegant event spaces including a pillar-less high ceiling Grand Ballroom which can accommodate up-to 300 persons in banquet style, all our meeting rooms come equipped with latest state of the art equipment. A professional on-site events team ensures a successful event.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Tokyo Edition, Toranomon
description: Experience the unparalleled comfort of the luxury lifestyle at The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon. With a downtown location offering a privileged view of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Bay, our luxury hotel signals a new generation in laid-back luxury. Discover an unprecedented intersection of tasteful design, innovation and elevated service steps from the city’s renowned art galleries, cultural landmarks, nightlife and restaurants. Showcasing premier dining, entertainment and amenities under one roof, our enchanting hotel offers an oasis of sophistication in downtown Tokyo, Japan. Every amenity achieves the perfect balance of comfort and style, from a specialty restaurant and signature cocktail bar to a 24-hour gym and custom-designed spa with 6 treatment rooms. The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon features 206 hotel rooms and suites with iconic skyline views, including 15 rooms with outdoor terraces.Marriott

name: Ki Niseko
description: Ki Niseko is ideally located less than 100metres from the high-speed gondola at Niseko Mt Resort Grand Hirafu. It boasts perfect ski-in ski-out access and ski storage, as well as indoor/outdoor hot spring baths. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Offering a great mountain or nature view, each room comes with a flat-screen TV, speakers, DVD player and air conditioning. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath tub and a hairdryer. At Ki Niseko you will find a 24-hour front desk, a hot spring bath, spa and ski/bike storage. Other facilities include a concierge desk, and a lobby bar and lounge where live music events are held. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and hiking. The property is a 15-minute drive from JR Kutchan Station. Shin Chitose Airport is a 3-hour bus ride away.

name: Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono
description: Set in Niseko, 12 km from Hirafu Station, Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests also enjoy access to the indoor pool and fitness centre, as well as the sauna and hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono you will find a restaurant serving Cantonese, French and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot spring bath. Ski equipment hire and bike hire are available at Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. Speaking Mandarin, German, English and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Kutchan Station is 5.7 km from the hotel, while Niseko Annupuri Hot Spring is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama, 97 km from Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport
address: 6225 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Offering a free 24-hour transfer service to LAX, Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport features spacious rooms with mid-century modern design and free WiFi. Venice Beach is 15 minutes’ drive away. An outdoor pool is available as well. A 55-inch cable HDTV is offered in each air-conditioned room at this full service hotel. Soundproof windows offer 24-hour comfort. Guest rooms also include a refrigerator, a coffee machine and a safe. Bathrooms have granite counter-tops, marble floors, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The restaurant onsite, unity la, offers a restaurant, open market, and a bar. The best of LA's ethnic neighborhoods and diverse communities come to life for our guests. unity la features a 24-hour open market and a unique offering of eclectic and savory choices. unity la is located on the lobby level. Guests can work out in the fitness center at Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport. Concierge services are available. This hotel is within 15 minutes’ drive of Marina Del Rey. Hollywood is 12 mi away. Westchester Golf Course is 2.5 mi away from this hotel.

name: Plaza la Reina
description: Plaza La Reina is located in Westwood Village, close to Beverly Hills and Santa Monica. This hotel offers guest rooms with free WiFi, international and domestic calls and valet parking. The Getty Cente is 3.1 mi away. Each room at the hotel features a fully equipped kitchen, a washer and tumble dryer, a personal safe and a Keurig® coffee machine. Plaza La Reina features upscale amenities such as concierge service, a rooftop lounge, alfresco dining and daily newspapers. A business center is also available. Universal Studios is 11 mi away from Plaza La Reina. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is 9.9 mi away.

name: Springhill Suites Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach
description: Unwind at SpringHill Suites Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach. Our hotel near Manhattan Beach, CA, provides an unbeatable location near El Segundo Beach, Dockweiler State Beach and Hermosa Beach. Guests can also easily access The Kia Forum Arena and Redondo Beach Performing Arts Center from our Hawthorne, CA, hotel. When you're ready to retire from your California beach-fueled adventures, make yourself at home in our spacious hotel suites. We offer complimentary Wi-Fi and separate living areas, so you have ample space to spread out. Stop by The Market for a wide selection of snacks and beverages before you hit the beach. During downtime, soak up the sun or enjoy a workout by swimming laps at our outdoor pool. Need to host an event in Manhattan Beach? Utilize our three venues for your flawless business meeting or gathering in California. Whatever fills your days with us, soar into a renewing stay at SpringHill Suites Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach.Marriott

name: Towneplace Suites Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach
description: Whether you’re in Southern California for work or fun, you’re in for a great stay at TownePlace Suites Los Angeles LAX/Manhattan Beach. Find our extended-stay hotel near Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) and the 405 freeway at the intersection of Manhattan Beach, Redondo Beach and El Segundo. Begin your day with our grab-and-go breakfast, accompanied by fresh coffee or take a dip in our hotel's heated outdoor pool. When you're ready to retreat to your hotel suite, settle in with a full-size kitchen and a comfortable living area designed for relaxation. All of our hotel rooms are pet-friendly, so feel free to bring your four-legged friend to keep you company. You can also enjoy hypoallergenic PURE amenities, free Wi-Fi and premium cable channels on your flat-panel TV. Let our hotel near Manhattan Beach, CA be your second home in the City of Angels.Marriott

name: Jolly Roger Hotel
description: Venice Beach is just 1 mi away from this nonsmoking Marina del Rey hotel, which offers an outdoor pool. It provides spacious rooms with free WiFi and expanded cable TV. A refrigerator and a coffee machine featuring Wolfgang Puck Gourmet Coffee are included in every room at Jolly Roger Hotel. The traditionally decorated rooms also have a work desk and ironing facilities. A free charging station for electric vehicles is available to guests of the property. A business center are located on site. Los Angeles International Airport is 5 mi away from Hotel Jolly Roger. Penmar Golf Course and the Santa Monica Pier are within 3 mi of this hotel.

name: Quality Inn Lomita-Los Angeles South Bay
description: The well-being of guests is top of mind at Choice-branded hotels. Guests may experience a variety of new and improved cleanliness protocols and products. If you are looking for a more for your money hotel in Lomita, the 100 per cent smoke free Quality Inn Lomita-Los Angeles South Bay is always a reasonably priced option. Amenities include free WiFi, free Grab and Go breakfast, free parking and an outdoor pool. Guest rooms feature a microwave, refrigerator and flat-screen TV. We are located on the beautiful Pacific Coast Highway at the base of the Rancho Palos Verdes Peninsula. L.A. is nearby, as are attractions like the Lomita Railroad Museum, Los Angeles Waterfront, Hermosa Beach, Redondo Beach Pier and the Battleship USS Iowa Museum. You can also earn rewards like gift cards and free nights when you join our Choice Privileges program.Choice Hotels

name: Bayside Hotel
description: No description found

name: The Adler a Hollywood Hills Hotel
description: No description found

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Airport
description: Discover the ideal choice for extended stays in Miami, FL, in our modern, fully equipped suites with expanded amenities at Residence Inn Miami Airport. Our pet-friendly airport hotel in Miami, Florida, boasts a superb location near the Miami International Airport (MIA), LoanDepot Park, Magic City Casino and Little Havana. Start your day with our complimentary breakfast and squeeze in a workout at our hotel's fitness center before exploring Miami. Then, soak up the sun at our outdoor pool. If you're visiting for business, host your event or meeting in our versatile venues. At the end of your day, retreat to spacious, well-appointed suites with pillowtop mattresses, complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens and separate living areas. No matter how long you're in Miami, let us ensure you enjoy your stay at our extended-stay Miami hotel near the airport.Marriott

name: Hyatt House Miami Airport
description: This Miami hotel is 1.9 mi from the Miami International Airport. The hotel offers a fully equipped kitchen in every suite and features an airport and local transfer service within 1.9 mi. Suites at Hyatt house Miami Airport include a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The suites also have a seating area and free WiFi. The Hyatt house Miami offers a free breakfast buffet and grocery services. Guests can work out in the gym or swim in the outdoor pool. Located on site, H Bar serves cocktails, desserts, and snacks for guests looking to socialize. The hotel is less than 15 minutes' drive of the American Airlines Arena, which features concerts and basketball games. Coral Gables is 6.8 mi away.

name: Fortune House Hotel Suites
description: On Brickell Avenue, and less than 3 miles from the Port of Miami, this apartment-style Florida hotel provides an outdoor pool, hot tub, and on-site restaurant. The spacious, fully-furnished suites at Fortune House Hotel feature a full kitchen, private laundromat, and a balcony. Separate bedrooms and a dining areas are also included. A state-of-the-art fitness center and sauna are available to all guests at the Hotel Fortune House. Guests will have access to free property-wide Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk for added convenience. Madison's Restaurant and Lounge serves unique fusion of contemporary and traditional Latin fare. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are made-to-order from the menu. Fortune House is less than 2 miles from American Airlines Arena and a 15-minute drive from Miami Beach. Miami International Airport is less than 10 miles away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Aventura Mall
address: 19900 West Country Club Drive, Aventura, FL 33180
description: Explore South Florida in style while enjoying a Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall hotel suite. Located near Gulfstream Park, our hotel, close to Aventura Mall, makes exploring Miami's top attractions and beaches easy. Choose from our studio, one- and two-bedroom hotel suites and enjoy the comforts of home, like complimentary Wi-Fi, spacious living areas and luxurious bedding. Start your day with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet or make the most of your suite's kitchen to prepare a special homemade meal. Once you've refueled and recharged, stop by our fitness center to work on your cardio. Next, take a refreshing dip in the heated outdoor pool at our hotel in Aventura, surrounded by cozy lounge chairs and swaying palm trees. Hosting an event? With four stylish meeting spaces offering audiovisual equipment, our hotel accommodates everything from business conferences to quinceañeras. So whether you're visiting the beach or going on a cruise, find your home at Residence Inn Miami Aventura Mall.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Doral Mall Area
description: Set a pace that suits you at the New Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. You'll thrive at Residence Inn with the conveniences you need. Like spacious kings and double queen studio, and one-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Complimentary shuttle service to Miami International Airport from 9am - 5pm. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. And stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Miami Airport West/Doral
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn by Marriott. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. You'll thrive at Residence Inn with the conveniences you need. Like spacious studios, and one bedroom suites of either one king or two queen beds with separate living and sleeping areas. A fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. Stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall
description: Whether you’re staying in Miami for just a few nights or for much longer, you’ll discover your home away from home at the new Homewood Suites by Hilton® Miami Dolphin Mall. We are located adjacent to the Dolphin Mall, and less than one mile from the Miami International Mall – Miami’s premier retail destination. We are also within 4 miles of Doral and world class golf, and only 10 miles from Miami International Airport. The shopping, dining, attractions and entertainment of downtown are just 16.3 miles from our all-suite Miami hotel. Savor a free full, hot breakfast every morning, and unwind at the complimentary Wednesday evening social.* Settle into a stylish suite, offering everything you need to feel at home, including complimentary WiFi access, a work desk, an HDTV, plush bedding, and a full kitchen. Make the most of your leisure time at this extended-stay Miami hotel. Work out with the latest wellness technology in the expanded fitness center, swim in the sparkling outdoor pool, or top up your tan on the sun deck. Enjoy a farm to table selection of entrees and appetizers at The Flamingo Grille, which serves American classics influenced and inspired by the vibrant local flavors popular in Miami. With a 24-hour business center, and 5,500 square feet of conference space available in the attached Garden Inn, our hotel is an ideal base for meetings, training events and celebrations for up to 175 people. * Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Staybridge Suites Miami International Airport
description: Staybridge Suites - Miami International Airport features air-conditioned rooms in Miami. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a fitness center, as well as barbecue facilities. Miami International Airport is 1.2 mi from the property, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a bath or shower and a hair dryer. All rooms feature a desk. An onsite bar and juice bar are provided for guests to enjoy. An evening reception with complimentary light fare, beer, and wine is offered Monday through Wednesday. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business center and laundry service at the property. Complimentary shuttle service is offered to the Miami Intermodal Center, which is 1476 ft away. The property is 2.7 mi from Marlins Park and 3.7 mi from Miracle Mile Miami.

name: Element Miami Doral
description: A contemporary haven amid Miami's vibrant cityscape, Element Miami Doral enjoys a prime location near popular South Florida attractions. Stylish studios and suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, pillowtop mattresses, work desks, and much more. Our eco-friendly accommodations provide a tranquil retreat, conveniently situated near US Southern Command and Florida International University, and close to the airport. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast, setting the perfect tone for exploration and relaxation. Discover museums and indulge in shopping sprees at Dolphin Mall and International Mall. Miami's beaches beckon, inviting you to bask in the warm embrace of the ocean. Afterward, cool off with a dip in our outdoor pool. At 107 Steak & Bar, savor delectable cuts of prime beef and fusion cuisine. Elevate your events in versatile spaces, perfect for meetings, weddings, and private parties. Experience the best of Miami at Element Miami Doral, your home base for unforgettable adventures.Marriott

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: SERENA Hotel Aventura Miami, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: The SERENA Hotel Aventura is moments away from world class shopping at Aventura Mall and neighbors to Gulf Stream Park and Casino, where you can enjoy live horse races, fine restaurants, gambling and shopping. We are located in the epicenter of the Aventura Medical District and the nearest hotel to the Aventura Hospital. Enjoy refined contemporary rooms and suites in a relaxed atmosphere. A portion of our suites feature separate living and sleeping areas featuring including a fully equipped kitchen. We offer a full restaurant and bar, a conference room, fitness center and rooftop swimming pool. SERENA is derived from the Latin word serenus, meaning clear, tranquil, or serene. Whether you’ve spent your day under the sun, shopping or working you can unplug and arrive at your place of tranquility.Hilton

name: The Mutiny Hotel
description: Offering a heated outdoor pool, the Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel overlooks Sailboat Bay and is 1053 ft from the Coconut Grove shopping and dining district. Features include a restaurant, bar, and sauna. Kitchen and sofa bed are provided in all suites. Coconut Grove Mutiny Luxury Suites Hotel extras include 2 flat-screen TVs and a Bose® Bluetooth® docking station. Room service is offered for a fee. Free WiFi in public areas, a fitness center, and a hot tub in addition to a 24-hour front desk are available to guests throughout their stay. Massages and in-room dining are offered for a fee. Table 14 Bar & Restaurant is the product of JC & Cristina Digon’s vision and passion along with Executive Chef Nilton Castillo’s international cuisine. Table 14 features breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service menus. Miami city center and the University of Miami are within 19 minutes’ drive away. The hotel is also 2 mi from Viscaya Museum & Gardens and 5.8 mi from the South Beach Art Deco District.

name: Provident Doral At The Blue
description: Provident Doral at the Blue features holiday villas and each one includes a full kitchen. Guests will enjoy access to a resort-style pool and the Miami International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away. Free WiFi is available in each of these Miami villas along with flat-screen TVs. All units have a spa bath and some have a private balcony or an additional bathroom. Guests can visit the on-site fitness center at Provident Doral at the Blue Miami or schedule a massage at the spa and wellness center. A hot tub is also on site as well as a sauna. The Chophouse 5300 is an on-site restaurant at this resort and there is also the Poolside Bar and Grill open seasonally. This property is 16 mi from the shores of Miami Beach. The Lincoln Road Mall offers many shopping options and is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bentley Hotel South Beach
description: Location This hotel enjoys an oceanfront location in the heart of South Beach and the Art Deco district. It is within walking distance of South Beach's famous shopping streets and just 3 minutes from Lincoln Road Mall. Everything South Beach has to offer is at the doorstep: trendy restaurants, designer boutiques, non-stop nightlife and, of course, the beach. The accommodation is only 7 minutes from downtown Miami, 10 minutes from Brickell Avenue, 15 minutes from Coconut Grove and 20 minutes from Key Biscayne. Miami International Airport is 15 minutes away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 39 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby area, where a 24-hour check-out service is available. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Additional services include room service and a laundry. In addition, a conference room and a business centre are also available. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a kitchen and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a queen-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. For self-catering guests, there is a well equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. Leisure options at the establishment also include a gym, a spa, a steam bath and massage treatments. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Hilton Vacation Club Crescent on South Beach Miami
description: Located on Ocean Drive across the street from Miami Beach and Lummus Park, our hotel is mere steps from popular restaurants, galleries and shops. We are only a 25-minute drive from Miami International Airport and 50 minutes Fort Lauderdale International Airport. Our one and two-bedroom suites feature fully equipped kitchens and separate living area.Hilton

name: Homewood Suites Miami Airport/Blue Lagoon
description: The newly renovated Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami-Airport/Blue Lagoon hotel in Florida is located minutes from the Miami International Airport - 3.6 miles - and Downtown Miami and it is ideally situated for leisure activities on a private secluded peninsula in the heart of Blue Lagoon a 100-acre fresh water lagoon. The Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami-Airport/Blue Lagoon hotel is also within walking distance to several restaurants and offers complimentary shuttle service to and from Miami International Airport 7am to 9pm, every hour on the hour.Hilton

name: Candlewood Suites Miami Intl Airport - 36th St
description: NEW HOTEL NEAR THE MIAMI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT Welcome to the brand new Candlewood Suites Miami International Airport 36th Street offering 130 Studios with Fully Equipped Kitchens. We are conveniently located just 8 minutes from MIA offering Free Shuttle to and from the Miami Airport and just 9 minutes from the City of Doral and its many Restaurants, Shopping Malls and attractions. We welcome business travelers, leisure travelers, groups and extended stay guests visiting Miami and looking for a perfect location with easy access to major Expressways like 826 and 112 connecting you in minutes to Downtown Miami and Miami Beach for great dining and entertainment. You will enjoy the short drive to catch the Miami Dolphins play at Hard Rock Stadium, the Marlins at Miami Marlins Park and the Miami Heat at American Airlines Arena. Candlewood Suites Miami International Airport is your personal retreat. You will have room to work, relax and make the most of your day. Amenities include free Wi-Fi access, free Parking, spacious workstations in all suites, free laundry and our Candlewood Cupboard offering you a great variety of items. The best of Miami is waiting for you at the Candlewood Suites Miami International Airport 36th Street where you will feel relaxed from the start.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: 1818 Meridian House
description: Guests at this apartment-style Miami Beach property can stroll through the garden or relax in the solarium. Iconic South Beach is 15 minutes’ walk away. Each apartment offers WiFi, a flat-screen TV, and a tablet computer. A small refrigerator and microwave are provided as well. A kitchen and dining area are featured in select apartments at 1818 Meridian House. An on-site launderette is available to all guests throughout their stay at this South Florida 1818 Meridian House. Bicycle use is free based on availability. Miami International Airport is 10 miles away. These apartments are opposite Miami Beach Convention Center and 9 minutes’ walk from upscale shopping at Lincoln Road Mall.

name: The Sagamore Hotel South Beach
description: This modern hotel in Miami Beach offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and an outdoor pool. It is conveniently located for those wanting to visit the area's popular attractions. This art deco hotel provides a range of amenities, including a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. The Sagamore Hotel has 101 rooms, all of which are filled with a variety of amenities to ensure an enjoyable stay. The Sagamore Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Canvas and Video Bar. A continental breakfast is served every day and room service is available for guests travelling at a more leisurely pace. A selection of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The Sagamore Hotel is also moments from the area's popular establishments, plus Lincoln Road is a 10-minute stroll away. It is also within walking distance of Miami City Ballet, Miami Beach Convention Center and the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation.Revato
