description: Tru By Hilton Miami Airport South Blue Lagoon, Fl has a fitness center, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Miami. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a grill. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, an ATM and free WiFi. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Certain rooms also offer a kitchenette with a microwave. All rooms feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play pool at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for golfing. A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Tru By Hilton Miami Airport South Blue Lagoon, Fl. University of Miami is 4.9 miles from the accommodation, while Marlins Park is 5.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 0.6 miles from Tru By Hilton Miami Airport South Blue Lagoon, Fl.

name: Sole Miami, A Noble House Resort
address: 17315 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: This oceanfront hotel features direct beach access, sea and pool view restaurant with a bar. Shopping, dining and entertainment at Miami Beach are 20 minute's drive away. Aventura Mall and Bal Harbor Shops are both within 3.7 mi of the property. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort hotel guest rooms are furnished with iPod docking stations and flat-screen cable TVs. Suites offer a seating area and all rooms include a private balcony. Sole' Miami, A Noble House Resort features an outdoor swimming pool with ocean views. Guests can also take advantage of the tour desk for help discovering the area. Miami Beach's historic Art Deco district, which offers unique shops and famous restaurants, is also close by. Oleta River State Park is 10 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Private Residences At Hotel Arya By Sofla Vacations
description: Located within the Sonesta Coconut Grove Hotel, the Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations offer a heated outdoor pool, hot tub, free WiFi, and free private on-site parking. Miami city center is 4.3 mi away. Every suite and apartment has a seating area and a dining table. Apartments have a full kitchen including an oven, stove, and dishwashwer. Ocean, skyline, and river views are available. Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations features a sauna, fully equipped fitness center, and 2 squash courts. A 24-hour front desk and room service are offered for convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal of continental and Peruvian specialties at either of the 2 on-site restaurants which overlook Coconut Grove and Sailboat Bay. CocoWalk with chic shopping venues is 3 minutes' away. Miami Beach is 8.1 mi from Private Residences at Sonesta by SoFLA Vacations, and the nearest airport, Miami Airport, is 5 mi from the property.

name: Crystal Beach Suites Miami Oceanfront Hotel
description: This Miami Beach, Florida hotel is 272 feet from the beach and 400 feet from the ocean. Features include an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi. A kitchenette, living room, and queen-size sofa bed are provided in each suite at Crystal Beach Suites Oceanfront Hotel. Premium suites include granite countertops and 2 larger flat-screen televisions. A laundry, ATM cash machine, and drink and snack vending machines are on site. Guests will also have access to a boarding pass computer and printer, luggage weight scale, and ice machines. This Miami Beach Crystal Beach Hotel is within a 10-minute drive of South Beach and Bal Harbour. Aventura Mall is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Extended Stay America Premier Suites - Miami - Airport - Miami Springs
description: The Extended Stay America Miami is 10 minutes’ drive from Miami International Airport and the Art Deco District is 12 miles away. This hotel has an outdoor pool. Free grab-and-go breakfast including breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee and tea is served every morning. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily provided for a fee. Towels and linen can be exchanged at the front desk. Every room is equipped with a kitchenette that includes a refrigerator and microwave. All rooms have bedding with colorful patterns, wood furnishings, and cable TV. A fitness center is on site at the Miami Springs Extended Stay as well as laundry facilities. Miami city center is 5 miles away and the beach is 15 minutes’ drive from this extended stay hotel. The Miami International Mall is less than 10 miles away.

name: Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach
description: Located in Miami Beach, these Florida apartments feature 2 outdoor heated pools and a fitness center. A full kitchen and free WiFi is provided in each apartment. Bayshore Golf Course is 3.6 mi away. A flat-screen cable TV, separate seating area, and hairdryer are provided. Some Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach apartments have a balcony with an ocean or bay view. A hot tub is available to guests at this Miami Beach Churchill Suite Monte Carlo Miami Beach property. Valet parking is provided on site for an additional fee. The Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.9 mi away. The property is also 4 mi from the Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts and 30 minutes’ drive from the Miami International Airport.

name: Bikini Lodge
description: Located in Miami Beach (South Beach), Bikini Lodge is a 3-minute walk from Flamingo Park and 12 minutes by foot from Lincoln Road Mall. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Colony Theater and 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Lummus Park Beach. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and dryers, and you can also request irons/ironing boards. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Flamingo Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi 8th Street Designer District - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Lincoln Road Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi Colony Theater - 1 km / 0.6 mi Española Way - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Miami Beach Marina - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Art Deco Historic District - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Collins Avenue Shopping Area - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi World Erotic Art Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi Ocean Drive - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Espanola Way and Washington Avenue - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Lummus Park Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi Miami Beach Beaches - 1.5 km / 1 mi Art Deco Welcome Center - 1.5 km / 1 mi Colony Hotel - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi The nearest airports are: Miami Intl. Airport (MIA) - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood Intl. Airport (FLL) - 45.3 km / 28.2 mi Miami, FL (MPB-Public Seaplane Base) - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi Miami, FL (OPF-Opa Locka Executive) - 33.5 km / 20.8 mi The preferred airport for Bikini Lodge is Miami Intl. Airport (MIA). Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and limited parking is available onsite. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as concierge services. Additional features at this hotel include gift shops/newsstands and a television in a common area. You can enjoy a meal at Bikini Cafe & Beer Garden serving the guests of Bikini Lodge, or stop in at the grocery/convenience store. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM. You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 20 per accommodation, per stay A damage deposit of USD 20 will be collected before check-in. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Late check-out fee: USD 20 (subject to availability) Credit card charges are subject to a surcharge The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. A car is not required for transportation to and from this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. The property is cleaned and disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; cashless payment methods are available for all transactions; contactless room service is available; masks are required in public areas. Enhanced food service safety measures are in place. This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (CDC).Sembo

name: Suites On South Beach
description: Located in Miami Beach, Florida, this hotel has suites with a microwave and refrigerator as well as free WiFi. It’s centrally located just 1 mi from Miami Beach Convention Center. A flat-screen cable TV is included in each room at Suites on South Beach. The bathroom is complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Select suites feature a full kitchenette. Reception for check-in is available between 3 PM to 11 PM at these Miami Beach Suites. Other offerings include luggage storage and dry cleaning. Shopping and dining at Lincoln Road Mall is 4 minutes’ drive from this hotel. Guests will be 3 minutes’ walk from Ocean Drive and the beach.

name: Beach Haus Bal Harbour
address: 290 Bal Bay Drive, Bal Harbour, FL 33154
description: Located in Bal Harbor Village, Beach Haus find this secluded three-story building with views of the Intracoastal waterway, an outdoor pool and a 5-minute walk to Bal Harbor beach where you will find daily service with chairs and umbrellas. Spacious units fully equipped with a kitchenette or kitchen create the perfect set-up for a retreat where you can relax while you get immersed in the luxury of Bal Harbor living. Experience chic shopping and a selection of dining options less than a mile away at Bal Harbor Shops. Visit Halouver or Oleta River parks to ride a bike, a kayak, or a boat.

name: Strand Ocean Drive Suites
description: Located 3 minutes' walk from the beach on Ocean Drive, this aparthotel features a rooftop pool with 360-degree ocean and city views. All newly renovated Strand Ocean Drive Suites buildings are opposite the beach. A kitchenette is included in each accommodations at OceanDriveVR newly renovated Suites and includes a microwave, refrigerator, and stovetop. Select rooms offer ocean views. Free WiFi is available. At this Art Deco District Miami Beach Strand newly renovated ocean Drive Suites you will find a bar. Other facilities like a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage are offered. A 24-hour front desk is available at the property. Concierge service is offered onsite. The restaurants and nightlife of South Beach are within walking distance from this hotel. Guests will be 0.8 mi from shopping at Lincoln Road Mall. The Miami International Airport is 14 mi away.

name: Casablanca -Kitchen, Pool, Beach-
description: Providing an outdoor swimming pool and with a direct access to the beach, CASABLANCA -Kitchen, Pool, Beach- is located in the North Beach district of Miami Beach, 328 feet from Miami Beach and 1.9 mi from Surfside Beach. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and paid private parking is available on site. Accommodations is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower and a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. Holocaust Memorial is 3.7 mi from CASABLANCA -Kitchen, Pool, Beach-, while Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.7 mi away. The nearest airport is Miami Seaplane Base Airport, 5.6 mi from the accommodations.

name: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Loews Miami Beach Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Loews Miami Beach Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Miami Beach (FL) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Crest Hotel Suites
description: Crest Hotel & Suites is a restored 3 Star boutique hotel with modern Art Deco design in South Beach, Miami. Its delicate coral-colored rock faade and large lobby with marble floors transport guests to another era, while its modern rooms invite you to relax and enjoy. Our amenities include a swimming pool, a vegan restaurant and an unbeatable location. Enjoy its close proximity to Miamis beaches and tourist destinations like Lincoln Road, the New World Center and the Convention Center.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Downtown/Seaport
description: The boutique style Residence Inn by Marriott® Boston Downtown/Seaport offers 120 suites style rooms with fully equipped kitchens. Located in the heart of Boston’s highly sought after Seaport District & walking distance to the harbor front, many restaurants, shopping, Boston Convention & Events Center, Boston’s financial district & many one-of-a-kind attractions. Start your day with a complimentary breakfast served in the hotel’s breakfast room or relax in the hotel’s lobby while enjoying the hotel’s unique architecture & history. Traveling on business? Enjoy access to a 24hrs business center, complimentary Wi-Fi & and in-room work desk. The hotel offers a private meeting space to accommodate up to 20 people comfortably & the hotel’s unique Atrium can accommodate up to 70 people for private functions. Regardless of the purpose of your trip, the Residence Inn by Marriott® Boston Downtown/Seaport is sure to please any discerning traveler.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Watertown
description: The Residence Inn is Watertown’s first all-suite hotel, across from Arsenal Yards and the Charles River, where Boston meets Cambridge. Our Watertown, MA, hotel boasts spacious studio, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Each suite includes a fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Guests enjoy free internet, and a free breakfast is provided daily to start mornings off right. Our on-site 24-hour fitness center will keep your routine in check. Our hotel is minutes from Cambridge’s Harvard Square and Harvard University, Perkins School for the Blind, Commander’s Mansion, MIT, Arsenal Yards, Athenahealth Campus and downtown Boston. Our extended stay in Watertown, MA, is conveniently located only 9 miles from Boston's Logan Airport, and we offer paid parking for $28 per day per vehicle.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai
description: In the heart of Worli, the business hub of India’s largest city, Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai creates a tranquil, chic haven filled with sincere Indian hospitality. The Four Seasons offers comfortable rooms offering sweeping views of the city. It has an outdoor pool, spa and fitness centre. The spacious air-conditioned rooms come with a DVD player, 42-inch LCD TV, an iPod docking station and a bar. The marble bathroom has a separate bathtub and walk-in shower. Guests at the Mumbai Four Seasons can enjoy the ice fountain or the steam bath and Ayurvedic treatments at the spa. The hotel offers a concierge, babysitting services, and an ATM. Spanning 2 floors, Asian restaurant San Qi has a wine bar and a menu offering Indian, Chinese and Japanese dishes. Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai is located in the Worli-Lower Parel commercial area. It is a 10-minute drive from Siddhivinayak Temple and a 15-minute drive from Shivaji Park.

name: Emporio Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Retorno Gucumatz Km 17 L49 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout and accommodation with terraces and views of the Caribbean Sea, Emporio Cancun is set on the beach in Cancún’s Hotel Zone. It has a picturesque setting between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupté Lagoon. Each air-conditioned room and suite has bright décor and tiled flooring. All accommodation at the Emporio Cancun has cable TV. Suites also come with a kitchen and a dining and seating area. San Miguelito Archaeological Site and the Cancún Maya Museum are located in front of the hotel.

name: Kassia Tulum, Boutique Hotel
address: 396 Calle Gama Ote. Colonia Huracanes, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Anah Suites Tulum by Sunest
address: Av Del Sol, Mz 22, Lt 1, Bahía Principe, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring air conditioning, Anah Suites Tulum by Sunest offers accommodation in Akumal. Xcacel-Xcacelito is 5 km away. The accommodation features a cable flat-screen TV. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with an oven. Towels and bed linen are provided. Anah Suites Tulum by Sunest also includes an outdoor pool, 24 hours securit and Shuttle to the Bahia Principe en Tulum Hootel The area is popular for golfing. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including snorkelling and diving. There is a public beach and private beach club accessible 5 km away. Kantenah Bay is 10 km from Anah Suites Tulum by Sunest. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from Anah Suites Tulum by Sunest.

name: Latino Hotel Boutique
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and views of the pool, Latino Hotel Boutique is set in the center of Tulum, only 500 meters from the Tulum bus station. Front desk is open from 7:00 am to 21:00 pm, yet late arrivals are welcomed. Terrace or a balcony in rooms are on the second level. Dine at local restaurants starting at only 50 metres from the property. Check in 3pm. Check out 11am.

name: Hotel Club Akumal Caribe
address: Carrete Puerto Juarez - Tulum Kilometro 104, 77500 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Situated on the coast of Akumal Bay, 45 minutes south of Playa del Carmen, this hotel offers hotel rooms and bungalows. It features an on-site spa, dive center, and restaurant. The accommodations at Hotel Akumal Caribe are equipped with air conditioning and a ceiling fan. A refrigerator and laptop safe box are also provided in all rooms. Snorkeling and fishing tours are available through the Akumal Diving Center, part of Hotel Club Akumal Caribe. A beach bar is available on site. The front desk is open from 07:00 to 22:00, and bicycle rentals are available. The archeological site Xelha is 25 minutes from the Akumal Caribe Hotel Club. The Xel-Ha Aquatic Theme Park is only 10 minutes from the property. Please note that Breakfast is not included for children. If you are travelling with kids, you must pay a fee for breakfast directly at the hotel.

name: Aquatech Villas Derosa Resort
address: Lot 36 And 37 Aventuras Akumal, 77737 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Aquatech Villas DeRosa Resort offers an outdoor pool, rooftop restaurant and rooms and beachfront condos with private balconies and Caribbean Sea views. It is 15 minutes from the Tulum Ruins. The rooms and condos provide cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The one to three-bedroom condos feature fully equipped kitchens and dining areas. They have one bathroom for each bedroom. Beach volleyball courts and a trampoline are available to guests at the Aquatech Villas. The resort has an Aquatech Dive Center and offers scuba diving instructions. Other water activities at the resort’s private beach include snorkeling and fishing. Aquatech Villas DeRosa is within a 20-minute drive of downtown Akumal and Hidden Worlds Cenotes Park.

name: Nah Uxibal Villa and Casitas
address: Soliman Bay, Tulum, 88870 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from Soliman Bay Beach, Nah Uxibal Villa and Casitas features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the various facilities of this property are water sports facilities, a private beach area and barbecue facilities. The resort also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. At the resort, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. The rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms also boast a kitchen fitted with a microwave. At Nah Uxibal Villa and Casitas each room has bed linen and towels. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 15 km from Nah Uxibal Villa and Casitas, while Xel Ha is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 67 km from the resort.

name: Pepem Holistic Experience - Adults Only
address: Carr. Cancún - Tulum, Cenotes Sac Actun, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: With pool views, Pepem Holistic Experience - Adults Only is located in Tulum and has a restaurant, a tour desk, bar, garden, outdoor pool and terrace. The villa features both WiFi and private parking free of charge. All units come with a patio with garden views, a kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower. If you would like to discover the area, hiking, snorkelling and cycling are possible in the surroundings. Tulum Archeological Site is 16 km from the accommodation, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 70 km from Pepem Holistic Experience - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Casa Finlandia
description: No description found

name: Banyan Tree Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Live a unique experience in an exclusive resort in the Riviera Maya, Banyan Tree Mayakoba Triple AAA 5 Diamond resort has private villas with swimming pools surrounded by vegetation offering you a stay of luxury and harmony. Diamond resort, because we believe in our mission: to offer you the most memorable vacations of your life and a simply unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: The Elements Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: Avenida Flamingo & Calle 46, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Moments from the Caribbean Sea and ancient ruins in Playa del Carmen, this property is surrounded by lush vegetation and offers fully furnished condos with fully equipped kitchens and ocean views. The Elements features a private beach, beach club and spacious outdoor pool. Guests will also enjoy the fully equipped fitness center and an on-site business center, both with ocean views. The one and 2 and 3 bedroom condos at the Elements offer flat-screen TVs and high-count linens. After a busy day, guests can relax on their private terrace or enjoy the evening breeze from the living room.

name: Impression Moxché by Secrets
address: Carr Tulum Playa Del Carmen km 294, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 11 km from ADO International Bus Station and 11 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, the property provides a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Gran Sahara
address: AV. 15 Calle 8, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a casino, Gran SAHARA is situated in Playa del Carmen, 1.1 km from ADO International Bus Station. Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and around 1.4 km from Kool Beach Club. The property is located 1.6 km from Disabled-friendly beach and 3 km from Church of Guadalupe. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The restaurant at Gran SAHARA serves Italian cuisine. The accommodation offers a terrace. Speaking both English and Spanish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Quinta Alegria Shopping Mall is 700 metres from Gran SAHARA. Cancun International Airport is 55 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Playa Condo Hotel and Beach Club
address: 1 Avenida Norte Esquina 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and a freezer.Expedia

name: Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel
address: Av 10 Esquina Calle 44, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located a short walk from Terminal Foranea de Autobuses Station, Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Playa del Carmen. It also provides an outdoor pool, massage services and an express check-in and check-out feature. The hotel boasts a range of recreational amenities and services, including a bike trail, bicycle rental and Rooftop Pool. For families Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel offers babysitting/child services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a coffee maker, a refrigerator and an iPod docking station. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room dining area, a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel is close to shops, dining and Playa del Carmen's nightlife. Xcaret Eco Theme Park and Xcaret Archaeological Site are just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Maya Villa Condo Hotel and Beachclub
address: 1 Avenida Norte Entre Calle 14 Norte y 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This Maya Villa Condo Hotel is located on Playa del Carmen Q Roo, Mexico within walking distance to the Beach and features free Wi-Fi in all areas. The Maya Villa Condo Hotel is decorated with Mayan art and offers access to the beach club and fitness centre. All the condos have a unique combination of modern luxury and Mayan style, as well as modern kitchens. This Maya Villa Condo Hotel also offers access to the restaurants and the modern scuba shop. Laundry service is available with an extra charge. Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges. One bedroom condos don't allow extra person. Please note that the rate does not include 16% and 5% taxes.

name: The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive
address: Predio El Limonar Fraccion 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Facing the beachfront, The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive offers 5-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen and features a garden, terrace and restaurant. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The resort provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the resort, every room comes with a wardrobe. Each room has air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive have a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Playa del Carmen Beach is a few steps from the accommodation, while Mayakoba Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 42 km from The Fives Beach Hotel & Residences - All Senses Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Playa del Carmen
address: Retorno 50 Avenida Sur, Carretera 307 Cancun Tulum Chetumal Cancun, Solidaridad, 77717 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently located in the heart of Riviera Maya, the Residence Inn Playa del Carmen offers easy access to all major business and leisure hubs. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. Our 149 stylish fully furnished studios, one-bedroom, two-bedroom suites feature fully equipped kitchens along with flexible space to work and live. Our complimentary breakfast making it easy to start every morning just the way you like it. The Market in the lobby is open 24h a day to grab a snack and satisfy your cravings day or night. Want to try out a new recipe in the comfort of your home? Why not use our complimentary grocery delivery service. To balance work and play, relax by the pool overlooking the golf course or make it your office for the day. At our hotel in Playa del Carmen, Mexico, you can work out on your terms without constraints at our gym or using our curated RI Runs Routes on MapMyFitness. Pets are allowed at our hotel too!Marriott

name: Quinta Margarita Boho Chic Hotel
address: Calle 32 Norte 124, Entre 5ta y 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Quinta Margarita Boho Chic Hotel is a small, hip, boutique hotel steps from many attractions in town. Our location is premium. You will find shops, restaurants, bars, with great atmosphere, nice designs and some of them with live music; therefore you might experience some music or noise coming from these places. Our property is a 4 floors building, and we do not have an elevator. We have a wonderful pool terrace right at our roof garden. We do not have a private parking lot at our facilities, however to park close to us is really easy, please consider the city charges 10 pesos per hour to park on the public street. We are sure you will enjoy our premium location as much as all of our guests, with the different activities you will find walking distance from us. If you have questions or need more information regarding these matters, please do not hesitate to reach out. Guest service attention from 8:00 to 22:00 hours.

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: The Royal Haciendas All Suites Resort & Spa
address: Km 289 Carretera Federal Chetumal - Puerto Juarez Lote 2 Mz 70, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located next to the beach on the Mayan Riviera, the Royal Haciendas Resort & Spa offers luxury suites set in tropical gardens. The complex offers swimming pools, tennis courts and a free shuttle to Playa del Carmen. All accommodations have free Wi-Fi, and many suites have a seating area with a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some also have wonderful ocean views. All reservations include two complimentary tickets for the Cancun Mayan Museum. Transportation not included. The Royal Haciendas complex has a spa and wellness centre with Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. The beach next to the complex offers loungers and parasols. The Hacienda complex offers activities including diving. Nearby Playa del Carmen offers a good range of shops, bars and restaurants, as well as beautiful natural surroundings. Cancun International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Villas Sacbe Condo Hotel and Beach Club
address: 1st Norte Between 12 And 14 Streets, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in lush gardens, Villas Sacbe Condo Hotel and Beach Club offers an outdoor pool, access to a gym, beach club and spa. It is located just steps from the popular 12th street, which boasts nightlife and restaurants. Villas Sacbe apartments are elegantly decorated and feature fully equipped kitchenettes, seating and dining areas, a cable TV. The penthouse has its own private plunge pool. This property is just 150 meters from the popular 5th Avenue, where most of the shops, bars, restaurants and nightlife of Playa del Carmen are found. Free private parking is possible on site, and Wi-Fi connection is available for free. Villas Sacbe also offers additional services with extra cost, including laundry, airport shuttle and babysitting.

name: Casa Gem B&B
address: Av Diagonal 80 Sur Lte 17, 77712 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 3 guestrooms featuring espresso makers and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. This bed & breakfast also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). The complimentary shuttle will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A cruise ship terminal shuttle is provided at no charge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Playa del Carmen, Casa Gem B&B is by the ocean, within a 10-minute drive of Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and Xplor Theme Park. This beach bed & breakfast is 2.5 mi (4.1 km) from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Playacar Golf Club. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the bed & breakfast's coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to noon. name: Acanto Playa del Carmen, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: 16th Street, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: A Peaceful Oasis in Playa del Carmen Steps from 5th Avenue, beautiful beaches, and exciting nightlife Welcome to Acanto Playa del Carmen, Trademark Collection by Wyndham offering easy access to 5th Avenue restaurants, bars, and stores. Just steps from the glistening shores of Riviera Maya, this hotel puts you close to lively beach clubs and Xcaret Eco Park, plus shopping at Quinta Alegria and the interactive 3D Museum of Wonders. You can plan a day trip to see Tulums Mayan ruins or visit the island of Cozumel for scuba diving. Plus, Cancun International Airport is 55 kilometers away. During your stay, enjoy free breakfast and unwind at the outdoor pool or on the rooftop boasting ocean views.Wyndham

name: Ocean Zen Suites on 5th Avenue - Adults Only
address: Quinta Avenida (5a) Calle 68 y 70, 77728 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Ocean Zen Suites - Eco Luxury Hotel Suites with amazing roof top infinity pool with views of the Turquoise blue waters of the Mexican Caribbean over lush green trees. Punta Esmeralda, Clean powdery sandy quiet beaches and turquoise waters are less than 400 meters away or less than 5 minutes stroll. Yes, we are located on peaceful and quiet famous NEW Quinta (5th Avenue), away from the Noisy bars. Neighborhood local restaurants, Fruit/Vegetable market and 24-Hour store are less than 5 minutes’ walk. Relax on the roof top terrace infinity pool area, watching the amazing sunrise or lay in the sunbeds at night gazing at the moon and stars and feeling the cool breeze. We are an Eco-Friendly Boutique hotel, AC units at Ocean Zen suites are Solar powered. Hot water tanks are European design with hot water on demand. FREE- Harvested and Purified RAIN WATER supplied to OCEAN ZEN SUITES by RAIN-HA, tested by Mexican Government Authority Labs. Please bring your own bottle (BYOB) for FREE Refills of Pure Rain water. No acid rain, No chemicals. Modern bathroom with, water saving showers and toilets. Shampoo, Body wash, Conditioner and hand soap are all naturally made from pure honey by Mayans from Mayans Village. Each of Suite has FREE Premium Internet, with direct connect and your own FREE WIFI allocated to that Suite. FREE WIFI by the Infinity pool and all common area. Our Eco- Luxury Suites are ergonomically designed for your comfort. Combination decor and atmosphere with modern Eco technology. All beds, patio and pool furniture are hand made by Mayans with local solid hard wood. Come stay with us experience Ocean Zen Suits -where Eco Luxury meets Serenity.

name: Nasim Condo Hotel Playa Del Carmen
address: Calle 34 Norte Esquina Avenida 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: We are on North 34th Street and 10th Avenue, meters from Fifth Avenue and the beach. They are around, restaurants, bars and nightlife nearby. The building has a beautiful pool. Each of our condos has high speed internet, smart TV, coffee maker, beach towels, and everything you need for a comfortable stay. MANDARINO BEACH CLUB FREE ACCESS; Guests can enjoy the facilities of the Mandarino Beach Club beach club just 10 minutes walk from the Condominium. CHEDRAUI SELECT with restaurants around, it is located in front of our condominium, it is the only supermarket in the area. EXCURSIONS to the parks leave in front of the condo. MARIO VILLANUEVA SPORTS CLUB, is located in front of the condominium, where you can do free sports activities. PARKING 15 meters from the accommodation, payment. CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST at our Negroamaro restaurant 3 minutes from the Condominium (optional) The price of the reservation per room does not include the cleaning service (ask at reception). In case the person needs a daily cleaning service, they must pay a daily additional cleaning day, depending on the season (ask at reception).

name: Hilton Playa Del Carmen Adult Only Resort
address: Av. Constituyentes No. 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located 55.5km away from Cancun International Airport. Major attractions near the location include Xplor Park (8.5km), Xcaret Park (10km) and Rio Secreto (19km). Facilities and amenities include bar, concierge facilities, free Wi-Fi, gym/fitness facilities, lounge area, restaurant, sauna and spa facilities. Rooms feature Wi-Fi, room service, mini bar/fridge, TV, safe in room, telephone, air conditioning, tea/cofee maker, hairdryer, balcony/terrace and radio. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Avenida Constituyentes 2 Gonzalo Guerrero, 77710 Playa del Carmen Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Riviera Maya Suites
address: Calle 32 Norte Y 1Era Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by landscaped gardens in a great location near Playa del Carmen's famous beach and 5th Avenue, this property offers fully furnished 2 and 3-bedroom apartments. The apartments at Riviera Maya feature fully equipped kitchens with dinnerware and cooking utensils. There is also a laundry room that offers a washer and dryer. After a busy day, guests can relax on their private balcony in the hammock. Additional activities such as scuba diving, snorkeling and sport fishing are available only steps from the property.

name: Suites Fenicia
address: 30 Av. Norte, Calle 46 Norte Zazil Ha, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304
address: 1a. Av. Nte. calle 10 Norte C. 10 y Z. Federal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 700 metres from the centre of Playa del Carmen, 700 metres from Playacar Beach, Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304 features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, an infinity pool and a fitness centre. Complimentary WiFi is provided. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Guests can also relax in the garden. ADO International Bus Station is 600 metres from the aparthotel, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304.

name: Fabiola Condo Hotel
address: Calle 10 Bis, Entre 15 y 20, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Playa del Carmen Beach, Fabiola Condo Hotel offers an outdoor pool and hot tub, surrounded by palm trees. Each air-conditioned apartment and studio has free Wi-Fi and a kitchenette. Brightly decorated, Fabiola’s studios and apartments feature cable TV and a private bathroom. Kitchenettes include a microwave, hob, and coffee maker. Apartments also have a balcony overlooking the street. The complex is situated in the centre of Playa del Carmen, just 2 blocks from lively Fifth Avenue. You can find a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk. Free private parking is available at the Fabiola. Cancún Airport is a 45-minute drive away, and staff at reception can arrange airport transfers at an extra cost.

name: Aldea Thai by Mistik Vacation Rentals
address: Cozumel Av Lot 81 between 28 and 26 st, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This condominium is a short walk from Mamita's Beach Club and Fifth Avenue. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool with a bar and free on-site parking. Aldea Thai features a TV and DVD player in every suite. Designer bath amenities and a safety deposit box are also included. Some suites offer a full kitchen and separate living room. Cancun International Airport is a 45 minute drive from Thai Aldea. Archaeological sites including Tulum and Chichen Itza are within driving distance of the Condominium. Please note that 5% of the total accommodation will be charged at the time of issuing refunds for administrative expenses.

name: Cocos Cabañas Playa del Carmen Adults Only
address: Xcalacoco Lote 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Cocos Cabañas Playa del Carmen Adults Only are a 2 minutes' walk from Xcalacoco Beach. Cocos Cabañas Playa del Carmen Adults Only offers a daily continental breakfast and an outdoor swimming pool. All bungalows are air-conditioned, have ceiling fans, and an iPod docking station. Beach club access is provided as well. The bungalows are built in a typical local style with thatched roofs made of dried and woven palm-tree leaves. They all have tiled flooring and bathrooms with a shower or bath. Cocos Cabañas Playa del Carmen Adults Only offers both Mexican and international cuisine, including pizzas made in Cocos’ wood-fired oven, and a range of Mexican appetizers such as guacamole, ceviche, or quesadillas. Guests can relax in the sun loungers or hammocks by the pool, go snorkelling, or explore some of the nearby Mayan ruins, including Tulum or Chichen Itza. Ferries to the island of Cozumel leave from Playa del Carmen, and the trip is about 45 minutes' long.

name: Antera Hotel & Residences
address: Avenida 10 Norte Esquina Calle 6, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Playa del Carmen, 300 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, Antera Hotel & Residences features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Antera Hotel & Residences offers an American or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 34 km from Antera Hotel & Residences, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Paradisus La Perla – Adults Only
address: 5ta Avenida, Esquina Calle 112, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in a stunning little bay, the hotel is within walking distance of beaches and Playa del Carmen town centre. There is a plethora of attractions in the vicinity and the hotel is also close to famous Mayan archaeological sites such as Tulum, Chichen Itza and Coba. Paradisus La Perla Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor pool and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant Free private parking is available on site. Room Service – Included. Service charge of $5 usd per delivery applies. Royal Service categories will have the service included with no extra fee. A supplement applies to book Bali Beds located at La Perla or La Esmeralda swimming pool area.FarePortal

name: La Divina by Aldea Thai
address: Av. Cozumel Mz.81 Lt. 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This elegant and sophisticated property set in Playa del Carmen offers an outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi access, and is located only 160 metres from vibrant 5th Avenue and 10 metres from the white-sand beaches of the Caribbean. The spacious and comfortable apartments have a modern décor and feature balconies offering partial ocean view, flat-screen TVs, cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen, plus seating and dining areas. Toiletries are provided within the bathrooms with showers. The penthouse apartments feature roof top terraces with private plunge pools. Popular 5th Avenue offers a wide variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife entertainment. Also, Mamitas Beach Club, Kool Beach Club & Coralina are located in front of the property. The friendly staff at La Divina by Aldea Thai can help the guests with information about interesting touristic spots, like Tulum Archaeological Site, or Xcaret Nature Park, both reachable in 45 minutes and 15 minutes’ drive respectively. Activities like scuba diving, golf and snorkelling can be arranged, extra fees might be applicable.

name: El Taj Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: 1 Norte Esquina Calle 14 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens next to Playa del Carmen Beach, these luxury suites offer access to an infinity pool, outdoor hot tub and spa. Guests enjoy free access to the beach club. Suites at El Taj Oceanfront Condo Hotel offer a large terrace. El Taj property is composed by two buildings. Oceanfront suites offer sea views and direct beach access, while Beachside suites overlook the pool, fish pond and gardens. Each spacious suite has elegant Bali-inspired décor and a typical palapa thatched roof. A Smart TV and modern kitchen are included. Gourmet cuisine is served in El Taj Condo’s ASI restaurant, while pizzas, snacks and drinks are available in the beach bar. You can also request a private chef to prepare meals in your suite. El Taj is situated in central Playa del Carmen, just 2 blocks from Fifth Avenue. This popular boulevard is home to boutiques, pavement cafés, bars and restaurants.

name: Fairmont Mayakoba, Riviera Maya
address: Ctr. Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen KM. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, this beachfront property is in the entertainment district, 0.3 mi (0.5 km) from El Camaleon Mayakoba Golf Course, and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Tres Rios Ecopark. Mamitas Beach Club and Playa del Carmen Main Beach are also within 6 mi (10 km).Expedia

name: Eurostars Hacienda Vista Real
address: Paseo Chichen Itza Retorno 3 Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Eurostars Hacienda Vista Real is an elegant property located in Playa del Carmen. The facility offers tropical gardens, lakes and a golf course within the Playacar gated community. The passengers ferry to Cozumel is located 12 minutes' drive away. The accommodation resembles an old Mexican hacienda boasting a typical Yucatan style. Guests will enjoy of an outdoor pool, and of a restaurant set by the pool area which specializes in typical Mexican dishes like fajitas, guacamole and chilaquiles. There is also a spa-treatment facility that guests can enjoy. Guests will be able to explore the popular touristic spots located near Eurostars Hacienda Vista real, like Xcaret Eco-Theme Park located 15 minutes' drive away, or stroll around vibrant 5th Avenue, which offers shopping malls, restaurants, bars and local art crafts shops. Cancun can be reached in a 45-minute drive.

name: Paseo del Sol Condohotel by Bric
address: Avenida Xaman-Ha Mz. 12 LT.4 y 5, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxury apartment complex is situated in a private gated community in the heart of Playa del Carmen, Mexico. This property provides exceptional accommodation in an unforgettable location. Guests can enjoy a variety of water activities as well as top-rated golfing at the nearby golf course. The city centre, filled with shops, restaurants and entertainment is also nearby. Every guest can feel at home when at the Paseo del Sol Condominios. Each private apartment is uniquely decorated and furnished with a fully-equipped kitchen. Guests can also enjoy a variety of facilities, including a barbecue area and a swimming pool.

name: Pueblito Escondido Luxury Condo Hotel
address: Av. 38 Norte Col. Centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself comfortable in this air-conditioned apartment, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. There's a private balcony. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and a flat-screen television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a microwave. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. Business}, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at this apartment in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be a 5-minute walk from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and 11 minutes by foot from Quinta Avenida. This apartment is 6.9 mi (11.1 km) from Xcaret Eco Theme Park and 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Mamitas Beach. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 250 per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 10:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards There is no front desk at this property. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available No elevators Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos
address: Corredor Turístico Sjc-Csl, KM. 10 Lote D, Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos Resort, a stunning architectural masterpiece with a classic Mexican Hacienda flair. Elegant guest villas with balconies are scattered across lush, tropical gardens overlooking a private beach on the Emerald Sea of Cortez. Enjoy a seamless blend of traditional Mexican charm and contemporary style with exceptional service unlike anywhere else. Situated in the prestigious Cabo del Sol development, the resort features 270 guest rooms and suites, the restorative Cactus SPA™, a fitness center with a steam room and sauna, a variety of restaurants to choose from, evening entertainment, and sparkling pools that create an atmosphere of pure indulgence. For timeless celebrations, our planners can assist in an unforgettable beach wedding or ballroom gathering, curated in every way.Marriott

name: Esperanza, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on the coast of the Pacific Ocean, this luxury resort is 19 km from downtown Los Cabos. It features a beachfront infinity pool, spa boutique, and free yoga sessions. Each spacious cabana-style room at the Cabo San Lucas Esperanza Resort is furnished with high ceilings and a large, private terrace. Guests can watch the flat-screen TV, use the free Wi-Fi, or charge their iPod with the iPod docking station. This resort boasts a private beach with concierge services. There is a large state-of-the-art gym and an on-site art gallery. Cocina del Mar, part of the resort, is carved into the cliffs overlooking the ocean and serves Baja-inspired cuisine. La Terraza Americana is open for lunch and offers American dishes in a casual outdoor atmosphere. The infinity pool has a swim-up bar. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 14.2 km from Esperanza Resort Cabo San Lucas. Downtown San José del Cabo is a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: Montage Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 12.5 Int, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 2.6 km from Medano Beach, Montage Los Cabos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation offers a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area, as well as a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Dairy-free, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Montage Los Cabos offers a hot tub. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Cabo San Lucas is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from Montage Los Cabos.

name: Dreams Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Transpenisular 18.5 Cls-Sjc, 23400 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located 2.6-miles from Chileno Beach, this Los Cabos resort features a full-service spa. Three sparkling pools and yoga on the beach are offered along with ocean views from every suite. This all-suite Dream Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa features suites with a private terrace overlooking the ocean. Each suite includes a stocked minibar and iPod docking station. The marble bathrooms boast separate bathtubs and showers with slippers and bathrobes provided. On-site dining includes steaks, seafood, Pan Asian and more. Guests at Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort can also choose from a la carte items and buffets. Room service is available as well. Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort & Spa offers tennis clinics, cooking classes and cocktail lessons. A seasonal turtle release event allows guests to participate in helping the Caray Green Sea Turtles.

name: Live Aqua Private Residences Los Cabos
address: Carr. Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Discover a luxurious paradise nestled within the exclusive oceanfront community of Cabo del Sol. Overlooking the marvelous deep blue waters of the Sea of Corts, the fifth fairway of The Ocean Golf Course designed by Jack Nicklaus and the magnificent beauty of the Baja California Desert, these 35 stunning vacation residences are custom designed with high-end interior and exterior finishes to offer an experience that will likely instill a yearning to return year after year. Live Aqua Private Residence Los Cabos unveiled its multimillion-dollar concept in Fall 2017 to overindulge the senses. Fine dining, a relaxing pool atmosphere, premier beach access, exceptional personalized service and world-class golf just 5 minutes away will surely become the new standard for your family getaways.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 36.31 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Los Cabos, Baja California Sur.iHotelier/iStay

name: Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort
address: Callejon Pescador South N, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This Cabo San Lucas hotel is located along Cabo Bay on Medano Beach. The hotel offers a full-service spa, on-site dining options and guest suites with ocean views, subject to availability. Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort features 2 outdoor pools, including one that is for adults only. A modern fitness centre free of charge is also available on-site. The property features a state of the art wireless connection system that allows to have high-speed WiFi and unlimited services like messages, phone calls and a virtual phone number connection. Guest rooms at the Cabo Villas Beach are equipped with flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Microwaves and mini-refrigerators are also included. Guests can dine at the Baja Brewing Rooftop Restaurant, Aleta Seafood Bar & Grillt or at the Beach Club.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations Club La Pacifica Los Cabos
address: Mexico 1 Tourist Corridor, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: We are on the shore of Los Cabos between the towns of San Jose del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas. Cabo Real and El Dorado golf clubs are under 10 minutes away. Take a dip in our infinity pool or our Dolphin Terrace pool overlooking the Sea of Cortes. Indulge in massage, salon or beauty treatments at our spa.Hilton

name: Zadun-A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Zadún, the first Ritz-Carlton Reserve in Mexico where an authentic and magical experience awaits you. Our resort in San José del Cabo offers an untouched sanctum where desert and ocean collide — in your very own luxurious haven. Allow yourself to be seduced by Puerto Los Cabos, its breathtaking coastline, and a rich culture that will enchant you at every breath. Discover and explore a town with a historical charm and submerged in Spanish colonial flare. A very modern design Mexico has to offer, coupled with the handcrafted work of local artisans, will lay a magical and compelling experience at your feet. With every step you take inside Zadún, you’ll be surrounded by a natural allure and elegance unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Give in to the intimacy of our San José del Cabo hotel hideaway that you can claim as your own, reserved just for you at the end of the Earth.Marriott

name: Cabo Surf Hotel & Spa
address: Transpeninsular Highway km 28, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Only 10 minutes’ drive from central San Jose del Cabo, this hotel is located in one of the most popular surfing beaches of the region. It also has spa facilities, outdoor pool and hot tub. The accommodations at Cabo Surf Hotel feature light décor and wooden furniture, plus they include amenities like iPod dockings, flat-screen cable TVs and bathrobes. The bathroom offers luxury brand toiletries and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi connection is also available throughout. The 7 Seas Restaurant serves Mexican and Mediterranean dishes and operates from 07:00 until 22:00 hours. Within 2 km from Cabo Surf, guests will be able to find other food options, which include an Asian-style and salad restaurants. Popular activities that can be performed at Cabo Surf are diving, windsurfing and surfing. The front desk staff may also help the guests with popular sightseeing options. In Cabo San Lucas guests will find several golf courses and is 25 minutes’ drive from the property. Los Cabos International Airport is 23 km away.

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas - Baja Point
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 22.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Get away to The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas – Baja Point. Our oceanfront vacation ownership resort places you along the bustling resort corridor where you can immerse in the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. While here, plan to scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at nearby Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve or tee off at nearby golf courses. Take a day trip to the famous Los Cabos Arch and after your day of exploring, schedule a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomí or take a swim at our outdoor infinity pool. For our littlest visitors to Mexico, the Westin Kids Club sparks a true vacation adventure. Feel recharged after a brisk run or strength training session in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. Dine on-site at any of our six restaurants and bars, offering international cuisines and a sports bar. Enjoy relaxing in your spacious villa or guest room rental with complimentary Wi-Fi. Catch spectacular sunsets over Los Cabos at our scenic resort every day of your stay.Marriott

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas
address: Carretera Transpenninsular Km 22.5, 23440 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the ultimate wellness retreat in Los Cabos at The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas. Situated by the Pacific Ocean and the Sea of Cortez, our family-friendly vacation ownership resort places you steps from the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. Scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at the Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve and tee off on the rolling greens of nearby golf courses. After sightseeing at the famous Los Cabos Arch, return for a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomi. Our outdoor infinity pool, a 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and a Westin Kids Club activate your vacation in Mexico. Fuel up at our six on-site restaurants and bars that serve a variety of international cuisine or join friends for the big game and a craft brew at our sports bar. As the sun sets on Los Cabos, settle into your comfortable studio or spacious villa accommodations with complimentary Wi-Fi. Escape to our relaxing seaside resort.Marriott

name: La Marina Inn
address: Calle Los Pescadores, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in San José del Cabo, 200 metres from La Playita, La Marina Inn offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and dry cleaning services. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. La Playita Beach is 2.5 km from La Marina Inn, while Puerto Los Cabos is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Posada Señor Mañana
address: Alvaro Obregon No. 1, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located just 50 metres from the San José del Cabo art district and the city’s Main Square, Hotel Posada Señor Mañana has a tropical garden with hammocks and a cafeteria that serves Mexican dishes. The comfortable rooms have fans and a private bathroom with shower. Hotel Posada Señor Mañana also offers BBQ facilities, laundry services, and has a library. Wi-fi access is available and the property features a shared lounge area with a TV and an equipped kitchen. Guests can rent bicycles, kayaks, surfboards and snorkels. Playa Bocona beach is 15 minutes’ walk from the property, and Los Cabos International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Palmas De Cortez
address: Calle 20 de Noviembre # 2, 23330 Los Barriles, Baja California Sur
description: Offering spa service, a gym, swimming pool, on-site windsurfing and tennis courts, Hotel Palmas de Cortez is located right on Los Barriles Beach. Buena Vista Beach is less than 4 km away. The accommodation offers contemporary décor, air conditioning, ceiling fan, telephone and TV. The private bathrooms feature shower and include free toiletries. This complex features a restaurant serving international food and Mexican-style cuisine. There are also a swim-up bar, a pool-side bar and a lounge bar on site. Guests at Hotel Palmas de Cortez can arrange activities as eco-tours, fishing, kayaking, paddle boards and ATV rentals. There is also a playground area, children’s pool and tennis court. Events facilities as conference rooms, meeting rooms, exhibit spaces and banquets facilities are also available as well shuttle services with an extra charge. This property is 500 metres from the ExotiKite Kiteboarding School. Santiago Zoo is 23 km away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 50-minute drive away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 24.8, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos is conveniently located between San Jose Del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas, offering easy access to all of the area attractions. This intimate hotel is a great choice for being close to scenic beaches, award-winning golf courses, fishing, surfing plus great shopping and nightlife. Located near the new tollway, our Los Cabos hotel also offers easy access to the airport. Settle into your spacious guest room or suite and enjoy free hot breakfast buffet daily from 6:00am to 10:00am. Each room includes a clean and fresh Hampton bed™, free WiFi and refrigerator. Many rooms feature kitchenettes and sofa sleepers, perfect for families. Pamper yourself in the bathroom with a Waterpik® showerhead and Purity Basics® bath products. Enjoy extra space and amenities in our deluxe rooms with great views and authentic décor. Our Los Cabos hotel is part of the Koral Center that features new ABC hospital, restaurants, shops and more all within one roof for your convenience. Inside the hotel visit our Wellness Center and Spa, unwind in the rooftop pool or whirlpool, and try some intricate cocktail creations in the rooftop Palapa Bar while admiring views of the ocean and mountains. Hampton by Hilton Las Cabos offers a pristine location for banquets and weddings with 1,500 sq. ft. of meeting space accommodating up to 60 guests. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you with all of the world class service and hospitality.Hilton

name: The Club at Solaz
address: Corredor Turístico Csl-Sjc Km. 18.5, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Magnificent beach front resort located on the Tourist Corridor between the golden of the Baja California desert and the turquoise waters of the Sea of Cortez. Designed by Sordo Madaleno Architects to create a sculpture integrated to the landscape with ocean views from all areas of the resort.A nature-inspired refuge that is meant to bring balance, harmony and freedom to those who step inside and combines Mexican contemporary style with modern sophistication and exclusivity, that provides luxury and comfort of modernity merging in perfect tune with nature.Quarry stone, granite, marble, wood, and textures harmonize to establish an intimate bond between the complex and its location.Landscaped by Jernimo Gabayet; the selection consists of a mixture of trees, bushes and flowers of endemic and exotic origin. Together paint a grandiose atmosphere full of life and color, providing the surroundings with the natural beauty that can only come from the earth and keep our guests in touch with the Baja California Surs unique wonders.Immaculate and refined art from the renowned Mexican artist Csar Lpez Negrete, whos challenge was to make our guests to be able to remember Solaz Los Cabos through its art collection that consists of 772 pieces displayed throughout the property and longing to return time after time.iHotelier/iStay

name: Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos
address: Retorno Playa Añuiti No. 27, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool a furnished terrace, Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos is located 700 metres from Gulf of California Beach and 3 km from Plaza Italia Square. The modern rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom is private and has a shower and free toiletries. Rooms also have garden views. The Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos has a restaurant with regional food and a bar with Mexican beverage. Room service is available. The guests can sunbathe on the furnished terrace and enjoy activities like cycling, diving, fishing and snorkelling. This Park Royal is 5 minutes’ drive from San Jose Main Square and 700 metres from Las Palmas Park. The Hotels Zone is 3 minutes' drive away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Camino Viejo A San Jose Km 0.5, Col. Playa El Meda, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located on the Gulf of California, features suites with balconies and fully equipped kitchens. It offers two pools, a waterslide and three restaurants. Suites provide dining areas, minibars and seating areas with sofa beds. They also include satellite TV and safety deposit boxes. Wi-Fi is available. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features a private beach area along with tennis, a gym and business center are available to guests. The on-site Las Tortugas Restaurant Cabo features musical shows and theatrical productions. The resort provides babysitting and car rentals and has a convenience store and tour desk. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located in Baja California Sur, Mexico, is within 3 miles of Cabo Sailing and Cabo San Lucas Country Club. It is 20 miles from Casa Dahlia Art Gallery.

name: Quivira Los Cabos Condos & Homes - Vacation Rentals
address: Quivira Los Cabos 1, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Just a short distance from scuba diving, this smoke-free villa lets you experience it all. Jump into your car and make short work of the 4-minute drive to Quivira Golf Club or the 6-minute drive to Puerto Paraiso Mall (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). Spend a day at the nearby private beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink at the poolside bar of this villa, which also features a garden. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This vacation rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Krystal Grand Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 29, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in San Jose Del Cabo. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Mariamar Suites
address: Calle Marea Alta N.1 Col Costa Azul, 23406 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located among the Club Campestre San José and Querencia Golf Club in San José del Cabo, this property features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. Complimentary breakfast is included. The suite at MariaMar Suites has a balcony overlooking the Gulf of California, a dining area and cable TV. It also features a minibar, a coffee maker and a microwave oven. The bathroom has a shower and is private. Guests will receive free breakfast included. La Roca Beach, and Acapulquito Beach, both well known as ideal surfing sites, are 15 minutes’ walk from MariaMar Suites, and Costazul gazebo is only 10 minutes’ walk away. Costa Azul Beach is located right across from the hotel. Los Cabos International Airport is 9.6 km from the suites. San José del Cabo town centre is 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Santa Maria del Cabo
address: Paseo de Los Cabos 148, 23407 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located 500 metres from Las Mañanitas Beach, this modern hotel offers an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms feature free Wi-Fi and balconies with views of San José Golf Course and the beach. All rooms at Hotel Santa Maria del Cabo have flat-screen cable TV and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The hotel has 24-hour reception and offers a laundry service and massage. You can hire a car and free parking is available.

name: Zoetry Casa del Mar Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur

name: The ultimate sailing yacht vacation in the Sea of Cortez. Jersey Girl II
description: Our passion is sharing this magnificent place, the Sea of Cortez, with our friends, old and new. We invite one and all to come, explore and enjoy what Jacques Cousteau called “the world’s aquarium”. “Jersey Girl” is one of the largest, best equipped and most comfortable yachts available for charter in the Sea of Cortez. We truly enjoy sharing this amazing place, and our past guests agree, there is no better way to experience it than on the water onboard Jersey Girl. Come let us sail you away to some of the most beautiful and tranquil beaches and bays anywhere on earth. Often, we are accompanied by playful pods of dolphins, rays jumping for joy and breaching whales are a common site. Jersey Girl is a very modern, well equipped and extremely comfortable vessel. Our four private staterooms each feature private head and shower. The spacious salon features seating for ten, big screen video, a wet bar with ice maker and espresso machine and of course a blender for the perfect margarita. Our spacious decks are the perfect place to catch the rays or the cool breezes, and we have much more space than any catamaran or power yachts our size. Enjoy our unique bean bags, deck chairs, or lounge on the large padded area ahead of the cockpit. Our cockpit features seating, fold up table of cocktails and snacks, or an al fresco dinner. There is plenty of shade for the sunny days of summer. If being wet brings happiness, Jersey Girl has it covered. We have snorkeling equipment, and a marine biologist on board to guide and help identify what is seen. Stand up paddle boards, and even a crystal clear kayak. Our twenty foot by eight foot floating island is one of our more popular toys. Jersey Girl fifteen foot Zodiac tender is powerful enough to go tubing, and make excursions to beaches, reefs, and nearby islands. We often find unique and untouched snorkeling spots, where our guests can be alone with the local inhabitants. If SCUBA is your passion, we operate in conjunction with the premier dive center in Baja, Cortez Expirations, and we can arrange guides, instructors, equipment rentals, and we have a dive compressor on board. Of course no trip to La Paz is complete without swimming with whale sharks, and swimming with the sea lions. Although there are additional costs involved, it is truly a once in a lifetime experience. We are licensed, insured, and permitted in accordance with Mexican law. We are a legal charter operated to the highest standards. Customer service and safety is our highest priority. We look forward to meeting new friends.VRBO
