name: Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel
address: Cont. 5 de Mayo 8, Int 12B, 37760 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 1.4 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a barbecue and to a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room is equipped with a coffee machine, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a stovetop. At Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Casa Grande Luxury Boutique Hotel include Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Allende´s Institute and Chorro´s trip. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 71 km from the hotel.

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Velas Vallarta
address: Paseo de la Marina Norte 585, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Property Location With a stay at velas vallarta in Puerto Vallarta (Marina Vallarta), you'll be a 3-minute drive from Cruise Ship Terminal and 7 minutes from Malecon. This condominium resort is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Bay of Banderas and 5.6 mi (8.9 km) from Playa de los Muertos. description: Modern hotel near the Puerto Vallarta Airport. In the exclusive urbanized area in the heart of the Marina area, comes the modern Holiday Inn & Suites Puerto Vallarta Marina & Golf hotel. We pride ourselves in offering warm and welcoming experiences that provide our guests with the best business and leisure travel. Located just a few meters from the Puerto Vallarta International Airport, and close to the International Convention Center, just 10 minutes from downtown Puerto Vallarta. Discover the city by strolling along Puerto Vallarta's famous boardwalk and explore the alleyways of Old Vallarta's cobblestone streets. A lobby with a lounge welcomes you from your daily activities, and our front desk staff is always ready to assist you. Take time to relax in the new Spa Center, which offers a variety of soothing services, and relax in the beautiful pool and hot tub for public facilities while enjoying a panoramic view of the city. Make the most of our meeting rooms and our spacious boardroom with modern equipment to host events or meet with clients. Unwind in comfortable and spacious rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Zonaz Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in Puerto Vallarta and with Los Muertos Beach reachable within 300 metres, ZonaZ Boutique Hotel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers a garden. Every room includes a balcony with views of the city. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At ZonaZ Boutique Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Puerto Vallarta, like cycling. Amapas Beach is less than 1 km from ZonaZ Boutique Hotel, while Camarones Beach is a 15-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Los Tules Villas del Sol
address: Boulevard Francisco Medina Ascencio Km.2.5, Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Only 5 minutes’ drive from Marina Vallarta and featuring an outdoor pool, Villas del Sol en Los Tules offers its guests free WiFi access, a spa and private beach area. The bright and functional accommodations include a flat-screen cable TV, kitchen and balconies offering panoramic views of the surroundings. Guests will find a restaurant at Villas del Sol offering à la carte services. A variety of restaurants can be found close to the Malecon Boardwalk. At Villas del Sol en Los Tules guests will enjoy of massage services for an additional fee. Activities that can be enjoyed in the surroundings include table tennis and fishing. The property offers free parking. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is located 5 km away.

name: San Trópico Boutique Hotel & Peaceful Escape
address: Flamingos 161, Marina Vallarta, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and views of the mountains, San Trópico Petit Hotel is situated in Puerto Vallarta in the Jalisco Region, 2.4 km from Cruise Ship Pier. The hotel has a sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. The apartments have a flat-screen cable TV and room service. Certain units include a seating area where you can relax and some also have views of the pool or garden. Every room is equipped with 2 full bathrooms. Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Amaca Puerto Vallarta - Adults Only
address: Pino Suarez, 583, Emilio Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel Amaca Puerto Vallarta - Adults Only is located 500 metres from Playa de los Muertos. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout. The rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a desk, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries. Some rooms have a sea view. At Hotel Amaca Puerto Vallarta - Adults Only you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered include a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. This property is 1.2 km from Puerto Vallarta town centre and 7 km form the commercial area. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 11 km away.

name: Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta
address: Calle 567 Lazaro Cardenas, 48130 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor heated pool and ahot tub, Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta is located in Puerto Vallarta, just 1 km from the Pacific Ocean. Each air-conditioned room comes with a cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. Some have views of the pool and tropical gardens. At Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta you will find a shared hot tub, while other facilities offered include meeting spaces and a tour desk. Guests can find restaurants and shops within walking distance. Both Marina Vallarta Golf Club and Licenciado Gustavo Diaz Oraz International Airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

name: Hotel Hacienda de Vallarta Centro
address: Insurgentes 322 Colonia Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from the beaches around Isla Cuale, Hotel Hacienda de Vallarta Centro is located 2 km outside central Puerto Vallarta. It features an outdoor swimming pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Hacienda de Vallarta Centro has traditional, Mexican-style décor. There is cable TV and a private bathroom. The hotel features a 24-hour reception and a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found around the seafront and in the centre of Puerto Vallarta. There is easy access to the 200 Motorway and Puerto Vallarta Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Casa Anita
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad # 601, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set 5 minutes’ walk from Colonia Las Amapas Beach, Casa Anita offers suites with sea views, an indoor and an outdoor swimming pool. Its terrace features a hot tub and views over Puerto Vallarta’s South Shore. Each spacious suite and room at Casa Anita has bright, traditional Mexican décor. There is a balcony, a kitchenette and free Wi-Fi. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found around the oceanfront. The hotel has 3 barbecue areas. The centre of Puerto Vallarta is a 10-minute drive from Casa Anita. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Garza Blanca Preserve Resort & Spa
address: Km. 7.5 A Barra De Navidad, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The spacious open floor plan of this ocean view hotel room exudes a luxurious indoor/outdoor lifestyle. The exquisite finishes of the deluxe room features one king or two queen-sized beds, one bathroom, a fully-stocked wet bar, large flat screen TV, private terrace with sizable hammock along with all the luxury and grandeur of this beautiful ocean view hotel room in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Room decor is contemporary with earth tones and sleek, modern look; featuring large picture windows that look out on the Pacific. Come and enjoy our beautiful stay.VRBO

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Find your balance among 14 acres of swaying palm trees and fronted by a 410-foot private beach on the Pacific Ocean. The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta offers all this splendor only five minutes from Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport and charming downtown Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Lace up for dining and upscale shops at the marina district across the road. Relax at a beachfront pergola and sparkling pool or book an appointment at our serene spa offering head-to-toe pampering. Our Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, resort hotel features a Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and nearby golf courses. Bright colors and tropical Mexican décor grace every ocean-view hotel room at our resort, and each accommodation includes a private balcony, plush Heavenly® Bed and rejuvenating Heavenly® Bath. Recharge the right way at The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta.Marriott

Rooms feature air conditioning, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, balcony, safe, television, mini bar, and telephone. Address: Paseo de la Marina Sur 7, 48354, Puerto Vallarta, JAL, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Olas Altas Suites
address: Rodolfo Gomez 158, Col. Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Olas Altas Suites is located 100 metres from Los Muertos Beach and 20 minutes’ drive from Puerto Vallarta International Airport. It features free Wi-Fi and free parking. The suites at Olas Altas offer art-colourful décor, air conditioning, safety box, seating area and flat-screen cable TV. All of the suites have a fully equipped kitchenette with fridge and stove. The bathroom is private and has shower. Restaurant Michel on site serves Italian food to its guests. Several options within 400 metres as Mexican and local food are available. Olas Altas Suites is 800 metres from Cuale Island and 15 minutes’ drive from Puerto Vallarta Town Centre. Cihuatlán-Puerto Vallarta Motorway is 200 metres away. Guest may request a Private Luxury Yacht and Lunch tour or even shuttle from the airport at an extra cost.

name: Puerto de Luna Pet Friendly and Family Suites
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No.2500, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Surrounded by a beautiful tropical environment, this all-suites hotel features comfortable accommodations, exceptional services and is located within walking distance of the beach. The air-conditioned suites at this property feature a full kitchen, plus a seating area with a sofa and a cable TV. They offer balconies with views of the gardens. Guests at Puerto de Luna Pet Friendly and Family Suites can easily discover the surrounding area and attractions with help from the travel agency, located in the lobby. Beautiful beaches are located a short distance away and offer many water activities.

name: Lindo Mar Resort
address: Km 2.5 Carretera a Barra de Navidad, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Lindo Mar Resort is a beachfront property with an outdoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Car rental services are available on site and the property is guarded 24 hours a day. The apartments at Lindo Mar Resort include fully equipped kitchens, cable TV, plus seating and dining areas. They have safety deposit boxes and maid services are available. The bathrooms have showers. The restaurant at Lindo Mar Resort serves traditional Mexican dishes, and guests will find a variety of restaurants at Puerto Vallarta’s town centre, 12 minutes’ drive away. Guests may enjoy Vista Vallarta Golf Course, which is 18.4 km from Lindo Mar Resort, and Paradise Mall is 23 km away. Puerto Vallarta International Airport can be reached in a 25-minute drive.

Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features at this Baroque hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and a communal living room. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 200 meters. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to noon for a fee. name: Bb De Rohan
address: Sqaq Numru 11 Triq Il-Kbira, Żebbuġ, Haz-Zebbug
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, BB De Rohan offers accommodation in Żebbuġ, 7 km from Valletta and 4 km from Mdina. The rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a shared lounge and a free outdoor pool at the property. You can play billiards at the bed and breakfast. The bed and breakfast also offers bike hire and car hire. St Julian's is 7 km from BB De Rohan, while Sliema is 7 km away. Malta International Airport is 4 km from the property and the Blue Grotto can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Malta Central
description: Malta's leading upper midscale serviced Aparthotel offers all Accor service excellence with modern state of the art design and technology, ideal also for extended stays. The hotel's 70 Studios, One-Bedroom Apartments and Penthouses are designed in an urban casual and stylish atmosphere. The rooftop pool offers a spectacular view over the Bay, Valletta, Sliema, Gzira and Manoel island. The hotel is centrally located in a quiet residential area, near the main hospital Mater Dei and University of Malta.accorhotels.com

name: Lulu Boutique Hotel
address: 29, Triq L-Innu Malti, Żebbuġ, Gozo ZBG 3505
description: Located in Żebbuġ and with Hagar Qim reachable within 6.8 km, Lulu Boutique Hotel provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms come with a balcony and others also offer pool views. At Lulu Boutique Hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Żebbuġ, like snorkelling. Lulu Boutique Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Valletta Waterfront is 7.2 km from the hotel, while Hal Saflieni Hypogeum is 7.6 km away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 4 km from Lulu Boutique Hotel.

name: The Burrow Guest House
address: The Burrow, No. 3, Sqaq No. 4, Tarxien TXN 1740
description: Set in a unique 15th-century house, this family-run guest house lies in the small village of Tarxien. The ancient Tarxien Temples are a 5-minute walk away. WiFi is free throughout the property. Rooms at The Burrow Host feature antique furnishings and exposed stone walls. Each includes tiled or parquet floors. All rooms come with air conditioning, balcony or a patio. The property was renovated in February of 2018. The Burrow Host Guest House is 6 km from Valletta and a 7-minute taxi ride from Malta International Airport. Sandy beaches can be reached in 10 minutes by buses that stop just outside.

name: Eurostars Oporto
address: Rua do Mestre Guilherme Camarinha, 212, Porto, Porto
description: Eurostars Oporto is a modern design hotel located 100 metres from Hospital São João Metro. The hotel offers a breakfast daily, contemporary rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas. All guest rooms at Eurostars Oporto have hardwood floors and flatscreen TVs. Each has a private balcony and a tiled en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a glass of local Porto wine in the bar. Regional and international meals can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. The 24-hour front desk can help with car and bicycle rental. Matosinho Beach is only 8 km away, and Oporto’s Dragao Football Stadium just 3 km. This Eurostars Hotel is conveniently located 10 minutes’ Metro journey from Porto’s historic centre. It is 10 minutes’ drive from Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport.

name: Koolhouse Porto
description: Located in Avenida da Boavista and 4 minutes’ walking from Boavista Roundabout, the Koolhouse Porto is an historic house with a garden and free WiFi access. This guest house offers accommodation in private rooms and one-bedroom apartments. All units have an elegant décor with sober shades. Bathrooms are modern and include a walk-in shower. Some apartments include a kitchenette, and some rooms have a mini-bar. All units have tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen cable TV. Guests are less than 10 minutes’ walking from Bom Sucesso shopping centre, where a variety of shops and dining options are available. Bom Sucesso market, located across the street from the shopping centre, also has gourmet dining options for lunch and dinner. Koolhouse Porto is 2.3 km from Serralves Garden and Park. A pleasant 20-minute walk takes guests to Cristal Palace Gardens, and 10 minutes’ walking further guests will find Clérigos Tower. Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is within a 15-minute drive from the Koolhouse, and the A1 motorway is less than 2 km away.

name: Babosas Village by Our Madeira
address: Caminho Das Babosas n14, 9050-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a stovetop and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Quinta Cova do Milho
address: Caminho do Poiso, 191, 9100-262 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: No description found

name: PortoBay Serra Golf
address: Sítio Dos Casais Próximos, - 0 ., 9100-255 Santo Antonio da Serra, Madeira
description: PortoBay Serra Golf is a small charming estate with tasteful decoration, surrounded by nature and Madeiran traditions. with the golf course nearby!! Feel like you're in the heart of the country, with luxurious greenery, and a welcoming environments. The main house, dating from 1920, was restored in 1999 and is classified as part of the region's heritage. The faade, with decorative elements from the Art Nouveaux period, the frieze of floral tiles, windows with white wooden slats, and its fish-scale roof are unique features. In the PortoBay Serra Golf garden there are over 90 species, subspecies and a variety of flowers and plants to be found, some of them found only on the island, and all duly identified.iHotelier/iStay

name: Arts In Hotel Conde Carvalhal
description: This restored Madeiran mansion is located 900 metres from Funchal's Old Town and has scenic views of the sea, the city and the mountains from its own botanical gardens and terraces. Free WiFi and free covered private parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms of ARTS IN Hotel Conde Carvalhal have flat-screen TVs, bright and modern furnishings and wooden floors. Bathrobes are provided in all rooms. Some have an equipped kitchenette and a balcony. The suites are located in the original mansion, while the studios are situated in the modern annex. For guests’ convenience, a breakfast is served daily, containing homegrown, organic herbal teas and fruits, daily pastries, eggs and fresh juice. Guests can also enjoy a relaxing therapeutic massage. ARTS IN Hotel Conde Carvalhal staff can arrange scooter, car and bicycle rental. There is a shuttle service available, and Madeira Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Reid's Palace, A Belmond Hotel, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff in 10 acres of subtropical gardens overlooking the Atlantic, this 5-star resort features an oceanfront spa, 3 swimming pools and direct access to oceanic waters. All rooms at Reid's Palace are elegantly furnished and include a balcony and marble bathroom with amenities. A minibar with complimentary soft drinks and free in-room movies are available to each room. Reid’s Palace Spa features indoor and outdoor therapy suites with a private whirlpool. It offers an indulgent menu of treatments using world-class spa brands. Dry and wet saunas are also on site. Active guests can play a match on the tennis courts, or get energised with cardiovascular equipment at the modern gym. Madeira's finest ingredients are brought to life at Michelin-starred William Restaurant, while the Villa Cipriani serves classic Italian dishes. The Dining Room organises elegant soirees in Edwardian ambiance, during the winter season. The Reid’s is 3 km from Praia Formosa Beach and 15 minutes’ walk to Funchal city centre with plenty of nightlife. It provides free private parking.

name: Porto Santa Maria Hotel
address: Avenida do Mar e Das Comunidades Madeirenses, 50, 9050-029 Funchal, Madeira
description: Porto Santa Maria is located at the water's edge with direct access to the sea front promenade. Behind the hotel lies the old centre of Funchal, the well-known "old town". Its close relationship to the sea, the outstanding and exclusive views over the harbour where the cruise ships dock, its picturesque surroundings and the unique flavours of its cuisine result in genuine urban tranquility. The Porto Santa Marias location is fantastic for both the actively inclined and those who would prefer to relax and listen to the breaking of waves. A congenial hotel offering 146 rooms, restaurant, bars with terrace, direct access to the promenade, outdoor pool, indoor pool, SPA, gym, parking (extra fee). all in the heart of the city. Porto Santa Maria is an adult only hotel, only accepting reservations for guests over 16 years old.iHotelier/iStay

name: Dom Pedro Garajau
description: Dom Pedro Garajau is located in the south coast of Madeira Island, between Funchal and Caniço. The hotel features modern rooms with balcony and a large outdoor pool. The hotel’s rooms have wooden furniture and are decorated in neutral colours. Each room has satellite TV and a balcony with view of the gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. Guests can relax on the sun loungers around the pool, or just enjoy the sea view from the indoor pool with the sliding roof. The hotel has a sports court, where guests have the opportunity to play volleyball and badminton. The hotel is 9 km away from Funchal and provides a tour desk. Madeira International Airport is only 11 km away and a car rental service is available on site.

name: Florasol Residence Hotel
description: Boasting views of the Atlantic Ocean, Florasol Residence Hotel is a 12-minute drive from Funchal city centre. It has a large outdoor pool and offers self-catering rooms and apartments. Florasol Residence Hotel's accommodations feature furnished balconies and panoramic views. They come equipped with a seating area, and cable TV. Some rooms overlook the beach and the Atlantic Ocean. Mesalusa Restaurant has an indoor seating area and a sun terrace where guests can enjoy international cuisine and regional dishes made from fresh ingredients. It offers a buffet breakfast and has a lush garden with palm trees and hammocks. Florasol's guests can relax in a sun lounger poolside or visit the games room that includes billiards and table tennis. There is also a children playground. Florasol Residence Hotel is located 2 km from Avenida do Mar and 16 km from Madeira Airport. It offers free on-site private parking (upon availability).

name: Quinta Santo Antonio Da Serra
address: Estrada Santo Antonio Da Serra, 477, 9100-255 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and nearby pool access, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Santa Maria - Hostel
address: Rua De Santa Maria 145, 9060-200 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located within a traditional and historical building in Funchal old town, Santa Maria Hostel is a boutique hostel featuring a vintage-style décor. The hostel offers a restaurant with an excellent variety of both international and local cuisine. Ranging from dorms to private accommodation, each unit at the Santa Maria is decorated with attention to detail in a very colorful way. Dorm rooms have lockers, individual reading lights and access to shared bathroom facilities. Extra bed is necessary to request to the Hostel. Guests can use a fully equipped kitchen to prepare their meals. The restaurant on the ground floor serves a variety of meals based on fish, from sushi to the freshly caught fish. A mezzanine floor encloses the lounge area, with a reading nook, a flat-screen TV and sofas. There is also an outdoor seating area, where guests are welcome to relax. The central location of Santa Maria means guests are a few steps from the lively bar street, and a cable car can also be found within walking distance. Santa Maria Hostel is 17 km from Madeira International Airport, and a chargeable airport shuttle is available. The Funchal Sé Cathedral is within 10 minutes’ walking.

name: Moradia Cor de Rosa
address: Caminho do Pico Pequeno nº33, 9200-142 Machico, Madeira
description: Situated in Machico, within 2.2 km of Banda d'Alem Beach and 2.3 km of Sao Roque Beach, Moradia Cor de Rosa provides accommodation with a garden and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting full-day security, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The guest house features sea views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. At the guest house, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms will provide guests with a outdoor furniture and a kettle. Guests at Moradia Cor de Rosa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Machico, like hiking. Santana's traditional houses is 18 km from the accommodation, while Marina do Funchal is 23 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 3 km from Moradia Cor de Rosa.

name: Canico Bay Apartments
address: Rua D. Francisco Santana, 9125-000 Caniço, Madeira
description: This aparthotel features an outdoor pool, dry cleaning, and laundry facilities. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Additionally, express check-out, tour/ticket assistance, and multilingual staff are onsite. Each apartment provides a TV with satellite channels, plus a kitchen with a refrigerator, a stovetop, and a microwave. Added amenities include free WiFi, a furnished balcony, and room service.Expedia

name: Balancal Apartments and Villas Palheiro Village
description: Located in Funchal, Balancal Apartments offers an outdoor pool. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 1 km from Palheiro Golf Course. The apartments will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a hairdryer, the private bathrooms also comes with a bidet and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy sea view and city view from the room. Guests can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen that each apartment provides. Alternatively guests can taste the local gastronomy at the restaurant on site. The Ecological Park of Funchal is 10 km away and the Old Town centre is 6 km away. Reis Magos Beach is 11 km away and the city of Machico with its golden sand beach is 20 km away. Madeira International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Bio Quinta do Pantano, Agro Turismo
description: A Studio consists of 1 open space room with a wood burning stove and two single beds or an XL double bed and the possibility of placing two extra beds. It contains 1 bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer, a fully equipped kitchenette and a direct exit to the gardens, which have a table for dining outside. The Studios are also equipped with Econo-Heat heating, wireless internet and cable TV. These are prepared to accommodate two people, however, it has the capacity to accommodate a maximum of three people. With an area of 14,000 m2, the Quinta has been in the Pereira family since 1928, it owes its name to the swamp in it and contains a small sample of the vast Madeiran flora that can be enjoyed by any visitor through a pleasant walk. by the property. In addition to being very well situated, just 150 meters from the village center, with easy access to bus stops, the health center, the pharmacy, restaurants, the supermarket and the church, Quinta do Pântano is a quiet and peaceful place. reserved, with a country setting and a magnificent surrounding landscape, ideal for resting and recovering from everyday city stress. Biological certification is another quality of the Quinta. In addition to the production of flowers, we are dedicated to the cultivation of vegetables and various fruits, with which we make jams. Our goal is not mass production, but to produce with quality, thus preserving all the benefits of the food and, at the same time, enhancing its flavor. For an additional cost, our guests can enjoy a fantastic breakfast that, in addition to bread, milk, tea and coffee, contains typical fruits of the region and organic products from the farm such as homemade jams and eggs. As a welcome sign, Quinta do Pântano offers its customers the first breakfast of their stay. At Quinta, our guests can enjoy a magnificent landscape and a cozy atmosphere, as well as a transfer service, free parking, laundry service, babysitting service, common barbecue, sun loungers and tables for meals in the gardens.Expedia

name: Inn & Art Madeira
address: Rua Robert Baden Powell 61-62, 9125-036 Caniço, Madeira
description: Inn & Art Madeira has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Caniço. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 1.2 km of Reis Magos Beach. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the inn, rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. The rooms have a safety deposit box. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Inn & Art Madeira. Marina do Funchal is 11 km from the accommodation, while Girao Cape is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International, 12 km from Inn & Art Madeira, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Bay House
description: Spectacular Villa with breath-taking views over the ocean,the entire Funchal bay and the mountains. location is great 15 minuts by car to the airport and 8 minuts to city FUNCHAL. and walking distance 4 minuts to bus stop. 10 minutes to Palheiro Golf. two bedrooms with private baths ocean view, kitchen and dinning you can enjoy your favorite drink while watching the sunsets. all facade is glass to the varanda and ocean, garage has direct access to the house espresso machine and coffee Lavazza.free WIFI and TV.VRBO

name: Porto Santo House Rosário Coelho
address: Estrada Regional 120 Serra Fora Vivenda Rosario, 9400-105 Porto Santo, Madeira
description: Situated in Porto Santo, less than 500 meters from Porto De Frades Beach and with the Porto Santo Beach being 8 km away, Porto Santo House Rosário Coelho offers a garden and free Wi-Fi. The beautiful stretch of 8 km long of sandy beaches along the south of the island begins at 4.6 km away from the property. You can have a stroll before getting to the beaches and along the way find sightseeing spots and restaurants. The nearest airport is Porto Santo Airport, 4 km from the country house.

name: Valle Paraizo
address: Estrada Regional 102, n-161. Vale Paraíso, 9135-060 Camacha, Madeira
description: Perfect for guests seeking to experience country living on Madeira, these chalets are tucked away on a private estate near Camacha, a village near Funchal. All units are serviced twice a week and include a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, making Valleparaizo the ideal getaway. Breakfast is available upon request and at an additional cost. Each of the 11 chalets is detached and built in regional style. Read a book in front of the fireplace or relax outside on the patio. Surrounded by various fruit trees and wild flowers, Valle Paraizo radiates an idyllic atmosphere. Take a relaxing stroll through the gardens or watch farm animals together with your children. Pets are also welcome, ensuring a truly fun family holiday.

name: Quinta da Praia das Fontes
address: Largo do Marques de Soydos, 2890-032 Setúbal, Setubal
description: A XVI century Manor House, Quinta Da Praia is a traditional posada with panoramic views 20 km out of Lisbon. It features horse riding facilities, a pool and a tennis court. The well appointed and spacious rooms of the Quinta Da Praia Das Fontes offer a bath, TV and a seating area with fireplace. Free WiFi connection is available in the public areas of the hotel, which includes a games room. Guests can also enjoy the surroundings near the river Tagus by bicycle. Set in the picturesque town of Alcochete, Quinta Da Praia Das Fontes is 15 minutes away from Lisbon Airport and 20 minutes from Lisbon city centre.

name: Penha Longa Resort
address: Estrada da Lagoa Azul, Linho, 2714-511 Sintra, Lisbon District
description: Breaking the lush landscape of Sintra’s rolling green hills Penha Longa Resort is a reminder that true beauty withstands time. The hotel, the only within the natural park, seamlessly incorporates a 14th century monastery and chapel within its luxurious setting. A 27-hole championship golf course is to be both played and admired family-focused activities celebrate nature and tradition; and three of nine dining experiences hold coveted Michelin stars.Marriott

name: Vale del Rei Hotel & Villas
address: Quinta Vale D'el Rei 8400-421 Carvoeiro, 8400-421 Praia do Carvoeiro, Faro
description: Set in the rural Algarve landscape, Vale d'El Rei Resort is surrounded by vineyards and only 3 km from the sandy Marinha Beach. It has 2 pools, a stream, and lake. Decorated in warm chocolate and earthy tones, all spacious rooms feature wicker and suede furnishings. Fitted with terracotta flooring, each has a satellite TV. The Pool Terrace serves a buffet breakfast and light meals. Mediterranean cuisine can be enjoyed at the Serenata restaurant while the Calabash Café offers a nice setting for cocktails. Relaxation facilities at Vale d'El Rei Resort include a day spa with sauna, hot tub and Turkish baths as well a lit tennis court. The hotel activities team can arrange horse riding, mountain biking and fishing excursions. Vale d'El Rei Resort provides guests with a free shuttle service to Carvoeiro Beach.

name: Sheraton Cascais Resort
address: Rua Das Palmeiras Lote 5 - Quinta da Marinha, Cascais, Lisbon District
description: Sheraton Cascais Resort has an enviable location on Portugal’s sweeping Atlantic coast just 30 minutes from Lisbon and about a mile from the famous Guincho Beach, one of the best surfing spots in Europe.The Resort, located near the finest golf courses in Portugal, has a fine dining restaurant and bar, a world-class wellness & beauty spa, a health & fitness club and two outdoor swimming pools, overlooking beautifully landscaped gardens. Offering 156 accommodations from Deluxe Rooms to 3 Bedroom Suites that transform our guests experience. A Glass Terrace restaurant with access to the garden provides a welcoming atmosphere. Our luxurious Serenity Spa offers a wide range of wellness and reinvigorating treatments to recharge both body and soul. Evoking tranquility and serenity, the rooms and suites are integrated within the beautiful surroundings and overlook the resort grounds and gardens.Marriott

name: Casa Vela Boutique House
address: Rua Dos Bem Lembrados 17, 2750-306 Cascais, Lisbon District
description: No description found

name: Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the design Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort features an outdoor pool with sun loungers. Guests can relax in the Spa, offering a varied range of treatments and massages. The property comprises an 18-hole golf course and the clubhouse offers a restaurant, 2 bars and bag storage area. With free WiFi access, the spacious and natural-light rooms come with a satellite LCD TV and air conditioning. The typical Portuguese-tile bathroom is equipped with bathrobes and a bath tub. All rooms were decorated by a design studio. Guests will also a find a fitness centre. The unit has views over golf course, Atlantic Ocean and the Óbidos Lagoon. Lisbon's Portela Airport is 1-hour driving distance from Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Bom Sucesso Resort
address: Lugar DO Bom Sucesso - Vau 27, 2510-665 Óbidos, Leiria
description: Located next to Óbidos Lagoon, this 5-star resort offers uniquely designed villas, just a 15-minute drive from the medieval town of Óbidos. It features an outdoor pool, and an 18-hole golf course. Designed by famous architects, all villas and houses of Bom Sucesso have a private furnished patio that leads to the garden. All elegant and sophisticated accommodation features a kitchen and common areas decorated in a contemporary style. Daily cleaning is included. The Guardian Bom Sucesso Golf, a golf course with a PGA rating, occupies an area exceeding 60 hectares and has 18 holes, a driving range and a golf academy. Bom Sucesso Holiday Design Villas offers 4 tennis courts, 2 paddle tennis courts, football pitch and a kids club. Bom Sucesso’s restaurant and bars offer international cuisine and Mediterranean dishes with a Portuguese touch. Breakfast is served at the golf club house. During the summer, a shuttle to transport guests to the beach and Óbidos is available. The property is a 60-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport.

name: Pestana Sintra Golf
address: Quinta de Beloura, Rua Mato da Mina, 19, 2710-692 Sintra, Lisbon District
description: Located in Quinta da Beloura, this hotel is next to an 18-hole golf course and 3 km from Sintra’s centre. It features a spa, indoor and outdoor pools and tennis courts. The air-conditioned rooms at the Pestana Sintra Golf and Spa Resort feature a contemporary design and amenities including a flat-screen TV. Many rooms include balconies with views of the Sintra Hills. The Mourisco Restaurant serves traditional Portuguese cuisine and international dishes in a charming upscale setting. The O Chafariz Bar serves fine cocktails and snacks by the gardens. The Pestana Sintra has 2 outdoor swimming pools and an indoor pool and spa area. The Physio Spa offers a sauna and Turkish baths, as well as deluxe massage services. As a sustainability measure, the indoor pool's water will only be heated to 26ºC The Pestana is 7 km from the cosmopolitan seaside resorts of Estoril and Cascais. Free parking is available on site, upon availability.

name: Vale d'Oliveiras Quinta Resort & Spa
address: Barranco Fundo, Apartado 79, 8401-904 Praia do Carvoeiro, Faro
description: Peacefully located in Carvoeiro’s countryside and surrounded by lush gardens, this resort features an outdoor pool surrounded by palm trees and a fully equipped spa and gym. Free Wi Fi is available. The bright and airy rooms and suites at the 5-star Vale d'Oliveiras Quinta Resort & Spa feature a balcony or terrace overlooking the resort's grounds. The suites are self catering and have a fully equipped kitchen with a washing machine. The Olive Tree Restaurant serves Portuguese and Mediterranean dishes on the terrace, which overlooks the swimming pool. The hotel also offers the Jasmin Bar, which serves light meals and healthy options prepared with fresh ingredients. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxation therapies at the spa, including full-body massages and hot-stone massages. There is also a Turkish bath and indoor pool. For younger guests, the Quinta Resort offers a children’s playground with fun activities. Gramacho and Vale da Pinta golf courses are within 2 km.

name: The Village Praia d'El Rey Golf & Beach Resort
address: Avenida D. Pedro I, No. 30, 2510-453 Óbidos, Leiria
description: Located next to the Atlantic Coast, The Village - Praia D’El Rey Golf & Beach Resort offers spacious self-catering apartments, townhouses and villas. The accommodation is divided by properties "By the Garden", which are located next to the golf course, and by properties "By the Ocean", which are next to the resort's northern beach. Accommodation is done in a modern decor with cable TV. It includes a kitchen with kitchenware, a refrigerator, as well as a microwave and dishwasher. A dining area is provided. The apartments and townhouses have access to a condominium swimming pool, while the villas each enjoy their own private swimming pool. For a special rate, guests have access to the Hotel Marriott's facilities, which include a spa, fitness centre, bar, 2 restaurants and a championship golf course. These facilities are within 1 to 3 km, depending on the booked accommodation. Other activities, such as scuba diving, are organized within the resort. The resort is 20 km from the medieval town of Óbidos. The fishing village of Peniche is 19 km away. Lisbon Airport is 75 km away. Guests may rent a car at the resort. Free parking is possible on-site. There also is a free resort shuttle.

name: Pelican Alvor
description: Modern design and a tranquil setting make this aparthotel, located only a few minutes from Alvor’s centre, a welcome retreat from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Close to Ria do Alvor Natural Reserve, it enjoys a green setting and offers 2 swimming pools, one for adults and one for children. All of the Pelican Alvor apartments have spacious balconies and are equipped with a full kitchenette, air conditioning and a satellite TV. Each unit has a private bathroom as well as a safety deposit box, which is available at an extra charge. Guests are welcome to relax on the balcony of their elegantly furnished apartment or studio. Large windows ensure plenty of natural light even on rainy days. Ria Restaurante offers a buffet breakfast service. Guests can take a snack at the bar while enjoying the view of the gardens. Guests can also enjoy a meal in the local restaurants and bars. The apartment's kitchenette comes with dishwasher, microwave and a coffee maker. The Alvor Beach is only 2 km away and can be easily reached via car, as can Praia da Rocha Beach, which is within a 10-minute drive. Alvor's centre is 1.7 km away. Faro International Airport is 67 km from Pelican Alvor. A bus stop is available at 500 metres and free parking is available in the property's surrounding area.

name: Tulipán Vendégház

name: Balkon Apartmanház Panzió
description: Situated in Balatonfüred in the Veszprem region and Eszterhazy Beach reachable within 1.6 km, Balkon Apartmanház Panzió features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some rooms feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. The bed and breakfast offers an outdoor fireplace. There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go cycling and hiking nearby. Popular points of interest near Balkon Apartmanház Panzió include Balatonfured Kisfaludy, Balatonfüred train station and Annagora Aquapark. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton, 87 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tóth nyaraló
description: Located in Balatongyörök in the Zala region and Balatongyorok Beach reachable within 1.5 km, Tóth nyaraló provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a garden and free private parking. Each unit is equipped with a terrace offering mountain views, a satellite flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers an outdoor fireplace. Cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Thermal Lake Hévíz is 15 km from Tóth nyaraló, while Sümeg Castle is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Güns Vendégház
description: Boasting pool with a view, open-air bath and views of mountain, Güns Vendégház is located in Szigliget, 27 km from Thermal Lake Hévíz. Featuring free shuttle service, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. The guest house provides certain rooms that include a safety deposit box, and each room is equipped with a private bathroom and a outdoor furniture. At Güns Vendégház the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and halal options. The accommodation offers a picnic area. The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and free use of bicycles is available at Güns Vendégház. Staff at the guest house are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. Sümeg Castle is 30 km from Güns Vendégház, while Tihany Abbey is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton, 37 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lídia vendégház
description: Set in Tata, within 31 km of Courtyard of Europe and 31 km of Fortress of Komarno, Lídia vendégház offers accommodation with free bikes and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Each room is equipped with a terrace with garden views. The units at the guest house come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. At Lídia vendégház all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Tata, like cycling. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 82 km from Lídia vendégház.

name: Harmony Park Hotel & Spa
address: Saulės Vaikų g. 18, Vazgaikiemo k., Balbieriškio seniūnija, Prienų rajonas, Prienai LT-59257
description: Offering free entry to the baths area, Harmony Park Hotel & SPA is situated in a peaceful and quiet area of Vazgaikiemis. It features spacious, air-conditioned rooms with elegant interior design and a minibar. All rooms are stylishly decorated with patterned carpets, graphic tiles and high quality furniture. Each comes with a seating area and a large bathroom with a bathtub and a hairdryer. You can visit Harmony Park Hotel's spa centre with a hot tub, a steam bath and massage treatments. Horse riding, cycling and other sports activities are available. Breakfast is served every morning in the luxurious restaurant, which offers gourmet dishes that you can enjoy on a large terrace. Barbecue facilities and room service are available. Harmony Park Hotel & SPA is located 1.5 km from the main road leading to the city of Alytus, 26 km away. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Vila Elvina
description: Vila Elvina is located 850 metres from the Baltic Sea and offers warmly decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests are welcome to relax in the garden with barbecue facilities or use a sauna. Each room at the Elvina includes a kitchenette with essential cooking utensils. There is also a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A TV and a safety deposit box are also provided. The property includes a children’s playground and bicycle rentals. There is a 24-hour front desk service and free private parking. Vila Elvina is situated in a quiet part of Palanga, 1.8 km from the town centre. The nearest store is 150 metres away and the Palanga International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel & Resort
address: Avenida Niemeyer 121 - Leblon, Rio de Janeiro 22450-220
description: Located near the beaches of Rio de Janeiro Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel and Resort offers one of the only beachfront resorts with an extensive recreational area, hotel spa and other amenities. Find us tucked between trendy Barra da Tijuca and famed Ipanema Beach. Our full-service luxury resort offers extensive business facilities in a tropical setting. Take our complimentary shuttle to nearby Leblon Beach and its upscale shopping mall. Stroll our resort's lush, landscaped grounds, set on a white-sand beach facing the tropical South Atlantic, flanked by Brazils towering mountains. Each of the 538 hotel rooms and suites at our Rio de Janeiro resort include Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds, as well as private balconies with partial or full ocean views. Reserve a club-level accommodation for complimentary access to the Sheraton Club Lounge and a private area for breakfast.MarriottRead less

name: Barra Family Resort - 3 Quartos
address: Avenida Das Américas 13.600, Bloco 3, Apto 902, Rio de Janeiro 22790-702
description: Barra Family Resort - Lindo 3 Quartos features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The apartment includes 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms with free toiletries, a living room and a fully-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen smart TV is featured on the living room, and another smaller flat-screen TV is featured on one of the bedrooms. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. Barra Family Resort also features a wellness area, where guests can make the most of facilities like a hot tub and a sauna. A children's playground can be found at the accommodation, along with a sun terrace.Read less

name: Le Parc Residential Resort
address: Avenida Tim Lopes, 255-Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro 22640-908
description: 17 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens in Rio de Janeiro, Le Parc Residential Resort provides accommodation with access to a hot spring bath, hammam and beauty services. This property offers access to a balcony, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. The apartment features an infinity pool with a pool bar, as well as a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance. There is a snack bar, bar and lounge. The apartment also features an indoor pool and a steam room for guests to relax in. For guests with children, Le Parc Residential Resort offers an indoor play area, a baby safety gate and a children's playground. A kids' club is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax in the garden. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 19 km from Le Parc Residential Resort, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 28 km from the apartment.Read less

name: Joaquina Guest House
address: 766 Avenida Prefeito Acácio Garibaldi S. Thiago, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: Situated in Florianópolis and with Praia Lagoa da Conceição reachable within 600 metres, Joaquina Guest House features express check-in and check-out, rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. At the guest house rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Some rooms have a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a minibar. All rooms at Joaquina Guest House are fitted with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. You can play billiards at Joaquina Guest House, and the area is popular for hiking and fishing. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Praia do GravatĂˇ, Mole beach and Conceição Lagoon.

description: Situated in Florianópolis, within 600 metres of Ingleses Beach and 22 km of Floripa Mall, Pousada Ondas de Floripa features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The inn has a hot tub and a shared kitchen. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. The units at the inn come with a private bathroom and bed linen. Guests at Pousada Ondas de Floripa will be able to enjoy activities in and around Florianópolis, like hiking and fishing. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 27 km from the accommodation, while Campeche Island is 35 km from the property. name: Holiday Florianópolis - 267B
description: Located in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region and Ingleses Beach reachable within 200 metres, Holiday Florianópolis - 267B provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, water sports facilities and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.7 km from Brava Beach. Guests have access to a sauna, steam room and can also attend fitness classes. The spacious aparthotel with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the aparthotel. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security. Guests can chill out in the on-site bar, while a grocery delivery service is also available. You can play billiards and table tennis at the aparthotel, and the area is popular for fishing and hiking. Kids pool is also available at Holiday Florianópolis - 267B, while guests can also relax in the garden. Floripa Mall is 25 km from the accommodation, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 30 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 40 km from Holiday Florianópolis - 267B.

The property is located 15 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall, 18 km from Campeche Island and 19 km from Floripa Mall. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hostel, every room includes a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a city view. Featuring a shared bathroom, rooms at Hostel do Morro also provide guests with a sea view. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Florianópolis, like cycling. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 25 km from the hostel.

name: Casa da Marilú
address: Servidão do Jornalista, 135 Praia do Santinho, Florianopolis 88058-724
description: Located in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, with Ingleses Beach and Santinho Beach nearby, Casa da Marilú features accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. Situated on the beachfront, this property features free bikes, a garden and barbecue facilities. The aparthotel provides mountain views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels. There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service and packed lunches are also available. Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the aparthotel can arrange a car rental service. Floripa Mall is 26 km from Casa da Marilú, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 40 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pousada Cris Garden Bed&Breakfast
address: 282 Rua Salto Floriano Em frente Aduana Brasil/Argentina, Foz do Iguaçu 85855-771
description: Situated in Foz do Iguaçu, 4.8 km from Iguazu Casino, Pousada Cris Garden Bed&Breakfast features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Located around 22 km from Iguazu Falls, the hotel with free WiFi is also 23 km away from Iguaçu National Park. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms also boast a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Pousada Cris Garden Bed&Breakfast each room is fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation offers a barbecue. You can play table tennis at Pousada Cris Garden Bed&Breakfast, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. Iguaçu Waterfalls is 23 km from the hotel, while Garganta del Diablo is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Foz do Iguacu/Cataratas International, 8 km from Pousada Cris Garden Bed&Breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Foz Casa Do Turista
address: Rua Gregório Dotto, 58, Foz do Iguaçu 85863-755
description: Located 800 metres from Foz do Iguaçu city centre and 18 km from Iguaçu Falls, Foz Casa do Turista offers a pool and non-smoking rooms in a homey atmosphere. Wi-Fi is free. Decorated with dark wooden floors and soft lighting, the rooms at Casa do Turista are spacious and bright, with large windows. They have a flat-screen TV and some offer a shared bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Foz Casa do Turista is located 300 metres from JL Cataratas Shopping Centre, 400 metres from Foz do Iguaçu Bus Terminal and 15 km from Itaipú Hydroelectric Power Plant. Free parking is provided.

name: The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível
address: Shtn Trecho 2 lote 4 - Asa Norte, Brasília - DF, Brasil, Brasilia 70800-220
description: Situated in Brasilia, 4 km from Palace of Justice, The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation offers a kids' club and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. At The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a hot spring bath. National Congress of Brazil is 4.8 km from The Sun Resort - Super Apartamento de 2 quartos - 1 suíte e 1 reversível, while Brasília Cathedral is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 22 km from the resort.
